src/store/persistConfig.ts

authTransform
Type : object
Default value : { in: (inboundState: any) => { // Filter out sensitive data before persisting if (inboundState?.user?.password) { // eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars const {password, ...userWithoutPassword} = inboundState.user; return { ...inboundState, user: userWithoutPassword, }; } return inboundState; }, out: (outboundState: any) => { // Check token expiration on rehydration if (outboundState?.lastLoginTime) { const tokenAge = Date.now() - outboundState.lastLoginTime; const maxAge = 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000; // 24 hours if (tokenAge > maxAge) { console.log('[Persist] Token expired, clearing auth state'); return { ...outboundState, isLoggedIn: false, token: undefined, refreshToken: undefined, user: undefined, lastLoginTime: undefined, }; } } return outboundState; }, }

Auth transform to filter sensitive data and handle token expiration
persistConfig
Type : object
Default value : { key: 'root', storage: securePersistAdapter, whitelist: [ 'auth', 'servicesCart', 'leadsApi', 'quotationsApi', 'notifications', 'tickets', ], // Persist auth, cart, and leads cache-state blacklist: [ 'ui', // Never persist UI state 'checkout', // Ephemeral – never persist sensitive checkout drafts ], transforms: [ { key: 'auth', ...authTransform, }, { key: 'servicesCart', in: (state: any) => { // Validate cart state before persisting try { if (!state || typeof state !== 'object') { return null; } return state; } catch (error) { console.warn('[Persist] Invalid cart state, not persisting:', error); return null; } }, out: (state: any) => { // Validate cart state when loading from storage try { if (!state) { return {items: {}, totalItems: 0, lastUpdated: null}; } // Validate structure if (typeof state !== 'object' || !state.items) { console.warn('[Persist] Corrupted cart state, resetting'); return {items: {}, totalItems: 0, lastUpdated: null}; } return state; } catch (error) { console.warn('[Persist] Error loading cart state, resetting:', error); return {items: {}, totalItems: 0, lastUpdated: null}; } }, }, { key: 'leadsApi', ...leadsApiTransform, }, { key: 'quotationsApi', ...quotationsApiTransform, }, { key: 'notifications', in: (state: any) => { // Validate notifications state before persisting try { if (!state || typeof state !== 'object') { console.warn( '[Persist] Invalid notifications state, not persisting' ); return null; } // Validate structure if (!Array.isArray(state.items) || !Array.isArray(state.readIds)) { console.warn( '[Persist] Invalid notifications structure, not persisting' ); return null; } console.log('[Persist] Persisting notifications:', { itemsCount: state.items.length, readIdsCount: state.readIds.length, unreadCount: state.unreadCount, }); return state; } catch (error) { console.warn( '[Persist] Error persisting notifications state:', error ); return null; } }, out: (state: any) => { // Validate notifications state when loading from storage try { if (!state) { console.log( '[Persist] No notifications state found, using initial state' ); return { items: [], readIds: [], unreadCount: 0, lastFetched: null, isPolling: false, pollError: null, }; } // Validate structure and provide fallbacks if (typeof state !== 'object') { console.warn('[Persist] Corrupted notifications state, resetting'); return { items: [], readIds: [], unreadCount: 0, lastFetched: null, isPolling: false, pollError: null, }; } // Ensure required fields exist with proper types const validatedState = { items: Array.isArray(state.items) ? state.items : [], readIds: Array.isArray(state.readIds) ? state.readIds : [], unreadCount: typeof state.unreadCount === 'number' ? state.unreadCount : 0, lastFetched: state.lastFetched || null, isPolling: false, // Always reset polling state on app startup pollError: null, // Clear errors on startup }; console.log('[Persist] Restored notifications state:', { itemsCount: validatedState.items.length, readIdsCount: validatedState.readIds.length, unreadCount: validatedState.unreadCount, lastFetched: validatedState.lastFetched ? new Date(validatedState.lastFetched).toISOString() : null, }); return validatedState; } catch (error) { console.warn( '[Persist] Error loading notifications state, resetting:', error ); return { items: [], readIds: [], unreadCount: 0, lastFetched: null, isPolling: false, pollError: null, }; } }, }, { key: 'tickets', in: (state: any) => { // Validate tickets state before persisting try { if (!state || typeof state !== 'object') { console.warn('[Persist] Invalid tickets state, not persisting'); return null; } // Validate structure if ( !state.list || typeof state.list !== 'object' || !Array.isArray(state.list.items) || typeof state.threads !== 'object' ) { console.warn('[Persist] Invalid tickets structure, not persisting'); return null; } console.log('[Persist] Persisting tickets:', { itemsCount: state.list.items.length, total: state.list.total, threadsCount: Object.keys(state.threads).length, }); return state; } catch (error) { console.warn('[Persist] Error persisting tickets state:', error); return null; } }, out: (state: any) => { // Validate tickets state when loading from storage try { if (!state) { console.log( '[Persist] No tickets state found, using initial state' ); return { list: { items: [], total: 0, lastFetched: null, error: null, }, threads: {}, }; } // Validate structure and provide fallbacks if (typeof state !== 'object') { console.warn('[Persist] Corrupted tickets state, resetting'); return { list: { items: [], total: 0, lastFetched: null, error: null, }, threads: {}, }; } // Ensure required fields exist with proper types const validatedState = { list: { items: Array.isArray(state.list?.items) ? state.list.items : [], total: typeof state.list?.total === 'number' ? state.list.total : 0, lastFetched: state.list?.lastFetched || null, error: null, // Clear errors on startup }, threads: typeof state.threads === 'object' ? state.threads : {}, }; // Clear any error states from threads on startup Object.keys(validatedState.threads).forEach(ticketId => { if (validatedState.threads[ticketId]) { validatedState.threads[ticketId].error = null; } }); console.log('[Persist] Restored tickets state:', { itemsCount: validatedState.list.items.length, total: validatedState.list.total, threadsCount: Object.keys(validatedState.threads).length, lastFetched: validatedState.list.lastFetched ? new Date(validatedState.list.lastFetched).toISOString() : null, }); return validatedState; } catch (error) { console.warn( '[Persist] Error loading tickets state, resetting:', error ); return { list: { items: [], total: 0, lastFetched: null, error: null, }, threads: {}, }; } }, }, ], timeout: 10000, // 10 second timeout version: 1, writeFailHandler: (err: Error) => { console.error('[Persist] Write failed:', err); // Don't throw here to prevent app crashes // Error handling is done at the authSlice level }, }

Enhanced persist configuration with secure storage adapter

src/components/debug/AzureBlobTester.tsx

AzureBlobTester
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { // Form states const [sasUrl, setSasUrl] = useState( 'https://solariumstorage.blob.core.windows.net/kyc-documents/test.pdf?sv=2021-06-08&ss=b&srt=sco&sp=w&se=2025-12-31T23:59:59Z&st=2025-07-19T00:00:00Z&spr=https&sig=mockSignature123' ); const [expiresInSec, setExpiresInSec] = useState('300'); // 5 minutes const [fileName, setFileName] = useState('test-document.pdf'); const [fileSize, setFileSize] = useState('5120'); // 5MB in KB const [mimeType, setMimeType] = useState('application/pdf'); // Test scenario options const [simulateFailure, setSimulateFailure] = useState(false); const [simulate403, setSimulate403] = useState(false); const [simulateTimeout, setSimulateTimeout] = useState(false); const [simulateSlowUpload, setSimulateSlowUpload] = useState(false); // KYC integration const [leadId, setLeadId] = useState('LEAD-123'); const [customerId, setCustomerId] = useState('CUST-001'); const [docType, setDocType] = useState<'PAN' | 'Aadhaar'>('PAN'); // Upload state const [isUploading, setIsUploading] = useState(false); const [uploadProgress, setUploadProgress] = useState<UploadProgress | null>( null ); const [uploadError, setUploadError] = useState<string | null>(null); const abortControllerRef = useRef<AbortController | null>(null); // Results const [results, setResults] = useState<string>(''); const addResult = (title: string, data: any) => { const timestamp = new Date().toLocaleTimeString(); const result = `\n[${timestamp}] ${title}:\n${JSON.stringify( data, null, 2 )}\n${'='.repeat(50)}`; setResults(prev => prev + result); }; const resetUploadState = () => { setIsUploading(false); setUploadProgress(null); setUploadError(null); abortControllerRef.current = null; }; const createMockFile = (name: string, size: number, type: string): RNFile => { return { uri: `file:///mock/path/${name}`, name, type, size: size * 1024, // Convert KB to bytes }; }; const mockGetFreshSas = async (): Promise<SasInfo> => { console.log('[AzureBlobTester] Mock getFreshSas called'); // Simulate API delay await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000)); addResult('🔄 Fresh SAS Token Requested', { message: 'Mock fresh SAS token generated', timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }); return { sasUrl: `${sasUrl}&refreshed=true`, expiresInSec: parseInt(expiresInSec), }; }; const handleBasicUpload = async () => { const file = createMockFile(fileName, parseInt(fileSize), mimeType); resetUploadState(); setIsUploading(true); try { addResult('🚀 Starting Basic Upload', { file, sasUrl, expiresInSec: parseInt(expiresInSec), }); await uploadFileToSas({ sasUrl, file, expiresInSec: parseInt(expiresInSec), onProgress: progress => { setUploadProgress(progress); console.log(`Upload progress: ${progress.percentage}%`); }, }); addResult('✅ Basic Upload Success', { file: file.name, size: file.size, result: 'Upload completed successfully', }); Alert.alert('Success', 'Basic upload completed successfully!'); } catch (error) { const uploadError = error as UploadError; setUploadError(uploadError.message); addResult('❌ Basic Upload Error', { error: uploadError.message, type: uploadError.type, statusCode: uploadError.statusCode, retryable: uploadError.retryable, }); Alert.alert('Error', `Upload failed: ${uploadError.message}`); } finally { setIsUploading(false); } }; const handleUploadWithRetry = async () => { const file = createMockFile(fileName, parseInt(fileSize), mimeType); resetUploadState(); setIsUploading(true); try { addResult('🔄 Starting Upload with Retry Support', { file, sasUrl, hasFreshSasCallback: true, }); await uploadFileToSas({ sasUrl, file, expiresInSec: parseInt(expiresInSec), onProgress: progress => { setUploadProgress(progress); }, getFreshSas: mockGetFreshSas, }); addResult('✅ Upload with Retry Success', { file: file.name, result: 'Upload completed (may have retried)', }); Alert.alert('Success', 'Upload with retry completed successfully!'); } catch (error) { const uploadError = error as UploadError; setUploadError(uploadError.message); addResult('❌ Upload with Retry Error', { error: uploadError.message, type: uploadError.type, }); Alert.alert('Error', `Upload with retry failed: ${uploadError.message}`); } finally { setIsUploading(false); } }; const handleCancellableUpload = async () => { const file = createMockFile(fileName, parseInt(fileSize), mimeType); const abortController = createUploadAbortController(); abortControllerRef.current = abortController; resetUploadState(); setIsUploading(true); try { addResult('⏹️ Starting Cancellable Upload', { file, hasAbortSignal: true, }); await uploadFileToSas({ sasUrl, file, expiresInSec: parseInt(expiresInSec), onProgress: progress => { setUploadProgress(progress); }, getFreshSas: mockGetFreshSas, abortSignal: abortController.signal, }); addResult('✅ Cancellable Upload Success', { file: file.name, result: 'Upload completed without cancellation', }); Alert.alert('Success', 'Cancellable upload completed successfully!'); } catch (error) { const uploadError = error as UploadError; setUploadError(uploadError.message); addResult('❌ Cancellable Upload Error', { error: uploadError.message, type: uploadError.type, wasCancelled: uploadError.type === 'CANCELLED', }); if (uploadError.type === 'CANCELLED') { Alert.alert('Cancelled', 'Upload was cancelled by user'); } else { Alert.alert( 'Error', `Cancellable upload failed: ${uploadError.message}` ); } } finally { setIsUploading(false); abortControllerRef.current = null; } }; const handleCancelUpload = () => { if (abortControllerRef.current && isUploading) { abortControllerRef.current.abort(); addResult('🛑 Upload Cancelled', { timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), reason: 'User initiated cancellation', }); } else { Alert.alert('Info', 'No active upload to cancel'); } }; const handleKycIntegratedUpload = async () => { resetUploadState(); setIsUploading(true); try { addResult('🔗 Starting KYC Integrated Upload', { leadId, customerId, docType, step: 'Requesting SAS token', }); // Step 1: Get SAS token using KYC service const sasResponse = await requestKycSasToken({ customerId, docType, leadId, }); addResult('✅ KYC SAS Token Retrieved', sasResponse); // Step 2: Upload file using the SAS URL const file = createMockFile(fileName, parseInt(fileSize), mimeType); await uploadFileToSas({ sasUrl: sasResponse.sasUrl, file, expiresInSec: 300, // 5 minutes default onProgress: progress => { setUploadProgress(progress); }, getFreshSas: async () => { // Refresh SAS token if needed const freshSas = await requestKycSasToken({ customerId, docType, leadId, }); return { sasUrl: freshSas.sasUrl, expiresInSec: 300, }; }, }); addResult('✅ KYC Integrated Upload Success', { leadId, customerId, docType, file: file.name, result: 'Complete KYC upload workflow succeeded', }); Alert.alert('Success', 'KYC integrated upload completed successfully!'); } catch (error) { const uploadError = error as any; setUploadError(uploadError.message); addResult('❌ KYC Integrated Upload Error', { error: uploadError.message, leadId, customerId, docType, }); Alert.alert( 'Error', `KYC integrated upload failed: ${uploadError.message}` ); } finally { setIsUploading(false); } }; const handleTestScenarios = async () => { const scenarios = []; if (simulate403) { scenarios.push('403 Error (Expired Token)'); } if (simulateTimeout) { scenarios.push('Timeout Error'); } if (simulateFailure) { scenarios.push('Network Failure'); } if (simulateSlowUpload) { scenarios.push('Slow Upload Progress'); } addResult('🧪 Test Scenarios Selected', { scenarios, message: 'These would be tested with mock XMLHttpRequest', }); Alert.alert( 'Test Scenarios', `Selected scenarios: ${scenarios.join( ', ' )}\n\nNote: In a real implementation, these would modify the XMLHttpRequest mock to simulate the conditions.` ); }; const handleUtilityFunctions = () => { const config = getUploadConfig(); const fileSizeBytes = parseInt(fileSize) * 1024; const estimatedTime = estimateUploadTime(fileSizeBytes); const estimatedTimeFast = estimateUploadTime( fileSizeBytes, 5 * 1024 * 1024 ); // 5MB/s const utilities = { uploadConfig: config, fileSize: fileSizeBytes, estimatedUploadTime: { default: `${estimatedTime} seconds (1MB/s)`, fastConnection: `${estimatedTimeFast} seconds (5MB/s)`, }, progressInterval: `${config.PROGRESS_INTERVAL_MS}ms`, timeout: `${config.TIMEOUT_MS}ms`, }; addResult('📊 Utility Functions Results', utilities); }; const clearResults = () => { setResults(''); resetUploadState(); }; return ( <ScrollView style={styles.container}> <Text style={styles.title}>Azure Blob Uploader Manual Tester</Text> {/* File Configuration */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>1. File Configuration</Text> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>File Name:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={fileName} onChangeText={setFileName} placeholder="test-document.pdf" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>File Size (KB):</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={fileSize} onChangeText={setFileSize} placeholder="5120" keyboardType="numeric" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>MIME Type:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={mimeType} onChangeText={setMimeType} placeholder="application/pdf" /> </View> </View> {/* SAS Configuration */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>2. SAS Configuration</Text> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>SAS URL:</Text> <TextInput style={[styles.input, styles.multilineInput]} value={sasUrl} onChangeText={setSasUrl} placeholder="https://..." multiline numberOfLines={3} /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Expires In (seconds):</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={expiresInSec} onChangeText={setExpiresInSec} placeholder="300" keyboardType="numeric" /> </View> </View> {/* KYC Integration */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>3. KYC Integration</Text> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Lead ID:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={leadId} onChangeText={setLeadId} placeholder="LEAD-123" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Customer ID:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={customerId} onChangeText={setCustomerId} placeholder="CUST-001" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Document Type:</Text> <View style={styles.buttonGroup}> {(['PAN', 'Aadhaar', 'VoterID', 'DrivingLicense'] as const).map( type => ( <TouchableOpacity key={type} style={[ styles.typeButton, docType === type && styles.typeButtonActive, ]} onPress={() => setDocType(type)} > <Text style={[ styles.typeButtonText, docType === type && styles.typeButtonTextActive, ]} > {type} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> ) )} </View> </View> </View> {/* Test Scenarios */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>4. Test Scenarios (Mock)</Text> <View style={styles.switchRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Simulate 403 Error:</Text> <Switch value={simulate403} onValueChange={setSimulate403} /> </View> <View style={styles.switchRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Simulate Timeout:</Text> <Switch value={simulateTimeout} onValueChange={setSimulateTimeout} /> </View> <View style={styles.switchRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Simulate Network Failure:</Text> <Switch value={simulateFailure} onValueChange={setSimulateFailure} /> </View> <View style={styles.switchRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Simulate Slow Upload:</Text> <Switch value={simulateSlowUpload} onValueChange={setSimulateSlowUpload} /> </View> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.tertiaryButton]} onPress={handleTestScenarios} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Apply Test Scenarios</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {/* Upload Controls */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>5. Upload Tests</Text> <View style={styles.buttonRow}> <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.button, styles.primaryButton, isUploading && styles.disabledButton, ]} onPress={handleBasicUpload} disabled={isUploading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Basic Upload</Text> </TouchableOpacity> <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.button, styles.secondaryButton, isUploading && styles.disabledButton, ]} onPress={handleUploadWithRetry} disabled={isUploading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Upload with Retry</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> <View style={styles.buttonRow}> <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.button, styles.warningButton, isUploading && styles.disabledButton, ]} onPress={handleCancellableUpload} disabled={isUploading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Cancellable Upload</Text> </TouchableOpacity> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.dangerButton]} onPress={handleCancelUpload} disabled={!isUploading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Cancel Upload</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.button, styles.successButton, isUploading && styles.disabledButton, ]} onPress={handleKycIntegratedUpload} disabled={isUploading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>KYC Integrated Upload</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {/* Upload Status */} {(isUploading || uploadProgress || uploadError) && ( <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Upload Status</Text> {isUploading && ( <View style={styles.statusRow}> <Text style={styles.statusLabel}>Status:</Text> <Text style={styles.statusValue}>Uploading...</Text> </View> )} {uploadProgress && ( <> <View style={styles.statusRow}> <Text style={styles.statusLabel}>Progress:</Text> <Text style={styles.statusValue}> {uploadProgress.percentage}% </Text> </View> <View style={styles.progressBar}> <View style={[ styles.progressFill, {width: `${uploadProgress.percentage}%`}, ]} /> </View> <View style={styles.statusRow}> <Text style={styles.statusLabel}>Size:</Text> <Text style={styles.statusValue}> {Math.round(uploadProgress.loaded / 1024)} KB /{' '} {Math.round(uploadProgress.total / 1024)} KB </Text> </View> </> )} {uploadError && ( <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <Text style={styles.errorText}>Error: {uploadError}</Text> </View> )} </View> )} {/* Utility Functions */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>6. Utility Functions</Text> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.infoButton]} onPress={handleUtilityFunctions} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Test Utility Functions</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {/* Results */} <View style={styles.section}> <View style={styles.resultsHeader}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Results</Text> <TouchableOpacity style={styles.clearButton} onPress={clearResults}> <Text style={styles.clearButtonText}>Clear</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> <ScrollView style={styles.resultsContainer}> <Text style={styles.resultsText}> {results || 'No results yet...'} </Text> </ScrollView> </View> </ScrollView> ); }
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, padding: 16, backgroundColor: '#f5f5f5', }, title: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: 20, color: '#333', }, section: { backgroundColor: 'white', padding: 16, marginBottom: 16, borderRadius: 8, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 2}, shadowOpacity: 0.1, shadowRadius: 4, elevation: 3, }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: 12, color: '#333', }, inputRow: { marginBottom: 12, }, label: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', marginBottom: 4, color: '#555', }, input: { borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#ddd', borderRadius: 6, padding: 12, fontSize: 16, backgroundColor: '#fafafa', }, multilineInput: { height: 80, textAlignVertical: 'top', }, buttonGroup: { flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 8, }, typeButton: { paddingHorizontal: 12, paddingVertical: 8, borderRadius: 6, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#ddd', backgroundColor: '#f9f9f9', }, typeButtonActive: { backgroundColor: '#007AFF', borderColor: '#007AFF', }, typeButtonText: { fontSize: 14, color: '#333', }, typeButtonTextActive: { color: 'white', }, switchRow: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 12, }, buttonRow: { flexDirection: 'row', gap: 8, marginBottom: 8, }, button: { flex: 1, paddingVertical: 12, paddingHorizontal: 16, borderRadius: 6, alignItems: 'center', }, primaryButton: { backgroundColor: '#007AFF', }, secondaryButton: { backgroundColor: '#34C759', }, tertiaryButton: { backgroundColor: '#FF9500', }, warningButton: { backgroundColor: '#FFCC00', }, dangerButton: { backgroundColor: '#FF3B30', }, successButton: { backgroundColor: '#30D158', }, infoButton: { backgroundColor: '#64D2FF', }, disabledButton: { backgroundColor: '#C7C7CC', }, buttonText: { color: 'white', fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', }, statusRow: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginBottom: 8, }, statusLabel: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', color: '#555', }, statusValue: { fontSize: 14, color: '#333', }, progressBar: { height: 8, backgroundColor: '#E5E5EA', borderRadius: 4, marginBottom: 12, overflow: 'hidden', }, progressFill: { height: '100%', backgroundColor: '#007AFF', borderRadius: 4, }, errorContainer: { backgroundColor: '#FFEBEE', padding: 12, borderRadius: 6, borderLeftWidth: 3, borderLeftColor: '#FF3B30', }, errorText: { color: '#C62828', fontSize: 14, }, resultsHeader: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 12, }, clearButton: { paddingHorizontal: 12, paddingVertical: 6, backgroundColor: '#FF3B30', borderRadius: 4, }, clearButtonText: { color: 'white', fontSize: 12, fontWeight: '600', }, resultsContainer: { maxHeight: 300, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#ddd', borderRadius: 6, padding: 12, backgroundColor: '#fafafa', }, resultsText: { fontSize: 12, fontFamily: 'monospace', color: '#333', }, })

src/refresh/refreshThunks.ts

backgroundRefresh
Default value : createAsyncThunk< RefreshResult, RefreshOptions | undefined, {state: RootState} >('refresh/backgroundRefresh', async (options = {}, {dispatch}) => { return dispatch( refreshAllData({ ...options, showLoading: false, isBackground: true, }) ).unwrap(); })

Background refresh (silent, no loading indicators)
refreshAllData
Default value : createAsyncThunk< RefreshResult, RefreshOptions | undefined, {state: RootState} >('refresh/refreshAllData', async (options = {}, {dispatch, getState}) => { const { showLoading = true, includeUserData = true, apis, isBackground = false, } = options; const refreshResult: RefreshResult = { success: true, refreshedApis: [], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; try { // Determine which APIs to refresh const apisToRefresh = apis || [ RefreshableApi.SERVICES, ...(includeUserData ? [ RefreshableApi.AUTH, RefreshableApi.LEADS, RefreshableApi.NOTIFICATIONS, RefreshableApi.TICKETS, ] : []), ]; // Start refresh if (showLoading) { dispatch(startRefresh({total: apisToRefresh.length})); } let currentStep = 0; // Refresh Services API if (apisToRefresh.includes(RefreshableApi.SERVICES)) { try { if (showLoading) { dispatch( updateRefreshProgress({ current: ++currentStep, currentStep: 'Refreshing services...', }) ); } dispatch(servicesApi.util.invalidateTags(['Services', 'Service'])); refreshResult.refreshedApis.push(RefreshableApi.SERVICES); } catch (error) { const refreshError: RefreshError = { api: RefreshableApi.SERVICES, error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Services refresh failed', }; refreshResult.errors.push(refreshError); refreshResult.success = false; } } // Refresh Auth API (if user data is included) if (apisToRefresh.includes(RefreshableApi.AUTH)) { try { if (showLoading) { dispatch( updateRefreshProgress({ current: ++currentStep, currentStep: 'Refreshing user data...', }) ); } dispatch(authApi.util.invalidateTags(['Auth', 'User'])); refreshResult.refreshedApis.push(RefreshableApi.AUTH); } catch (error) { const refreshError: RefreshError = { api: RefreshableApi.AUTH, error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Auth refresh failed', }; refreshResult.errors.push(refreshError); refreshResult.success = false; } } // Refresh Leads API (if user data is included) if (apisToRefresh.includes(RefreshableApi.LEADS)) { try { if (showLoading) { dispatch( updateRefreshProgress({ current: ++currentStep, currentStep: 'Refreshing leads...', }) ); } dispatch(leadsApi.util.invalidateTags(['Lead', 'LeadsList'])); refreshResult.refreshedApis.push(RefreshableApi.LEADS); } catch (error) { const refreshError: RefreshError = { api: RefreshableApi.LEADS, error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Leads refresh failed', }; refreshResult.errors.push(refreshError); refreshResult.success = false; } } // Refresh Notifications API (if user data is included) if (apisToRefresh.includes(RefreshableApi.NOTIFICATIONS)) { try { if (showLoading) { dispatch( updateRefreshProgress({ current: ++currentStep, currentStep: 'Refreshing notifications...', }) ); } dispatch( notificationsApi.util.invalidateTags([ 'Notification', 'NotificationsList', ]) ); refreshResult.refreshedApis.push(RefreshableApi.NOTIFICATIONS); } catch (error) { const refreshError: RefreshError = { api: RefreshableApi.NOTIFICATIONS, error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Notifications refresh failed', }; refreshResult.errors.push(refreshError); refreshResult.success = false; } } // Refresh Tickets API (if user data is included) if (apisToRefresh.includes(RefreshableApi.TICKETS)) { try { if (showLoading) { dispatch( updateRefreshProgress({ current: ++currentStep, currentStep: 'Refreshing tickets...', }) ); } dispatch(ticketsApi.util.invalidateTags(['Ticket', 'TicketsList'])); refreshResult.refreshedApis.push(RefreshableApi.TICKETS); } catch (error) { const refreshError: RefreshError = { api: RefreshableApi.TICKETS, error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Tickets refresh failed', }; refreshResult.errors.push(refreshError); refreshResult.success = false; } } // Complete refresh if (showLoading) { if (refreshResult.success) { dispatch(completeRefresh({timestamp: refreshResult.timestamp})); } else { const errorMessage = refreshResult.errors.length > 0 ? `Failed to refresh: ${refreshResult.errors[0].error}` : 'Refresh completed with errors'; dispatch(failRefresh({error: errorMessage})); } } return refreshResult; } catch (error) { const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Refresh failed unexpectedly'; if (showLoading) { dispatch(failRefresh({error: errorMessage})); } return { success: false, refreshedApis: [], errors: [{api: RefreshableApi.SERVICES, error: errorMessage}], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } })

Refresh all application data
refreshSpecificData
Default value : createAsyncThunk< RefreshResult, {apis: RefreshableApi[]; options?: RefreshOptions}, {state: RootState} >('refresh/refreshSpecificData', async ({apis, options = {}}, {dispatch}) => { return dispatch(refreshAllData({...options, apis})).unwrap(); })

Refresh specific APIs

src/api/baseQuery.ts

baseFetchQuery
Default value : fetchBaseQuery({ baseUrl: buildApiUrl(''), timeout: AppConfig.API_TIMEOUT, prepareHeaders: (headers, {getState}) => { const state = getState() as RootState; // Get token from new auth system const token = state.newAuth?.token || undefined; // Add common headers const requestHeaders = getRequestHeaders(token); Object.entries(requestHeaders).forEach(([key, value]) => { headers.set(key, value); }); return headers; }, })

Create the base fetch query
baseQuery
Type : BaseQueryFn<string | FetchArgs, , FetchBaseQueryError>
Default value : baseQueryWithRetry

Base query with additional features
baseQueryWithRetry
Type : BaseQueryFn<string | FetchArgs, , FetchBaseQueryError>
Default value : async (args, api, extraOptions) => { const {dispatch} = api; const maxRetries = 3; let attempt = 0; // Set loading state for non-background requests const isBackgroundRequest = typeof args === 'object' && 'background' in args && args.background; if (!isBackgroundRequest) { dispatch(setLoading({isLoading: true})); } while (attempt <= maxRetries) { try { const result = await baseFetchQuery(args, api, extraOptions); // Debug logging if (__DEV__) { const url = typeof args === 'string' ? args : args.url; const method = typeof args === 'string' ? 'GET' : args.method || 'GET'; debugApiCall(method, url, args, result.data, result.error); } // Handle successful response if (!result.error) { if (!isBackgroundRequest) { dispatch(setLoading({isLoading: false})); } return result; } // Handle authentication errors with idempotent logout if (isAuthError(result.error) && !logoutManager.isInProgress()) { // Check if this is a lockout (423) - don't logout, just return error if (result.error.status === 423) { console.warn('[API] Account lockout detected (423), not logging out'); if (!isBackgroundRequest) { dispatch(setLoading({isLoading: false})); } return result; // Return lockout error without logout } // DEVELOPMENT MODE: Skip logout for upload API failures to avoid interrupting dev workflow const url = typeof args === 'string' ? args : args.url; const isUploadRequest = url && (url.includes('kycDocuments') || url.includes('/upload') || url.includes('/sas')); if (__DEV__ && isUploadRequest) { console.warn( '[API] DEV MODE: Auth error on upload API detected, skipping auto-logout:', {url, error: result.error} ); if (!isBackgroundRequest) { dispatch(setLoading({isLoading: false})); } return result; // Return error without logout in dev mode } console.warn('[API] Authentication error detected:', result.error); await logoutManager.handleLogout(dispatch, api.getState); if (!isBackgroundRequest) { dispatch(setLoading({isLoading: false})); } return result; // Return the auth error without retry } // Handle retryable errors if (isRetryableError(result.error) && attempt < maxRetries) { const delay = calculateRetryDelay(attempt); console.log( `[API] Retrying request in ${delay}ms (attempt ${ attempt + 1 }/${maxRetries})` ); await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(() => resolve(undefined), delay) ); attempt++; continue; } // Non-retryable error or max retries reached if (!isBackgroundRequest) { dispatch(setLoading({isLoading: false})); } return result; } catch (error) { console.error('[API] Unexpected error in baseQuery:', error); if (!isBackgroundRequest) { dispatch(setLoading({isLoading: false})); } return { error: { status: 'FETCH_ERROR', error: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error', } as FetchBaseQueryError, }; } } // This should never be reached, but TypeScript requires it if (!isBackgroundRequest) { dispatch(setLoading({isLoading: false})); } return { error: { status: 'FETCH_ERROR', error: 'Max retries exceeded', } as FetchBaseQueryError, }; }

Enhanced base query with retry logic and error handling
createTag
Default value : (type: string, id?: string | number) => { return id ? {type, id} : {type, id: 'LIST'}; }

Create tag for cache invalidation
invalidateTags
Default value : (type: string, ids?: (string | number)[]) => { if (!ids || ids.length === 0) { return [{type, id: 'LIST'}]; } return [...ids.map(id => createTag(type, id)), {type, id: 'LIST'}]; }

Invalidate tags for cache updates
logoutManager
Default value : new LogoutManager()
provideTags
Default value : <T extends {id: string | number}>( type: string, result?: T[] ) => { if (!result) { return [{type, id: 'LIST'}]; } return [...result.map(item => createTag(type, item.id)), {type, id: 'LIST'}]; }

Provide tags for cache invalidation
transformError
Default value : (error: FetchBaseQueryError) => { return parseApiError(error); }

Transform error to standard format
transformResponse
Default value : <T>(response: any): T => { // Handle different response formats from backend if (response?.success !== undefined) { // Backend returns {success: boolean, data: T, error?: string} if (response.success) { return response.data; } else { throw new Error(response.error || 'API request failed'); } } // Direct data response return response; }

Transform response to standard format

borderRadius
Type : object
Default value : { small: 4, medium: 8, large: 12, xl: 16, round: 50, }

colors

Default value : { // Primary colors - Green theme for solar energy primary: '#2E7D32', // Dark green primaryDark: '#1B5E20', // Darker green primaryLight: '#4CAF50', // Light green // Secondary colors - Complementary blue secondary: '#1976D2', // Blue secondaryDark: '#0D47A1', // Dark blue secondaryLight: '#42A5F5', // Light blue // Background colors background: '#FFFFFF', surface: '#F8F9FA', // Status colors error: '#F44336', warning: '#FF9800', success: '#4CAF50', info: '#2196F3', // Lead status colors quoted: '#673AB7', // Purple for quoted/discussion status // Text colors text: { primary: '#212121', secondary: '#757575', disabled: '#BDBDBD', placeholder: '#9E9E9E', }, // Border colors border: { default: '#E0E0E0', light: '#F5F5F5', focus: '#2E7D32', }, // Overlay colors overlay: { light: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)', medium: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)', dark: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)', }, }

Solarium Green Energy Color Palette
shadows
Type : object
Default value : { small: { shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 1, }, shadowOpacity: 0.1, shadowRadius: 2, elevation: 2, }, medium: { shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 2, }, shadowOpacity: 0.15, shadowRadius: 4, elevation: 4, }, large: { shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 4, }, shadowOpacity: 0.2, shadowRadius: 8, elevation: 8, }, }

Type : SpacingScale
Default value : { xs: 4, sm: 8, md: 16, lg: 24, xl: 32, xxl: 48, }

Spacing scale based on 8px grid

Default value : { fontFamily: { regular: 'System', medium: 'System', bold: 'System', light: 'System', }, fontSize: { xs: 12, sm: 14, md: 16, lg: 18, xl: 24, xxl: 32, }, lineHeight: { tight: 1.2, normal: 1.4, relaxed: 1.6, }, }
