src/utils/apiHelpers.ts

buildApiUrl
Default value : (endpoint: string): string => { const baseUrl = AppConfig.BASE_API_URL.replace(/\/$/, ''); // Remove trailing slash const cleanEndpoint = endpoint.replace(/^\//, ''); // Remove leading slash return `${baseUrl}/api/v1/${cleanEndpoint}`; }

Build API URL with base URL
buildQueryParams
Default value : (params: Record<string, any>): string => { const cleanParams = Object.entries(params) .filter( ([_, value]) => value !== undefined && value !== null && value !== '' ) .map(([key, value]) => [key, String(value)]); if (cleanParams.length === 0) { return ''; } const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(cleanParams); return `?${searchParams.toString()}`; }

Build query parameters string
calculateRetryDelay
Default value : ( attempt: number, baseDelay: number = 1000 ): number => { // Exponential backoff: baseDelay * 2^attempt + random jitter const exponentialDelay = baseDelay * Math.pow(2, attempt); const jitter = Math.random() * 1000; // Add up to 1 second of jitter return Math.min(exponentialDelay + jitter, 30000); // Cap at 30 seconds }

Calculate retry delay with exponential backoff
debugApiCall
Default value : ( method: string, url: string, request?: any, response?: any, error?: any ) => { if (!__DEV__) { return; } console.group(`[API] ${method} ${url}`); if (request) { console.log('Request:', request); } if (response) { console.log('Response:', response); } if (error) { console.error('Error:', error); } console.groupEnd(); }

Debug API request/response
formatFileSize
Default value : (bytes: number): string => { if (bytes === 0) { return '0 Bytes'; } const k = 1024; const sizes = ['Bytes', 'KB', 'MB', 'GB']; const i = Math.floor(Math.log(bytes) / Math.log(k)); return `${parseFloat((bytes / Math.pow(k, i)).toFixed(2))} ${sizes[i]}`; }

Format file size for uploads
getRequestHeaders
Default value : ( token?: string, additionalHeaders?: Record<string, string> ): Record<string, string> => { const headers: Record<string, string> = { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', Accept: 'application/json', 'X-App-Version': '1.0.0', 'X-Platform': 'mobile', ...additionalHeaders, }; if (token) { headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`; } return headers; }

Get request headers with common defaults
isAuthError
Default value : (error: any): boolean => { return error?.status === 401 || error?.status === 403; }

Check if error requires authentication
isNetworkError
Default value : (error: any): boolean => { return ( error?.name === 'NetworkError' || error?.code === 'NETWORK_ERROR' || error?.status === 0 || !navigator.onLine ); }

Check if error is a network error
isRetryableError
Default value : (error: any): boolean => { if (isNetworkError(error)) { return true; } const retryableStatuses = [408, 429, 500, 502, 503, 504]; return retryableStatuses.includes(error?.status); }

Check if error is retryable
parseApiError
Default value : (error: any): ApiError => { // Handle different error formats if (error?.data?.error) { return { code: error.status || 500, message: error.data.error.message || 'An error occurred', details: error.data.error.details, }; } if (error?.data?.message) { return { code: error.status || 500, message: error.data.message, details: error.data, }; } if (error?.message) { return { code: error.status || 500, message: error.message, details: error, }; } return { code: error?.status || 500, message: 'An unexpected error occurred', details: error, }; }

Parse API error response
validateFileUpload
Default value : ( file: {size: number; type: string; name: string}, options: { maxSize?: number; allowedTypes?: string[]; allowedExtensions?: string[]; } = {} ): {valid: boolean; error?: string} => { const { maxSize = 10 * 1024 * 1024, // 10MB default allowedTypes = ['image/jpeg', 'image/png', 'application/pdf'], allowedExtensions = ['.jpg', '.jpeg', '.png', '.pdf'], } = options; // Check file size if (file.size > maxSize) { return { valid: false, error: `File size must be less than ${formatFileSize(maxSize)}`, }; } // Check file type if (!allowedTypes.includes(file.type)) { return { valid: false, error: `File type ${file.type} is not allowed`, }; } // Check file extension const extension = file.name .toLowerCase() .substring(file.name.lastIndexOf('.')); if (!allowedExtensions.includes(extension)) { return { valid: false, error: `File extension ${extension} is not allowed`, }; } return {valid: true}; }

Validate file for upload

src/components/common/Button/Button.tsx

Button
Type : React.FC<ButtonProps>
Default value : ({ title, onPress, variant = 'primary', size = 'medium', disabled = false, loading = false, icon, iconPosition = 'left', fullWidth = false, style, textStyle, testID, accessibilityLabel, accessibilityHint, }) => { // Determine if button should be disabled const isDisabled = disabled || loading; // Button styles const buttonStyles = useMemo( () => [ styles.button, styles[size], isDisabled ? styles.disabled : styles[variant], fullWidth && styles.fullWidth, style, ], [variant, size, isDisabled, fullWidth, style] ); // Text styles const textStyles = useMemo( () => [ styles.text, styles[`${size}Text`], isDisabled ? styles.disabledText : styles[`${variant}Text`], textStyle, ], [variant, size, isDisabled, textStyle] ); // Spinner color const spinnerColor = useMemo(() => { if (isDisabled) { return '#8E8E93'; } if (variant === 'outline' || variant === 'ghost') { return '#007AFF'; } return '#FFFFFF'; }, [variant, isDisabled]); // Handle press const handlePress = () => { if (!isDisabled) { onPress(); } }; // Render content const renderContent = () => { if (loading) { return ( <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> <ActivityIndicator size="small" color={spinnerColor} /> <Text style={[textStyles, styles.loadingText]}>{title}</Text> </View> ); } const textElement = <Text style={textStyles}>{title}</Text>; if (!icon) { return textElement; } if (iconPosition === 'left') { return ( <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> <View style={styles.iconLeft}>{icon}</View> {textElement} </View> ); } return ( <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> {textElement} <View style={styles.iconRight}>{icon}</View> </View> ); }; return ( <TouchableOpacity style={buttonStyles} onPress={handlePress} disabled={isDisabled} activeOpacity={0.7} testID={testID} accessibilityLabel={accessibilityLabel || title} accessibilityHint={accessibilityHint} accessibilityRole="button" accessibilityState={{ disabled: isDisabled, busy: loading, }} > {renderContent()} </TouchableOpacity> ); }

src/storage/secureStorage.ts

CACHE_TTL
Type : number
Default value : 30000
clearCache
Default value : (): void => { tokenCache = null; }

Clear token cache
clearJWT
Default value : async (): Promise<void> => { try { console.log('[SecureStorage] Clearing JWT token...'); // Clear from secure storage await EncryptedStorage.removeItem(JWT_TOKEN_KEY); // Clear cache clearCache(); console.log('[SecureStorage] JWT token cleared successfully'); } catch (error) { console.error('[SecureStorage] Failed to clear JWT:', error); clearCache(); // Clear cache anyway throw SecureStorageError.forDelete( JWT_TOKEN_KEY, error instanceof Error ? error : undefined ); } }

Clear JWT token from secure storage
forceMigrationCheck
Default value : async (): Promise<MigrationResult> => { migrationAttempted = false; migrationResult = null; clearCache(); return await migrateLegacyToken(); }

Force migration check (for testing)
getJWT
Default value : async (): Promise<string | undefined> => { try { // Use cache if valid if (isCacheValid() && tokenCache) { console.log('[SecureStorage] Returning cached JWT token'); return tokenCache.token || undefined; } console.log('[SecureStorage] Retrieving JWT token...'); // Ensure migration is attempted before reading await migrateLegacyToken(); // Read from secure storage const token = await EncryptedStorage.getItem(JWT_TOKEN_KEY); // Update cache tokenCache = { token, timestamp: Date.now(), }; if (token) { console.log('[SecureStorage] JWT token retrieved successfully'); } else { console.log('[SecureStorage] No JWT token found'); } return token || undefined; } catch (error) { console.error('[SecureStorage] Failed to get JWT:', error); clearCache(); throw SecureStorageError.forRead( JWT_TOKEN_KEY, error instanceof Error ? error : undefined ); } }

Get JWT token from secure storage
getMigrationStatus
Default value : (): MigrationResult | null => { return migrationResult; }

Get migration status (for debugging/analytics)
isCacheValid
Default value : (): boolean => { if (!tokenCache) { return false; } return Date.now() - tokenCache.timestamp < CACHE_TTL; }

Check if cache is valid
JWT_TOKEN_KEY
Type : string
Default value : 'auth_token_secure'

Storage keys for JWT tokens
LEGACY_ASYNC_STORAGE_KEY
Type : string
Default value : 'auth_token'
LEGACY_ENCRYPTED_STORAGE_KEY
Type : string
Default value : 'auth_token'
migrateLegacyToken
Default value : async (): Promise<MigrationResult> => { if (migrationAttempted) { return migrationResult || {status: MigrationStatus.NOT_NEEDED}; } migrationAttempted = true; try { console.log('[SecureStorage] Starting token migration check...'); // Check if we already have a token in the new secure key const existingToken = await EncryptedStorage.getItem(JWT_TOKEN_KEY); if (existingToken) { migrationResult = { status: MigrationStatus.NOT_NEEDED, message: 'Token already exists in secure storage', }; console.log( '[SecureStorage] Migration not needed - token already secure' ); return migrationResult; } let tokenToMigrate: string | null = null; let sourceKey: string | null = null; // 1. Check AsyncStorage (plain text - highest priority for migration) try { tokenToMigrate = await AsyncStorage.getItem(LEGACY_ASYNC_STORAGE_KEY); if (tokenToMigrate) { sourceKey = LEGACY_ASYNC_STORAGE_KEY; console.log( '[SecureStorage] Found token in AsyncStorage (plain) - migrating...' ); } } catch (error) { console.warn('[SecureStorage] Failed to check AsyncStorage:', error); } // 2. Check EncryptedStorage with legacy key (if no AsyncStorage token found) if (!tokenToMigrate) { try { tokenToMigrate = await EncryptedStorage.getItem( LEGACY_ENCRYPTED_STORAGE_KEY ); if (tokenToMigrate) { sourceKey = LEGACY_ENCRYPTED_STORAGE_KEY; console.log( '[SecureStorage] Found token in EncryptedStorage (legacy key) - migrating...' ); } } catch (error) { console.warn( '[SecureStorage] Failed to check legacy EncryptedStorage:', error ); } } // If no token found anywhere, migration not needed if (!tokenToMigrate || !sourceKey) { migrationResult = { status: MigrationStatus.NOT_NEEDED, message: 'No legacy token found', }; console.log( '[SecureStorage] No legacy token found - migration not needed' ); return migrationResult; } // Migrate token to new secure key await EncryptedStorage.setItem(JWT_TOKEN_KEY, tokenToMigrate); console.log('[SecureStorage] Token migrated to secure storage'); // Clean up legacy storage try { if (sourceKey === LEGACY_ASYNC_STORAGE_KEY) { await AsyncStorage.removeItem(LEGACY_ASYNC_STORAGE_KEY); console.log('[SecureStorage] Cleaned up AsyncStorage token'); } else { await EncryptedStorage.removeItem(LEGACY_ENCRYPTED_STORAGE_KEY); console.log('[SecureStorage] Cleaned up legacy EncryptedStorage token'); } } catch (cleanupError) { console.warn( '[SecureStorage] Failed to cleanup legacy token:', cleanupError ); // Don't fail migration if cleanup fails } migrationResult = { status: MigrationStatus.MIGRATED, fromKey: sourceKey, message: `Successfully migrated token from ${sourceKey}`, }; console.log('[SecureStorage] Migration completed successfully'); // Log analytics event for migration if (__DEV__) { console.log( '[SecureStorage] ANALYTICS: Token migration completed', migrationResult ); } return migrationResult; } catch (error) { console.error('[SecureStorage] Migration failed:', error); migrationResult = { status: MigrationStatus.FAILED, message: `Migration failed: ${ error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error' }`, }; // Log analytics event for migration failure if (__DEV__) { console.log( '[SecureStorage] ANALYTICS: Token migration failed', migrationResult ); } throw SecureStorageError.forMigration( error instanceof Error ? error : undefined ); } }

Migrate legacy token from old storage locations Order: AsyncStorage (plain) → EncryptedStorage (legacy key) → new key
migrationAttempted
Default value : false

Migration tracking
migrationResult
Type : MigrationResult | null
Default value : null
resetSecureStorage
Default value : (): void => { migrationAttempted = false; migrationResult = null; clearCache(); }

Clear all caches and reset state (for testing)
saveJWT
Default value : async (token: string): Promise<void> => { try { console.log('[SecureStorage] Saving JWT token...'); // Ensure migration is attempted before saving await migrateLegacyToken(); // Save to secure storage await EncryptedStorage.setItem(JWT_TOKEN_KEY, token); // Update cache tokenCache = { token, timestamp: Date.now(), }; console.log('[SecureStorage] JWT token saved successfully'); } catch (error) { console.error('[SecureStorage] Failed to save JWT:', error); clearCache(); throw SecureStorageError.forWrite( JWT_TOKEN_KEY, error instanceof Error ? error : undefined ); } }

Save JWT token to secure storage
tokenCache
Type : literal type | null
Default value : null

Performance cache for token retrieval

src/store/cacheSlice.ts

cacheSlice
Default value : createSlice({ name: 'cache', initialState, reducers: { setCachedData: (state, action: PayloadAction<{key: string; data: any}>) => { state.cachedData[action.payload.key] = action.payload.data; }, clearCache: state => { state.cachedData = {}; state.lastSyncTime = undefined; }, setSyncTime: (state, action: PayloadAction<number>) => { state.lastSyncTime = action.payload; }, setSyncInProgress: (state, action: PayloadAction<boolean>) => { state.syncInProgress = action.payload; }, }, })

Cache slice
initialState
Type : CacheState
Default value : { lastSyncTime: undefined, cachedData: {}, syncInProgress: false, }

Initial state
selectCachedData
Default value : (state: {cache: CacheState}) => state.cache.cachedData
selectLastSyncTime
Default value : (state: {cache: CacheState}) => state.cache.lastSyncTime
selectSyncInProgress
Default value : (state: {cache: CacheState}) => state.cache.syncInProgress
Default value : cacheSlice.actions

src/utils/payloadSize.ts

calculatePayloadSize
Default value : (payload: unknown): number => { try { // Convert payload to JSON string to get approximate size const jsonString = JSON.stringify(payload); // Calculate byte size (UTF-8 encoding) // Each character can be 1-4 bytes in UTF-8, this gives a reasonable approximation const encoder = new TextEncoder(); const encoded = encoder.encode(jsonString); return encoded.length; } catch (error) { console.warn('[PayloadSize] Failed to calculate payload size:', error); return 0; } }

Payload Size Utilities Validates request payload sizes to prevent oversized requests
formatByteSize
Default value : (bytes: number): string => { if (bytes === 0) { return '0 B'; } const k = 1024; const sizes = ['B', 'KB', 'MB', 'GB']; const i = Math.floor(Math.log(bytes) / Math.log(k)); return `${parseFloat((bytes / Math.pow(k, i)).toFixed(1))} ${sizes[i]}`; }

Format byte size for display
isPayloadTooLarge
Default value : ( payload: unknown, maxSizeKB: number = 100 ): boolean => { const sizeBytes = calculatePayloadSize(payload); const maxSizeBytes = maxSizeKB * 1024; return sizeBytes > maxSizeBytes; }

Check if payload exceeds maximum size

src/store/servicesCartSlice.ts

calculateTotalItems
Default value : (items: Record<string, CartItem>): number => { return Object.values(items).reduce((total, item) => total + item.qty, 0); }

Calculate total items in cart
initialState
Type : ServicesCartState
Default value : { items: {}, totalItems: 0, lastUpdated: null, }
selectCartCount
Default value : (state: { servicesCart: ServicesCartState | undefined; }) => state.servicesCart?.totalItems ?? 0
selectCartIsEmpty
Default value : (state: { servicesCart: ServicesCartState | undefined; }) => (state.servicesCart?.totalItems ?? 0) === 0
selectCartItemById
Default value : (serviceId: string) => (state: {servicesCart: ServicesCartState | undefined}) => state.servicesCart?.items[serviceId] || null
selectCartItems
Default value : (state: { servicesCart: ServicesCartState | undefined; }) => state.servicesCart?.items ?? {}
selectCartItemsArray
Default value : createSelector([selectCartItems], items => Object.values(items) )
selectCartLastUpdated
Default value : (state: { servicesCart: ServicesCartState | undefined; }) => state.servicesCart?.lastUpdated ?? null
selectIsCartFull
Default value : (state: { servicesCart: ServicesCartState | undefined; }) => (state.servicesCart?.totalItems ?? 0) >= 20
selectUniqueItemsCount
Default value : (state: { servicesCart: ServicesCartState | undefined; }) => Object.keys(state.servicesCart?.items ?? {}).length
servicesCartSlice
Default value : createSlice({ name: 'servicesCart', initialState, reducers: { /** * Add service to cart or increase existing quantity * * Enforces 20-item total limit and validates input. * If service exists, increases quantity. If new, creates cart item. * * @param action.payload.service - Complete service object to add * @param action.payload.qty - Quantity to add (default: 1) * * @example * ```typescript * dispatch(addToCart({ * service: { serviceId: 'solar-install', name: 'Installation', ... }, * qty: 3 * })); * ``` */ addToCart: ( state, action: PayloadAction<{service: Service; qty?: number}> ) => { const {service, qty = 1} = action.payload; const serviceId = service.serviceId; // Check max items constraint if (wouldExceedMaxItems(state.items, serviceId, qty)) { console.warn( `[Cart] Cannot add ${qty} of ${serviceId}. Would exceed 20 item limit.` ); return; // Don't modify state if it would exceed limit } const timestamp = new Date().toISOString(); if (state.items[serviceId]) { // Update existing item state.items[serviceId].qty += qty; state.items[serviceId].service = service; // Update service data } else { // Add new item state.items[serviceId] = { id: serviceId, qty, service, addedAt: timestamp, }; } state.totalItems = calculateTotalItems(state.items); state.lastUpdated = timestamp; }, /** * Remove service from cart or decrease quantity * * If quantity to remove >= current quantity, removes service completely. * Otherwise, decreases quantity by specified amount. * * @param action.payload.serviceId - Service ID to remove from * @param action.payload.qty - Quantity to remove (default: 1) */ removeFromCart: ( state, action: PayloadAction<{serviceId: string; qty?: number}> ) => { const {serviceId, qty = 1} = action.payload; const existingItem = state.items[serviceId]; if (!existingItem) { console.warn(`[Cart] Cannot remove ${serviceId}. Not in cart.`); return; } const timestamp = new Date().toISOString(); if (existingItem.qty <= qty) { // Remove item completely delete state.items[serviceId]; } else { // Decrease quantity state.items[serviceId].qty -= qty; } state.totalItems = calculateTotalItems(state.items); state.lastUpdated = timestamp; }, /** * Set specific quantity for a service * * More efficient than multiple add/remove operations. * Setting quantity to 0 removes the service. * Validates 20-item total limit. * * @param action.payload.serviceId - Service ID to update * @param action.payload.qty - New quantity (0 removes service) */ updateQuantity: ( state, action: PayloadAction<{serviceId: string; qty: number}> ) => { const {serviceId, qty} = action.payload; const existingItem = state.items[serviceId]; if (!existingItem) { console.warn(`[Cart] Cannot update ${serviceId}. Not in cart.`); return; } if (qty <= 0) { // Remove item if quantity is 0 or negative delete state.items[serviceId]; } else { // Check max items constraint const tempItems = {...state.items}; tempItems[serviceId] = {...existingItem, qty}; if (calculateTotalItems(tempItems) > 20) { console.warn( `[Cart] Cannot set ${serviceId} quantity to ${qty}. Would exceed 20 item limit.` ); return; } state.items[serviceId].qty = qty; } state.totalItems = calculateTotalItems(state.items); state.lastUpdated = new Date().toISOString(); }, /** * Clear entire cart */ clearCart: state => { state.items = {}; state.totalItems = 0; state.lastUpdated = new Date().toISOString(); }, /** * Remove specific service completely */ removeService: (state, action: PayloadAction<{serviceId: string}>) => { const {serviceId} = action.payload; if (state.items[serviceId]) { delete state.items[serviceId]; state.totalItems = calculateTotalItems(state.items); state.lastUpdated = new Date().toISOString(); } }, /** * Reset cart state (for testing/corruption recovery) */ resetCartState: () => initialState, }, })
validateCartState
Default value : (state: any): boolean => { if (!state || typeof state !== 'object') { return false; } if (!state.items || typeof state.items !== 'object') { return false; } if (typeof state.totalItems !== 'number') { return false; } // Validate each cart item for (const [key, item] of Object.entries(state.items)) { if (!item || typeof item !== 'object') { return false; } const cartItem = item as any; if (!cartItem.id || typeof cartItem.id !== 'string') { return false; } if (typeof cartItem.qty !== 'number' || cartItem.qty < 1) { return false; } if (!cartItem.service || typeof cartItem.service !== 'object') { return false; } if (!cartItem.service.serviceId || cartItem.service.serviceId !== key) { return false; } } return true; }

Validate cart state for persistence recovery
wouldExceedMaxItems
Default value : ( items: Record<string, CartItem>, serviceId: string, qtyToAdd: number ): boolean => { const currentTotal = calculateTotalItems(items); const existingQty = items[serviceId]?.qty || 0; const newTotal = currentTotal - existingQty + (existingQty + qtyToAdd); return newTotal > 20; }

Check if adding item would exceed max limit
Default value : servicesCartSlice.actions

src/store/notificationsSlice.ts

calculateUnreadCount
Default value : ( items: Notification[], readIds: string[] ): number => { const readIdSet = new Set(readIds); return items.filter(item => !readIdSet.has(item.id)).length; }

Helper function to calculate unread count based on items and readIds
initialState
Type : NotificationsState
Default value : { items: [], readIds: [], unreadCount: 0, lastFetched: null, isPolling: false, pollError: null, }

Initial state for notifications slice
mergeNotificationsHelper
Default value : ( existingItems: Notification[], newItems: Notification[] ): Notification[] => { const existingIds = new Set(existingItems.map(item => item.id)); const uniqueNewItems = newItems.filter(item => !existingIds.has(item.id)); const allItems = [...existingItems, ...uniqueNewItems]; // Sort by timestamp, newest first return allItems.sort( (a, b) => new Date(b.createdAt).getTime() - new Date(a.createdAt).getTime() ); }

Helper function to merge new notifications with existing ones Preserves existing items and adds new ones, sorted by timestamp (newest first)
notificationsSlice
Default value : createSlice({ name: 'notifications', initialState, reducers: { /** * Replace all notifications with new set from server * Preserves read state and recalculates unread count * * @param action.payload - Array of notifications from server */ setNotifications: (state, action: PayloadAction<Notification[]>) => { state.items = action.payload.sort( (a, b) => new Date(b.createdAt).getTime() - new Date(a.createdAt).getTime() ); state.unreadCount = calculateUnreadCount(state.items, state.readIds); state.lastFetched = Date.now(); state.pollError = null; }, /** * Merge new notifications with existing ones * Preserves existing notifications and read state * * @param action.payload - Array of new notifications to merge */ mergeNotifications: (state, action: PayloadAction<Notification[]>) => { state.items = mergeNotificationsHelper(state.items, action.payload); state.unreadCount = calculateUnreadCount(state.items, state.readIds); state.lastFetched = Date.now(); state.pollError = null; }, /** * Mark a single notification as read * Adds notification ID to readIds array and updates unread count * * @param action.payload - Notification ID to mark as read */ markAsRead: (state, action: PayloadAction<string>) => { const notificationId = action.payload; // Only add if not already in readIds if (!state.readIds.includes(notificationId)) { state.readIds.push(notificationId); state.unreadCount = Math.max(0, state.unreadCount - 1); } }, /** * Mark all current notifications as read * Efficiently adds all notification IDs to readIds array */ markAllAsRead: state => { const existingReadIds = new Set(state.readIds); const newReadIds = state.items .map(item => item.id) .filter(id => !existingReadIds.has(id)); state.readIds.push(...newReadIds); state.unreadCount = 0; }, /** * TEMPORARY: Clear all read IDs (make all notifications unread) * Used for testing the "Mark All Read" functionality */ clearAllReadIds: state => { state.readIds = []; state.unreadCount = calculateUnreadCount(state.items, []); }, /** * Set polling status (active/inactive) * * @param action.payload - Boolean indicating if polling is active */ setPollingStatus: (state, action: PayloadAction<boolean>) => { state.isPolling = action.payload; // Clear error when polling starts successfully if (action.payload) { state.pollError = null; } }, /** * Set polling error message * * @param action.payload - Error message or null to clear */ setPollError: (state, action: PayloadAction<string | null>) => { state.pollError = action.payload; }, /** * Clear all notifications and reset state * Used for logout or data reset scenarios */ clearNotifications: state => { state.items = []; state.readIds = []; state.unreadCount = 0; state.lastFetched = null; state.isPolling = false; state.pollError = null; }, }, })

Notifications slice for managing in-app notifications state

Handles notification data, read state tracking, and polling status. Uses array storage for readIds to ensure Redux serialization compatibility.
selectHasNotifications
Default value : createSelector( [selectNotificationsState], notificationsState => (notificationsState?.items?.length ?? 0) > 0 )

Select if notifications have been fetched at least once
selectIsPolling
Default value : createSelector( [selectNotificationsState], notificationsState => notificationsState?.isPolling ?? false )

Select polling status
selectLastFetched
Default value : createSelector( [selectNotificationsState], notificationsState => notificationsState?.lastFetched ?? null )

Select last fetched timestamp
selectNotificationById
Default value : (notificationId: string) => createSelector( [selectNotifications], notifications => notifications.find(notification => notification.id === notificationId) || null )

Select notification by ID with read status
selectNotifications
Default value : createSelector( [selectNotificationsState], (notificationsState): (Notification & {isRead: boolean})[] => { if (!notificationsState) { return []; } const readIdSet = new Set(notificationsState.readIds); return notificationsState.items.map(notification => ({ ...notification, isRead: readIdSet.has(notification.id), })); } )

Select all notifications with read status computed Returns notifications with isRead flag for UI consumption
selectNotificationsState
Default value : (state: { notifications: NotificationsState | undefined; }) => state.notifications
selectPollError
Default value : createSelector( [selectNotificationsState], notificationsState => notificationsState?.pollError ?? null )

Select polling error
selectUnreadCount
Default value : createSelector( [selectNotificationsState], notificationsState => notificationsState?.unreadCount ?? 0 )

Select unread count
selectUnreadNotifications
Default value : createSelector( [selectNotifications], notifications => notifications.filter(notification => !notification.isRead) )

Select only unread notifications
Default value : notificationsSlice.actions

src/hooks/useKycUpload.ts

canUploadDocType
Default value : (docType: KycDocumentType): boolean => { const lastUpload = uploadDebounceTimestamps.get(docType); if (!lastUpload) { return true; } const now = Date.now(); return now - lastUpload >= UPLOAD_DEBOUNCE_MS; }

Check if upload is allowed based on debounce
canUploadKycDocType
Default value : (docType: KycDocumentType): boolean => { return canUploadDocType(docType); }

Utility function to check if a document type can be uploaded (not in debounce)
getKycUploadDebounceTime
Default value : (docType: KycDocumentType): number => { return getRemainingDebounceTime(docType); }

Utility function to get remaining debounce time for a document type
getRemainingDebounceTime
Default value : (docType: KycDocumentType): number => { const lastUpload = uploadDebounceTimestamps.get(docType); if (!lastUpload) { return 0; } const now = Date.now(); const elapsed = now - lastUpload; const remaining = UPLOAD_DEBOUNCE_MS - elapsed; return Math.max(0, Math.ceil(remaining / 1000)); }

Get remaining debounce time in seconds
UPLOAD_DEBOUNCE_MS
Default value : 60 * 1000

Debounce window for uploads (60 seconds)
uploadDebounceTimestamps
Default value : new Map<KycDocumentType, number>()

Debounce storage for uploads per document type
useKycUpload
Default value : (): UseKycUploadReturn => { const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); const {user} = useNewAuth(); // Upload state const [status, setStatus] = useState<UploadStatus>('idle'); const [progress, setProgress] = useState<number | null>(null); const [error, setError] = useState<Error | undefined>(undefined); const [result, setResult] = useState<UploadResult | undefined>(undefined); // Abort controller for cancellation const abortControllerRef = useRef<AbortController | null>(null); const currentDocTypeRef = useRef<KycDocumentType | null>(null); /** * Cancel current upload */ const cancel = useCallback(() => { if (abortControllerRef.current && status === 'running') { console.log('[useKycUpload] Cancelling upload...'); abortControllerRef.current.abort(); setStatus('cancelled'); setProgress(null); setError(undefined); } }, [status]); /** * Reset state for new upload */ const resetState = useCallback(() => { setStatus('idle'); setProgress(null); setError(undefined); setResult(undefined); }, []); /** * Start KYC document upload */ const startUpload = useCallback( async (docType: KycDocumentType, file: RNFile, leadId?: string) => { // Guard: Check if user is authenticated if (!user?.id) { console.error('[useKycUpload] User not authenticated'); setError(new Error('User not authenticated')); setStatus('error'); return; } // Guard: Check debounce if (!canUploadDocType(docType)) { const remainingSeconds = getRemainingDebounceTime(docType); console.warn( `[useKycUpload] Upload blocked by debounce for ${docType}. ${remainingSeconds}s remaining.` ); setError( new Error( `Please wait ${remainingSeconds} seconds before uploading another ${docType} document.` ) ); setStatus('error'); return; } // Guard: Check if already uploading if (status === 'running') { console.warn('[useKycUpload] Upload already in progress'); return; } try { console.log(`[useKycUpload] Starting upload for ${docType}:`, { fileName: file.name, fileSize: file.size, fileType: file.type, }); // Reset state and setup for new upload resetState(); setStatus('running'); setProgress(0); currentDocTypeRef.current = docType; // Create abort controller abortControllerRef.current = new AbortController(); // Record upload timestamp for debounce uploadDebounceTimestamps.set(docType, Date.now()); // Create store reference for the upload function const storeRef = { getState: (): RootState => { // This will be called during upload to get current state return (global as any).__REDUX_STORE_STATE__ || {}; }, dispatch, }; // temporary hard-coded leadId if not provided // currently, our mock-server expects it mandatorily, but it is expected to be optional // finally, it should be passed in uploadKycDocument only if needed if (!leadId) { leadId = 'LEAD-1014'; } // Start upload const uploadResult = await uploadKycDocument({ leadId, customerId: user.id, docType, file, onProgress: (percentage: number) => { // Only update progress if upload wasn't cancelled if ( abortControllerRef.current && !abortControllerRef.current.signal.aborted ) { setProgress(percentage); console.log(`[useKycUpload] Progress: ${percentage}%`); } }, store: storeRef, abortSignal: abortControllerRef.current.signal, }); // Success if ( abortControllerRef.current && !abortControllerRef.current.signal.aborted ) { console.log( '[useKycUpload] Upload completed successfully:', uploadResult ); setStatus('success'); setProgress(100); setResult(uploadResult); // Auto-invalidate KYC cache dispatch( kycApi.util.invalidateTags([ {type: 'KycDoc', id: user.id}, {type: 'KycDoc', id: 'LIST'}, ]) ); } } catch (uploadError) { // Handle different error types if (abortControllerRef.current?.signal.aborted) { console.log('[useKycUpload] Upload was cancelled'); setStatus('cancelled'); setProgress(null); return; } console.error('[useKycUpload] Upload failed:', uploadError); // DEVELOPMENT MODE: Mock success for failed uploads to maintain UX flow // This allows testing the complete upload workflow even when mock server fails if (__DEV__) { console.warn( '[useKycUpload] DEV MODE: Simulating upload success despite API failure for UX testing' ); // Simulate successful upload result const mockResult = { blobName: `mock-${docType}-${Date.now()}.pdf`, url: 'https://mock-storage.blob.core.windows.net/kyc-docs', }; setStatus('success'); setProgress(100); setResult(mockResult); // Trigger cache invalidation to refresh document list // This will cause useKycDocuments to refetch and show updated status dispatch( kycApi.util.invalidateTags([ {type: 'KycDoc', id: user.id}, {type: 'KycDoc', id: 'LIST'}, ]) ); console.log( '[useKycUpload] DEV MODE: Mock upload completed successfully' ); return; } // PRODUCTION MODE: Handle errors normally let errorToSet: Error; if (uploadError instanceof KycUploadError) { errorToSet = new Error( `Upload failed at ${uploadError.step}: ${uploadError.originalError.message}` ); } else if (uploadError instanceof ValidationError) { errorToSet = uploadError; } else if (uploadError instanceof Error) { errorToSet = uploadError; } else { errorToSet = new Error('Upload failed with unknown error'); } setError(errorToSet); setStatus('error'); setProgress(null); } finally { // Cleanup abortControllerRef.current = null; currentDocTypeRef.current = null; } }, [user?.id, status, dispatch, resetState] ); // Cleanup on unmount useEffect(() => { return () => { if (abortControllerRef.current) { abortControllerRef.current.abort(); } }; }, []); return { startUpload, progress, status, error, cancel, result, }; }

Custom hook for KYC document uploads with progress tracking and cancellation

Features:

  • Real-time progress updates (0-100%)
  • Upload cancellation with AbortController
  • 60-second debounce per document type
  • Automatic cache invalidation on success
  • Comprehensive error handling

src/hooks/useKycDocuments.ts

canUploadDocument
Default value : (status: KycDocumentStatus | 'Missing'): boolean => { return status === 'Missing' || status === 'Rejected'; }

Check if a document status allows upload
canUploadKycDocument
Default value : ( status: KycDocumentStatus | 'Missing' ): boolean => { return canUploadDocument(status); }

Utility function to check if a document can be uploaded
findLatestDocument
Default value : ( documents: KycDocument[], docType: KycDocumentType ): KycDocument | undefined => { const docsOfType = documents.filter(doc => doc.docType === docType); if (docsOfType.length === 0) { return undefined; } // Sort by uploadedAt descending and return the latest return docsOfType.sort( (a, b) => new Date(b.uploadedAt).getTime() - new Date(a.uploadedAt).getTime() )[0]; }

Find the latest document version for a given document type
getKycDocumentDisplayName
Default value : (docType: KycDocumentType): string => { return KYC_DOCUMENT_DISPLAY_NAMES[docType]; }

Utility function to get display name for a document type
KYC_DOCUMENT_CHECKLIST
Type : KycDocumentType[]
Default value : [ 'IncomeProof', 'LightBill', 'CancelledCheque', 'Aadhaar', 'PAN', 'PassportPhoto', 'Other', ] as const

Fixed checklist of all 7 KYC document types
KYC_DOCUMENT_DISPLAY_NAMES
Type : Record<KycDocumentType, string>
Default value : { IncomeProof: 'Income Proof', LightBill: 'Light Bill (Latest)', CancelledCheque: 'Cancelled Cheque (Latest)', Aadhaar: 'Aadhaar Card', PAN: 'PAN Card', PassportPhoto: 'Passport-size Photograph', Other: 'Other Documents', }

Display names for KYC document types
processKycDocuments
Default value : ( apiDocuments: KycDocument[] = [] ): KycDocView[] => { return KYC_DOCUMENT_CHECKLIST.map(docType => { const latestDoc = findLatestDocument(apiDocuments, docType); const status: KycDocumentStatus | 'Missing' = latestDoc?.status || 'Missing'; return { docType, status, canUpload: canUploadDocument(status), latestDoc, displayName: KYC_DOCUMENT_DISPLAY_NAMES[docType], }; }); }

Process API response to create fixed checklist
useKycDocuments
Default value : ( customerId?: string, leadId?: string ): UseKycDocsResult => { const {user} = useNewAuth(); // Derive customer ID from auth state if not provided const resolvedCustomerId = customerId || user?.id; // Query KYC documents from API const { data: apiResponse, isLoading, refetch: apiRefetch, } = useListKycDocumentsQuery( {customerId: resolvedCustomerId, ...(leadId && {leadId})}, { // Force fresh data on every call refetchOnMountOrArgChange: true, // Skip query if no customer ID available AND no leadId available skip: !resolvedCustomerId && !leadId, } ); // Process API response into fixed checklist const docs = useMemo(() => { return processKycDocuments(apiResponse?.documents); }, [apiResponse?.documents]); // Memoized refetch function const refetch = useCallback(() => { if (resolvedCustomerId || leadId) { apiRefetch(); } }, [apiRefetch, resolvedCustomerId, leadId]); return { docs, isLoading: isLoading && (!!resolvedCustomerId || !!leadId), refetch, }; }

Custom hook for KYC documents with fixed checklist and auto-refresh

src/navigation/index.ts

CART_CHECKOUT_ROUTE
Type : string
Default value : 'CartCheckout'

Route Constants

src/components/common/CartBadge/CartBadge.tsx

CartBadge
Type : React.FC<CartBadgeProps>
Default value : ({size = 18, style}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const {cartCount} = useCartActions(); if (cartCount === 0) { return null; } return ( <View style={[styles.container, style]} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="text" accessibilityLabel={`Cart has ${cartCount} item${ cartCount === 1 ? '' : 's' }`} accessibilityLiveRegion="polite" > <Badge size={size} style={[ styles.badge, { backgroundColor: theme.colors.error, }, ]} visible={cartCount > 0} > {cartCount > 99 ? '99+' : cartCount.toString()} </Badge> </View> ); }
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { position: 'absolute', top: -8, right: -8, zIndex: 1, }, badge: { fontSize: 12, fontWeight: 'bold', minWidth: 18, minHeight: 18, }, })

src/screens/main/CartCheckoutScreen.tsx

CartCheckoutScreen
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const navigation = useNavigation<CartCheckoutScreenNavigationProp>(); const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); // API mutation hook const [createLead, {isLoading: isCreatingLead}] = useCreateLeadMutation(); // Auth state from new auth system const {user: currentUser} = useNewAuth(); // Local state const [snackbarVisible, setSnackbarVisible] = useState(false); const [snackbarMessage, setSnackbarMessage] = useState(''); // Cart selectors const cartItems = useAppSelector(selectCartItemsArray); const cartCount = useAppSelector(selectCartCount); const isCartEmpty = useAppSelector(selectCartIsEmpty); // Form default values const defaultValues: CheckoutFormData = { address: '', }; /** * Handle empty cart redirect */ const handleEmptyCartRedirect = useCallback(() => { if (isCartEmpty) { Alert.alert( 'Empty Cart', 'Your cart is empty. Please add services before checkout.', [ { text: 'OK', onPress: () => navigation.goBack(), }, ] ); } }, [isCartEmpty, navigation]); /** * Check for empty cart on screen focus */ useFocusEffect( useCallback(() => { handleEmptyCartRedirect(); }, [handleEmptyCartRedirect]) ); /** * Reset error state on screen focus */ useFocusEffect( useCallback(() => { if (snackbarVisible) { setSnackbarVisible(false); setSnackbarMessage(''); } }, [snackbarVisible]) ); /** * Show error snackbar */ const showError = useCallback((message: string) => { setSnackbarMessage(message); setSnackbarVisible(true); }, []); /** * Show success snackbar */ const showSuccess = useCallback((message: string) => { setSnackbarMessage(message); setSnackbarVisible(true); }, []); /** * Handle form submission with real API call */ const handleSubmit = useCallback( async (data: CheckoutFormData) => { // Early guard - prevent double submissions if (isCreatingLead) { console.log('[CartCheckout] Submission already in progress, ignoring'); return; } // Show confirmation alert before submitting Alert.alert( 'Submit Service Request', `Are you sure you want to submit this service request?\n\nCustomer: ${ currentUser?.name || 'Customer' }\nPhone: ${currentUser?.phone || 'N/A'}\nAddress: ${ data.address }\nServices: ${cartCount} items\n\nThis will create a lead for our team to contact you.`, [ { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel', }, { text: 'Submit Request', style: 'default', onPress: async () => { try { console.log('[CartCheckout] Starting lead creation...', { customerName: currentUser?.name || 'Customer', phone: currentUser?.phone || 'N/A', cartItems: cartItems.length, totalItems: cartCount, }); // Prepare API payload (matches swagger spec exactly) const serviceIds = cartItems.map( item => item.service.serviceId ); const createLeadPayload: CreateLeadRequest = { customerName: currentUser?.name || `Customer_${Date.now()}`, phone: currentUser?.phone || '0000000000', // Use actual phone or fallback address: data.address.trim(), services: serviceIds, }; console.log( '[CartCheckout] API payload (swagger compliant):', createLeadPayload ); // Call the API const result = await createLead(createLeadPayload).unwrap(); // Handle the actual API response structure const leadId = result.leadId || result.data?.leadId || 'Unknown'; console.log('[CartCheckout] Lead created successfully:', { leadId, fullResponse: result, }); // Clear cart immediately dispatch(clearCart()); // Navigate to Services screen with success message navigation.navigate('Main', { screen: 'Services', params: { showSuccessMessage: true, successMessage: `Service request submitted successfully! Lead ID: ${leadId}`, leadId, }, }); } catch (error) { console.error('[CartCheckout] Lead creation failed:', error); // Handle different error types let errorMessage = 'Failed to submit service request. Please try again.'; if (error instanceof ServiceFetchError) { errorMessage = error.message; } else if ( error && typeof error === 'object' && 'message' in error ) { errorMessage = (error as any).message; } else if ( error && typeof error === 'object' && 'data' in error ) { const errorData = (error as any).data; if (errorData && typeof errorData.message === 'string') { errorMessage = errorData.message; } } showError(errorMessage); } }, }, ] ); }, [ cartItems, cartCount, currentUser, isCreatingLead, createLead, dispatch, navigation, showSuccess, showError, ] ); /** * Calculate cart summary */ const cartSummary = { totalItems: cartCount, uniqueServices: cartItems.length, }; /** * Handle clear cart with confirmation */ const handleClearCart = useCallback(() => { Alert.alert( 'Clear Cart', 'Are you sure you want to remove all items from your cart? This action cannot be undone.', [ { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel', }, { text: 'Clear Cart', style: 'destructive', onPress: () => { dispatch(clearCart()); navigation.navigate('Main', {screen: 'Services'}); }, }, ] ); }, [dispatch, navigation]); /** * Render cart item */ const renderCartItem = useCallback( ({item, index}: {item: CartItem; index: number}) => ( <CartItemRow cartItem={item} testID={`cart-item-${index}`} /> ), [] ); /** * Render cart summary header */ const renderCartSummary = () => ( <View style={styles.summaryContainer}> <View style={styles.summaryHeader}> <MaterialIcons name="shopping-cart" size={20} color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.summaryTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Cart Summary </Text> </View> <View style={styles.summaryStats}> <Text style={[styles.summaryText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="text" accessibilityLabel={`${cartSummary.uniqueServices} unique services, ${cartSummary.totalItems} total items`} > {cartSummary.uniqueServices} Service {cartSummary.uniqueServices !== 1 ? 's' : ''} •{' '} {cartSummary.totalItems} Item{cartSummary.totalItems !== 1 ? 's' : ''} </Text> </View> </View> ); /** * Render customer info */ const renderCustomerInfo = () => ( <View style={styles.customerContainer}> <View style={styles.customerHeader}> <MaterialIcons name="person" size={20} color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.customerTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Customer Information </Text> </View> <Text style={[styles.customerText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="text" accessibilityLabel={`Customer: ${ currentUser?.name || 'Customer' }, Phone: ${currentUser?.phone || 'N/A'}`} > Name: {currentUser?.name || 'Customer'} </Text> <Text style={[styles.customerText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Phone: {currentUser?.phone || 'N/A'} </Text> {currentUser?.email && ( <Text style={[styles.customerText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Email: {currentUser.email} </Text> )} </View> ); /** * Render pricing footer */ const renderPricingFooter = () => ( <View style={[ styles.pricingFooter, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.primaryContainer}, ]} > <View style={styles.pricingRow}> <MaterialIcons name="info-outline" size={16} color={theme.colors.onPrimaryContainer} /> <Text style={[styles.pricingText, {color: theme.colors.onPrimaryContainer}]} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="text" accessibilityLabel="Pricing information: Contact us for detailed quotation" > Contact us for detailed quotation based on your requirements </Text> </View> </View> ); /** * Render form section (simplified - only address needed) */ const renderFormSection = () => ( <FormProviderWrapper defaultValues={defaultValues} formOptions={{ mode: 'onChange', resolver: undefined, }} onSubmit={handleSubmit} testID="checkout-form" > {methods => ( <View style={styles.formContainer}> <Text style={[styles.sectionTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Service Details </Text> {/* Address Field - Only field needed */} <Controller name="address" control={methods.control} rules={{ required: 'Address is required', minLength: { value: 10, message: 'Address must be at least 10 characters long', }, validate: value => { const trimmed = value?.trim(); if (!trimmed) { return 'Address is required'; } if (trimmed.length < 10) { return 'Address must be at least 10 characters long'; } return true; }, }} render={({field, fieldState}) => ( <TextInput label="Service Address *" placeholder="Enter the complete address where service is required" value={field.value} onChangeText={text => field.onChange(text)} errorMessage={fieldState.error?.message} hasError={!!fieldState.error} multiline numberOfLines={4} maxLength={300} testID="address-input" accessibilityLabel="Service address input field" accessibilityHint="Enter the complete address where solar service is required" /> )} /> {/* Info Text */} <Text style={[styles.infoText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Please provide a complete address including area, city, and any landmarks for easy location. </Text> {/* Submit Button */} <Button title={isCreatingLead ? 'Submitting...' : 'Submit Service Request'} onPress={methods.onSubmit} variant="primary" size="large" fullWidth disabled={ isCreatingLead || !methods.formState.isValid || !!methods.formState.errors.address || isCartEmpty } style={styles.submitButton} testID="submit-button" accessibilityLabel={ isCreatingLead ? 'Submitting service request' : 'Submit service request' } accessibilityHint={ isCreatingLead ? 'Please wait, submitting your request' : !methods.formState.isValid ? 'Form has errors, please correct them first' : isCartEmpty ? 'Cart is empty, cannot submit' : 'Submit your service request with selected services' } /> </View> )} </FormProviderWrapper> ); // Early return for empty cart (backup check) if (isCartEmpty) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer testID="empty-cart-screen"> <View style={styles.emptyContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="shopping-cart" size={64} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} /> <Text style={[styles.emptyTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Your cart is empty </Text> <Text style={[ styles.emptyMessage, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Add some services to continue with checkout </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } return ( <SafeAreaContainer testID="cart-checkout-screen"> {/* Loading Overlay */} {isCreatingLead && ( <LoadingOverlayContainer message="Submitting your service request..." visible={true} /> )} <ScrollView style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} contentContainerStyle={styles.scrollContent} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} scrollEnabled={!isCreatingLead} > {/* Customer Info */} {renderCustomerInfo()} {/* Cart Summary */} {renderCartSummary()} {/* Cart Items List */} <View style={styles.cartItemsContainer}> <FlatList data={cartItems} keyExtractor={item => item.id} renderItem={renderCartItem} scrollEnabled={false} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} /> </View> {/* Pricing Footer */} {renderPricingFooter()} {/* Clear Cart Button */} <View style={styles.clearCartContainer}> <Button title="Clear Cart" onPress={handleClearCart} variant="outline" size="small" disabled={isCreatingLead} style={styles.clearCartButton} textStyle={styles.clearCartButtonText} testID="clear-cart-button" accessibilityLabel="Clear all items from cart" accessibilityHint="Removes all services from your cart" /> </View> {/* Form Section */} {renderFormSection()} </ScrollView> {/* Snackbar for success/error messages */} <Snackbar visible={snackbarVisible} onDismiss={() => { setSnackbarVisible(false); setSnackbarMessage(''); }} duration={4000} action={{ label: 'Dismiss', onPress: () => { setSnackbarVisible(false); setSnackbarMessage(''); }, }} style={styles.snackbar} > {snackbarMessage} </Snackbar> </SafeAreaContainer> ); }

Cart Checkout Screen Component
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, scrollContent: { flexGrow: 1, padding: 16, }, // Customer Info customerContainer: { marginBottom: 16, padding: 12, borderRadius: 8, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#E0E0E0', }, customerHeader: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 8, }, customerTitle: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', marginLeft: 8, }, customerText: { fontSize: 14, marginBottom: 4, }, // Cart Summary summaryContainer: { marginBottom: 16, }, summaryHeader: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 8, }, summaryTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', marginLeft: 8, }, summaryStats: { paddingLeft: 28, }, summaryText: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '500', }, // Cart Items cartItemsContainer: { marginBottom: 16, }, // Pricing Footer pricingFooter: { padding: 12, borderRadius: 8, marginBottom: 24, }, pricingRow: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', }, pricingText: { fontSize: 12, fontWeight: '500', marginLeft: 8, flex: 1, }, // Form Section formContainer: { flex: 1, }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', marginBottom: 16, }, infoText: { fontSize: 12, fontStyle: 'italic', marginTop: 8, marginBottom: 16, }, submitButton: { marginTop: 24, }, // Empty State emptyContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', padding: 32, }, emptyTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, }, emptyMessage: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', }, clearCartContainer: {marginBottom: 16}, clearCartButton: { borderColor: 'green', borderWidth: 2, }, clearCartButtonText: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '500', color: 'red', }, // Snackbar snackbar: { marginBottom: 16, }, })

Styles

src/components/cart/CartItemRow/CartItemRow.tsx

CartItemRow
Type : React.FC<CartItemRowProps>
Default value : ({ cartItem, readonly = true, testID, }) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const {service, qty} = cartItem; return ( <View style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]} testID={testID} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="text" accessibilityLabel={`${service.name}, ${service.type} service, quantity ${qty}. ${service.description}`} > {/* Service Header */} <View style={styles.header}> <MaterialIcons name="solar-power" size={20} color={theme.colors.primary} style={styles.icon} /> <View style={styles.serviceInfo}> <Text style={[styles.serviceName, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} numberOfLines={1} > {service.name} </Text> <Text style={[styles.serviceType, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} numberOfLines={1} > {service.type} </Text> </View> <View style={styles.quantityContainer}> <Text style={[ styles.quantityLabel, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Qty: </Text> <Text style={[styles.quantityValue, {color: theme.colors.primary}]} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="text" accessibilityLabel={`Quantity: ${qty}`} > {qty} </Text> </View> </View> {/* Service Description */} <Text style={[styles.description, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} numberOfLines={2} > {service.description} </Text> {/* Footer with pricing info */} <View style={styles.footer}> {service.priceRange && ( <View style={styles.priceContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="currency-rupee" size={14} color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.priceText, {color: theme.colors.primary}]}> Contact for pricing </Text> </View> )} </View> </View> ); }

src/store/checkoutSlice.ts

checkoutSlice
Default value : createSlice({ name: 'checkout', initialState, reducers: { /** * Submit draft lead (NO-OP stub for now) * * Simply logs and persists the draft lead data to Redux state. * This will be replaced with actual API call in S3-TASK-01B. * * @param action.payload - Draft lead data with address, instructions, and cart snapshot */ submitDraftLead: (state, action: PayloadAction<DraftLead>) => { const timestamp = new Date().toISOString(); // Log for debugging (will be removed in production) console.log('[Checkout] Draft lead submitted:', { timestamp, address: action.payload.address, instructionsLength: action.payload.instructions?.length || 0, servicesCount: action.payload.cartSnapshot.length, totalItems: action.payload.cartSnapshot.reduce( (sum, item) => sum + item.qty, 0 ), }); // Store draft in Redux (ephemeral - never persisted) state.draft = action.payload; state.lastSubmittedAt = timestamp; state.error = undefined; // TODO: Replace with actual API call in S3-TASK-01B // This will become: await leadsAPI.createLead(action.payload) }, /** * Set submission loading state */ setSubmitting: (state, action: PayloadAction<boolean>) => { state.isSubmitting = action.payload; }, /** * Set submission error */ setSubmissionError: (state, action: PayloadAction<string>) => { state.error = action.payload; state.isSubmitting = false; }, /** * Clear draft lead data */ clearDraft: state => { state.draft = undefined; state.error = undefined; state.isSubmitting = false; }, /** * Reset entire checkout state */ resetCheckoutState: () => initialState, }, })

Checkout slice
initialState
Type : CheckoutState
Default value : { isSubmitting: false, }

Initial state
selectCheckoutDraft
Default value : (state: {checkout: CheckoutState}) => state.checkout.draft
selectHasDraft
Default value : (state: {checkout: CheckoutState}) => !!state.checkout.draft
selectIsSubmitting
Default value : (state: {checkout: CheckoutState}) => state.checkout.isSubmitting
selectLastSubmittedAt
Default value : (state: {checkout: CheckoutState}) => state.checkout.lastSubmittedAt
selectSubmissionError
Default value : (state: {checkout: CheckoutState}) => state.checkout.error
Default value : checkoutSlice.actions

src/utils/debugAuth.ts

clearAllAuthStorage
Default value : async () => { try { console.log('[Debug] Clearing all auth storage...'); // Clear Redux Persist await AsyncStorage.removeItem('persist:newRoot'); console.log('[Debug] Cleared persist:newRoot'); // Clear JWT const {clearJWT} = await import('../storage/secureStorage'); await clearJWT(); console.log('[Debug] Cleared JWT from secure storage'); // Clear all OTP attempts and lockouts const keys = await AsyncStorage.getAllKeys(); const otpKeys = keys.filter( key => key.startsWith('otp_attempts_') || key.startsWith('otp_lockout_') ); if (otpKeys.length > 0) { await AsyncStorage.multiRemove(otpKeys); console.log('[Debug] Cleared OTP attempts and lockouts'); } console.log('[Debug] All auth storage cleared'); } catch (error) { console.error('[Debug] Failed to clear auth storage:', error); } }

Clear all auth storage for testing Clears both old and new auth systems
clearOtpAttempts
Default value : async (phone: string) => { try { console.log(`[Debug] Clearing OTP attempts for ${phone}...`); const attemptKey = `otp_attempts_${phone}`; const lockoutKey = `otp_lockout_${phone}`; await AsyncStorage.multiRemove([attemptKey, lockoutKey]); console.log(`[Debug] OTP attempts cleared for ${phone}`); } catch (error) { console.error('[Debug] Failed to clear OTP attempts:', error); } }

Clear OTP attempts and lockout for a phone number
debugAuthState
Default value : async () => { try { console.log('=== AUTH DEBUG START ==='); // Check NEW auth system (persist:newRoot) const newPersistedData = await AsyncStorage.getItem('persist:newRoot'); console.log( '[Debug] NEW persisted Redux data (newRoot):', newPersistedData ? 'EXISTS' : 'NULL' ); if (newPersistedData) { try { const newParsed = JSON.parse(newPersistedData); console.log( '[Debug] NEW persisted auth state:', newParsed.newAuth ? 'EXISTS' : 'NULL' ); if (newParsed.newAuth) { const newAuthData = JSON.parse(newParsed.newAuth); console.log('[Debug] NEW auth state details:', { isLoggedIn: newAuthData.isLoggedIn, hasUser: !!newAuthData.user, hasToken: !!newAuthData.token, error: newAuthData.error, }); } } catch (parseError) { console.error( '[Debug] Failed to parse NEW persisted data:', parseError ); } } // Check JWT in secure storage try { const jwt = await getJWT(); console.log('[Debug] JWT in secure storage:', jwt ? 'EXISTS' : 'NULL'); if (jwt) { // Try to decode JWT payload for additional info try { const base64Decode = (str: string): string => { if (typeof atob !== 'undefined') { return atob(str); } // React Native polyfill return Buffer.from(str, 'base64').toString('ascii'); }; const payload = JSON.parse(base64Decode(jwt.split('.')[1])); console.log('[Debug] JWT payload:', { userId: payload.userId, phone: payload.phone, role: payload.role, exp: payload.exp ? new Date(payload.exp * 1000).toISOString() : 'N/A', }); } catch (decodeError) { console.warn('[Debug] Failed to decode JWT payload:', decodeError); } } } catch (jwtError) { console.error('[Debug] Failed to get JWT:', jwtError); } console.log('=== AUTH DEBUG END ==='); } catch (error) { console.error('[Debug] Auth debug failed:', error); } }

Debug authentication state

Type : object
Default value : { primary: '#007AFF', error: '#FF3B30', background: '#FFFFFF', surface: '#F8F9FA', text: '#000000', textSecondary: '#666666', border: '#E5E5E7', borderDisabled: '#D1D1D6', overlay: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)', }
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ otpContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', width: '100%', maxWidth: 300, }, otpInputContainer: { width: '100%', alignItems: 'center', }, fieldsContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', width: '100%', maxWidth: 280, paddingHorizontal: 8, }, otpInputField: { width: 45, height: 55, borderWidth: 2, borderRadius: 8, textAlign: 'center', fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '500', color: colors.text, backgroundColor: colors.surface, }, // Focus state focusedField: { borderColor: colors.primary, shadowColor: colors.primary, shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 0}, shadowOpacity: 0.3, shadowRadius: 4, elevation: 3, }, // Error state errorField: { borderColor: colors.error, shadowColor: colors.error, shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 0}, shadowOpacity: 0.2, shadowRadius: 2, elevation: 2, }, // Disabled state disabledField: { borderColor: colors.borderDisabled, opacity: 0.5, }, // Default state defaultField: { borderColor: colors.border, }, errorContainer: { marginTop: 8, width: '100%', alignItems: 'center', }, errorText: { color: colors.error, fontSize: 14, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 18, }, pasteButton: { marginTop: 12, paddingVertical: 8, paddingHorizontal: 12, backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.1)', borderRadius: 6, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: 'rgba(0, 122, 255, 0.2)', alignSelf: 'center', }, pasteInstructionText: { color: colors.primary, fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '500', textAlign: 'center', }, loadingContainer: { position: 'absolute', top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', backgroundColor: colors.overlay, borderRadius: 8, }, })

src/store/index.ts

createPersistedReducer
Default value : () => { return persistReducer( { ...enhancedPersistConfig, stateReconciler: (inboundState: any, originalState: any) => { // Validate inbound state before reconciling if (!validatePersistedState(inboundState)) { console.warn('[Store] Invalid persisted state, using original state'); return originalState; } // Custom reconciliation logic return { ...originalState, ...inboundState, }; }, }, rootReducer ); }

Enhanced persistor with validation Persisted reducer
enhancedPersistConfig
Type : object
Default value : { ...persistConfig, // Don't persist API cache - it should be fresh on app start blacklist: [ 'ui', authApi.reducerPath, newAuthApi.reducerPath, // Don't persist new auth API cache servicesApi.reducerPath, leadsApi.reducerPath, quotationsApi.reducerPath, kycApi.reducerPath, notificationsApi.reducerPath, profileApi.reducerPath, ticketsApi.reducerPath, ], }

Enhanced persist configuration
persistor
Default value : persistStore( store, { manualPersist: false, }, () => { console.log('[Store] Persistence initialization complete'); // Debug info in development if (__DEV__) { console.log('[Store] Initial state:', store.getState()); } } )

Create persistor with enhanced error handling
rootReducer
Default value : combineReducers({ // Data slices auth: authReducer, // Keep old auth for now newAuth: newAuthReducer, // New simplified auth ui: uiReducer, cache: cacheReducer, refresh: refreshReducer, servicesCart: servicesCartReducer, checkout: checkoutReducer, notifications: notificationsReducer, tickets: ticketsReducer, // API slices [authApi.reducerPath]: authApi.reducer, [newAuthApi.reducerPath]: newAuthApi.reducer, // New auth API [servicesApi.reducerPath]: servicesApi.reducer, [leadsApi.reducerPath]: leadsApi.reducer, [quotationsApi.reducerPath]: quotationsApi.reducer, [kycApi.reducerPath]: kycApi.reducer, [notificationsApi.reducerPath]: notificationsApi.reducer, [profileApi.reducerPath]: profileApi.reducer, [ticketsApi.reducerPath]: ticketsApi.reducer, })

Root reducer with API slices
store
Default value : configureStore({ reducer: createPersistedReducer(), middleware: getDefaultMiddleware => getDefaultMiddleware({ serializableCheck: { ignoredActions: [ FLUSH, REHYDRATE, PAUSE, PERSIST, PURGE, REGISTER, // RTK Query actions 'authApi/executeQuery/pending', 'authApi/executeQuery/fulfilled', 'authApi/executeQuery/rejected', 'authApi/executeMutation/pending', 'authApi/executeMutation/fulfilled', 'authApi/executeMutation/rejected', 'servicesApi/executeQuery/pending', 'servicesApi/executeQuery/fulfilled', 'servicesApi/executeQuery/rejected', 'leadsApi/executeQuery/pending', 'leadsApi/executeQuery/fulfilled', 'leadsApi/executeQuery/rejected', 'quotationsApi/executeQuery/pending', 'quotationsApi/executeQuery/fulfilled', 'quotationsApi/executeQuery/rejected', 'quotationsApi/executeMutation/pending', 'quotationsApi/executeMutation/fulfilled', 'quotationsApi/executeMutation/rejected', 'kycApi/executeQuery/pending', 'kycApi/executeQuery/fulfilled', 'kycApi/executeQuery/rejected', 'kycApi/executeMutation/pending', 'kycApi/executeMutation/fulfilled', 'kycApi/executeMutation/rejected', 'notificationsApi/executeQuery/pending', 'notificationsApi/executeQuery/fulfilled', 'notificationsApi/executeQuery/rejected', 'notificationsApi/executeMutation/pending', 'notificationsApi/executeMutation/fulfilled', 'notificationsApi/executeMutation/rejected', 'profileApi/executeQuery/pending', 'profileApi/executeQuery/fulfilled', 'profileApi/executeQuery/rejected', 'profileApi/executeMutation/pending', 'profileApi/executeMutation/fulfilled', 'profileApi/executeMutation/rejected', 'ticketsApi/executeQuery/pending', 'ticketsApi/executeQuery/fulfilled', 'ticketsApi/executeQuery/rejected', 'ticketsApi/executeMutation/pending', 'ticketsApi/executeMutation/fulfilled', 'ticketsApi/executeMutation/rejected', ], // Ignore these field paths in all actions ignoredActionsPaths: [ 'meta.arg', 'payload.timestamp', 'meta.baseQueryMeta', ], // Ignore these paths in the state ignoredPaths: [ 'items.dates', `${authApi.reducerPath}.queries`, `${authApi.reducerPath}.mutations`, `${servicesApi.reducerPath}.queries`, `${servicesApi.reducerPath}.mutations`, `${leadsApi.reducerPath}.queries`, `${leadsApi.reducerPath}.mutations`, `${quotationsApi.reducerPath}.queries`, `${quotationsApi.reducerPath}.mutations`, `${kycApi.reducerPath}.queries`, `${kycApi.reducerPath}.mutations`, `${notificationsApi.reducerPath}.queries`, `${notificationsApi.reducerPath}.mutations`, `${profileApi.reducerPath}.queries`, `${profileApi.reducerPath}.mutations`, `${ticketsApi.reducerPath}.queries`, `${ticketsApi.reducerPath}.mutations`, ], }, thunk: { extraArgument: { // Add any extra arguments for thunks here }, }, }) // Add RTK Query middleware .concat(authApi.middleware) .concat(newAuthApi.middleware) // Add new auth API middleware .concat(servicesApi.middleware) .concat(leadsApi.middleware) .concat(quotationsApi.middleware) .concat(kycApi.middleware) .concat(notificationsApi.middleware) .concat(profileApi.middleware) .concat(ticketsApi.middleware), devTools: __DEV__ && { name: 'Solarium Customer App', trace: true, traceLimit: 25, // Add RTK Query devtools support actionSanitizer: action => { if ( action.type?.includes('executeQuery') || action.type?.includes('executeMutation') ) { return { ...action, // Sanitize large payloads for devtools payload: action.payload ? '[API Payload]' : action.payload, }; } return action; }, }, enhancers: getDefaultEnhancers => { return getDefaultEnhancers({ autoBatch: true, }); }, })

Configure store with API middleware
storeUtils
Type : object
Default value : { /** * Get current state */ getState: () => store.getState(), /** * Check if store is rehydrated */ isRehydrated: () => persistor.getState().bootstrapped, /** * Wait for rehydration to complete */ waitForRehydration: (): Promise<void> => { return new Promise(resolve => { if (persistor.getState().bootstrapped) { resolve(); return; } const unsubscribe = persistor.subscribe(() => { if (persistor.getState().bootstrapped) { unsubscribe(); resolve(); } }); }); }, /** * Reset store to initial state */ reset: async () => { await persistor.purge(); // Reset RTK Query cache store.dispatch(authApi.util.resetApiState()); store.dispatch(servicesApi.util.resetApiState()); store.dispatch(leadsApi.util.resetApiState()); store.dispatch(quotationsApi.util.resetApiState()); store.dispatch(kycApi.util.resetApiState()); store.dispatch(notificationsApi.util.resetApiState()); store.dispatch(profileApi.util.resetApiState()); store.dispatch(ticketsApi.util.resetApiState()); persistor.persist(); }, /** * Invalidate all API caches */ invalidateAPIs: () => { store.dispatch(authApi.util.invalidateTags(['User', 'Auth'])); store.dispatch(servicesApi.util.invalidateTags(['Service', 'Services'])); store.dispatch(leadsApi.util.invalidateTags(['Lead', 'LeadsList'])); store.dispatch( quotationsApi.util.invalidateTags([ 'Quotation', 'QuotationsList', 'QuotationPdf', ]) ); store.dispatch(kycApi.util.invalidateTags(['KycDoc'])); store.dispatch( notificationsApi.util.invalidateTags([ 'Notification', 'NotificationsList', ]) ); store.dispatch(profileApi.util.invalidateTags(['UserProfile'])); store.dispatch(ticketsApi.util.invalidateTags(['Ticket', 'TicketsList'])); }, /** * Purge all persisted state */ purge: async () => { await persistor.purge(); }, /** * Flush pending persistence operations */ flush: async () => { await persistor.flush(); }, }

Store utilities

src/utils/persistenceHelpers.ts

createPersistenceListeners
Default value : () => { const listeners = { onRehydrate: (key: string) => { console.log(`[Persistence] Rehydrating ${key}`); }, onPause: () => { console.log('[Persistence] Persistence paused'); }, onPersist: () => { console.log('[Persistence] State persisted'); }, onError: (error: Error) => { console.error('[Persistence] Persistence error:', error); }, }; return listeners; }

Persistence event listeners
debugPersistence
Default value : () => { if (__DEV__) { console.group('[Persistence Debug]'); console.log('Persistor state:', persistor.getState()); console.log('Is rehydrated:', persistor.getState().bootstrapped); console.log('Registry:', persistor.getState().registry); console.groupEnd(); } }

Debug persistence state
persistenceHelpers
Type : object
Default value : { /** * Purge all persisted state */ purgeAll: async (): Promise<void> => { try { console.log('[Persistence] Purging all persisted state'); await persistor.purge(); await clearStorage(); } catch (error) { console.error('[Persistence] Error purging state:', error); throw error; } }, /** * Flush pending persistence operations */ flush: async (): Promise<void> => { try { console.log('[Persistence] Flushing pending operations'); await persistor.flush(); } catch (error) { console.error('[Persistence] Error flushing:', error); throw error; } }, /** * Pause persistence */ pause: (): void => { console.log('[Persistence] Pausing persistence'); persistor.pause(); }, /** * Resume persistence */ persist: (): void => { console.log('[Persistence] Resuming persistence'); persistor.persist(); }, /** * Get persistence state */ getState: () => { return { isRehydrated: persistor.getState().bootstrapped, registry: persistor.getState().registry, }; }, /** * Reset persistence to initial state */ reset: async (): Promise<void> => { try { console.log('[Persistence] Resetting to initial state'); await persistor.purge(); persistor.persist(); } catch (error) { console.error('[Persistence] Error resetting:', error); throw error; } }, /** * Check if persistence is working */ healthCheck: async (): Promise<boolean> => { try { const testKey = 'persistence_health_check'; const testValue = {timestamp: Date.now()}; // Try to write and read a test value await persistor.flush(); // Check if we can access the underlying storage const storage = require('react-native-encrypted-storage').default; await storage.setItem(testKey, JSON.stringify(testValue)); const retrieved = await storage.getItem(testKey); await storage.removeItem(testKey); return retrieved !== null; } catch (error) { console.error('[Persistence] Health check failed:', error); return false; } }, }

Persistence operations

src/components/modals/CreateTicketModal.tsx

CreateTicketModal
Type : React.FC<CreateTicketModalProps>
Default value : ({ visible, onClose, onSuccess, prefilledLeadId, testID = 'create-ticket-modal', }) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); // Form state const [selectedLeadId, setSelectedLeadId] = useState<string>(''); const [subject, setSubject] = useState<string>(''); const [description, setDescription] = useState<string>(''); const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null); // Form validation errors const [fieldErrors, setFieldErrors] = useState<{ leadId?: string; subject?: string; description?: string; }>({}); // API hooks const { data: leadsResponse, isLoading: isLoadingLeads, error: leadsError, } = useGetLeadsQuery({ status: 'Executed', limit: 100, }); const [createTicket, {isLoading: isCreatingTicket}] = useCreateTicketMutation(); // Reset form when modal visibility changes useEffect(() => { if (visible) { setError(null); setFieldErrors({}); if (prefilledLeadId) { setSelectedLeadId(prefilledLeadId); } else { setSelectedLeadId(''); } setSubject(''); setDescription(''); } }, [visible, prefilledLeadId]); /** * Convert leads to dropdown options */ const leadOptions: DropdownOption[] = useMemo(() => { // Filter for executed leads on client-side const executedLeads = leadsResponse?.data || []; return executedLeads.map((lead: any) => ({ value: lead.leadId, label: lead.leadId, sublabel: `Services:\n ${lead.services.join(',\n ')}`, })); }, [leadsResponse]); /** * Validate form fields */ const validateForm = useCallback((): boolean => { const errors: typeof fieldErrors = {}; // Validate leadId if (!selectedLeadId.trim()) { errors.leadId = 'Please select a lead'; } // Validate subject if (!subject.trim()) { errors.subject = 'Subject is required'; } else if (subject.length > 200) { errors.subject = 'Subject must be less than 200 characters'; } // Validate description if (!description.trim()) { errors.description = 'Description is required'; } else if (description.length > 2000) { errors.description = 'Description must be less than 2000 characters'; } setFieldErrors(errors); return Object.keys(errors).length === 0; }, [selectedLeadId, subject, description]); /** * Handle form submission */ const handleSubmit = useCallback(async () => { setError(null); if (!validateForm()) { return; } try { const leadIdToUse = prefilledLeadId || selectedLeadId; console.log('[CreateTicketModal] Creating ticket:', { leadId: leadIdToUse, subject: subject.trim(), descriptionLength: description.trim().length, }); const result = await createTicket({ leadId: leadIdToUse, subject: subject.trim(), description: description.trim(), }).unwrap(); console.log('[CreateTicketModal] Ticket created successfully:', result); // Call success callback with ticket ID if (onSuccess && result.ticketId) { onSuccess(result.ticketId); } // Close modal onClose(); } catch (createError: any) { console.error('[CreateTicketModal] Create ticket error:', createError); let errorMessage = 'Failed to create ticket. Please try again.'; if (createError?.data?.error) { errorMessage = createError.data.error; } else if (createError?.message) { errorMessage = createError.message; } setError(errorMessage); } }, [ selectedLeadId, subject, description, createTicket, onSuccess, onClose, validateForm, prefilledLeadId, ]); /** * Handle lead selection */ const handleLeadSelect = useCallback( (leadId: string) => { setSelectedLeadId(leadId); if (fieldErrors.leadId) { setFieldErrors(prev => ({...prev, leadId: undefined})); } }, [fieldErrors.leadId] ); /** * Handle subject change */ const handleSubjectChange = useCallback( (text: string) => { setSubject(text); if (fieldErrors.subject) { setFieldErrors(prev => ({...prev, subject: undefined})); } }, [fieldErrors.subject] ); /** * Handle description change */ const handleDescriptionChange = useCallback( (text: string) => { setDescription(text); if (fieldErrors.description) { setFieldErrors(prev => ({...prev, description: undefined})); } }, [fieldErrors.description] ); /** * Clear error message */ const clearError = useCallback(() => { setError(null); }, []); return ( <Portal> <Modal visible={visible} onDismiss={onClose} contentContainerStyle={styles.modalContainer} testID={testID} > <Card style={[styles.card, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]}> <ScrollView showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false}> <Card.Content> <Text variant="headlineSmall" style={[styles.title, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} accessibilityRole="header" accessibilityLabel="Create new support ticket" > Create Support Ticket </Text> <Text variant="bodyMedium" style={[ styles.subtitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Create a new support ticket for your executed lead </Text> {error && ( <ErrorMessage message={error} type="error" visible={true} dismissible={true} onDismiss={clearError} style={styles.errorMessage} testID="create-ticket-error" /> )} <View style={styles.formContainer}> {/* Lead Selection */} {prefilledLeadId ? ( <View style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Text style={{fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: 4}}> Lead ID </Text> <Text style={{color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}}> {prefilledLeadId} </Text> </View> ) : ( <Dropdown label="Select Lead *" placeholder="Choose an executed lead..." value={selectedLeadId} options={leadOptions} onSelect={handleLeadSelect} error={fieldErrors.leadId} loading={isLoadingLeads} disabled={!!prefilledLeadId} testID="lead-dropdown" /> )} {(leadsError || (leadOptions.length === 0 && !isLoadingLeads)) && ( <Text variant="bodySmall" style={[styles.helperText, {color: theme.colors.error}]} > {leadsError ? 'Failed to load leads. Please try again.' : 'No executed leads found. Please ensure you have leads with "Executed" status.'} </Text> )} {/* Subject Field */} <TextInput label="Subject *" placeholder="Enter ticket subject..." value={subject} onChangeText={handleSubjectChange} error={!!fieldErrors.subject} maxLength={200} disabled={isCreatingTicket} style={styles.textInput} testID="subject-input" /> {fieldErrors.subject && ( <Text variant="bodySmall" style={[styles.fieldErrorText, {color: theme.colors.error}]} > {fieldErrors.subject} </Text> )} <Text variant="bodySmall" style={[ styles.charCountText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > {subject.length}/200 characters </Text> {/* Description Field */} <TextInput label="Description *" placeholder="Describe your issue in detail..." value={description} onChangeText={handleDescriptionChange} error={!!fieldErrors.description} multiline numberOfLines={4} maxLength={2000} disabled={isCreatingTicket} style={[styles.textInput, styles.descriptionInput]} testID="description-input" /> {fieldErrors.description && ( <Text variant="bodySmall" style={[styles.fieldErrorText, {color: theme.colors.error}]} > {fieldErrors.description} </Text> )} <Text variant="bodySmall" style={[ styles.charCountText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > {description.length}/2000 characters </Text> </View> <Divider style={styles.divider} /> <Text variant="bodySmall" style={[ styles.helpText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > * All fields are required{'\n'} Once created, you can track and communicate through the ticket thread. </Text> </Card.Content> <Card.Actions style={styles.actions}> <Button mode="text" onPress={onClose} disabled={isCreatingTicket} accessibilityLabel="Cancel ticket creation" accessibilityRole="button" testID="cancel-button" > Cancel </Button> <Button mode="contained" onPress={handleSubmit} disabled={isCreatingTicket} loading={isCreatingTicket} icon={({size, color}) => ( <MaterialIcons name="add" size={size} color={color} /> )} accessibilityLabel={ isCreatingTicket ? 'Creating ticket' : 'Create ticket' } accessibilityRole="button" testID="create-button" > {isCreatingTicket ? 'Creating...' : 'Create Ticket'} </Button> </Card.Actions> </ScrollView> </Card> </Modal> </Portal> ); }

Create Ticket Modal Component
styles
