Default value : StyleSheet.create({ modalContainer: { margin: 20, maxHeight: '90%', }, card: { borderRadius: 12, elevation: 8, }, title: { textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: 8, fontWeight: 'bold', }, subtitle: { textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: 24, }, errorMessage: { marginBottom: 16, }, formContainer: { marginBottom: 16, }, textInput: { marginBottom: 4, backgroundColor: 'transparent', }, descriptionInput: { minHeight: 100, }, fieldErrorText: { marginLeft: 16, marginTop: 4, marginBottom: 4, }, charCountText: { textAlign: 'right', marginBottom: 16, marginRight: 16, }, helperText: { marginLeft: 16, marginBottom: 16, }, divider: { marginVertical: 16, }, helpText: { textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 18, }, actions: { justifyContent: 'space-between', paddingTop: 8, paddingHorizontal: 16, }, })

src/theme/ThemeProvider.tsx

customTheme
Type : ExtendedTheme
Default value : { ...MD3LightTheme, fonts: fontConfig, colors: { ...MD3LightTheme.colors, primary: colors.primary, primaryContainer: colors.primaryLight, secondary: colors.secondary, secondaryContainer: colors.secondaryLight, background: colors.background, surface: colors.surface, error: colors.error, onPrimary: '#FFFFFF', onSecondary: '#FFFFFF', onBackground: colors.text.primary, onSurface: colors.text.primary, onError: '#FFFFFF', outline: colors.border.default, outlineVariant: colors.border.light, }, // Add our custom properties spacing, typography, shadows, borderRadius, }

Custom theme based on Material Design 3
fontConfig
Default value : configureFonts({ config: { displayLarge: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.bold, fontSize: typography.fontSize.xxl, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.xxl * typography.lineHeight.tight, }, displayMedium: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.bold, fontSize: typography.fontSize.xl, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.xl * typography.lineHeight.tight, }, displaySmall: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.bold, fontSize: typography.fontSize.lg, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.lg * typography.lineHeight.normal, }, headlineLarge: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.medium, fontSize: typography.fontSize.xl, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.xl * typography.lineHeight.normal, }, headlineMedium: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.medium, fontSize: typography.fontSize.lg, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.lg * typography.lineHeight.normal, }, headlineSmall: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.medium, fontSize: typography.fontSize.md, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.md * typography.lineHeight.normal, }, titleLarge: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.medium, fontSize: typography.fontSize.lg, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.lg * typography.lineHeight.normal, }, titleMedium: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.medium, fontSize: typography.fontSize.md, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.md * typography.lineHeight.normal, }, titleSmall: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.medium, fontSize: typography.fontSize.sm, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.sm * typography.lineHeight.normal, }, bodyLarge: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.regular, fontSize: typography.fontSize.md, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.md * typography.lineHeight.relaxed, }, bodyMedium: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.regular, fontSize: typography.fontSize.sm, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.sm * typography.lineHeight.relaxed, }, bodySmall: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.regular, fontSize: typography.fontSize.xs, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.xs * typography.lineHeight.relaxed, }, labelLarge: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.medium, fontSize: typography.fontSize.sm, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.sm * typography.lineHeight.normal, }, labelMedium: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.medium, fontSize: typography.fontSize.xs, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.xs * typography.lineHeight.normal, }, labelSmall: { fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.medium, fontSize: typography.fontSize.xs, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.xs * typography.lineHeight.normal, }, }, })

Configure fonts for react-native-paper
ThemeContext
Default value : createContext<ExtendedTheme>(customTheme)

Theme context for accessing theme outside of Paper components
ThemeProvider
Type : React.FC<ThemeProviderProps>
Default value : ({children}) => { return ( <PaperProvider theme={customTheme}> <ThemeContext.Provider value={customTheme}> {children} </ThemeContext.Provider> </PaperProvider> ); }

Theme Provider Component Wraps the app with Material Design theme and custom theme context
useAppTheme
Default value : (): ExtendedTheme => { const theme = useContext(ThemeContext); if (!theme) { throw new Error('useAppTheme must be used within ThemeProvider'); } return theme; }

Hook to access theme in components

src/utils/debounceWindow.ts

DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS
Default value : { SINGLE_LEAD: 60, // 60 seconds for single lead refresh LEADS: 60, // 60 seconds for leads refresh SERVICES: 300, // 300 seconds for services AUTH: 120, // 2 minutes for auth QUOTATIONS: 180, // 180 seconds for quotations refresh SINGLE_QUOTATION: 180, // 180 seconds for single quotation QUOTE_ACTION: 5, // 5 seconds for accept/reject actions KYC: 60, // 60 seconds for KYC refresh NOTIFICATIONS: 30, // 30 seconds for notifications TICKETS: 30, // 30 seconds for tickets } as const

Debounce Window Utility Generic helper for time-window based debouncing
getDebounceStatusMessage
Default value : ( lastActionTime: number | null, debounceSeconds: number = DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.LEADS ): string => { const remainingSeconds = getRemainingDebounceTime( lastActionTime, debounceSeconds ); if (remainingSeconds === 0) { return 'Ready to refresh'; } if (remainingSeconds < 60) { return `Wait ${remainingSeconds} second${ remainingSeconds === 1 ? '' : 's' }`; } const minutes = Math.ceil(remainingSeconds / 60); return `Wait ${minutes} minute${minutes === 1 ? '' : 's'}`; }

Get human-readable time until next allowed action
getRemainingDebounceTime
Default value : ( lastActionTime: number | null, debounceSeconds: number = DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.LEADS ): number => { if (!lastActionTime) { return 0; } const now = Date.now(); const debounceMs = debounceSeconds * 1000; const timeSinceLastAction = now - lastActionTime; const remainingMs = debounceMs - timeSinceLastAction; return Math.max(0, Math.ceil(remainingMs / 1000)); }

Get remaining debounce time in seconds
isOutsideDebounceWindow
Default value : ( lastActionTime: number | null, debounceSeconds: number = DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.LEADS ): boolean => { if (!lastActionTime) { return true; // No previous action, allow } const now = Date.now(); const debounceMs = debounceSeconds * 1000; const timeSinceLastAction = now - lastActionTime; return timeSinceLastAction >= debounceMs; }

Check if enough time has passed since last action to allow new action

src/utils/imageCompression.ts

DEFAULT_OPTIONS
Type : Required<CompressionOptions>
Default value : { maxSizeMB: 10, maxWidthPx: 3000, maxHeightPx: 3000, quality: 75, keepExif: true, }

Default compression options
needsCompression
Default value : ( file: RNFile, options: Required<CompressionOptions> ): boolean => { // Check file size (2MB threshold) const sizeMB = file.size / (1024 * 1024); if (sizeMB > 2) { return true; } // For images, assume compression needed if > 1MB if (file.type.startsWith('image/') && sizeMB > 1) { return true; } return false; }

Check if file needs compression based on size and dimensions
performCompression
Default value : async ( file: RNFile, options: Required<CompressionOptions>, attempt: number = 1 ): Promise<RNFile> => { try { // Calculate quality based on attempt (more aggressive on retry) const quality = attempt === 1 ? options.quality : Math.max(options.quality - 20, 50); console.log( `[ImageCompression] Attempt ${attempt}: Compressing ${file.name} at ${quality}% quality` ); const response = await ImageResizer.createResizedImage( file.uri, options.maxWidthPx, options.maxHeightPx, file.type === 'image/png' ? 'PNG' : 'JPEG', quality, 0, // rotation undefined, // output path (auto-generated) options.keepExif, { mode: 'contain', onlyScaleDown: true, } ); // Create compressed file object const compressedFile: RNFile = { uri: response.uri, name: file.name, type: file.type, size: response.size || file.size, // Use original size if not available }; console.log( `[ImageCompression] Compressed from ${file.size} to ${compressedFile.size} bytes` ); return compressedFile; } catch (error) { throw new CompressionError( `Image compression failed on attempt ${attempt}: ${ error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error' }`, 'COMPRESSION_FAILED' ); } }

Compress image with specified options

src/screens/main/LeadDetail/InfoTab.tsx

DetailRow
Type : React.FC<literal type>
Default value : ({label, value, icon}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); return ( <View style={styles.detailRow}> <View style={styles.detailLabel}> {icon && ( <MaterialIcons name={icon} size={16} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} style={styles.detailIcon} /> )} <Text style={[styles.labelText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > {label}: </Text> </View> <View style={styles.detailValue}> {typeof value === 'string' ? ( <Text style={[styles.valueText, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> {value} </Text> ) : ( value )} </View> </View> ); }

Detail Row Component Renders a single detail row with label and value
InfoTab
Type : React.FC<InfoTabProps>
Default value : ({leadId}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); // Fetch lead details const { data: lead, isLoading, isError, isFetching, } = useGetLeadByIdQuery(leadId, { selectFromResult: result => ({ ...result, // Extract the lead data from the success response format data: result.data?.success ? result.data.data : result.data, }), }); // Enhanced refresh control with 60s debounce for detail screen const {refreshSingleLead, canRefreshSingleLead} = useRefreshControl(); /** * Handle pull-to-refresh */ const handleRefresh = React.useCallback(async () => { console.log('[InfoTab] Refreshing lead data for:', leadId); try { // Use the new single lead refresh method await refreshSingleLead(leadId); } catch (error) { console.error('[InfoTab] Refresh error:', error); } }, [refreshSingleLead, leadId]); // Loading state if (isLoading && !lead) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.loadingText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Loading Lead Info... </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } // Error state if (isError || !lead) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={[styles.errorTitle, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> Failed to Load Service Request </Text> <Text style={[ styles.errorDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Please pull down to refresh and try again. </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <ScrollView style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} contentContainerStyle={styles.contentContainer} refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isFetching && canRefreshSingleLead()} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} /> } showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} > {/* Details Section */} <View style={[styles.detailsCard, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]} > <DetailRow label="Requested Services" value={<ServicesList serviceIds={lead.services} />} icon="build" /> <DetailRow label="Requested On" value={formatDisplayDate(lead.createdAt)} icon="schedule" /> <DetailRow label="Last Updated" value={formatDisplayDate(lead.updatedAt)} icon="update" /> {lead.followUpDate && ( <DetailRow label="Next Follow-up" value={formatDisplayDate(lead.followUpDate)} icon="event" /> )} <DetailRow label="Installation Address" value={lead.address} icon="location-on" /> {lead.assignedTo && ( <DetailRow label="Assigned Partner" value={lead.assignedTo} icon="person" /> )} </View> </ScrollView> </SafeAreaContainer> ); }

InfoTab Component Shows essential lead information in a clean, organized layout
ServiceName
Type : React.FC<literal type>
Default value : ({serviceId}) => { const {data: service, isLoading} = useGetServiceByIdQuery(serviceId); if (isLoading) { return <Text>Loading...</Text>; } return <Text>{service?.name || serviceId}</Text>; }

Service Name Component Fetches and displays individual service name
ServicesList
Type : React.FC<literal type>
Default value : ({serviceIds}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); return ( <View style={styles.servicesContainer}> {serviceIds.map((serviceId, index) => ( <View key={serviceId} style={styles.serviceItem}> <ServiceName serviceId={serviceId} /> {index < serviceIds.length - 1 && ( <Text style={[styles.serviceSeparator, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} > ,{' '} </Text> )} </View> ))} </View> ); }

Services List Component Renders comma-separated list of service names

src/screens/main/LeadDetail/DocsTab.tsx

DocsTab
Type : React.FC<DocsTabProps>
Default value : ({leadId}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); // Fetch lead-specific KYC documents const {docs, isLoading, refetch} = useKycDocuments(undefined, leadId); // Enhanced refresh control const {refreshKyc, canRefreshKyc} = useRefreshControl(); /** * Handle pull-to-refresh */ const handleRefresh = useCallback(async () => { console.log('[DocsTab] Refreshing KYC documents for lead:', leadId); try { await refreshKyc(); refetch(); // Also trigger local refetch } catch (error) { console.error('[DocsTab] Refresh error:', error); } }, [refreshKyc, refetch, leadId]); /** * Handle upload success - refresh data */ const handleUploadSuccess = useCallback(() => { console.log('[DocsTab] Upload successful, refreshing data...'); refetch(); // Refresh local data }, [refetch]); /** * Handle upload error - show global error */ const handleUploadError = useCallback( (error: Error) => { console.error('[DocsTab] Upload error:', error); dispatch(setUIError(error.message)); }, [dispatch] ); /** * Render individual document item */ const renderDocumentItem = useCallback( ({item}: {item: KycDocView}) => ( <DocumentListItem document={item} leadId={leadId} onUploadSuccess={handleUploadSuccess} onUploadError={handleUploadError} /> ), [leadId, handleUploadSuccess, handleUploadError] ); /** * Get key extractor for FlatList */ const keyExtractor = useCallback((item: KycDocView) => item.docType, []); // Loading state if (isLoading && !docs) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={[ styles.loadingContainer, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}, ]} > <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.loadingText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Loading documents... </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } // Content state return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} testID="docs-tab-container" > <FlatList data={docs} renderItem={renderDocumentItem} keyExtractor={keyExtractor} ListEmptyComponent={<EmptyDocsState />} contentContainerStyle={styles.listContent} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isLoading && canRefreshKyc()} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} /> } // Performance optimizations removeClippedSubviews={true} maxToRenderPerBatch={7} // We have 7 KYC document types windowSize={10} initialNumToRender={7} getItemLayout={(data, index) => ({ length: 120, // Approximate item height offset: 120 * index, index, })} testID="docs-list" /> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); }

DocsTab Component Shows KYC documents for a specific lead with upload functionality
DocumentListItem
Type : React.FC<literal type>
Default value : ({document, leadId, onUploadSuccess, onUploadError}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const [showPicker, setShowPicker] = useState(false); // Upload hook const { startUpload, progress, status: uploadStatus, error, cancel, } = useKycUpload(); const statusConfig = getStatusConfig(document.status); const documentIcon = getDocumentIcon(document.docType); /** * Handle file selection from picker */ const handleFilePicked = useCallback( (file: RNFile) => { console.log(`[DocsTab] File picked for ${document.docType}:`, file); // For lead-specific uploads, we need to pass both customerId and leadId // The useKycUpload hook handles customerId, but we need leadId context startUpload(document.docType, file, leadId); }, [document.docType, startUpload, leadId] ); /** * Handle upload button press */ const handleUploadPress = useCallback(() => { if (!document.canUpload) { console.warn(`[DocsTab] Upload not allowed for ${document.docType}`); return; } setShowPicker(true); }, [document.canUpload, document.docType]); /** * Handle upload success */ useEffect(() => { if (uploadStatus === 'success') { console.log(`[DocsTab] Upload successful for ${document.docType}`); onUploadSuccess(); } }, [uploadStatus, document.docType, onUploadSuccess]); /** * Handle upload error */ useEffect(() => { if (uploadStatus === 'error' && error) { console.error(`[DocsTab] Upload failed for ${document.docType}:`, error); onUploadError(error); } }, [uploadStatus, error, document.docType, onUploadError]); const isUploading = uploadStatus === 'running'; const showUploadButton = document.canUpload && !isUploading; return ( <Pressable style={[styles.documentItem, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]} testID={`doc-item-${document.docType}`} > {/* Document Header */} <View style={styles.documentHeader}> {/* Document Icon */} <MaterialIcons name={documentIcon} size={24} color={theme.colors.primary} style={styles.documentIcon} /> {/* Document Content */} <View style={styles.documentContent}> <Text style={[styles.documentName, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} testID={`doc-name-${document.docType}`} > {document.displayName} </Text> {/* Upload Date */} {document.latestDoc && ( <Text style={[ styles.uploadDate, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} testID={`doc-date-${document.docType}`} > Uploaded:{' '} {new Date(document.latestDoc.uploadedAt).toLocaleDateString()} </Text> )} </View> {/* Status Badge */} <Chip mode="flat" compact={true} style={[ styles.statusChip, {backgroundColor: statusConfig.backgroundColor}, ]} textStyle={[styles.statusText, {color: statusConfig.textColor}]} testID={`doc-status-${document.docType}`} > {document.status} </Chip> </View> {/* Action Section */} <View style={styles.actionSection}> {/* Progress Bar (during upload) */} {isUploading && progress !== null && ( <View style={styles.progressSection}> <ProgressBar progress={progress / 100} color={theme.colors.primary} style={styles.progressBar} testID={`doc-progress-${document.docType}`} /> <View style={styles.progressActions}> <Text style={[ styles.progressText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > {progress}% </Text> <Button mode="text" onPress={cancel} compact textColor={theme.colors.error} testID={`doc-cancel-${document.docType}`} > Cancel </Button> </View> </View> )} {/* Upload Button */} {showUploadButton && ( <Button mode="outlined" onPress={handleUploadPress} icon={({size, color}) => ( <MaterialIcons name="cloud-upload" size={size} color={color} /> )} style={styles.uploadButton} contentStyle={styles.uploadButtonContent} labelStyle={styles.uploadButtonLabel} testID={`doc-upload-${document.docType}`} > Upload </Button> )} {/* Status Message for Non-Uploadable Documents */} {!document.canUpload && !isUploading && ( <Text style={[ styles.statusMessage, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} testID={`doc-message-${document.docType}`} > {document.status === 'Approved' ? 'Document approved' : 'Upload not available'} </Text> )} </View> {/* Document Picker Modal */} <DocumentPickerModal visible={showPicker} onClose={() => setShowPicker(false)} onFilePicked={handleFilePicked} testID={`doc-picker-${document.docType}`} /> </Pressable> ); }

Document List Item Component
EmptyDocsState
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); return ( <View style={styles.emptyContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="folder-open" size={64} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} style={styles.emptyIcon} /> <Text style={[styles.emptyTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> No Documents Found </Text> <Text style={[styles.emptySubtitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > KYC documents for this lead will appear here once uploaded. </Text> </View> ); }

Empty State Component
getDocumentIcon
Default value : (docType: KycDocumentType): string => { const iconMap = { IncomeProof: 'account-balance-wallet', LightBill: 'electrical-services', CancelledCheque: 'account-balance', Aadhaar: 'badge', PAN: 'credit-card', PassportPhoto: 'person', Other: 'insert-drive-file', }; return iconMap[docType] || 'insert-drive-file'; }

Get document type icon
getStatusConfig
Default value : (status: KycDocumentStatus | 'Missing') => { const configs = { Approved: {backgroundColor: '#4CAF50', textColor: '#FFFFFF'}, Pending: {backgroundColor: '#FF9800', textColor: '#FFFFFF'}, Rejected: {backgroundColor: '#F44336', textColor: '#FFFFFF'}, Missing: {backgroundColor: '#9E9E9E', textColor: '#FFFFFF'}, }; return configs[status] || configs.Missing; }

Get status badge color configuration
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, listContent: { padding: spacing.md, paddingBottom: spacing.xl, }, documentItem: { padding: spacing.md, marginVertical: spacing.xs, borderRadius: 12, elevation: 2, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 1}, shadowOpacity: 0.22, shadowRadius: 2.22, }, documentHeader: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'flex-start', marginBottom: spacing.sm, }, documentIcon: { marginRight: spacing.sm, marginTop: 2, }, documentContent: { flex: 1, marginRight: spacing.sm, }, documentName: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', marginBottom: spacing.xs, }, uploadDate: { fontSize: 12, fontStyle: 'italic', marginTop: spacing.xs, }, statusChip: { alignSelf: 'flex-start', }, statusText: { fontSize: 11, fontWeight: '600', }, actionSection: { marginTop: spacing.sm, alignItems: 'flex-end', }, progressSection: { width: '100%', marginBottom: spacing.sm, }, progressBar: { height: 4, borderRadius: 2, marginBottom: spacing.xs, }, progressActions: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', }, progressText: { fontWeight: '500', }, uploadButton: { borderRadius: 6, }, uploadButtonContent: { paddingHorizontal: spacing.sm, }, uploadButtonLabel: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '500', }, statusMessage: { fontStyle: 'italic', textAlign: 'right', fontSize: 12, }, emptyContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, paddingVertical: 64, }, emptyIcon: { opacity: 0.5, }, emptyTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center', }, emptySubtitle: { fontSize: 14, marginTop: 8, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 20, }, loadingContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, loadingText: { fontSize: 16, marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center', }, errorContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, errorTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center', }, errorSubtitle: { fontSize: 16, marginTop: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, })

DocsTab Styles Stylesheet for DocsTab component with consistent theming

src/components/kyc/DocumentRow.tsx

DocumentRow
Type : React.FC<DocumentRowProps>
Default value : ({ document, onUploadSuccess, onUploadError, testID = 'document-row', }) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const [showPicker, setShowPicker] = useState(false); // Upload hook const { startUpload, progress, status: uploadStatus, error, cancel, } = useKycUpload(); /** * Handle file selection from picker */ const handleFilePicked = useCallback( (file: RNFile) => { console.log(`[DocumentRow] File picked for ${document.docType}:`, file); startUpload(document.docType, file); }, [document.docType, startUpload] ); /** * Handle upload button press */ const handleUploadPress = useCallback(() => { if (!document.canUpload) { console.warn(`[DocumentRow] Upload not allowed for ${document.docType}`); return; } setShowPicker(true); }, [document.canUpload, document.docType]); /** * Handle upload success */ React.useEffect(() => { if (uploadStatus === 'success') { console.log(`[DocumentRow] Upload successful for ${document.docType}`); onUploadSuccess?.(); } }, [uploadStatus, document.docType, onUploadSuccess]); /** * Handle upload error */ React.useEffect(() => { if (uploadStatus === 'error' && error) { console.error( `[DocumentRow] Upload failed for ${document.docType}:`, error ); onUploadError?.(error); } }, [uploadStatus, error, document.docType, onUploadError]); const isUploading = uploadStatus === 'running'; const showUploadButton = document.canUpload && !isUploading; const statusColor = getStatusColor(document.status); const statusTextColor = getStatusTextColor(document.status); const statusIcon = getStatusIcon(document.status); return ( <View style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]} testID={`${testID}-${document.docType}`} > {/* Document Info Section */} <View style={styles.infoSection}> <View style={styles.nameSection}> <Text variant="titleMedium" style={[styles.documentName, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} testID={`${testID}-name`} > {document.displayName} </Text> {/* Status Badge */} <Chip icon={({size, color}) => ( <MaterialIcons name={statusIcon} size={size} color={color} /> )} style={[styles.statusChip, {backgroundColor: statusColor}]} textStyle={[styles.statusText, {color: statusTextColor}]} compact testID={`${testID}-status`} accessibilityLabel={`Status: ${document.status}`} > {document.status} </Chip> </View> {/* Upload Date (if document exists) */} {document.latestDoc && ( <Text variant="bodySmall" style={[styles.uploadDate, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} testID={`${testID}-date`} > Uploaded:{' '} {new Date(document.latestDoc.uploadedAt).toLocaleDateString()} </Text> )} </View> {/* Action Section */} <View style={styles.actionSection}> {/* Progress Bar (during upload) */} {isUploading && progress !== null && ( <View style={styles.progressSection}> <ProgressBar progress={progress / 100} color={theme.colors.primary} style={styles.progressBar} accessibilityLabel={`Upload progress: ${progress}%`} testID={`${testID}-progress`} /> <View style={styles.progressActions}> <Text variant="bodySmall" style={[ styles.progressText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > {progress}% </Text> <Button mode="text" onPress={cancel} compact textColor={theme.colors.error} testID={`${testID}-cancel`} accessibilityLabel="Cancel upload" > Cancel </Button> </View> </View> )} {/* Upload Button */} {showUploadButton && ( <Button mode="outlined" onPress={handleUploadPress} icon={({size, color}) => ( <MaterialIcons name="cloud-upload" size={size} color={color} /> )} style={styles.uploadButton} contentStyle={styles.uploadButtonContent} labelStyle={styles.uploadButtonLabel} testID={`${testID}-upload`} accessibilityRole="button" accessibilityLabel={`Upload ${document.displayName}`} accessibilityHint={`Opens file picker to upload ${document.displayName} document`} > Upload </Button> )} {/* Status Message for Non-Uploadable Documents */} {!document.canUpload && !isUploading && ( <Text variant="bodySmall" style={[ styles.statusMessage, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} testID={`${testID}-message`} > {document.status === 'Approved' ? 'Document approved' : 'Upload not available'} </Text> )} </View> {/* Document Picker Modal */} <DocumentPickerModal visible={showPicker} onClose={() => setShowPicker(false)} onFilePicked={handleFilePicked} testID={`${testID}-picker`} /> </View> ); }

Document Row Component Displays individual KYC document with status and upload functionality
getStatusColor
Default value : (status: KycDocumentStatus | 'Missing') => { switch (status) { case 'Approved': return colors.success; // Green case 'Pending': return colors.text.secondary; // Grey case 'Rejected': return colors.error; // Red case 'Missing': default: return colors.text.disabled; // Light grey } }

Get status badge color based on document status
getStatusIcon
Default value : (status: KycDocumentStatus | 'Missing') => { switch (status) { case 'Approved': return 'check-circle'; case 'Pending': return 'schedule'; case 'Rejected': return 'cancel'; case 'Missing': default: return 'radio-button-unchecked'; } }

Get status icon
getStatusTextColor
Default value : (status: KycDocumentStatus | 'Missing') => { switch (status) { case 'Approved': case 'Rejected': return '#FFFFFF'; // White text on colored background case 'Pending': return colors.text.primary; // Dark text case 'Missing': default: return colors.text.secondary; // Medium text } }

Get status text color for better contrast
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { padding: spacing.md, marginVertical: spacing.xs, borderRadius: 8, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: colors.border.light, }, infoSection: { flex: 1, marginBottom: spacing.sm, }, nameSection: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: spacing.xs, }, documentName: { flex: 1, fontWeight: '500', }, statusChip: { marginLeft: spacing.sm, }, statusText: { fontSize: 12, fontWeight: '500', }, uploadDate: { marginTop: spacing.xs, }, actionSection: { alignItems: 'flex-end', }, progressSection: { width: '100%', marginBottom: spacing.sm, }, progressBar: { height: 4, borderRadius: 2, marginBottom: spacing.xs, }, progressActions: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', }, progressText: { fontWeight: '500', }, uploadButton: { borderRadius: 6, }, uploadButtonContent: { paddingHorizontal: spacing.sm, }, uploadButtonLabel: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '500', }, statusMessage: { fontStyle: 'italic', textAlign: 'right', }, })

src/screens/main/DocumentsScreen.tsx

DocumentsScreen
Type : React.FC<Props>
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); const {user} = useNewAuth(); // KYC documents data const {docs, isLoading} = useKycDocuments(); // Enhanced refresh control const {refreshKyc, canRefreshKyc} = useRefreshControl(); /** * Handle pull-to-refresh */ const handleRefresh = useCallback(async () => { console.log('[DocumentsScreen] Refreshing KYC documents'); try { await refreshKyc(); } catch (error) { console.error('[DocumentsScreen] Refresh error:', error); } }, [refreshKyc]); /** * Handle upload success - refresh data */ const handleUploadSuccess = useCallback(() => { console.log('[DocumentsScreen] Upload successful, refreshing data...'); // The useKycUpload hook already invalidates cache, so data will refresh automatically }, []); /** * Handle upload error - show global error */ const handleUploadError = useCallback( (error: Error) => { console.error('[DocumentsScreen] Upload error:', error); dispatch(setUIError(error.message)); }, [dispatch] ); /** * Render individual document row */ const renderDocumentRow = useCallback( ({item}: {item: KycDocView}) => ( <DocumentRow document={item} onUploadSuccess={handleUploadSuccess} onUploadError={handleUploadError} /> ), [handleUploadSuccess, handleUploadError] ); /** * Render empty state (shouldn't happen with fixed checklist) */ const renderEmptyState = useCallback( () => ( <Card style={styles.emptyCard}> <Card.Content> <Text variant="bodyLarge" style={[styles.emptyText, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} > No KYC documents available </Text> </Card.Content> </Card> ), [theme.colors.onSurface] ); /** * Render list header with instructions */ const renderListHeader = useCallback( () => ( <View style={styles.headerSection}> <Text variant="headlineMedium" style={[styles.title, {color: theme.colors.primary}]} accessibilityRole="header" accessibilityLabel="KYC Documents screen header" testID="kyc-documents-title" > KYC Documents </Text> {user && ( <Text variant="titleMedium" style={[styles.customerName, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} testID="customer-name" accessibilityLabel={`Customer name: ${user.name}`} > Customer: {user.name} </Text> )} <Text variant="bodyMedium" style={[styles.instructions, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} testID="kyc-instructions" > Upload the required documents for identity verification. All documents must be clear and readable. </Text> <Text variant="bodySmall" style={[styles.requirements, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} testID="kyc-requirements" > Supported formats: JPG, PNG, PDF • Maximum size: 10MB per file </Text> </View> ), [theme, user] ); /** * Get key extractor for FlatList */ const keyExtractor = useCallback((item: KycDocView) => item.docType, []); // Show loading if user data is not available if (!user) { return ( <SafeAreaLayout> <View style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} > <LoadingSpinner size="large" text="Loading user information..." testID="documents-loading" accessibilityLabel="Loading user information" /> </View> </SafeAreaLayout> ); } return ( <SafeAreaLayout> <View style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} testID="kyc-documents-screen" > <FlatList data={docs} renderItem={renderDocumentRow} keyExtractor={keyExtractor} ListHeaderComponent={renderListHeader} ListEmptyComponent={renderEmptyState} contentContainerStyle={styles.listContent} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isLoading && canRefreshKyc()} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} /> } // Performance optimizations removeClippedSubviews={true} maxToRenderPerBatch={7} // We only have 7 items windowSize={10} initialNumToRender={7} getItemLayout={(data, index) => ({ length: 120, // Approximate row height offset: 120 * index, index, })} /> </View> </SafeAreaLayout> ); }

KYC Documents Screen Component Displays complete KYC document checklist with upload functionality
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, listContent: { padding: spacing.md, paddingBottom: spacing.xl, }, headerSection: { alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: spacing.lg, paddingBottom: spacing.lg, borderBottomWidth: 1, borderBottomColor: '#E0E0E0', }, title: { textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: spacing.sm, fontWeight: 'bold', }, customerName: { textAlign: 'center', fontWeight: '500', marginBottom: spacing.md, }, instructions: { textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 22, marginBottom: spacing.sm, paddingHorizontal: spacing.md, }, requirements: { textAlign: 'center', fontStyle: 'italic', }, emptyCard: { padding: spacing.md, alignItems: 'center', }, emptyText: { textAlign: 'center', }, })

src/navigation/MainTabNavigator.tsx

DocumentsTabIcon
Default value : ({color, size}: {color: string; size: number}) => ( <MaterialIcons name="description" size={size} color={color} /> )
HelpTabIcon
Default value : ({color, size}: {color: string; size: number}) => ( <MaterialIcons name="help" size={size} color={color} /> )
HomeTabIcon
Default value : ({color, size}: {color: string; size: number}) => ( <MaterialIcons name="home" size={size} color={color} /> )
MainTabNavigator
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const navigation = useNavigation<RootStackScreenProps<'Main'>['navigation']>(); const handleNotificationPress = () => { navigation.navigate('Notifications'); }; const handleProfilePress = () => { navigation.navigate('Profile'); }; const HeaderRight = () => ( <View style={{flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center'}}> <NotificationBellIcon onPress={handleNotificationPress} /> <ProfileIcon onPress={handleProfilePress} /> </View> ); return ( <Tab.Navigator screenOptions={{ tabBarActiveTintColor: theme.colors.primary, tabBarInactiveTintColor: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant, tabBarStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface, borderTopColor: theme.colors.outline, }, headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerTitleStyle: { fontWeight: 'bold', }, // headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, // HeaderRight will be handled per-screen for Services (cart + bell) and others (bell only) }} > <Tab.Screen name="Home" component={HomeScreen} options={{ title: 'Home', tabBarIcon: HomeTabIcon, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> <Tab.Screen name="Services" component={ServicesScreen} options={{ title: 'Services', tabBarIcon: ServicesTabIcon, // Header configured dynamically in ServicesScreen component }} /> <Tab.Screen name="MyRecords" component={MyRecordsScreen} options={{ title: 'My Records', tabBarIcon: MyRecordsTabIcon, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> <Tab.Screen name="Documents" component={DocumentsScreen} options={{ title: 'KYC Documents', tabBarIcon: DocumentsTabIcon, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> <Tab.Screen name="Help" component={HelpScreen} options={{ title: 'Help', tabBarIcon: HelpTabIcon, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> </Tab.Navigator> ); }

Main Tab Navigator
MyRecordsTabIcon
Default value : ({color, size}: {color: string; size: number}) => ( <MaterialIcons name="folder" size={size} color={color} /> )
ServicesTabIcon
Default value : ({color, size}: {color: string; size: number}) => ( <View style={styles.tabIconContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="solar-power" size={size} color={color} /> <CartBadge size={16} /> </View> )
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ tabIconContainer: { position: 'relative', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', }, headerRightContainer: { paddingRight: 16, }, cartIconContainer: { position: 'relative', padding: 8, }, })
Tab
Default value : createBottomTabNavigator<MainTabParamList>()

src/components/common/Dropdown/Dropdown.tsx

Dropdown
Type : React.FC<DropdownProps>
Default value : ({ label, placeholder = 'Select an option...', value, options, onSelect, error, disabled = false, loading = false, testID, }) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false); const selectedOption = options.find(option => option.value === value); const openMenu = useCallback(() => { if (!disabled && !loading) { setVisible(true); } }, [disabled, loading]); const closeMenu = useCallback(() => { setVisible(false); }, []); const handleSelect = useCallback( (selectedValue: string) => { onSelect(selectedValue); closeMenu(); }, [onSelect, closeMenu] ); const renderOption = useCallback( ({item}: {item: DropdownOption}) => ( <TouchableRipple onPress={() => handleSelect(item.value)} style={styles.menuItem} testID={`${testID}-option-${item.value}`} > <View> <Text variant="bodyMedium" style={{color: theme.colors.onSurface}}> {item.label} </Text> {item.sublabel && ( <Text variant="bodySmall" style={{color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}} > {item.sublabel} </Text> )} </View> </TouchableRipple> ), [handleSelect, theme, testID] ); const keyExtractor = useCallback((item: DropdownOption) => item.value, []); return ( <View style={styles.container}> <Menu visible={visible} onDismiss={closeMenu} contentStyle={[ styles.menuContent, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}, ]} anchor={ <TextInput label={label} value={selectedOption?.label || ''} placeholder={placeholder} onChangeText={() => {}} // Controlled by dropdown onTouchStart={openMenu} editable={false} error={!!error} disabled={disabled} right={ <TextInput.Icon icon={({color, size}) => ( <MaterialIcons name={visible ? 'keyboard-arrow-up' : 'keyboard-arrow-down'} size={size} color={color} /> )} onPress={openMenu} disabled={disabled || loading} /> } style={[ styles.textInput, disabled && {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surfaceDisabled}, ]} testID={testID} accessibilityLabel={label} accessibilityHint="Tap to open dropdown menu" /> } anchorPosition="bottom" > {loading ? ( <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> <Text style={{color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}}> Loading options... </Text> </View> ) : options.length === 0 ? ( <View style={styles.emptyContainer}> <Text style={{color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}}> No options available </Text> </View> ) : ( <FlatList data={options} renderItem={renderOption} keyExtractor={keyExtractor} ItemSeparatorComponent={() => <Divider />} style={styles.optionsList} nestedScrollEnabled={true} /> )} </Menu> {error && ( <Text variant="bodySmall" style={[styles.errorText, {color: theme.colors.error}]} > {error} </Text> )} </View> ); }

Dropdown Component
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { marginBottom: 16, }, textInput: { backgroundColor: 'transparent', }, menuContent: { borderRadius: 8, elevation: 8, maxHeight: 200, }, optionsList: { maxHeight: 180, }, menuItem: { padding: 12, minHeight: 48, justifyContent: 'center', }, loadingContainer: { padding: 16, alignItems: 'center', }, emptyContainer: { padding: 16, alignItems: 'center', }, errorText: { marginTop: 4, marginLeft: 16, }, })

src/utils/profileValidation.ts

EMAIL_REGEX
Default value : /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/

Profile Form Validation Validation rules for profile form fields based on API constraints
profileValidationRules
Default value : { name: { maxLength: { value: 100, message: 'Name cannot exceed 100 characters', }, validate: (value?: string) => { const trimmed = value?.trim(); if (trimmed && trimmed.length < 2) { return 'Name must be at least 2 characters long'; } return true; }, }, email: { validate: (value?: string) => { const trimmed = value?.trim(); if (trimmed && !EMAIL_REGEX.test(trimmed)) { return 'Please enter a valid email address'; } return true; }, }, } as const

Profile form validation rules for react-hook-form
sanitizeProfileData
Default value : (data: { name?: string; email?: string; }): {name?: string; email?: string} => { const sanitized: {name?: string; email?: string} = {}; // Only include fields that have non-empty values if (data.name?.trim()) { sanitized.name = data.name.trim(); } if (data.email?.trim()) { sanitized.email = data.email.trim().toLowerCase(); } return sanitized; }

Sanitize form data for API submission
validateProfileData
Default value : (data: { name?: string; email?: string; }): {isValid: boolean; errors: string[]} => { const errors: string[] = []; // Name validation if (data.name) { const trimmedName = data.name.trim(); if (trimmedName.length > 100) { errors.push('Name cannot exceed 100 characters'); } else if (trimmedName.length < 2) { errors.push('Name must be at least 2 characters long'); } } // Email validation if (data.email) { const trimmedEmail = data.email.trim(); if (!EMAIL_REGEX.test(trimmedEmail)) { errors.push('Please enter a valid email address'); } } return { isValid: errors.length === 0, errors, }; }

Check if form data is valid for submission

src/store/ticketsSlice.ts

EMPTY_THREADS
Type : object
Default value : {}
FALLBACK_TICKETS_STATE
Type : TicketsState
Default value : { list: {items: [], total: 0, lastFetched: null, error: null}, threads: EMPTY_THREADS, }
initialState
Type : TicketsState
Default value : { list: { items: [], total: 0, lastFetched: null, error: null, }, threads: {}, }

Initial state for tickets slice
selectHasTickets
Default value : createSelector( [selectTickets], tickets => tickets.length > 0 )

Select if tickets have been fetched at least once
selectIsThreadCacheValid
Default value : (ticketId: string) => createSelector( [selectThreadCacheTimestamp(ticketId)], timestamp => timestamp !== null )

Select if thread cache exists for specific ticket
selectIsTicketsCacheValid
Default value : createSelector( [selectTicketsCacheTimestamp], timestamp => timestamp !== null )

Select if tickets list cache exists (simplified)
selectOpenTicketsCount
Default value : createSelector( [selectTickets], tickets => tickets.filter(ticket => ticket.status === 'Open').length )

Select open tickets count
selectThreadCacheTimestamp
Default value : (ticketId: string) => createSelector( [selectTicketsState], ticketsState => ticketsState.threads[ticketId]?.lastFetched || null )

Select thread cache timestamp for specific ticket
selectThreadError
Default value : (ticketId: string) => createSelector( [selectTicketsState], ticketsState => ticketsState.threads[ticketId]?.error || null )

Select thread error for specific ticket
selectTicketById
Default value : (ticketId: string) => createSelector( [selectTicketsState], (ticketsState): GetTicketByIdResponse | null => { // Defensive access with null checking if (!ticketsState || !ticketsState.threads) { if (__DEV__) { console.warn( '[TicketsSlice] Invalid ticketsState or threads for ticketId:', ticketId ); } return null; } const thread = ticketsState.threads[ticketId]; return thread?.data || null; } )

Select ticket thread by ID (simplified - no TTL check: RTK Query handles freshness)
selectTicketFromList
Default value : (ticketId: string) => createSelector( [selectTickets], tickets => tickets.find(ticket => ticket.ticketId === ticketId) || null )

Select ticket by ID from list
selectTickets
Default value : createSelector( [selectTicketsState], (ticketsState): TicketListItem[] => { return ticketsState.list?.items || []; } )

Select tickets list (simplified - no TTL check: RTK Query handles freshness)
selectTicketsByLeadId
Default value : (leadId: string) => createSelector([selectTickets], tickets => tickets.filter(ticket => ticket.leadId === leadId) )

Select tickets by lead ID Useful for showing tickets in LeadDetailScreen
selectTicketsCacheTimestamp
Default value : createSelector( [selectTicketsState], ticketsState => ticketsState.list.lastFetched )

Select tickets list cache timestamp
selectTicketsListError
Default value : createSelector( [selectTicketsState], ticketsState => ticketsState.list?.error || null )

Select tickets list error
selectTicketsState
Default value : (state: any): TicketsState => { // Defensive state access with memoized fallback if (!state || typeof state !== 'object') { if (__DEV__) { console.warn( '[TicketsSlice] State is invalid, using fallback:', typeof state ); } return FALLBACK_TICKETS_STATE; } if (!state.tickets) { if (__DEV__) { console.warn( '[TicketsSlice] tickets slice not found in state, using fallback' ); } return FALLBACK_TICKETS_STATE; } // ✅ CRITICAL FIX: Ensure threads property always exists with memoization const ticketsState = state.tickets; if (!ticketsState.threads) { if (__DEV__) { console.warn('[TicketsSlice] threads property missing, initializing...'); } // Check cache first to avoid creating new objects if (statesWithThreadsCache.has(ticketsState)) { return statesWithThreadsCache.get(ticketsState)!; } // Create new state with threads and cache it const stateWithThreads = { ...ticketsState, threads: EMPTY_THREADS, }; statesWithThreadsCache.set(ticketsState, stateWithThreads); return stateWithThreads; } return ticketsState; }
selectTicketsTotal
Default value : createSelector( [selectTicketsState], ticketsState => ticketsState.list?.total || 0 )

Select tickets list total count
statesWithThreadsCache
Default value : new WeakMap<any, TicketsState>()
ticketsSlice
Default value : createSlice({ name: 'tickets', initialState, reducers: { /** * Set tickets list from API response * Replaces existing list and updates cache timestamp */ setTickets: ( state, action: PayloadAction<{items: TicketListItem[]; total: number}> ) => { state.list.items = action.payload.items.sort( (a, b) => new Date(b.createdAt).getTime() - new Date(a.createdAt).getTime() ); state.list.total = action.payload.total; state.list.lastFetched = Date.now(); state.list.error = null; }, /** * Set individual ticket thread data * Caches thread with timestamp for TTL management */ setTicketThread: ( state, action: PayloadAction<{ticketId: string; thread: GetTicketByIdResponse}> ) => { const {ticketId, thread} = action.payload; if (!state.threads[ticketId]) { state.threads[ticketId] = { data: null, lastFetched: null, error: null, }; } state.threads[ticketId].data = thread; state.threads[ticketId].lastFetched = Date.now(); state.threads[ticketId].error = null; }, /** * Set error for tickets list */ setListError: (state, action: PayloadAction<string | null>) => { state.list.error = action.payload; }, /** * Set error for specific ticket thread */ setThreadError: ( state, action: PayloadAction<{ticketId: string; error: string | null}> ) => { const {ticketId, error} = action.payload; if (!state.threads[ticketId]) { state.threads[ticketId] = { data: null, lastFetched: null, error: null, }; } state.threads[ticketId].error = error; }, /** * Clear all tickets data * Used for logout or data reset scenarios */ clearTickets: state => { state.list = { items: [], total: 0, lastFetched: null, error: null, }; state.threads = {}; }, /** * Update ticket in list after mutation * Used when ticket status changes or new messages added */ updateTicketInList: ( state, action: PayloadAction<{ ticketId: string; updates: Partial<TicketListItem>; }> ) => { const {ticketId, updates} = action.payload; const ticketIndex = state.list.items.findIndex( ticket => ticket.ticketId === ticketId ); if (ticketIndex !== -1) { state.list.items[ticketIndex] = { ...state.list.items[ticketIndex], ...updates, }; } }, /** * Add new ticket to list * Used after successful ticket creation */ addTicketToList: (state, action: PayloadAction<TicketListItem>) => { // Add to beginning of list (newest first) state.list.items.unshift(action.payload); state.list.total += 1; }, }, extraReducers: builder => { builder // ✅ Auto-sync successful getTickets to Redux state .addMatcher( ticketsApi.endpoints.getTickets.matchFulfilled, (state, action) => { console.log( '[TicketsSlice] Auto-syncing getTickets response to Redux' ); // ✅ DEFENSIVE CHECK: Ensure state.list exists if (!state.list) { console.log( '[TicketsSlice] WARNING: state.list is undefined, initializing...' ); state.list = { items: [], total: 0, lastFetched: null, error: null, }; } const {items, total} = action.payload; if (items && Array.isArray(items)) { state.list.items = items.sort( (a, b) => new Date(b.createdAt).getTime() - new Date(a.createdAt).getTime() ); state.list.total = total || 0; state.list.lastFetched = Date.now(); state.list.error = null; } else { console.log('[TicketsSlice] ERROR: Items is not an array:', items); } } ) // ✅ Auto-sync successful getTicketById to Redux state .addMatcher( ticketsApi.endpoints.getTicketById.matchFulfilled, (state, action) => { const ticketData = action.payload; const ticketId = action.meta.arg.originalArgs as string; console.log( `[TicketsSlice] Auto-syncing getTicketById ${ticketId} to Redux` ); // ✅ DEFENSIVE FIX: Ensure threads exists before access if (!state.threads) { if (__DEV__) { console.warn( '[TicketsSlice] threads missing in auto-sync, initializing...' ); } state.threads = {}; } if (!state.threads[ticketId]) { state.threads[ticketId] = { data: null, lastFetched: null, error: null, }; } state.threads[ticketId].data = ticketData; state.threads[ticketId].lastFetched = Date.now(); state.threads[ticketId].error = null; } ) // ✅ Handle getTickets errors .addMatcher( ticketsApi.endpoints.getTickets.matchRejected, (state, action) => { console.log( '[TicketsSlice] getTickets failed:', action.error.message ); state.list.error = action.error.message || 'Failed to fetch tickets'; } ) // ✅ Handle getTicketById errors .addMatcher( ticketsApi.endpoints.getTicketById.matchRejected, (state, action) => { const ticketId = action.meta.arg.originalArgs as string; console.log( `[TicketsSlice] getTicketById ${ticketId} failed:`, action.error.message ); if (!state.threads[ticketId]) { state.threads[ticketId] = { data: null, lastFetched: null, error: null, }; } state.threads[ticketId].error = action.error.message || 'Failed to fetch ticket details'; } ) // ✅ Handle createTicket success (invalidates list, which triggers refetch) .addMatcher( ticketsApi.endpoints.createTicket.matchFulfilled, (state, action) => { console.log( '[TicketsSlice] New ticket created:', action.payload.ticketId ); // Don't need to add to list manually - cache invalidation will trigger refetch } ) // ✅ Handle addMessage success (invalidates ticket detail) .addMatcher( ticketsApi.endpoints.addMessage.matchFulfilled, (state, action) => { const ticketId = action.meta.arg.originalArgs.ticketId; console.log(`[TicketsSlice] Message added to ticket ${ticketId}`); // Don't need manual update - cache invalidation will trigger refetch } ); }, })

Tickets slice for managing support ticket state Handles ticket list, individual threads, and cache management Auto-syncs with RTK Query via extraReducers
Default value : ticketsSlice.actions

src/screens/main/LeadDetail/QuotesTab.tsx

EmptyState
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); return ( <View style={{ flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, paddingVertical: 64, }} > <MaterialIcons name="description" size={64} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} style={{opacity: 0.5}} /> <Text style={{ fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', color: theme.colors.onSurface, marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center', }} > Quotations coming soon... </Text> <Text style={{ fontSize: 14, color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant, marginTop: 8, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 20, }} > Your quotations will appear here once they are prepared by our team. </Text> </View> ); }

Empty State Component
getStatusConfig
Default value : (status: QuotationStatus) => { const configs = { Draft: {backgroundColor: '#9E9E9E', textColor: '#FFFFFF'}, Created: {backgroundColor: '#2196F3', textColor: '#FFFFFF'}, Shared: {backgroundColor: '#03A9F4', textColor: '#FFFFFF'}, Accepted: {backgroundColor: '#4CAF50', textColor: '#FFFFFF'}, Rejected: {backgroundColor: '#F44336', textColor: '#FFFFFF'}, }; return configs[status] || configs.Draft; }

Status color configuration
QuoteItem
Type : React.FC<literal type>
Default value : ({quotation, onViewDetails, onDownloadPdf}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); const {user} = useNewAuth(); const statusConfig = getStatusConfig(quotation.status); // Role-based access control const isCustomer = user?.role === 'Customer'; const shouldShowAcceptReject = quotation.status === 'Shared' && isCustomer; // API mutations const [acceptQuotation, {isLoading: isAccepting}] = useAcceptQuotationMutation(); const [rejectQuotation, {isLoading: isRejecting}] = useRejectQuotationMutation(); // Debounce hook for this specific quotation const {isBlocked: isDebounceBlocked, triggerAction} = useActionDebounce( quotation.quotationId ); // Enhanced refresh control const {refreshQuotations} = useRefreshControl(); const formattedDate = React.useMemo(() => { try { return formatDisplayDate(quotation.createdAt); } catch (error) { console.warn('[QuotesTab] Date formatting error:', error); return 'Invalid date'; } }, [quotation.createdAt]); const quotationTitle = `Quote #${ quotation.quotationId.split('-')[1] || quotation.quotationId }`; /** * Explicit lead refresh helper * Forces refresh of lead data after quotation actions to ensure lead status updates are visible * * @remarks * This function is called after successful accept/reject operations to ensure that * backend changes to lead status (e.g., "Customer Accepted") are reflected in the UI. * The function uses RTK Query's invalidateTags to force cache invalidation. * * @returns Promise that resolves when refresh is complete */ const refreshLeadData = useCallback(async () => { try { console.log( '[QuotesTab] Explicitly refreshing lead data after quotation action' ); // Force invalidation of lead cache to ensure fresh data dispatch(leadsApi.util.invalidateTags(['Lead', 'LeadsList'])); // Allow small delay to ensure cache invalidation takes effect await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 100)); console.log('[QuotesTab] Lead data refresh triggered successfully'); } catch (error) { console.error('[QuotesTab] Error refreshing lead data:', error); // Don't throw - this is supplementary refresh } }, [dispatch]); /** * Handle quotation acceptance with comprehensive error handling * * @remarks * This function implements the complete accept workflow: * 1. Debounce check to prevent rapid actions * 2. User confirmation dialog * 3. API call to accept quotation * 4. Success feedback and data refresh * 5. Comprehensive error handling for various scenarios * * The function handles role-based access, conflict errors, and network failures * with appropriate user feedback for each scenario. * * @returns Promise that resolves when operation is complete */ const handleAccept = useCallback(async () => { try { // Check if action is blocked by debounce if (isDebounceBlocked) { Alert.alert( 'Please Wait', 'Please wait before performing another action.' ); return; } // Show confirmation dialog const confirmed = await openConfirmDialog({ title: 'Accept Quotation', message: `Are you sure you want to accept ${quotationTitle}? This action cannot be undone.`, confirmText: 'Accept', cancelText: 'Cancel', }); if (!confirmed) { return; } // Trigger debounce triggerAction(); console.log('[QuotesTab] Accepting quotation:', quotation.quotationId); // Call accept API const result = await acceptQuotation(quotation.quotationId).unwrap(); if (result.success) { console.log( '[QuotesTab] Quotation accepted successfully, refreshing data...' ); // Success feedback Alert.alert('Success', 'Quotation accepted successfully!', [ {text: 'OK'}, ]); // Refresh quotations data first await refreshQuotations(); // Then explicitly refresh lead data to show updated lead status // This ensures lead status change (to "Customer Accepted") is visible await refreshLeadData(); console.log('[QuotesTab] All data refreshed after accept operation'); } else { throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to accept quotation'); } } catch (error: any) { console.error('[QuotesTab] Accept quotation error:', error); // Handle specific error cases if (error.data?.error?.includes('Only customers can accept')) { // Role-based logout Alert.alert( 'Access Denied', 'You do not have permission to perform this action. You will be logged out.', [ { text: 'OK', onPress: () => { // TODO: Implement proper logout function console.log('User role access denied - logout required'); }, }, ] ); return; } if (error.code === 409 || error.status === 409) { Alert.alert('Action Not Allowed', 'Quotation already processed', [ {text: 'OK'}, ]); return; } if (error.data?.error?.includes('Access denied')) { Alert.alert( 'Access Denied', 'You do not have access to this quotation.', [{text: 'OK'}] ); return; } // Generic error const errorMessage = error.data?.error || error.message || 'Failed to accept quotation. Please try again.'; Alert.alert('Error', errorMessage, [{text: 'OK'}]); } }, [ quotation.quotationId, quotationTitle, isDebounceBlocked, triggerAction, acceptQuotation, refreshQuotations, refreshLeadData, dispatch, ]); /** * Handle quotation rejection with comprehensive error handling * * @remarks * Similar to handleAccept but for rejection operations. * Uses destructive confirmation dialog styling to emphasize the permanent nature * of the action. * * @returns Promise that resolves when operation is complete */ const handleReject = useCallback(async () => { try { // Check if action is blocked by debounce if (isDebounceBlocked) { Alert.alert( 'Please Wait', 'Please wait before performing another action.' ); return; } // Show confirmation dialog const confirmed = await openConfirmDialog({ title: 'Reject Quotation', message: `Are you sure you want to reject ${quotationTitle}? This action cannot be undone.`, confirmText: 'Reject', cancelText: 'Cancel', destructive: true, }); if (!confirmed) { return; } // Trigger debounce triggerAction(); console.log('[QuotesTab] Rejecting quotation:', quotation.quotationId); // Call reject API const result = await rejectQuotation(quotation.quotationId).unwrap(); if (result.success) { console.log( '[QuotesTab] Quotation rejected successfully, refreshing data...' ); // Success feedback Alert.alert('Success', 'Quotation rejected successfully!', [ {text: 'OK'}, ]); // Refresh quotations data first await refreshQuotations(); // Then explicitly refresh lead data to show any backend-updated lead status await refreshLeadData(); console.log('[QuotesTab] All data refreshed after reject operation'); } else { throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to reject quotation'); } } catch (error: any) { console.error('[QuotesTab] Reject quotation error:', error); // Handle specific error cases if (error.data?.error?.includes('Only customers can accept')) { // Role-based logout Alert.alert( 'Access Denied', 'You do not have permission to perform this action. You will be logged out.', [ { text: 'OK', onPress: () => { // TODO: Implement proper logout function console.log('User role access denied - logout required'); }, }, ] ); return; } if (error.code === 409 || error.status === 409) { Alert.alert('Action Not Allowed', 'Quotation already processed', [ {text: 'OK'}, ]); return; } if (error.data?.error?.includes('Access denied')) { Alert.alert( 'Access Denied', 'You do not have access to this quotation.', [{text: 'OK'}] ); return; } // Generic error const errorMessage = error.data?.error || error.message || 'Failed to reject quotation. Please try again.'; Alert.alert('Error', errorMessage, [{text: 'OK'}]); } }, [ quotation.quotationId, quotationTitle, isDebounceBlocked, triggerAction, rejectQuotation, refreshQuotations, refreshLeadData, dispatch, ]); // Calculate if buttons should be disabled const isActionDisabled = isAccepting || isRejecting || isDebounceBlocked; return ( <Pressable onPress={() => onViewDetails(quotation.quotationId)} style={({pressed}) => [ { backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface, borderRadius: 12, padding: 16, paddingBottom: shouldShowAcceptReject ? 24 : 20, // Extra padding for accept/reject buttons marginVertical: 6, elevation: 2, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 1}, shadowOpacity: 0.22, shadowRadius: 2.22, opacity: pressed ? 0.7 : 1, minHeight: shouldShowAcceptReject ? 140 : 100, // Increased height for buttons position: 'relative', }, ]} testID={`quote-item-${quotation.quotationId}`} > <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'flex-start', }} > {/* Left side: Icon + Content */} <View style={{flexDirection: 'row', flex: 1}}> {/* Quote Icon */} <MaterialIcons name="description" size={24} color={theme.colors.primary} style={{marginRight: 12, marginTop: 2}} /> {/* Content */} <View style={{flex: 1, marginRight: 12}}> {/* Title */} <Text style={{ fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', color: theme.colors.onSurface, marginBottom: 8, }} > {quotationTitle} </Text> {/* Date */} <Text style={{ fontSize: 12, fontStyle: 'italic', color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant, marginTop: 4, }} > Generated On: {formattedDate} </Text> </View> </View> {/* Right side: Status Badge */} <Chip mode="flat" compact={true} style={{ backgroundColor: statusConfig.backgroundColor, alignSelf: 'flex-start', }} textStyle={{ color: statusConfig.textColor, fontSize: 11, fontWeight: '600', }} > {quotation.status} </Chip> </View> {/* Accept/Reject Buttons - Show when status is 'Shared' and user is Customer */} {shouldShowAcceptReject && ( <View style={{ marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, }} > <AcceptRejectButtons onAccept={handleAccept} onReject={handleReject} disabled={isActionDisabled} loading={isAccepting || isRejecting} testID={`quote-actions-${quotation.quotationId}`} /> </View> )} {/* PDF Download Button - Positioned at bottom-right */} <TouchableOpacity onPress={e => { e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent triggering parent onPress onDownloadPdf(quotation.quotationId); }} style={{ position: 'absolute', bottom: 12, right: 12, flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', backgroundColor: theme.colors.primaryContainer, paddingHorizontal: 12, paddingVertical: 8, borderRadius: 8, elevation: 1, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 1}, shadowOpacity: 0.1, shadowRadius: 1, }} testID={`quote-pdf-${quotation.quotationId}`} > <MaterialIcons name="file-download" size={16} color={theme.colors.onPrimaryContainer} /> <Text style={{ fontSize: 12, fontWeight: '500', color: theme.colors.onPrimaryContainer, marginLeft: 4, }} > Download </Text> </TouchableOpacity> </Pressable> ); }

Quote Item Component with Clean Layout and Accept/Reject Actions
QuotesTab
Type : React.FC<QuotesTabProps>
Default value : ({leadId}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); // Fetch quotations for this lead const { data: quotations, isLoading, isError, isFetching, } = useGetQuotationsByLeadIdQuery(leadId); // Filter quotations to only show Shared, Accepted, or Rejected statuses const filteredQuotations = React.useMemo(() => { if (!quotations) { return []; } const allowedStatuses: QuotationStatus[] = [ 'Shared', 'Accepted', 'Rejected', ]; return quotations.filter(quotation => allowedStatuses.includes(quotation.status) ); }, [quotations]); // PDF download mutation const [getQuotationPdf, {isLoading: isPdfLoading}] = useGetQuotationPdfMutation(); // Enhanced refresh control with debounce for quotations const {refreshQuotations, canRefreshQuotations} = useRefreshControl(); /** * Handle pull-to-refresh */ const handleRefresh = useCallback(async () => { console.log('[QuotesTab] Refreshing quotations for lead:', leadId); try { await refreshQuotations(); } catch (error) { console.error('[QuotesTab] Refresh error:', error); } }, [refreshQuotations]); /** * Handle view quotation details (anywhere on container) */ const handleViewDetails = useCallback((quotationId: string) => { console.log('[QuotesTab] View details for quotation:', quotationId); Alert.alert( 'Coming Soon', `Quotation details for ${quotationId} will be available soon.`, [{text: 'OK'}] ); }, []); /** * Handle PDF download (bottom-right button) */ const handleDownloadPdf = useCallback( async (quotationId: string) => { console.log('[QuotesTab] Download PDF for quotation:', quotationId); try { const result = await getQuotationPdf(quotationId).unwrap(); if (result.pdfUrl) { // TEMPORARY: Use test PDF URL since mock server returns dummy URLs // TODO: Remove this line when connecting to real API const testPdfUrl = 'https://www.w3.org/WAI/ER/tests/xhtml/testfiles/resources/pdf/dummy.pdf'; console.log('[QuotesTab] Original API URL:', result.pdfUrl); console.log('[QuotesTab] Using test PDF URL:', testPdfUrl); // Open PDF in system's default viewer directly try { await Linking.openURL(testPdfUrl); } catch (error) { console.error('[QuotesTab] Linking.openURL error:', error); throw new Error('Cannot open PDF - no compatible app found'); } } else { throw new Error('PDF URL not received from server'); } } catch (error: any) { console.error('[QuotesTab] PDF download error:', error); // Handle different error types let errorMessage = 'Could not download the quotation PDF. Please try again.'; if (error.status === 401) { errorMessage = 'Session expired. Please log in again.'; } else if (error.status === 403) { errorMessage = 'You do not have permission to view this quotation.'; } else if (error.status === 404) { errorMessage = 'Quotation PDF not found.'; } else if (error.status === 409) { errorMessage = 'Quotation is not available for download at this time.'; } Alert.alert('Download Failed', errorMessage, [{text: 'OK'}]); } }, [getQuotationPdf] ); /** * Render quotation item */ const renderQuotationItem = useCallback( ({item}: {item: QuotationListItem}) => ( <QuoteItem quotation={item} onViewDetails={handleViewDetails} onDownloadPdf={handleDownloadPdf} /> ), [handleViewDetails, handleDownloadPdf] ); // Loading state if (isLoading && !filteredQuotations) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={{ flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }} > <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={{ fontSize: 16, marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center', color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant, }} > Loading quotations... </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } // Error state if (isError) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={{ flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }} > <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={{ fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', color: theme.colors.error, marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center', }} > Failed to Load Quotations </Text> <Text style={{ fontSize: 16, color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant, marginTop: 8, textAlign: 'center', }} > Please pull down to refresh and try again. </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } // Empty state if (!filteredQuotations || filteredQuotations.length === 0) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <FlatList data={[]} renderItem={() => null} ListEmptyComponent={<EmptyState />} refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isFetching && canRefreshQuotations()} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} /> } /> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } // Content state return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <FlatList data={filteredQuotations} renderItem={renderQuotationItem} keyExtractor={item => item.quotationId} contentContainerStyle={{ padding: 16, backgroundColor: theme.colors.background, }} refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isFetching && canRefreshQuotations()} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} /> } showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} // Performance optimizations for >30 items removeClippedSubviews={true} maxToRenderPerBatch={10} updateCellsBatchingPeriod={50} initialNumToRender={10} windowSize={10} /> {/* PDF Loading Overlay */} {isPdfLoading && ( <View style={{ position: 'absolute', top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0, backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', }} > <View style={{ backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface, padding: 24, borderRadius: 12, alignItems: 'center', elevation: 8, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 4}, shadowOpacity: 0.3, shadowRadius: 8, }} > <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={{ fontSize: 16, marginTop: 12, color: theme.colors.onSurface, }} > Preparing PDF... </Text> </View> </View> )} </SafeAreaContainer> ); }

QuotesTab Component Shows quotations for a lead with loading, error, and empty states

src/components/common/ErrorMessage/ErrorMessage.tsx

ErrorMessage
Type : React.FC<ErrorMessageProps>
Default value : ({ message, type = 'error', visible = true, dismissible = false, onDismiss, icon = true, style, testID, accessibilityLabel, }) => { // Container styles const containerStyles = useMemo( () => [styles.container, styles[type], style], [type, style] ); // Text styles const textStyles = useMemo( () => [styles.message, styles[`${type}Text`]], [type] ); // Dismiss text color const dismissTextColor = useMemo(() => { switch (type) { case 'error': return '#FF3B30'; case 'warning': return '#FF9500'; case 'info': return '#007AFF'; case 'success': return '#34C759'; default: return '#FF3B30'; } }, [type]); // Icon const getIcon = () => { if (!icon) { return null; } const iconText = { error: '⚠️', warning: '⚠️', info: 'ℹ️', success: '✅', }; return ( <View style={styles.iconContainer}> <Text style={{fontSize: 16}}>{iconText[type]}</Text> </View> ); }; if (!visible) { return null; } return ( <View style={containerStyles} testID={testID} accessibilityLabel={accessibilityLabel || `${type} message`} accessibilityRole="alert" > {getIcon()} <View style={styles.content}> <Text style={textStyles}>{message}</Text> </View> {dismissible && ( <TouchableOpacity style={styles.dismissButton} onPress={onDismiss} accessibilityLabel="Dismiss message" accessibilityRole="button" > <Text style={[styles.dismissText, {color: dismissTextColor}]}>×</Text> </TouchableOpacity> )} </View> ); }

src/config/links.ts

EXTERNAL_LINKS
Default value : { /** Privacy policy page URL */ PRIVACY_POLICY: 'https://solariumenergy.in/privacy-policy/', /** Terms of service URL (for future use) */ TERMS_OF_SERVICE: 'https://solariumenergy.in/terms/', /** Support/Help URL (for future use) */ SUPPORT: 'https://solariumenergy.in/support/', /** Company website */ COMPANY_WEBSITE: 'https://solariumenergy.in/', } as const

External Links Configuration Centralized configuration for all external links used in the app
getLinkDisplayName
Default value : (url: string): string => { switch (url) { case EXTERNAL_LINKS.PRIVACY_POLICY: return 'Privacy Policy'; case EXTERNAL_LINKS.TERMS_OF_SERVICE: return 'Terms of Service'; case EXTERNAL_LINKS.SUPPORT: return 'Support'; case EXTERNAL_LINKS.COMPANY_WEBSITE: return 'Company Website'; default: return 'External Link'; } }

Get user-friendly link names for accessibility
isValidUrl
Default value : (url: string): boolean => { try { new URL(url); return true; } catch { return false; } }

Validate if a URL is properly formatted
LINK_ERROR_MESSAGES
Default value : { UNSUPPORTED: 'This link cannot be opened on your device', NETWORK_ERROR: 'Unable to open link. Please check your internet connection', GENERAL_ERROR: 'Failed to open link. Please try again', } as const

Link opening error messages

src/utils/dateHelpers.ts

formatDisplayDate
Default value : (dateString: string): string => { try { const date = new Date(dateString); return date.toLocaleDateString('en-IN', { year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric', }); } catch (error) { console.warn('[DateHelpers] Invalid date for formatting:', dateString); return 'Invalid Date'; } }

Format date for display (fallback for relative time)
getRelativeTime
Default value : (dateString: string | Date): string => { try { const date = typeof dateString === 'string' ? new Date(dateString) : dateString; const now = new Date(); const diffInMs = now.getTime() - date.getTime(); const diffInMinutes = Math.floor(diffInMs / (1000 * 60)); const diffInHours = Math.floor(diffInMs / (1000 * 60 * 60)); const diffInDays = Math.floor(diffInMs / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)); const diffInWeeks = Math.floor(diffInDays / 7); const diffInMonths = Math.floor(diffInDays / 30); if (diffInMinutes < 1) { return 'Just now'; } else if (diffInMinutes < 60) { return `${diffInMinutes} min${diffInMinutes === 1 ? '' : 's'} ago`; } else if (diffInHours < 24) { return `${diffInHours} hour${diffInHours === 1 ? '' : 's'} ago`; } else if (diffInDays < 7) { return `${diffInDays} day${diffInDays === 1 ? '' : 's'} ago`; } else if (diffInWeeks < 4) { return `${diffInWeeks} week${diffInWeeks === 1 ? '' : 's'} ago`; } else if (diffInMonths < 12) { return `${diffInMonths} month${diffInMonths === 1 ? '' : 's'} ago`; } else { const years = Math.floor(diffInMonths / 12); return `${years} year${years === 1 ? '' : 's'} ago`; } } catch (error) { console.warn('[DateHelpers] Invalid date provided:', dateString); return 'Unknown'; } }

Date Helper Utilities Functions for formatting dates and relative time display

src/utils/statusHelpers.ts

formatStatusDisplay
Default value : (status: LeadStatus): string => { return status; // Currently no special formatting needed }

Format status for display (handles spacing, etc.)
getStatusColor
Default value : (status: LeadStatus): string => { switch (status) { case 'New Lead': return '#2196F3'; // Blue case 'In Discussion': return '#FF9800'; // Orange case 'Physical Meeting Assigned': return '#9C27B0'; // Purple case 'Customer Accepted': return '#4CAF50'; // Green case 'Won': return '#2E7D32'; // Dark Green case 'Pending at Solarium': return '#795548'; // Brown case 'Under Execution': return '#3F51B5'; // Indigo case 'Executed': return '#1B5E20'; // Very Dark Green case 'Not Responding': return '#757575'; // Grey case 'Not Interested': return '#F44336'; // Red case 'Other Territory': return '#607D8B'; // Blue Grey default: return '#757575'; // Default grey } }

Status color mapping for badges and UI elements
getStatusPriority
Default value : (status: LeadStatus): number => { const priorities: Record<LeadStatus, number> = { 'New Lead': 1, 'In Discussion': 2, 'Physical Meeting Assigned': 3, 'Customer Accepted': 4, Won: 5, 'Pending at Solarium': 6, 'Under Execution': 7, Executed: 8, 'Not Responding': 9, 'Not Interested': 10, 'Other Territory': 11, }; return priorities[status] || 99; }

Get status display priority for sorting

src/store/migrations.ts

getCurrentVersion
Default value : (): number => { return Math.max(...Object.keys(migrations).map(Number)) + 1; }

Get current migration version
migration0to1
Default value : (state: PersistedState): PersistedState => { console.log('[Migration] Running migration 0 -> 1'); return { ...state, _persist: { ...state._persist, version: 1, }, }; }

Migration from version 0 to 1 Initial migration - adds version field
migration1to2
Default value : (state: PersistedState): PersistedState => { console.log('[Migration] Running migration 1 -> 2'); // Example migration logic const typedState = state as any; if (typedState.auth) { // Example: Move phone to user object if it exists separately if (typedState.auth.phone && !typedState.auth.user?.phone) { typedState.auth.user = { ...typedState.auth.user, phone: typedState.auth.phone, }; delete typedState.auth.phone; } } return { ...typedState, _persist: { ...state._persist, version: 2, }, }; }

Migration from version 1 to 2 Example: Restructure auth state
migrations
Type : MigrationManifest
Default value : { 0: migration0to1, 1: migration1to2, // Add more migrations as needed // 2: migration2to3, // 3: migration3to4, }

Migration manifest Maps version numbers to migration functions
validatePersistedState
Default value : (state: any): boolean => { try { // Basic validation if (!state || typeof state !== 'object') { return false; } // Check for required structure if (state.auth && typeof state.auth !== 'object') { return false; } // Validate auth state structure if (state.auth?.user) { const user = state.auth.user; if (!user.id || !user.phone) { console.warn('[Persist] Invalid user structure, will reset'); return false; } } return true; } catch (error) { console.error('[Persist] State validation error:', error); return false; } }

Validate persisted state

src/config/environmentSelector.ts

getEffectiveEnvironment
Default value : (): Environment => { if (__DEV__ && selectedEnvironment) { return selectedEnvironment; } // Fallback to automatic detection return __DEV__ ? 'development' : 'production'; }

Get current effective environment (manual override or automatic)
getSelectedEnvironment
Default value : (): Environment | null => { return selectedEnvironment; }

Get manually selected environment
resetEnvironment
Default value : (): void => { selectedEnvironment = null; console.log('[Environment] Reset to automatic detection'); }

Reset to automatic environment detection
selectedEnvironment
Type : Environment | null
Default value : null
setEnvironment
Default value : (env: Environment): void => { if (__DEV__) { selectedEnvironment = env; console.log(`[Environment] Manually set to: ${env}`); } else { console.warn( '[Environment] Manual environment setting disabled in production' ); } }

Manually set environment (for development/testing only) This overrides the automatic environment detection

src/components/tickets/MessageBubble.tsx

getMessageStyle
Default value : (sender: string, theme: any) => { const isCustomer = sender === 'Customer'; return { bubble: { backgroundColor: isCustomer ? theme.colors.primary : theme.colors.surfaceVariant, alignSelf: isCustomer ? ('flex-end' as const) : ('flex-start' as const), marginLeft: isCustomer ? 48 : 0, marginRight: isCustomer ? 0 : 48, }, text: { color: isCustomer ? theme.colors.onPrimary : theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant, }, timestamp: { color: isCustomer ? `${theme.colors.onPrimary}CC` // 80% opacity : theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant, }, }; }

Get message bubble styling based on sender role
MessageBubble
Type : React.FC<MessageBubbleProps>
