Default value : React.memo( ({message, testID}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const messageStyle = getMessageStyle(message.sender, theme); const relativeTime = getRelativeTime(message.timestamp); return ( <View style={styles.container} testID={testID}> <View style={[styles.bubble, messageStyle.bubble]}> {/* Message Content */} <Text style={[styles.messageText, messageStyle.text]} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="text" accessibilityLabel={`Message from ${message.sender}: ${message.message}`} > {message.message} </Text> {/* Message Footer */} <Text style={[styles.timestamp, messageStyle.timestamp]} accessible={false} > {relativeTime} </Text> </View> </View> ); } )

src/components/notifications/NotificationListItem.tsx

getSeverityColor
Default value : ( severity: NotificationSeverity, theme: any ): string => { switch (severity) { case 'error': return theme.colors.error; case 'warning': return theme.colors.tertiary; case 'info': default: return theme.colors.primary; } }

Get severity color based on notification severity
NotificationListItem
Type : React.FC<NotificationListItemProps>
Default value : ({ notification, onPress, testID, }) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const handlePress = () => { onPress(notification); }; const timeAgo = formatDistanceToNow(new Date(notification.createdAt), { addSuffix: true, }); const iconName = getNotificationIcon(notification.type); const severityColor = getSeverityColor(notification.severity, theme); return ( <TouchableOpacity style={styles.container} onPress={handlePress} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="button" accessibilityLabel={`${notification.title}. ${notification.message}. ${ notification.isRead ? 'Read' : 'Unread' }. ${timeAgo}`} accessibilityHint="Tap to view details" testID={testID} > <Card style={[ styles.card, { backgroundColor: notification.isRead ? theme.colors.surface : theme.colors.secondaryContainer, }, ]} elevation={1} > <View style={styles.content}> {/* Left: Icon with severity color */} <View style={styles.iconContainer}> <MaterialIcons name={iconName} size={24} color={severityColor} /> </View> {/* Center: Content */} <View style={styles.textContainer}> <Text style={[ styles.title, { color: theme.colors.onSurface, fontWeight: notification.isRead ? '400' : '600', }, ]} numberOfLines={1} ellipsizeMode="tail" > {notification.title} </Text> <Text style={[ styles.message, { color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant, fontWeight: notification.isRead ? '400' : '500', }, ]} numberOfLines={2} ellipsizeMode="tail" > {notification.message} </Text> <Text style={[styles.timestamp, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > {timeAgo} </Text> </View> {/* Right: Unread indicator */} {!notification.isRead && ( <View style={styles.unreadIndicatorContainer}> <View style={[ styles.unreadIndicator, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary}, ]} /> </View> )} </View> </Card> </TouchableOpacity> ); }
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { marginHorizontal: 16, marginVertical: 4, }, card: { borderRadius: 8, }, content: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'flex-start', padding: 16, }, iconContainer: { marginRight: 12, marginTop: 2, }, textContainer: { flex: 1, marginRight: 8, }, title: { fontSize: 16, lineHeight: 20, marginBottom: 4, }, message: { fontSize: 14, lineHeight: 18, marginBottom: 8, }, timestamp: { fontSize: 12, lineHeight: 16, }, unreadIndicatorContainer: { justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', marginLeft: 8, }, unreadIndicator: { width: 8, height: 8, borderRadius: 4, }, })

Default value : ( status: QuotationStatus ): StatusColorConfig => { return QUOTATION_STATUS_COLORS[status] || QUOTATION_STATUS_COLORS.Draft; }

Default value : (status: QuotationStatus): boolean => { return status === 'Shared'; }

Default value : (status: QuotationStatus): boolean => { return status === 'Accepted' || status === 'Rejected'; }

Check if status indicates quotation is finalized

Type : Record<QuotationStatus, StatusColorConfig>
Default value : { Draft: { backgroundColor: '#9E9E9E', // Material Grey 500 textColor: '#FFFFFF', displayName: 'Draft', }, Created: { backgroundColor: '#2196F3', // Material Blue 500 textColor: '#FFFFFF', displayName: 'Created', }, Shared: { backgroundColor: '#03A9F4', // Material Light Blue 500 textColor: '#FFFFFF', displayName: 'Shared', }, Accepted: { backgroundColor: '#4CAF50', // Material Green 500 textColor: '#FFFFFF', displayName: 'Accepted', }, Rejected: { backgroundColor: '#F44336', // Material Red 500 textColor: '#FFFFFF', displayName: 'Rejected', }, }

src/components/leads/LeadListItem/LeadListItem.tsx

getStatusConfig
Default value : ( status: string, theme: any ): {backgroundColor: string; textColor: string} => { const statusLower = status.toLowerCase(); console.log( '[LeadListItem] Status mapping for:', status, '-> lowercase:', statusLower ); if (statusLower.includes('new')) { const config = { backgroundColor: theme.colors.info || '#2196F3', textColor: '#FFFFFF', }; console.log('[LeadListItem] NEW status config:', config); return config; } else if ( statusLower.includes('discussion') || statusLower.includes('meeting') ) { // Use explicit purple since theme.colors.quoted might not exist const config = {backgroundColor: '#673AB7', textColor: '#FFFFFF'}; console.log('[LeadListItem] DISCUSSION status config:', config); return config; } else if ( statusLower.includes('customer') && statusLower.includes('accepted') ) { const config = { backgroundColor: theme.colors.warning || '#FF9800', textColor: '#FFFFFF', }; console.log('[LeadListItem] CUSTOMER_ACCEPTED status config:', config); return config; } else if (statusLower.includes('won') || statusLower.includes('executed')) { const config = { backgroundColor: theme.colors.success || '#4CAF50', textColor: '#FFFFFF', }; console.log('[LeadListItem] WON status config:', config); return config; } else if ( statusLower.includes('not interested') || statusLower.includes('not responding') ) { const config = { backgroundColor: theme.colors.error || '#F44336', textColor: '#FFFFFF', }; console.log('[LeadListItem] NOT_INTERESTED status config:', config); return config; } else { const config = { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary || '#2E7D32', textColor: '#FFFFFF', }; console.log('[LeadListItem] DEFAULT status config:', config); return config; } }

Get status color and text color based on lead status AC-4.2: Status colors follow palette mapping with proper contrast
LeadListItem
Type : React.FC<LeadListItemProps>
Default value : React.memo( ({lead, onPress, testID}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const statusConfig = getStatusConfig(lead.status, theme); const {line1, line2} = splitAddress(lead.address); const relativeTime = getRelativeTime(lead.updatedAt); // AC-4.3: Accessible label combines address + status const accessibleLabel = `Lead ${lead.leadId}, ${lead.customerName}, ${line1} ${line2}, Status: ${lead.status}, Updated ${relativeTime}`; const handlePress = () => { onPress(lead.id || lead.leadId); // Handle both id formats }; return ( <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]} onPress={handlePress} testID={testID} // AC-4.3: accessibilityRole='button' accessible={true} accessibilityRole="button" accessibilityLabel={accessibleLabel} accessibilityHint="Tap to view lead details" > {/* Lead Header - ID and Status */} <View style={styles.leadHeader}> <Text style={[styles.leadId, {color: theme.colors.primary}]} accessible={false} // Included in parent's accessibilityLabel > {lead.leadId} </Text> {/* AC-4.3: Status Chip exposes accessible label */} <Chip style={[ styles.statusChip, {backgroundColor: statusConfig.backgroundColor}, ]} textStyle={[styles.statusChipText, {color: statusConfig.textColor}]} compact={true} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="text" accessibilityLabel={`Status: ${lead.status}`} mode="flat" > {lead.status} </Chip> </View> {/* AC-4.1: siteAddress (two-line) */} <View style={styles.addressContainer}> <Text style={[styles.addressLine1, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} numberOfLines={1} accessible={false} // Included in parent's accessibilityLabel > {line1} </Text> {line2 ? ( <Text style={[ styles.addressLine2, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} numberOfLines={1} accessible={false} // Included in parent's accessibilityLabel > {line2} </Text> ) : null} </View> {/* Footer - Customer and Time */} <View style={styles.footer}> <View style={styles.customerInfo}> <MaterialIcons name="person" size={14} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} style={styles.customerIcon} /> <Text style={[ styles.customerName, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} numberOfLines={1} accessible={false} // Included in parent's accessibilityLabel > {lead.customerName} </Text> </View> {/* AC-4.1: updatedAt (relative) */} <View style={styles.timeContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="schedule" size={12} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} style={styles.timeIcon} /> <Text style={[styles.timeText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} accessible={false} // Included in parent's accessibilityLabel > {relativeTime} </Text> </View> </View> </TouchableOpacity> ); } )

LeadListItem Component Memoized for performance (AC: 50 fps on 6-year-old Android)
splitAddress
Default value : (address: string): {line1: string; line2: string} => { if (!address) { return {line1: 'No address', line2: ''}; } const parts = address.split(',').map(part => part.trim()); if (parts.length <= 2) { return {line1: parts[0] || '', line2: parts[1] || ''}; } // Split roughly in middle, but keep locality together const midPoint = Math.ceil(parts.length / 2); const line1 = parts.slice(0, midPoint).join(', '); const line2 = parts.slice(midPoint).join(', '); return {line1, line2}; }

Split address into two lines for better display AC-4.1: siteAddress (two-line)

src/store/transforms/leadsApiTransform.ts

hasPersistedLeads
Default value : (state: any): boolean => { const leadsApi = state?.leadsApi; if (!leadsApi?.queries) { return false; } return Object.keys(leadsApi.queries).some( key => key.startsWith('getCustomerLeads') && leadsApi.queries[key]?.data?.length > 0 ); }

Helper to check if persisted leads data exists
leadsApiTransform
Type : object
Default value : { in: (inboundState: any) => { console.log( '[LeadsTransform] PERSISTING - Full state keys:', Object.keys(inboundState || {}) ); console.log( '[LeadsTransform] PERSISTING - Queries:', Object.keys(inboundState?.queries || {}) ); if (!inboundState || typeof inboundState !== 'object') { console.log('[LeadsTransform] PERSISTING - Invalid state, skipping'); return inboundState; } const {queries = {}} = inboundState; const hasCustomerLeads = Object.keys(queries).some( key => key.startsWith('getCustomerLeads') && queries[key]?.data?.length > 0 ); console.log( '[LeadsTransform] PERSISTING - Has customer leads data:', hasCustomerLeads ); console.log( '[LeadsTransform] PERSISTING - Saving state:', JSON.stringify(inboundState, null, 2) ); // For now, persist everything to test basic functionality return inboundState; }, out: (outboundState: any) => { console.log( '[LeadsTransform] RESTORING - State:', outboundState ? 'EXISTS' : 'NULL' ); console.log( '[LeadsTransform] RESTORING - Queries:', Object.keys(outboundState?.queries || {}) ); if (outboundState?.queries) { const queryKeys = Object.keys(outboundState.queries); console.log('[LeadsTransform] RESTORING - Found query keys:', queryKeys); queryKeys.forEach(key => { if (key.startsWith('getCustomerLeads')) { console.log( '[LeadsTransform] RESTORING - Customer leads data length:', outboundState.queries[key]?.data?.length || 0 ); } }); } return outboundState; }, }

Redux Persist Transform for Leads API Matches the existing auth/cart transform pattern

src/store/transforms/quotationsApiTransform.ts

hasPersistedQuotations
Default value : (state: any): boolean => { const quotationsApi = state?.quotationsApi; if (!quotationsApi?.queries) { return false; } return Object.keys(quotationsApi.queries).some( key => (key.startsWith('getQuotations') || key.startsWith('getQuotationsByLeadId')) && quotationsApi.queries[key]?.data?.length > 0 ); }

Helper to check if persisted quotations data exists
quotationsApiTransform
Type : object
Default value : { in: (inboundState: any) => { console.log( '[QuotationsTransform] PERSISTING - Full state keys:', Object.keys(inboundState || {}) ); console.log( '[QuotationsTransform] PERSISTING - Queries:', Object.keys(inboundState?.queries || {}) ); if (!inboundState || typeof inboundState !== 'object') { console.log('[QuotationsTransform] PERSISTING - Invalid state, skipping'); return inboundState; } const {queries = {}, ...otherState} = inboundState; // Filter out PDF endpoint queries since URLs are temporary const filteredQueries = Object.keys(queries).reduce((acc, queryKey) => { // Blacklist getQuotationPdf queries to avoid persisting temporary URLs if (queryKey.includes('getQuotationPdf')) { console.log( '[QuotationsTransform] PERSISTING - Filtering out PDF query:', queryKey ); return acc; } acc[queryKey] = queries[queryKey]; return acc; }, {} as any); const hasQuotationData = Object.keys(filteredQueries).some( key => (key.startsWith('getQuotations') || key.startsWith('getQuotationsByLeadId')) && filteredQueries[key]?.data?.length > 0 ); console.log( '[QuotationsTransform] PERSISTING - Has quotations data:', hasQuotationData ); console.log( '[QuotationsTransform] PERSISTING - Filtered queries count:', Object.keys(filteredQueries).length ); // Return state with filtered queries const stateToSave = { ...otherState, queries: filteredQueries, }; console.log( '[QuotationsTransform] PERSISTING - Saving state with', Object.keys(filteredQueries).length, 'queries' ); return stateToSave; }, out: (outboundState: any) => { console.log( '[QuotationsTransform] RESTORING - State:', outboundState ? 'EXISTS' : 'NULL' ); console.log( '[QuotationsTransform] RESTORING - Queries:', Object.keys(outboundState?.queries || {}) ); if (outboundState?.queries) { const queryKeys = Object.keys(outboundState.queries); console.log( '[QuotationsTransform] RESTORING - Found query keys:', queryKeys ); queryKeys.forEach(key => { if ( key.startsWith('getQuotations') || key.startsWith('getQuotationsByLeadId') ) { console.log( '[QuotationsTransform] RESTORING - Quotations data length:', Array.isArray(outboundState.queries[key]?.data) ? outboundState.queries[key].data.length : 'Not an array' ); } }); } return outboundState; }, }

Redux Persist Transform for Quotations API Matches the existing leads transform pattern

src/screens/main/LeadDetail/LeadDetailTabNavigator.tsx

headerStyles
Type : object
Default value : { container: { flex: 1, }, loadingContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center' as const, alignItems: 'center' as const, paddingHorizontal: 32, }, loadingText: { fontSize: 16, marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center' as const, }, errorContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center' as const, alignItems: 'center' as const, paddingHorizontal: 32, }, errorTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600' as const, marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center' as const, }, headerCard: { marginHorizontal: 16, marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, borderRadius: 12, padding: 16, elevation: 2, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 1, }, shadowOpacity: 0.22, shadowRadius: 2.22, }, headerContent: { flexDirection: 'row' as const, justifyContent: 'space-between' as const, alignItems: 'center' as const, }, leadId: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '700' as const, }, statusChip: { alignSelf: 'flex-start' as const, }, statusChipText: { fontSize: 12, fontWeight: '600' as const, }, }

Header Styles
LeadDetailTabNavigator
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const route = useRoute<LeadDetailRouteProp>(); const {leadId} = route.params; // Fetch lead details for the header const { data: lead, isLoading: isLeadLoading, isError: isLeadError, } = useGetLeadByIdQuery(leadId, { selectFromResult: result => ({ ...result, // Extract the lead data from the success response format data: result.data?.success ? result.data.data : result.data, }), }); /** * Info Tab with leadId prop */ const InfoTabWithProps: React.FC = () => <InfoTab leadId={leadId} />; /** * Quotes Tab with leadId prop */ const QuotesTabWithProps: React.FC = () => <QuotesTab leadId={leadId} />; /** * Docs Tab with leadId prop */ const DocsTabWithProps: React.FC = () => <DocsTab leadId={leadId} />; /** * Tickets Tab Placeholder */ const TicketsTabWithProps: React.FC = () => <TicketsTab leadId={leadId} />; // Loading state for header if (isLeadLoading) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={headerStyles.loadingContainer}> <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[ headerStyles.loadingText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Loading Lead Details ... </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } // Error state for header if (isLeadError || !lead) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={headerStyles.errorContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={[headerStyles.errorTitle, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> Failed to Load Service Request </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } const statusColor = getStatusColor(lead.status); return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={[ headerStyles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}, ]} > {/* Persistent Header */} <View style={[ headerStyles.headerCard, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}, ]} > <View style={headerStyles.headerContent}> <Text style={[headerStyles.leadId, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} > {lead.leadId} </Text> <Chip mode="flat" style={[ headerStyles.statusChip, {backgroundColor: `${statusColor}20`}, ]} textStyle={[headerStyles.statusChipText, {color: statusColor}]} > {lead.status} </Chip> </View> </View> {/* Tab Navigator */} <Tab.Navigator screenOptions={{ tabBarActiveTintColor: theme.colors.primary, tabBarInactiveTintColor: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant, tabBarIndicatorStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, height: 3, }, tabBarStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface, elevation: 4, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 2, }, shadowOpacity: 0.25, shadowRadius: 3.84, }, tabBarLabelStyle: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', textTransform: 'none', }, tabBarScrollEnabled: false, tabBarIndicatorContainerStyle: { marginHorizontal: 16, }, }} initialRouteName="Info" > <Tab.Screen name="Info" component={InfoTabWithProps} options={{ tabBarLabel: 'Info', }} /> <Tab.Screen name="Quotes" component={QuotesTabWithProps} options={{ tabBarLabel: 'Quotes', }} /> <Tab.Screen name="Docs" component={DocsTabWithProps} options={{ tabBarLabel: 'Docs', }} /> {lead.status === 'Executed' && ( <Tab.Screen name="Tickets" component={TicketsTabWithProps} options={{ tabBarLabel: 'Tickets', }} /> )} </Tab.Navigator> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); }

Lead Detail Tab Navigator with Persistent Header
Tab
Default value : createMaterialTopTabNavigator()

src/screens/main/HelpScreen.tsx

HelpScreen
Type : React.FC<Props>
Default value : ({navigation}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); // Debug logging console.log('[HelpScreen] Component rendering...'); // Fetch tickets from API const { data: apiTickets, isLoading, isError, error: _error, isFetching, } = useGetTicketsQuery(undefined, { selectFromResult: result => { return { ...result, data: result.data || {items: [], total: 0, offset: 0, limit: 25}, }; }, }); // Get tickets from Redux state (synced via extraReducers) const tickets = useAppSelector(selectTickets); // Pull-to-refresh with 60s debounce const {refreshTickets, canRefreshTickets} = useRefreshControl(); // Ticket polling with focus-based lifecycle const ticketPolling = useTicketPolling({ enabled: true, startImmediately: false, // Only start via focus control }); /** * Handle screen focus - start polling */ useFocusEffect( useCallback(() => { console.log('[HelpScreen] Screen focused, starting ticket polling'); ticketPolling.startPolling(); return () => { console.log('[HelpScreen] Screen unfocused, stopping ticket polling'); ticketPolling.stopPolling(); }; }, [ticketPolling]) ); // Create ticket modal visibility state const [createTicketModalVisible, setCreateTicketModalVisible] = useState(false); const [snackbarVisible, setSnackbarVisible] = useState(false); const [snackbarMessage, setSnackbarMessage] = useState(''); /** * Handle pull-to-refresh */ const handleRefresh = useCallback(async () => { console.log('[HelpScreen] Pull to refresh triggered'); try { await refreshTickets(); } catch (error) { console.error('[HelpScreen] Refresh error:', error); } }, [refreshTickets]); /** * Handle ticket item press - navigate to ticket thread */ const handleTicketPress = useCallback( (ticketId: string) => { console.log('[HelpScreen] Navigating to ticket thread:', ticketId); // Cast to any to bypass TypeScript navigation type restrictions // since we're navigating from tab navigator to root stack (navigation as any).navigate('TicketThread', {ticketId}); }, [navigation] ); /** * Handle create ticket button press */ const handleCreateTicket = useCallback(() => { console.log('[HelpScreen] Creating new ticket in modal'); setCreateTicketModalVisible(true); }, []); /** * Handle close create ticket modal */ const handleCloseCreateTicketModal = useCallback(() => { setCreateTicketModalVisible(false); }, []); /** * Show snackbar message */ const showMessage = useCallback((message: string) => { setSnackbarMessage(message); setSnackbarVisible(true); }, []); /** * Handle ticket created successfully */ const handleTicketCreated = useCallback( (ticketId: string) => { console.log('[HelpScreen] Ticket created successfully:', ticketId); showMessage(`Ticket ${ticketId} created successfully!`); // Optionally navigate to the new ticket // (navigation as any).navigate('TicketThread', {ticketId}); }, [showMessage] ); /** * FlatList optimizations */ const keyExtractor = useCallback( (item: TicketListItemType) => item.ticketId, [] ); const renderTicketItem = useCallback( ({item}: {item: TicketListItemType}) => { return ( <TicketListItemComponent ticket={item} onPress={handleTicketPress} testID={`ticket-item-${item.ticketId}`} /> ); }, [handleTicketPress] ); const getItemLayout = useCallback( (_: any, index: number) => ({ length: 100, // Approximate height of TicketListItemComponent offset: 100 * index, index, }), [] ); /** * Memoized empty state component */ const EmptyState = useMemo( () => ( <View style={styles.emptyContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="support-agent" size={64} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} /> <Text style={[styles.emptyTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> No Support Tickets </Text> <Text style={[ styles.emptyDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Your support tickets will appear here. Create a new ticket to get help with your requests. </Text> <Button mode="contained" onPress={handleCreateTicket} style={styles.createButton} icon="plus" > Create New Ticket </Button> </View> ), [theme, handleCreateTicket] ); /** * Memoized error state component */ const ErrorState = useMemo( () => ( <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={[styles.errorTitle, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> Failed to Load Tickets </Text> <Text style={[ styles.errorDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Please pull down to refresh and try again. </Text> <Button mode="outlined" onPress={handleRefresh} style={styles.retryButton} icon="refresh" > Retry </Button> </View> ), [theme, handleRefresh] ); // ✅ IMPROVED LOADING LOGIC: // Show loading only if we're loading (RTK query is fetching data) AND we don't have api data yet AND we have no Redux cached data yet const shouldShowLoading = isLoading && !apiTickets && tickets.length === 0; // Loading state - UPDATED CONDITION if (shouldShowLoading) { return ( <SafeAreaLayout> <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.loadingText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Loading your tickets... </Text> </View> </SafeAreaLayout> ); } console.log( '[HelpScreen] Rendering FlatList with', tickets.length, 'tickets' ); return ( <SafeAreaLayout> <View style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} > <FlatList data={tickets} // ✅ Use Redux data (which is populated via extraReducers) renderItem={renderTicketItem} keyExtractor={keyExtractor} getItemLayout={getItemLayout} refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isFetching && canRefreshTickets()} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} /> } // Performance optimizations removeClippedSubviews={true} maxToRenderPerBatch={10} windowSize={10} initialNumToRender={10} // States ListEmptyComponent={isError ? ErrorState : EmptyState} // Styling contentContainerStyle={ tickets.length === 0 ? styles.emptyListContainer : styles.listContainer } showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} /> {/* Create Ticket FAB - Always visible */} <FAB style={[styles.fab, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary}]} icon="plus" onPress={handleCreateTicket} label="Create Ticket" visible={true} /> </View> {/* Create Ticket Modal */} <CreateTicketModal visible={createTicketModalVisible} onClose={handleCloseCreateTicketModal} onSuccess={handleTicketCreated} testID="create-ticket-modal" /> {/* Snackbar for success messages */} <Snackbar visible={snackbarVisible} onDismiss={() => { setSnackbarVisible(false); setSnackbarMessage(''); }} duration={4000} action={{ label: 'Dismiss', onPress: () => { setSnackbarVisible(false); setSnackbarMessage(''); }, }} > {snackbarMessage} </Snackbar> </SafeAreaLayout> ); }

Help Screen (Tickets List) Component Shows support tickets with create ticket functionality
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, loadingContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, loadingText: { fontSize: 16, marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center', }, listContainer: { paddingTop: 16, paddingBottom: 100, // Space for FAB }, emptyListContainer: { flexGrow: 1, paddingBottom: 100, // Space for FAB }, emptyContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, emptyTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, emptyDescription: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 24, marginBottom: 24, }, createButton: { marginTop: 16, }, errorContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, errorTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, errorDescription: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 24, marginBottom: 24, }, retryButton: { marginTop: 16, }, fab: { position: 'absolute', right: 16, bottom: 16, }, })

src/screens/main/HomeScreen.tsx

HomeScreen
Type : React.FC<Props>
Default value : ({navigation}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); // Use new auth system const {user, logout} = useNewAuth(); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); /** * Handle logout */ const handleLogout = async () => { Alert.alert('Logout', 'Are you sure you want to logout?', [ { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel', onPress: () => { announceForAccessibility('Logout cancelled'); }, }, { text: 'Logout', style: 'destructive', onPress: async () => { try { setIsLoading(true); screenReaderUtils.announceLoading(true, 'logout'); // Use new auth system logout const result = await logout(); if (result.success) { screenReaderUtils.announceSuccess('Logged out successfully'); } else { console.error('[Home] Logout error:', result.error); announceForAccessibility('Logout failed, please try again'); } } catch (error) { console.error('[Home] Logout error:', error); announceForAccessibility('Logout failed, please try again'); } finally { setIsLoading(false); } }, }, ]); }; const logoutButtonStyle = useMemo( () => [ styles.logoutButton, { backgroundColor: theme.colors.error, opacity: isLoading ? 0.6 : 1, }, ], [theme.colors.error, isLoading] ); /** * Navigate to service detail (test deep linking) */ const testDeepLink = () => { // This will test the deep link navigation navigation.navigate('ServiceDetail' as any, { serviceId: 'SRV001', serviceName: 'Solar Panel Installation', }); }; return ( <SafeAreaLayout backgroundColor={theme.colors.background}> <ScrollView style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} {...createTextA11yProps('Home screen content')} > {/* Welcome Header */} <Card style={styles.card} {...createTextA11yProps('Welcome card')}> <Card.Content> <Text style={[styles.welcome, {color: theme.colors.primary}]} {...createTextA11yProps( `Welcome, ${user?.name || 'User'}!`, 'header', a11yTestIds.welcomeMessage )} > Welcome, {user?.name || 'User'}! 'Yes' : 'No'}` )} > ✅ User authenticated: {user ? 'Yes' : 'No'} </Text> <Text style={[styles.status, {color: theme.colors.primary}]} {...createTextA11yProps(`Token stored: ${user ? 'Yes' : 'No'}`)} > ✅ Token stored: {user ? 'Yes' : 'No'} </Text> <Text style={[styles.status, {color: theme.colors.primary}]} {...createTextA11yProps('Navigation working: Yes')} > ✅ Navigation working: Yes </Text> <Text style={[styles.status, {color: theme.colors.primary}]} {...createTextA11yProps('Redux integrated: Yes')} > ✅ Redux integrated: Yes </Text> <Text style={[styles.status, {color: theme.colors.primary}]} {...createTextA11yProps('Accessibility features: Enabled')} > ✅ Accessibility features: Enabled </Text> </View> </Card.Content> </Card> {/* Development Tools */} {__DEV__ && ( <Card style={styles.card} {...createTextA11yProps('Development tools card')} > <Card.Content> <Text style={[styles.sectionTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} {...createTextA11yProps('Development Tools', 'header')} > Development Tools </Text> <View style={styles.actionsSection}> <TouchableOpacity style={logoutButtonStyle} onPress={handleLogout} disabled={isLoading} {...createButtonA11yProps( isLoading ? 'Logging out' : 'Logout', 'Tap to logout from the application', isLoading, a11yTestIds.logoutButton )} > <Text style={[ styles.logoutButtonText, {color: theme.colors.onError}, ]} > {isLoading ? styles

src/store/newAuthSlice.ts

initialState
Type : NewAuthState
Default value : { isLoggedIn: false, isLoading: false, user: null, token: null, error: null, }

Initial state
loginSuccess
Default value : createAsyncThunk( 'newAuth/loginSuccess', async (loginData: LoginResponse, {dispatch}) => { try { // Save token to secure storage await saveJWT(loginData.accessToken); // Update state dispatch( setAuthState({ user: loginData.user, token: loginData.accessToken, isLoggedIn: true, }) ); return loginData; } catch (error) { console.error('[NewAuth] Login success handler failed:', error); throw error; } } )

Login success handler
logoutUser
Default value : createAsyncThunk( 'newAuth/logout', async (_, {dispatch}) => { try { // Clear secure storage await clearJWT(); // Clear state dispatch(clearAuthState()); return true; } catch (error) { console.error('[NewAuth] Logout failed:', error); // Still clear state even if storage clear fails dispatch(clearAuthState()); return true; } } )

Logout handler
newAuthSlice
Default value : createSlice({ name: 'newAuth', initialState, reducers: { setLoading: (state, action: PayloadAction<boolean>) => { state.isLoading = action.payload; }, setError: (state, action: PayloadAction<string | null>) => { state.error = action.payload; }, setAuthState: ( state, action: PayloadAction<{ user: User; token: string; isLoggedIn: boolean; }> ) => { state.user = action.payload.user; state.token = action.payload.token; state.isLoggedIn = action.payload.isLoggedIn; state.error = null; }, clearAuthState: state => { state.isLoggedIn = false; state.user = null; state.token = null; state.error = null; }, }, extraReducers: builder => { builder // Restore auth .addCase(restoreAuth.pending, state => { state.isLoading = true; }) .addCase(restoreAuth.fulfilled, state => { state.isLoading = false; }) .addCase(restoreAuth.rejected, state => { state.isLoading = false; state.isLoggedIn = false; state.user = null; state.token = null; }) // Login success .addCase(loginSuccess.pending, state => { state.isLoading = true; state.error = null; }) .addCase(loginSuccess.fulfilled, state => { state.isLoading = false; }) .addCase(loginSuccess.rejected, (state, action) => { state.isLoading = false; state.error = action.error.message || 'Login failed'; }) // Logout .addCase(logoutUser.fulfilled, state => { state.isLoading = false; }); }, })

New Auth Slice
restoreAuth
Default value : createAsyncThunk( 'newAuth/restore', async (_, {dispatch}) => { try { const token = await getJWT(); if (token) { // Simple JWT decode to get user info const base64Decode = (str: string): string => { if (typeof atob !== 'undefined') { return atob(str); } // React Native polyfill return Buffer.from(str, 'base64').toString('ascii'); }; const payload = JSON.parse(base64Decode(token.split('.')[1])); const user: User = { id: payload.userId, name: payload.name, email: payload.email, phone: payload.phone, role: payload.role, }; dispatch(setAuthState({user, token, isLoggedIn: true})); return {user, token}; } return null; } catch (error) { console.error('[NewAuth] Restore failed:', error); await clearJWT(); // Clear invalid token return null; } } )

Simple auth restoration - just check if token exists
selectAuthError
Default value : (state: {newAuth: NewAuthState}) => state.newAuth.error
selectAuthLoading
Default value : (state: {newAuth: NewAuthState}) => state.newAuth.isLoading
selectIsLoggedIn
Default value : (state: {newAuth: NewAuthState}) => state.newAuth.isLoggedIn
selectNewAuth
Default value : (state: {newAuth: NewAuthState}) => state.newAuth
selectToken
Default value : (state: {newAuth: NewAuthState}) => state.newAuth.token
selectUser
Default value : (state: {newAuth: NewAuthState}) => state.newAuth.user
Default value : newAuthSlice.actions

src/store/refreshSlice.ts

initialState
Type : RefreshState
Default value : { isRefreshing: false, lastRefreshAt: null, refreshError: null, refreshCount: 0, refreshProgress: { current: 0, total: 0, currentStep: '', }, }
refreshSlice
Default value : createSlice({ name: 'refresh', initialState, reducers: { /** * Start refresh operation */ startRefresh: (state, action: PayloadAction<{total: number}>) => { state.isRefreshing = true; state.refreshError = null; state.refreshProgress = { current: 0, total: action.payload.total, currentStep: 'Initializing refresh...', }; }, /** * Update refresh progress */ updateRefreshProgress: ( state, action: PayloadAction<{current: number; currentStep: string}> ) => { state.refreshProgress.current = action.payload.current; state.refreshProgress.currentStep = action.payload.currentStep; }, /** * Complete refresh operation successfully */ completeRefresh: (state, action: PayloadAction<{timestamp: string}>) => { state.isRefreshing = false; state.lastRefreshAt = action.payload.timestamp; state.refreshError = null; state.refreshCount += 1; state.refreshProgress = { current: 0, total: 0, currentStep: '', }; }, /** * Fail refresh operation */ failRefresh: (state, action: PayloadAction<{error: string}>) => { state.isRefreshing = false; state.refreshError = action.payload.error; state.refreshProgress = { current: 0, total: 0, currentStep: '', }; }, /** * Clear refresh error */ clearRefreshError: state => { state.refreshError = null; }, /** * Reset refresh state (useful for testing or logout) */ resetRefreshState: () => initialState, }, })
Default value : refreshSlice.actions

src/store/uiSlice.ts

initialState
Type : UIState
Default value : { isLoading: false, loadingMessage: undefined, error: null, activeModal: undefined, networkStatus: 'online', }

Initial state
selectActiveModal
Default value : (state: {ui: UIState}) => state.ui.activeModal
selectIsLoading
Default value : (state: {ui: UIState}) => state.ui.isLoading
selectLoadingMessage
Default value : (state: {ui: UIState}) => state.ui.loadingMessage
selectNetworkStatus
Default value : (state: {ui: UIState}) => state.ui.networkStatus
uiSlice
Default value : createSlice({ name: 'ui', initialState, reducers: { setLoading: ( state, action: PayloadAction<{isLoading: boolean; message?: string}> ) => { state.isLoading = action.payload.isLoading; state.loadingMessage = action.payload.message; }, setError: (state, action: PayloadAction<string | null>) => { state.error = action.payload; }, clearError: state => { state.error = null; }, showModal: (state, action: PayloadAction<string>) => { state.activeModal = action.payload; }, hideModal: state => { state.activeModal = undefined; }, setNetworkStatus: (state, action: PayloadAction<'online' | 'offline'>) => { state.networkStatus = action.payload; }, }, })

UI slice
Default value : uiSlice.actions

src/types/api-error.ts

isApiErrorResponse
Default value : (error: any): error is ApiErrorResponse => { return ( error && typeof error === 'object' && error.success === false && typeof error.error === 'string' ); }
isServerError
Default value : (error: any): error is ServerError => { return ( error && typeof error === 'object' && typeof error.status === 'number' && error.status >= 500 && error.status < 600 && typeof error.message === 'string' ); }
isValidationError
Default value : (error: any): error is ValidationError => { return ( error && typeof error === 'object' && error.status === 400 && typeof error.message === 'string' && error.errors && typeof error.errors === 'object' ); }

Type guards for error detection

src/store/securePersistAdapter.ts

isJWTKey
Default value : (key: string): boolean => { return key === 'auth_token_secure' || PERSIST_KEY_MAPPING[key] === 'jwt'; }

Determine if key is for JWT token
PERSIST_KEY_MAPPING
Type : Record<string, "jwt" | "other">
Default value : { 'persist:root': 'other', // Root persist key auth: 'other', // Auth state key auth_token_secure: 'jwt', // JWT token key }

Storage keys mapping for redux-persist
securePersistAdapter
Default value : new SecurePersistAdapter()

Export singleton instance

src/api/endpoints/kyc.ts

kycApi
Default value : createApi({ reducerPath: 'kycApi', baseQuery, tagTypes: ['KycDoc'], endpoints: builder => ({ /** * Request SAS token for KYC document upload */ requestSasToken: builder.mutation<SasTokenResponse, RequestSasTokenRequest>( { query: body => ({ url: 'kycDocuments', method: 'POST', body, }), transformResponse: transformResponse<SasTokenResponse>, transformErrorResponse: transformKycError, invalidatesTags: (result, error, {leadId, customerId}) => [ {type: 'KycDoc', id: leadId}, {type: 'KycDoc', id: customerId}, {type: 'KycDoc', id: 'LIST'}, ], } ), /** * List KYC documents */ listKycDocuments: builder.query< ListKycDocumentsResponse, ListKycDocumentsRequest >({ query: params => ({ url: 'kycDocuments', params, }), transformResponse: transformResponse<ListKycDocumentsResponse>, transformErrorResponse: transformKycError, providesTags: (result, error, {leadId, customerId}) => { const tags = [{type: 'KycDoc' as const, id: 'LIST'}]; if (leadId) { tags.push({type: 'KycDoc' as const, id: leadId}); } if (customerId) { tags.push({type: 'KycDoc' as const, id: customerId}); } // Add tags for each document if (result?.documents) { result.documents.forEach(doc => { tags.push({type: 'KycDoc' as const, id: doc.docId}); }); } return tags; }, }), /** * Get document download SAS token */ getDocumentSas: builder.mutation< GetDocumentSasResponse, GetDocumentSasRequest >({ query: params => ({ url: 'documents/sas', method: 'GET', params, }), transformResponse: transformResponse<GetDocumentSasResponse>, transformErrorResponse: transformKycError, }), }), })

KYC API Definition
transformKycError
Default value : (error: any) => { const baseError = transformError(error); // Add KYC-specific error handling if (error.status === 404) { return { ...baseError, message: 'KYC document not found or access denied', }; } if (error.status === 403) { return { ...baseError, message: 'You do not have permission to access this KYC document', }; } if (error.status === 413) { return { ...baseError, message: 'File size exceeds 10MB limit', code: 413, }; } if (error.status === 415) { return { ...baseError, message: 'Unsupported file type for KYC document', code: 415, }; } return baseError; }

Transform KYC errors to provide better error messages
Default value : kycApi

src/components/debug/KycApiTester.tsx

KycApiTester
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { // Form states const [customerId, setCustomerId] = useState('CUST-001'); const [leadId, setLeadId] = useState('LEAD-123'); const [docType, setDocType] = useState<KycDocumentType>('PAN'); const [docId, setDocId] = useState('KYC-DOC-123'); const [queryLeadId, setQueryLeadId] = useState('LEAD-123'); const [queryCustomerId, setQueryCustomerId] = useState(''); // Results state const [results, setResults] = useState<string>(''); // Hooks const [requestSasToken, {isLoading: sasLoading}] = useRequestSasTokenMutation(); const [getDocumentSas, {isLoading: downloadLoading}] = useGetDocumentSasMutation(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); // Query with current params const { data: kycDocs, isLoading: docsLoading, refetch: refetchDocs, } = useListKycDocumentsQuery({ leadId: queryLeadId || undefined, customerId: queryCustomerId || undefined, }); const addResult = (title: string, data: any) => { const timestamp = new Date().toLocaleTimeString(); const result = `\n[${timestamp}] ${title}:\n${JSON.stringify( data, null, 2 )}\n${'='.repeat(50)}`; setResults(prev => prev + result); }; const handleRequestSasToken = async () => { try { const result = await requestSasToken({ customerId, docType, leadId, }).unwrap(); addResult('✅ Request SAS Token Success', result); Alert.alert('Success', 'SAS token requested successfully!'); } catch (error) { addResult('❌ Request SAS Token Error', error); Alert.alert( 'Error', `Failed to request SAS token: ${JSON.stringify(error)}` ); } }; const handleGetDocumentSas = async () => { try { const result = await getDocumentSas({ docId, }).unwrap(); addResult('✅ Get Document SAS Success', result); Alert.alert('Success', 'Document SAS retrieved successfully!'); } catch (error) { addResult('❌ Get Document SAS Error', error); Alert.alert( 'Error', `Failed to get document SAS: ${JSON.stringify(error)}` ); } }; const handleListKycDocs = () => { if (kycDocs) { addResult('✅ List KYC Documents (RTK Query)', kycDocs); } }; const handleRefetchDocs = async () => { try { const result = await refetchDocs(); addResult('✅ Refetch KYC Documents', result.data); } catch (error) { addResult('❌ Refetch KYC Documents Error', error); } }; const handleImperativeSasToken = async () => { try { const result = await requestKycSasToken({ customerId, docType, leadId, }); addResult('✅ Imperative SAS Token Success', result); Alert.alert('Success', 'Imperative SAS token requested successfully!'); } catch (error) { addResult('❌ Imperative SAS Token Error', error); Alert.alert( 'Error', `Imperative SAS token failed: ${(error as Error).message}` ); } }; const handleImperativeLiveDocs = async () => { try { const result = await getLiveKycDocsForLead(queryLeadId || leadId); addResult('✅ Imperative Live Docs Success', result); Alert.alert('Success', 'Live documents fetched successfully!'); } catch (error) { addResult('❌ Imperative Live Docs Error', error); Alert.alert('Error', `Live docs failed: ${(error as Error).message}`); } }; const clearResults = () => { setResults(''); }; return ( <ScrollView style={styles.container}> <Text style={styles.title}>KYC API Manual Tester</Text> {/* Request SAS Token Section */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>1. Request SAS Token</Text> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Customer ID:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={customerId} onChangeText={setCustomerId} placeholder="CUST-001" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Lead ID:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={leadId} onChangeText={setLeadId} placeholder="LEAD-123" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Doc Type:</Text> <View style={styles.buttonGroup}> {(['PAN', 'Aadhaar'] as const).map(type => ( <TouchableOpacity key={type} style={[ styles.typeButton, docType === type && styles.typeButtonActive, ]} onPress={() => setDocType(type)} > <Text style={[ styles.typeButtonText, docType === type && styles.typeButtonTextActive, ]} > {type} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> ))} </View> </View> <View style={styles.buttonRow}> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.primaryButton]} onPress={handleRequestSasToken} disabled={sasLoading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}> {sasLoading ? 'Loading...' : 'Request SAS (Hook)'} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.secondaryButton]} onPress={handleImperativeSasToken} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Request SAS (Imperative)</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> </View> {/* List KYC Documents Section */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>2. List KYC Documents</Text> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Lead ID:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={queryLeadId} onChangeText={setQueryLeadId} placeholder="LEAD-123" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Customer ID:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={queryCustomerId} onChangeText={setQueryCustomerId} placeholder="Optional" /> </View> <View style={styles.buttonRow}> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.primaryButton]} onPress={handleListKycDocs} disabled={docsLoading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}> {docsLoading ? 'Loading...' : 'List Docs (Hook)'} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.secondaryButton]} onPress={handleRefetchDocs} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Refetch</Text> </TouchableOpacity> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.tertiaryButton]} onPress={handleImperativeLiveDocs} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Live Docs (Imperative)</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {kycDocs && ( <View style={styles.quickResult}> <Text style={styles.quickResultTitle}>Current Query Result:</Text> <Text style={styles.quickResultText}> {kycDocs.documents.length} documents found </Text> </View> )} </View> {/* Get Document SAS Section */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>3. Get Document SAS</Text> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Doc ID:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={docId} onChangeText={setDocId} placeholder="KYC-DOC-123" /> </View> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.primaryButton]} onPress={handleGetDocumentSas} disabled={downloadLoading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}> {downloadLoading ? 'Loading...' : 'Get Document SAS'} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {/* Results Section */} <View style={styles.section}> <View style={styles.resultsHeader}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Results</Text> <TouchableOpacity style={styles.clearButton} onPress={clearResults}> <Text style={styles.clearButtonText}>Clear</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> <ScrollView style={styles.resultsContainer}> <Text style={styles.resultsText}> {results || 'No results yet...'} </Text> </ScrollView> </View> </ScrollView> ); }
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, padding: 16, backgroundColor: '#f5f5f5', }, title: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: 20, color: '#333', }, section: { backgroundColor: 'white', padding: 16, marginBottom: 16, borderRadius: 8, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 2}, shadowOpacity: 0.1, shadowRadius: 4, elevation: 3, }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: 12, color: '#333', }, inputRow: { marginBottom: 12, }, label: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', marginBottom: 4, color: '#555', }, input: { borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#ddd', borderRadius: 6, padding: 12, fontSize: 16, backgroundColor: '#fafafa', }, buttonGroup: { flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 8, }, typeButton: { paddingHorizontal: 12, paddingVertical: 8, borderRadius: 6, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#ddd', backgroundColor: '#f9f9f9', }, typeButtonActive: { backgroundColor: '#007AFF', borderColor: '#007AFF', }, typeButtonText: { fontSize: 14, color: '#333', }, typeButtonTextActive: { color: 'white', }, buttonRow: { flexDirection: 'row', gap: 8, marginTop: 8, }, button: { flex: 1, paddingVertical: 12, paddingHorizontal: 16, borderRadius: 6, alignItems: 'center', }, primaryButton: { backgroundColor: '#007AFF', }, secondaryButton: { backgroundColor: '#34C759', }, tertiaryButton: { backgroundColor: '#FF9500', }, buttonText: { color: 'white', fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', }, quickResult: { marginTop: 12, padding: 12, backgroundColor: '#e8f5e8', borderRadius: 6, }, quickResultTitle: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', color: '#2d5a2d', marginBottom: 4, }, quickResultText: { fontSize: 14, color: '#2d5a2d', }, resultsHeader: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 12, }, clearButton: { paddingHorizontal: 12, paddingVertical: 6, backgroundColor: '#FF3B30', borderRadius: 4, }, clearButtonText: { color: 'white', fontSize: 12, fontWeight: '600', }, resultsContainer: { maxHeight: 300, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#ddd', borderRadius: 6, padding: 12, backgroundColor: '#fafafa', }, resultsText: { fontSize: 12, fontFamily: 'monospace', color: '#333', }, })

src/components/debug/KycUploaderTester.tsx

KycUploaderTester
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { // Form states const [leadId, setLeadId] = useState('LEAD-123'); const [customerId, setCustomerId] = useState('CUST-001'); const [docType, setDocType] = useState<KycDocumentType>('PAN'); const [fileName, setFileName] = useState('test-document.pdf'); const [fileSize, setFileSize] = useState('1024'); // Size in KB const [mimeType, setMimeType] = useState('application/pdf'); // Upload state const [isUploading, setIsUploading] = useState(false); const [uploadProgress, setUploadProgress] = useState(0); const [uploadError, setUploadError] = useState<string | null>(null); const [uploadResult, setUploadResult] = useState<any>(null); // Results const [results, setResults] = useState<string>(''); // User info const newAuth = useAppSelector(selectNewAuth); const user = newAuth?.user; const addResult = (title: string, data: any) => { const timestamp = new Date().toLocaleTimeString(); const result = `\n[${timestamp}] ${title}:\n${JSON.stringify( data, null, 2 )}\n${'='.repeat(50)}`; setResults(prev => prev + result); }; const createMockFile = ( name: string, type: string, sizeKB: number ): RNFile => ({ uri: `file:///mock/${name}`, name, type, size: sizeKB * 1024, // Convert KB to bytes }); const resetUploadState = () => { setIsUploading(false); setUploadProgress(0); setUploadError(null); setUploadResult(null); }; const handleCompleteUpload = async () => { const file = createMockFile(fileName, mimeType, parseInt(fileSize)); resetUploadState(); setIsUploading(true); try { addResult('🚀 Starting Complete KYC Upload', { leadId, docType, file, currentUser: user?.id, }); const result = await uploadKycDocument({ leadId, customerId, docType, file, onProgress: percentage => { setUploadProgress(percentage); console.log(`Upload progress: ${percentage}%`); }, store, onInvalidate: invalidatedLeadId => { addResult('🔄 Cache Invalidated', { leadId: invalidatedLeadId, timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }); }, }); setUploadResult(result); addResult('✅ Complete KYC Upload Success', { result, finalProgress: uploadProgress, }); Alert.alert( 'Success', `Upload completed!\n\nBlob: ${result.blobName}\nURL: ${result.url}` ); } catch (error) { const kycError = error as KycUploadError; setUploadError(kycError.message); addResult('❌ Complete KYC Upload Error', { error: kycError.message, step: kycError.step, originalError: kycError.originalError?.message, }); Alert.alert( 'Error', `Upload failed at ${kycError.step}:\n${kycError.message}` ); } finally { setIsUploading(false); } }; const handleTestLargeImage = async () => { // Test with large image that should be compressed const largeImage = createMockFile( 'large-photo.jpg', 'image/jpeg', 8 * 1024 ); // 8MB resetUploadState(); setIsUploading(true); try { addResult('🖼️ Starting Large Image Upload (with compression)', { leadId, docType, file: largeImage, shouldCompress: true, }); const result = await uploadKycDocument({ leadId, customerId, docType, file: largeImage, onProgress: setUploadProgress, store, }); setUploadResult(result); addResult('✅ Large Image Upload Success', { result, originalSize: largeImage.size, compressionApplied: true, }); Alert.alert('Success', 'Large image upload with compression completed!'); } catch (error) { const kycError = error as KycUploadError; setUploadError(kycError.message); addResult('❌ Large Image Upload Error', { error: kycError.message, step: kycError.step, }); Alert.alert('Error', `Large image upload failed: ${kycError.message}`); } finally { setIsUploading(false); } }; const handleTestGifRejection = async () => { // Test with GIF file that should be rejected const gifFile = createMockFile('animation.gif', 'image/gif', 100); resetUploadState(); setIsUploading(true); try { addResult('🚫 Testing GIF File Rejection', { leadId, docType, file: gifFile, expectedResult: 'Should be rejected', }); await uploadKycDocument({ leadId, customerId, docType, file: gifFile, store, }); // Should not reach here Alert.alert('Unexpected', 'GIF file was not rejected!'); } catch (error) { const kycError = error as KycUploadError; setUploadError(kycError.message); addResult('✅ GIF File Correctly Rejected', { error: kycError.message, step: kycError.step, expectedBehavior: 'Validation should reject unsupported MIME types', }); Alert.alert( 'Expected Result', `GIF file correctly rejected:\n${kycError.message}` ); } finally { setIsUploading(false); } }; const handleTestDocumentLimit = async () => { // Test with lead that has reached document limit const file = createMockFile('test.pdf', 'application/pdf', 100); resetUploadState(); setIsUploading(true); try { addResult('📊 Testing Document Limit', { leadId: 'LEAD-LIMIT-TEST', docType, file, expectedResult: 'Should be rejected if limit reached', }); await uploadKycDocument({ leadId: 'LEAD-LIMIT-TEST', customerId, docType, file, store, }); setUploadResult({blobName: 'success', url: 'success'}); addResult('✅ Document Limit Test - Upload Succeeded', { result: 'Under limit, upload allowed', }); Alert.alert('Success', 'Document limit test passed - upload allowed'); } catch (error) { const kycError = error as KycUploadError; setUploadError(kycError.message); addResult('📊 Document Limit Test - Upload Rejected', { error: kycError.message, step: kycError.step, reason: 'Document limit reached', }); Alert.alert( 'Expected Result', `Document limit reached:\n${kycError.message}` ); } finally { setIsUploading(false); } }; const clearResults = () => { setResults(''); resetUploadState(); }; return ( <ScrollView style={styles.container}> <Text style={styles.title}>KYC Upload Orchestrator Tester</Text> {/* User Info */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Current User</Text> <Text style={styles.userInfo}>ID: {user?.id || 'Not logged in'}</Text> <Text style={styles.userInfo}>Role: {user?.role || 'Unknown'}</Text> </View> {/* Upload Configuration */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Upload Configuration</Text> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Lead ID:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={leadId} onChangeText={setLeadId} placeholder="LEAD-123" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Document Type:</Text> <View style={styles.buttonGroup}> {(['PAN', 'Aadhaar', 'VoterID', 'DrivingLicense'] as const).map( type => ( <TouchableOpacity key={type} style={[ styles.typeButton, docType === type && styles.typeButtonActive, ]} onPress={() => setDocType(type)} > <Text style={[ styles.typeButtonText, docType === type && styles.typeButtonTextActive, ]} > {type} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> ) )} </View> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>File Name:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={fileName} onChangeText={setFileName} placeholder="test-document.pdf" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>File Size (KB):</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={fileSize} onChangeText={setFileSize} keyboardType="numeric" placeholder="1024" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>MIME Type:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={mimeType} onChangeText={setMimeType} placeholder="application/pdf" /> </View> </View> {/* Upload Tests */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Upload Tests</Text> <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.button, styles.primaryButton, isUploading && styles.disabledButton, ]} onPress={handleCompleteUpload} disabled={isUploading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Complete Upload Test</Text> </TouchableOpacity> <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.button, styles.secondaryButton, isUploading && styles.disabledButton, ]} onPress={handleTestLargeImage} disabled={isUploading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Large Image Test (8MB JPG)</Text> </TouchableOpacity> <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.button, styles.warningButton, isUploading && styles.disabledButton, ]} onPress={handleTestGifRejection} disabled={isUploading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>GIF Rejection Test</Text> </TouchableOpacity> <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.button, styles.infoButton, isUploading && styles.disabledButton, ]} onPress={handleTestDocumentLimit} disabled={isUploading} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Document Limit Test</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {/* Upload Status */} {(isUploading || uploadProgress > 0 || uploadError || uploadResult) && ( <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Upload Status</Text> {isUploading && ( <View style={styles.statusRow}> <Text style={styles.statusLabel}>Status:</Text> <Text style={styles.statusValue}>Uploading...</Text> </View> )} <View style={styles.statusRow}> <Text style={styles.statusLabel}>Progress:</Text> <Text style={styles.statusValue}>{uploadProgress}%</Text> </View> <View style={styles.progressBar}> <View style={[styles.progressFill, {width: `${uploadProgress}%`}]} /> </View> {uploadResult && ( <View style={styles.resultContainer}> <Text style={styles.resultTitle}>Upload Result:</Text> <Text style={styles.resultText}> Blob: {uploadResult.blobName} </Text> <Text style={styles.resultText}>URL: {uploadResult.url}</Text> </View> )} {uploadError && ( <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <Text style={styles.errorText}>Error: {uploadError}</Text> </View> )} </View> )} {/* Results */} <View style={styles.section}> <View style={styles.resultsHeader}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Results</Text> <TouchableOpacity style={styles.clearButton} onPress={clearResults}> <Text style={styles.clearButtonText}>Clear</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> <ScrollView style={styles.resultsContainer}> <Text style={styles.resultsText}> {results || 'No results yet...'} </Text> </ScrollView> </View> </ScrollView> ); }
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, padding: 16, backgroundColor: '#f5f5f5', }, title: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: 20, color: '#333', }, section: { backgroundColor: 'white', padding: 16, marginBottom: 16, borderRadius: 8, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 2}, shadowOpacity: 0.1, shadowRadius: 4, elevation: 3, }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: 12, color: '#333', }, userInfo: { fontSize: 14, color: '#666', marginBottom: 4, }, inputRow: { marginBottom: 12, }, label: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', marginBottom: 4, color: '#555', }, input: { borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#ddd', borderRadius: 6, padding: 12, fontSize: 16, backgroundColor: '#fafafa', }, buttonGroup: { flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 8, }, typeButton: { paddingHorizontal: 12, paddingVertical: 8, borderRadius: 6, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#ddd', backgroundColor: '#f9f9f9', }, backgroundColor: '#FF9500', }, infoButton: { backgroundColor: '#64D2FF', }, disabledButton: { backgroundColor: '#C7C7CC', }, buttonText: { color: 'white', fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', }, statusRow: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginBottom: 8, }, statusLabel: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', color: '#555', }, statusValue: { fontSize: 14, color: '#333', }, progressBar: { height: 8, backgroundColor: '#E5E5EA', borderRadius: 4, marginBottom: 12, overflow: 'hidden', }, progressFill: { height: '100%', backgroundColor: '#007AFF', borderRadius: 4, }, resultContainer: { backgroundColor: '#E8F5E8', padding: 12, borderRadius: 6, marginBottom: 8, }, resultTitle: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', color: '#2D5A2D', marginBottom: 4, }, resultText: { fontSize: 12, color: '#2D5A2D', fontFamily: 'monospace', }, errorContainer: { backgroundColor: '#FFEBEE', padding: 12, borderRadius: 6, borderLeftWidth: 3, borderLeftColor: '#FF3B30', }, errorText: { color: '#C62828', fontSize: 14, }, resultsHeader: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 12, }, clearButton: { paddingHorizontal: 12, paddingVertical: 6, backgroundColor: '#FF3B30', borderRadius: 4, }, clearButtonText: { color: 'white', fontSize: 12, fontWeight: '600', }, resultsContainer: { maxHeight: 300, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#ddd', borderRadius: 6, padding: 12, backgroundColor: '#fafafa', }, resultsText: { fontSize: 12, fontFamily: 'monospace', color: '#333', }, })

src/components/debug/KycValidationTester.tsx

KycValidationTester
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { // Form states const [leadId, setLeadId] = useState('LEAD-123'); const [customerId, setCustomerId] = useState('CUST-001'); const [fileName, setFileName] = useState('document.pdf'); const [mimeType, setMimeType] = useState('application/pdf'); const [fileSize, setFileSize] = useState('5120'); // 5MB in KB const [testMimeType, setTestMimeType] = useState('image/jpeg'); // Results const [results, setResults] = useState<string>(''); const addResult = (title: string, data: any) => { const timestamp = new Date().toLocaleTimeString(); const result = `\n[${timestamp}] ${title}:\n${JSON.stringify( data, null, 2 )}\n${'='.repeat(50)}`; setResults(prev => prev + result); }; const handleValidateMimeType = () => { try { validateMimeType(testMimeType); addResult('✅ MIME Type Validation Success', { mimeType: testMimeType, result: 'Valid', }); Alert.alert('Success', `MIME type ${testMimeType} is valid!`); } catch (error) { const validationError = error as ValidationError; addResult('❌ MIME Type Validation Error', { mimeType: testMimeType, error: validationError.message, code: validationError.code, }); Alert.alert('Error', validationError.message); } }; const handleValidateDocCount = async () => { try { await validateDocCountForLead(leadId); addResult('✅ Document Count Validation Success', { leadId, result: 'Count is within limit', }); Alert.alert('Success', 'Document count is within limit!'); } catch (error) { const validationError = error as ValidationError; addResult('❌ Document Count Validation Error', { leadId, error: validationError.message, code: validationError.code, }); Alert.alert('Error', validationError.message); } }; const handleValidateKycDocument = async () => { const file: RNFile = { uri: `file:///path/to/${fileName}`, name: fileName, type: mimeType, size: parseInt(fileSize) * 1024, // Convert KB to bytes }; try { await validateKycDocument(file, customerId, leadId); addResult('✅ Complete KYC Document Validation Success', { leadId, file, result: 'All validations passed', }); Alert.alert('Success', 'All KYC document validations passed!'); } catch (error) { const validationError = error as ValidationError; addResult('❌ Complete KYC Document Validation Error', { leadId, customerId, file, error: validationError.message, code: validationError.code, field: validationError.field, value: validationError.value, }); Alert.alert('Error', validationError.message); } }; const handleUtilityFunctions = () => { const utilities = { supportedMimeTypes: getSupportedKycMimeTypes(), maxDocumentCount: getMaxDocumentCount(), mimeTypeChecks: { 'image/jpeg': isSupportedKycMimeType('image/jpeg'), 'image/gif': isSupportedKycMimeType('image/gif'), 'application/pdf': isSupportedKycMimeType('application/pdf'), 'text/plain': isSupportedKycMimeType('text/plain'), }, }; addResult('📋 Utility Functions Results', utilities); }; const clearResults = () => { setResults(''); }; return ( <ScrollView style={styles.container}> <Text style={styles.title}>KYC Validation Manual Tester</Text> {/* MIME Type Validation */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>1. MIME Type Validation</Text> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>MIME Type:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={testMimeType} onChangeText={setTestMimeType} placeholder="image/jpeg" /> </View> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.primaryButton]} onPress={handleValidateMimeType} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Validate MIME Type</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {/* Document Count Validation */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>2. Document Count Validation</Text> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Lead ID:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={leadId} onChangeText={setLeadId} placeholder="LEAD-123" /> </View> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.primaryButton]} onPress={handleValidateDocCount} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Validate Document Count</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {/* Complete KYC Document Validation */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}> 3. Complete KYC Document Validation </Text> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Customer ID:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={customerId} onChangeText={setCustomerId} placeholder="CUST-001" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>Lead ID:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={leadId} onChangeText={setLeadId} placeholder="LEAD-123" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>File Name:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={fileName} onChangeText={setFileName} placeholder="document.pdf" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>MIME Type:</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={mimeType} onChangeText={setMimeType} placeholder="application/pdf" /> </View> <View style={styles.inputRow}> <Text style={styles.label}>File Size (KB):</Text> <TextInput style={styles.input} value={fileSize} onChangeText={setFileSize} placeholder="5120" keyboardType="numeric" /> </View> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.primaryButton]} onPress={handleValidateKycDocument} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Complete Validation</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {/* Utility Functions */} <View style={styles.section}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>4. Utility Functions</Text> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.button, styles.secondaryButton]} onPress={handleUtilityFunctions} > <Text style={styles.buttonText}>Test Utility Functions</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {/* Results */} <View style={styles.section}> <View style={styles.resultsHeader}> <Text style={styles.sectionTitle}>Results</Text> <TouchableOpacity style={styles.clearButton} onPress={clearResults}> <Text style={styles.clearButtonText}>Clear</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> <ScrollView style={styles.resultsContainer}> <Text style={styles.resultsText}> {results || 'No results yet...'} </Text> </ScrollView> </View> </ScrollView> ); }
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, padding: 16, backgroundColor: '#f5f5f5', }, title: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: 20, color: '#333', }, section: { backgroundColor: 'white', padding: 16, marginBottom: 16, borderRadius: 8, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 2}, shadowOpacity: 0.1, shadowRadius: 4, elevation: 3, }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: 12, color: '#333', }, inputRow: { marginBottom: 12, }, label: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', marginBottom: 4, color: '#555', }, input: { borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#ddd', borderRadius: 6, padding: 12, fontSize: 16, backgroundColor: '#fafafa', }, button: { paddingVertical: 12, paddingHorizontal: 16, borderRadius: 6, alignItems: 'center', marginTop: 8, }, primaryButton: { backgroundColor: '#007AFF', }, secondaryButton: { backgroundColor: '#34C759', }, buttonText: { color: 'white', fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', }, resultsHeader: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 12, }, clearButton: { paddingHorizontal: 12, paddingVertical: 6, backgroundColor: '#FF3B30', borderRadius: 4, }, clearButtonText: { color: 'white', fontSize: 12, fontWeight: '600', }, resultsContainer: { maxHeight: 300, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#ddd', borderRadius: 6, padding: 12, backgroundColor: '#fafafa', }, resultsText: { fontSize: 12, fontFamily: 'monospace', color: '#333', }, })

src/api/endpoints/leads.ts

leadsApi
Default value : createApi({ reducerPath: 'leadsApi', baseQuery, tagTypes: ['Lead', 'LeadsList'], endpoints: builder => ({ /** * Get leads with filters */ getLeads: builder.query<PaginatedResponse<Lead>, GetLeadsRequest>({ query: (params = {}) => { const {page = 1, limit = 20, ...filters} = params; return { url: 'leads', params: {page, limit, ...filters}, }; }, // ✅ Custom transformResponse that maps API structure to PaginatedResponse transformResponse: (response: any): PaginatedResponse<Lead> => { // Handle the standard {success, data} structure first let apiData; if (response.success && response.data) { apiData = response.data; } else { throw new Error('Invalid leads response format'); } // Transform to match PaginatedResponse interface return { data: apiData.items || [], // Extract items array pagination: { page: Math.floor(apiData.offset / apiData.limit) + 1, limit: apiData.limit, total: apiData.total, totalPages: Math.ceil(apiData.total / apiData.limit), hasNext: apiData.offset + apiData.limit < apiData.total, hasPrev: apiData.offset > 0, }, }; }, transformErrorResponse: transformLeadError, providesTags: result => [ ...provideTags('Lead', result?.data), {type: 'LeadsList' as const, id: 'LIST'}, ], }), /** * Get leads for the current customer * Returns up to 100 leads for the authenticated customer */ getCustomerLeads: builder.query<Lead[], void>({ query: () => { const params = { limit: 100, sortBy: 'updatedAt', sortOrder: 'desc', }; // Validate payload size (should be small for query params) if (isPayloadTooLarge(params, 1)) { // 1KB limit for query params throw new Error('Query parameters too large'); } return { url: 'leads', params, }; }, transformResponse: (response: any) => { // Handle the actual API response structure let leads: Lead[] = []; if (response.success && response.data && response.data.items) { // API returns: { success: true, data: { items: [...], total, offset, limit } } leads = response.data.items; } else if (response.data && Array.isArray(response.data)) { // Fallback: direct array response leads = response.data; } else if (Array.isArray(response)) { // Fallback: direct array leads = response; } // Transform API response to match our Lead interface const transformedLeads = leads.map((lead: any) => ({ ...lead, id: lead.leadId || lead.id, // Map leadId to id customerId: lead.customerId || `CUST-${lead.phone?.slice(-4)}`, // Generate if missing customer: lead.customer || { id: lead.customerId || `CUST-${lead.phone?.slice(-4)}`, name: lead.customerName, phone: lead.phone, }, })); // Client-side enforcement of 100 item limit return transformedLeads.slice(0, 100); }, transformErrorResponse: transformLeadError, providesTags: result => [ ...provideTags('Lead', result), {type: 'LeadsList' as const, id: 'CUSTOMER'}, ], }), /** * Get lead by ID */ getLeadById: builder.query<Lead, string>({ query: leadId => `leads/${leadId}`, transformResponse: transformResponse<Lead>, transformErrorResponse: transformLeadError, providesTags: (result, error, leadId) => [ {type: 'Lead' as const, id: leadId}, ], }), /** * Create new lead - Real API implementation */ createLead: builder.mutation<Lead, CreateLeadRequest>({ query: data => ({ url: 'leads', method: 'POST', body: data, }), transformResponse: (response: LeadResponse) => { // Handle backend response format if (response.success && response.data) { return response.data; } // Direct Lead object response return response.data as Lead; }, transformErrorResponse: transformLeadError, invalidatesTags: [ {type: 'LeadsList' as const, id: 'LIST'}, {type: 'LeadsList' as const, id: 'CUSTOMER'}, ], onQueryStarted: async (payload, {queryFulfilled}) => { try { // Client-side payload size validation if (isPayloadTooLarge(payload, 100)) { const actualSize = calculatePayloadSize(payload); const validationError: ValidationError = { status: 400, message: 'Request payload too large', errors: { payload: [ `Payload size ${Math.round( actualSize / 1024 )}KB exceeds 100KB limit`, ], }, }; console.warn('[CreateLead] Payload too large:', { size: `${Math.round(actualSize / 1024)}KB`, limit: '100KB', payload: `${JSON.stringify(payload).substring(0, 200)}...`, }); throw new ServiceFetchError( validationError.message, 'CREATE_LEAD', 'PAYLOAD_TOO_LARGE', {httpStatus: 400} ); } // Wait for the query to complete await queryFulfilled; } catch (error) { // Error handling is done by transformErrorResponse console.error('[CreateLead] Mutation failed:', error); } }, }), }), })

Leads API Definition
transformLeadError
Default value : (error: any): ServiceFetchError => { // Check for validation errors if (isValidationError(error)) { const fieldErrors = Object.entries(error.errors) .map(([field, messages]) => `${field}: ${messages.join(', ')}`) .join('; '); return new ServiceFetchError( `Validation failed: ${fieldErrors}`, 'LEAD_VALIDATION', 'VALIDATION_ERROR', {httpStatus: error.status} ); } // Check for server errors if (isServerError(error)) { return new ServiceFetchError( error.message, 'LEAD_SERVER_ERROR', 'SERVER_ERROR', {httpStatus: error.status} ); } // Check for API error responses if (isApiErrorResponse(error)) { return new ServiceFetchError(error.error, 'LEAD_API_ERROR', 'API_ERROR', { httpStatus: 500, }); } // Fallback to standard error transformation const baseError = transformError(error); return new ServiceFetchError( baseError.message, 'LEAD_UNKNOWN_ERROR', 'UNKNOWN_ERROR', {httpStatus: baseError.code} ); }

Enhanced error transformation for leads API
Default value : leadsApi

src/components/debug/LeadsDebugger.tsx

LeadsDebugger
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const [testResults, setTestResults] = useState<string>(''); // Manual trigger instead of automatic const [triggerQuery, {data, isLoading, error}] = leadsApi.useLazyGetCustomerLeadsQuery(); const testCustomerLeads = async () => { try { setTestResults('Testing customer leads API...\n'); const result = await triggerQuery().unwrap(); setTestResults( prev => `${prev}✅ Success!\n` + `📊 Leads found: ${result.length}\n` + `📋 First lead: ${JSON.stringify(result[0], null, 2)}\n` ); } catch (error: any) { console.error('[LeadsDebugger] Query error:', error); setTestResults( prev => `${prev}❌ ERROR!\n` + `🔢 Status: ${error.status || 'Unknown'}\n` + `📝 Message: ${ error.data?.message || error.message || 'Unknown error' }\n` + `🧾 Full error: ${JSON.stringify(error, null, 2)}\n\n` ); } }; return ( <View style={{padding: 20, backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}}> <Text style={{fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: 10}}> Customer Leads API Debugger </Text> <TouchableOpacity onPress={testCustomerLeads} style={{ backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, padding: 15, borderRadius: 8, marginBottom: 20, }} disabled={isLoading} > <Text style={{color: 'white', textAlign: 'center'}}> {isLoading ? 'Testing...' : 'Test Customer Leads API'} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> <ScrollView style={{maxHeight: 400}}> <Text style={{fontFamily: 'monospace', fontSize: 12}}> {testResults || 'Click "Test Customer Leads API" to run test'} </Text> </ScrollView> </View> ); }

src/components/common/LoadingOverlayContainer/LoadingOverlayContainer.tsx

LoadingOverlayContainer
Type : React.FC<LoadingOverlayContainerProps>
Default value : ({ visible, message, mode = 'fullscreen', dismissible = false, onDismiss, backgroundColor, spinnerColor = '#007AFF', testID, accessibilityLabel, }) => { // Overlay styles const overlayStyles = useMemo( () => [ mode === 'fullscreen' ? styles.fullscreenOverlay : styles.localOverlay, backgroundColor && {backgroundColor}, ], [mode, backgroundColor] ); // Content styles const contentStyles = useMemo( () => [styles.content, mode === 'local' && styles.localContent], [mode] ); // Message styles const messageStyles = useMemo( () => [styles.message, mode === 'local' && styles.localMessage], [mode] ); // Handle dismiss const handleDismiss = () => { if (dismissible && onDismiss) { onDismiss(); } }; // Render content const renderContent = () => ( <View style={contentStyles}> <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={spinnerColor} style={styles.spinner} /> {message && <Text style={messageStyles}>{message}</Text>} </View> ); if (!visible) { return null; } if (mode === 'fullscreen') { return ( <Modal visible={visible} transparent animationType="fade" onRequestClose={handleDismiss} > <TouchableOpacity style={overlayStyles} activeOpacity={1} onPress={dismissible ? handleDismiss : undefined} testID={testID} accessibilityLabel={accessibilityLabel || 'Loading'} accessibilityRole="progressbar" > <TouchableOpacity activeOpacity={1}> {renderContent()} </TouchableOpacity> </TouchableOpacity> </Modal> ); } // Local overlay return ( <View style={overlayStyles} testID={testID} accessibilityLabel={accessibilityLabel || 'Loading'} accessibilityRole="progressbar" > {renderContent()} </View> ); }

src/components/common/LoadingSpinner/LoadingSpinner.tsx

LoadingSpinner
Type : React.FC<LoadingSpinnerProps>
Default value : ({ size = 'medium', color = '#007AFF', text, overlay = false, style, testID, accessibilityLabel, }) => { // Container styles const containerStyles = useMemo( () => [styles.container, styles[size], overlay && styles.overlay, style], [size, overlay, style] ); // Spinner size const spinnerSize = useMemo(() => { switch (size) { case 'small': return 'small'; case 'large': return 'large'; default: return 'small'; } }, [size]); return ( <View style={containerStyles} testID={testID} accessibilityLabel={accessibilityLabel || 'Loading'} accessibilityRole="progressbar" > <ActivityIndicator size={spinnerSize} color={color} style={styles.spinner} /> {text && <Text style={styles.text}>{text}</Text>} </View> ); }
