src/components/debug/NotificationsTester.tsx

mockNotifications
Type : Notification[]
Default value : [ { id: 'TEST-001', title: 'Test Notification 1', message: 'This is a test notification message', type: 'user', severity: 'info', read: false, createdAt: new Date().toISOString(), metadata: {priority: 'medium', source: 'mock'}, }, { id: 'TEST-002', title: 'Test Notification 2', message: 'Another test notification', type: 'announcement', severity: 'warning', read: false, createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - 60000).toISOString(), // 1 minute ago metadata: {priority: 'high', source: 'mock'}, }, { id: 'TEST-003', title: 'Test Notification 3', message: 'Third test notification', type: 'system', severity: 'error', read: false, createdAt: new Date(Date.now() - 300000).toISOString(), // 5 minutes ago metadata: {priority: 'low', source: 'mock'}, }, ]

Mock notification data for testing
NotificationsTester
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); // Redux state const notifications = useAppSelector(selectNotifications); const unreadCount = useAppSelector(selectUnreadCount); const isPolling = useAppSelector(selectIsPolling); const lastFetched = useAppSelector(selectLastFetched); const pollError = useAppSelector(selectPollError); // API hooks const { data: apiData, error: apiError, isLoading: isApiLoading, isFetching: isApiFetching, } = useGetNotificationsQuery( {page: 1, limit: 20, sortBy: 'createdAt', sortOrder: 'desc'}, {pollingInterval: 0} // Disable automatic polling here, we'll use our custom hook ); const [triggerLazyQuery] = useLazyGetNotificationsQuery(); // Refresh control const { refreshNotifications, canRefreshNotifications, refreshAll, isRefreshing, } = useRefreshControl(); // Notification polling const { isPolling: isCustomPolling, lastPollAt, nextPollAt, pollCount, startPolling, stopPolling, pollNow, } = useNotificationPolling({ enabled: true, startImmediately: false, // Manual start for testing }); // App state tracking const [appState, setAppState] = useState<AppStateStatus>( AppState.currentState ); /** * App state change handler */ const handleAppStateChange = useCallback( (nextAppState: AppStateStatus) => { console.log( '[NotificationsTester] App state changed:', appState, '->', nextAppState ); setAppState(nextAppState); }, [appState] ); /** * Setup app state listener */ useEffect(() => { const subscription = AppState.addEventListener( 'change', handleAppStateChange ); return () => subscription?.remove(); }, [handleAppStateChange]); /** * Log component mount */ useEffect(() => { console.log('=== NotificationsTester Mounted ==='); console.log('Initial Redux state:', { notificationsCount: notifications.length, unreadCount, isPolling, lastFetched: lastFetched ? new Date(lastFetched).toISOString() : null, }); return () => { console.log('=== NotificationsTester Unmounted ==='); }; }, []); /** * Log Redux state changes */ useEffect(() => { console.log('[NotificationsTester] Redux state changed:', { notificationsCount: notifications.length, unreadCount, isPolling, lastFetched: lastFetched ? new Date(lastFetched).toISOString() : null, pollError, }); }, [notifications.length, unreadCount, isPolling, lastFetched, pollError]); /** * Log API state changes */ useEffect(() => { console.log('[NotificationsTester] API state changed:', { isLoading: isApiLoading, isFetching: isApiFetching, hasData: !!apiData, dataCount: apiData?.length || 0, hasError: !!apiError, errorMessage: apiError ? String(apiError) : null, }); }, [isApiLoading, isApiFetching, apiData, apiError]); /** * Log polling state changes */ useEffect(() => { console.log('[NotificationsTester] Polling state changed:', { isCustomPolling, lastPollAt: lastPollAt ? new Date(lastPollAt).toISOString() : null, nextPollAt: nextPollAt ? new Date(nextPollAt).toISOString() : null, pollCount, }); }, [isCustomPolling, lastPollAt, nextPollAt, pollCount]); /** * Test Redux slice operations */ const testSliceOperations = useCallback(() => { console.log('\n=== Testing Redux Slice Operations ==='); // Test setNotifications console.log('[SliceTest] Setting mock notifications...'); dispatch(setNotifications(mockNotifications)); setTimeout(() => { console.log('[SliceTest] Marking first notification as read...'); dispatch(markAsRead('TEST-001')); setTimeout(() => { console.log('[SliceTest] Marking all notifications as read...'); dispatch(markAllAsRead()); setTimeout(() => { console.log('[SliceTest] Clearing all notifications...'); dispatch(clearNotifications()); }, 2000); }, 2000); }, 2000); }, [dispatch]); /** * Test API calls */ const testApiCalls = useCallback(async () => { console.log('\n=== Testing API Calls ==='); try { console.log('[APITest] Triggering lazy query...'); const result = await triggerLazyQuery({ page: 1, limit: 10, sortBy: 'createdAt', sortOrder: 'desc', }).unwrap(); console.log('[APITest] Lazy query result:', result); // Add to Redux state dispatch(setNotifications(result)); } catch (error) { console.error('[APITest] Lazy query error:', error); } }, [triggerLazyQuery, dispatch]); /** * Test refresh control */ const testRefreshControl = useCallback(async () => { console.log('\n=== Testing Refresh Control ==='); // Check if we can refresh const canRefresh = canRefreshNotifications(); console.log('[RefreshTest] Can refresh notifications:', canRefresh); if (!canRefresh) { const lastRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.NOTIFICATIONS ); const timeSinceLastRefresh = lastRefresh ? (Date.now() - lastRefresh) / 1000 : 0; console.log( '[RefreshTest] Last refresh was', timeSinceLastRefresh, 'seconds ago' ); console.log( '[RefreshTest] Debounce window:', DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.NOTIFICATIONS, 'seconds' ); Alert.alert( 'Refresh Blocked', `Please wait ${ DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.NOTIFICATIONS - Math.floor(timeSinceLastRefresh) } more seconds` ); return; } try { console.log('[RefreshTest] Calling refreshNotifications...'); const result = await refreshNotifications(); console.log('[RefreshTest] Refresh result:', result); } catch (error) { console.error('[RefreshTest] Refresh error:', error); } }, [refreshNotifications, canRefreshNotifications]); /** * Test global refresh */ const testGlobalRefresh = useCallback(async () => { console.log('\n=== Testing Global Refresh ==='); try { console.log('[GlobalRefreshTest] Calling refreshAll...'); const result = await refreshAll({ includeUserData: true, showLoading: true, }); console.log('[GlobalRefreshTest] Global refresh result:', result); } catch (error) { console.error('[GlobalRefreshTest] Global refresh error:', error); } }, [refreshAll]); /** * Test polling controls */ const testStartPolling = useCallback(() => { console.log('\n=== Testing Polling Start ==='); dispatch(setPollingStatus(true)); startPolling(); }, [startPolling, dispatch]); const testStopPolling = useCallback(() => { console.log('\n=== Testing Polling Stop ==='); dispatch(setPollingStatus(false)); stopPolling(); }, [stopPolling, dispatch]); const testPollNow = useCallback(async () => { console.log('\n=== Testing Poll Now ==='); try { const result = await pollNow(); console.log('[PollTest] Poll now result:', result); } catch (error) { console.error('[PollTest] Poll now error:', error); } }, [pollNow]); /** * Test persistence (simulate app restart) */ const testPersistence = useCallback(() => { console.log('\n=== Testing Persistence ==='); // Add some notifications and mark some as read dispatch(setNotifications(mockNotifications)); dispatch(markAsRead('TEST-001')); dispatch(markAsRead('TEST-002')); console.log( '[PersistenceTest] Added notifications and marked some as read' ); console.log( '[PersistenceTest] Check Redux DevTools to see persisted state' ); Alert.alert( 'Persistence Test', 'Notifications added and some marked as read. Check Redux DevTools, then restart the app to see if state persists.' ); }, [dispatch]); /** * Test error scenarios */ const testErrorScenarios = useCallback(() => { console.log('\n=== Testing Error Scenarios ==='); // Simulate polling error dispatch(setPollError('Test error: Network timeout')); setTimeout(() => { console.log('[ErrorTest] Clearing error...'); dispatch(setPollError(null)); }, 3000); }, [dispatch]); /** * Format timestamp for display */ const formatTimestamp = (timestamp: number | null): string => { if (!timestamp) { return 'Never'; } return new Date(timestamp).toLocaleTimeString(); }; /** * Get debounce status */ const getDebounceStatus = (): string => { const lastRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.NOTIFICATIONS ); if (!lastRefresh) { return 'Ready'; } const timeSinceLastRefresh = (Date.now() - lastRefresh) / 1000; const remainingTime = DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.NOTIFICATIONS - timeSinceLastRefresh; if (remainingTime <= 0) { return 'Ready'; } return `Wait ${Math.ceil(remainingTime)}s`; }; return ( <ScrollView style={{flex: 1, padding: 16}}> <Title>Notifications Debug Tester</Title> {/* Current State */} <Card style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Card.Content> <Title>Current State</Title> <Paragraph> App State: <Chip mode="outlined">{appState}</Chip> </Paragraph> <Paragraph>Notifications Count: {notifications.length}</Paragraph> <Paragraph>Unread Count: {unreadCount}</Paragraph> <Paragraph>Is Polling (Redux): {isPolling ? 'Yes' : 'No'}</Paragraph> <Paragraph> Is Polling (Custom): {isCustomPolling ? 'Yes' : 'No'} </Paragraph> <Paragraph>Last Fetched: {formatTimestamp(lastFetched)}</Paragraph> <Paragraph>Poll Count: {pollCount}</Paragraph> <Paragraph>Last Poll: {formatTimestamp(lastPollAt)}</Paragraph> <Paragraph>Next Poll: {formatTimestamp(nextPollAt)}</Paragraph> <Paragraph>Debounce Status: {getDebounceStatus()}</Paragraph> <Paragraph> Global Refreshing: {isRefreshing ? 'Yes' : 'No'} </Paragraph> {pollError && ( <Paragraph style={{color: 'red'}}>Error: {pollError}</Paragraph> )} </Card.Content> </Card> {/* API State */} <Card style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Card.Content> <Title>API State</Title> <Paragraph>Loading: {isApiLoading ? 'Yes' : 'No'}</Paragraph> <Paragraph>Fetching: {isApiFetching ? 'Yes' : 'No'}</Paragraph> <Paragraph>API Data Count: {apiData?.length || 0}</Paragraph> {apiError && ( <Paragraph style={{color: 'red'}}> API Error: {String(apiError)} </Paragraph> )} </Card.Content> </Card> {/* Notifications List */} <Card style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Card.Content> <Title>Current Notifications</Title> {notifications.length === 0 ? ( <Paragraph>No notifications</Paragraph> ) : ( notifications.map(notification => ( <View key={notification.id} style={{ marginBottom: 8, padding: 8, backgroundColor: '#f5f5f5', }} > <Paragraph> <Text style={{fontWeight: 'bold'}}>{notification.title}</Text> </Paragraph> <Paragraph>{notification.message}</Paragraph> <Paragraph> Type: {notification.type} | Severity: {notification.severity} </Paragraph> <Paragraph> Read: {notification.isRead ? 'Yes' : 'No'} </Paragraph> <Paragraph> Created: {new Date(notification.createdAt).toLocaleString()} </Paragraph> </View> )) )} </Card.Content> </Card> <Divider style={{marginVertical: 16}} /> {/* Test Buttons */} <Title>Test Operations</Title> <View style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Button mode="contained" onPress={testSliceOperations} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > Test Redux Slice Operations </Button> <Button mode="contained" onPress={testApiCalls} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > Test API Calls </Button> <Button mode="contained" onPress={testRefreshControl} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > Test Refresh Control </Button> <Button mode="contained" onPress={testGlobalRefresh} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > Test Global Refresh </Button> </View> <View style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Button mode="outlined" onPress={testStartPolling} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > Start Polling </Button> <Button mode="outlined" onPress={testStopPolling} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > Stop Polling </Button> <Button mode="outlined" onPress={testPollNow} style={{marginBottom: 8}}> Poll Now </Button> </View> <View style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Button mode="outlined" onPress={testPersistence} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > Test Persistence </Button> <Button mode="outlined" onPress={testErrorScenarios} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > Test Error Scenarios </Button> </View> <View style={{marginBottom: 32}}> <Button mode="outlined" onPress={() => dispatch(clearNotifications())}> Clear All Notifications </Button> </View> </ScrollView> ); }

Debug component for testing notifications functionality

src/screens/main/MyRecordsScreen.tsx

MyRecordsScreen
Type : React.FC<Props>
Default value : ({navigation}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); // AC-5.1: Fetch leads with selectFromResult optimization const { data: leads = [], isLoading, isError, error, isFetching, } = useGetCustomerLeadsQuery(undefined, { // Minimize re-renders by selecting only what we need selectFromResult: result => ({ ...result, data: result.data || [], }), }); // AC-5.2: Pull-to-refresh with 60s debounce const {refreshLeads, canRefreshLeads} = useRefreshControl(); /** * Handle pull-to-refresh * Uses unified refresh system + leads-specific 60s debounce */ const handleRefresh = useCallback(async () => { console.log('[MyRecords] Pull to refresh triggered'); try { await refreshLeads(); } catch (error) { console.error('[MyRecords] Refresh error:', error); } }, [refreshLeads]); /** * AC-5.4: Handle lead item press - navigate to LeadDetail */ const handleLeadPress = useCallback( (leadId: string) => { console.log('[MyRecords] Navigating to lead detail:', leadId); navigation.navigate('LeadDetail', {leadId}); }, [navigation] ); /** * FlatList optimizations for performance */ const keyExtractor = useCallback((item: Lead) => item.id, []); const renderLeadItem = useCallback( ({item}: {item: Lead}) => ( <LeadListItem lead={item} onPress={handleLeadPress} testID={`lead-item-${item.id}`} /> ), [handleLeadPress] ); const getItemLayout = useCallback( (_: any, index: number) => ({ length: 120, // Approximate height of LeadListItem offset: 120 * index, index, }), [] ); /** * Memoized empty state component */ const EmptyState = useMemo( () => ( <View style={styles.emptyContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="folder-open" size={64} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} /> <Text style={[styles.emptyTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> No Leads Found </Text> <Text style={[ styles.emptyDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Your service requests will appear here once you create them. </Text> </View> ), [theme] ); /** * Memoized error state component */ const ErrorState = useMemo( () => ( <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={[styles.errorTitle, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> Failed to Load Leads </Text> <Text style={[ styles.errorDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Please pull down to refresh and try again. </Text> </View> ), [theme] ); // AC-5.1: Loading state if (isLoading && leads.length === 0) { return ( <SafeAreaLayout> <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.loadingText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Loading your leads... </Text> </View> </SafeAreaLayout> ); } return ( <SafeAreaLayout> <View style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} > <FlatList data={leads} renderItem={renderLeadItem} keyExtractor={keyExtractor} getItemLayout={getItemLayout} // AC-5.2: Pull-to-refresh integration refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isFetching && canRefreshLeads()} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} /> } // Performance optimizations removeClippedSubviews={true} maxToRenderPerBatch={10} windowSize={10} initialNumToRender={10} // States ListEmptyComponent={isError ? ErrorState : EmptyState} // Styling contentContainerStyle={ leads.length === 0 ? styles.emptyListContainer : undefined } showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} /> </View> </SafeAreaLayout> ); }

My Records Screen Component AC-5.1: Loading → List → Empty states AC-5.2: Pull-to-refresh with unified system + 60s debounce AC-5.4: Row tap navigation to LeadDetail AC-5.5: Auto-update when createLead succeeds
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, loadingContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, loadingText: { fontSize: 16, marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center', }, emptyListContainer: { flexGrow: 1, }, emptyContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, emptyTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, emptyDescription: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 24, }, errorContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, errorTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, errorDescription: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 24, }, })

src/api/endpoints/newAuth.ts

newAuthApi
Default value : createApi({ reducerPath: 'newAuthApi', baseQuery, tagTypes: ['Auth'], endpoints: builder => ({ /** * Login with phone and OTP */ login: builder.mutation<LoginResponse, LoginRequest>({ query: credentials => ({ url: '/auth/login', method: 'POST', body: credentials, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, }), invalidatesTags: ['Auth'], }), /** * Logout user */ logout: builder.mutation<LogoutResponse, void>({ query: () => ({ url: '/auth/logout', method: 'POST', body: {}, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, }), invalidatesTags: ['Auth'], }), }), })

New Auth API using actual endpoints
Default value : newAuthApi

src/store/newPersistConfig.ts

newPersistConfig
Type : object
Default value : { key: 'newRoot', storage: securePersistAdapter, whitelist: [ 'newAuth', // New auth state 'servicesCart', // Shopping cart 'notifications', // Notification state 'tickets', // Ticket state ], blacklist: [ 'auth', // Don't persist old auth 'ui', // Never persist UI state 'checkout', // Ephemeral checkout state 'cache', // Cache is ephemeral 'refresh', // Refresh state is ephemeral 'leadsApi', // Don't persist API cache 'quotationsApi', // Don't persist API cache 'newAuthApi', // Don't persist API cache 'servicesApi', // Don't persist API cache 'kycApi', // Don't persist API cache 'notificationsApi', // Don't persist API cache 'profileApi', // Don't persist API cache 'ticketsApi', // Don't persist API cache ], // No transforms - keep it simple for now transforms: [], }

Simple persist configuration - only auth

src/store/newStore.ts

newPersistor
Default value : persistStore(newStore)

Create persistor
newStore
Default value : configureStore({ reducer: persistedReducer, middleware: getDefaultMiddleware => getDefaultMiddleware({ serializableCheck: { ignoredActions: [FLUSH, REHYDRATE, PAUSE, PERSIST, PURGE, REGISTER], }, }) .concat(newAuthApi.middleware) .concat(servicesApi.middleware) .concat(leadsApi.middleware) .concat(quotationsApi.middleware) .concat(kycApi.middleware) .concat(notificationsApi.middleware) .concat(profileApi.middleware) .concat(ticketsApi.middleware), devTools: __DEV__, })

Configure store
persistedReducer
Default value : persistReducer(newPersistConfig, rootReducer)

Persisted reducer
rootReducer
Default value : combineReducers({ // Data slices newAuth: newAuthReducer, ui: uiReducer, cache: cacheReducer, refresh: refreshReducer, servicesCart: servicesCartReducer, checkout: checkoutReducer, notifications: notificationsReducer, tickets: ticketsReducer, // API slices [newAuthApi.reducerPath]: newAuthApi.reducer, [servicesApi.reducerPath]: servicesApi.reducer, [leadsApi.reducerPath]: leadsApi.reducer, [quotationsApi.reducerPath]: quotationsApi.reducer, [kycApi.reducerPath]: kycApi.reducer, [notificationsApi.reducerPath]: notificationsApi.reducer, [profileApi.reducerPath]: profileApi.reducer, [ticketsApi.reducerPath]: ticketsApi.reducer, })

Root reducer with new auth

src/navigation/NewRootNavigator.tsx

NewRootNavigator
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const {isLoggedIn, isLoading, user, token} = useNewAuth(); const navigationRef = useNavigationContainerRef(); const dispatch = useNewAppDispatch(); const {isPersisting, flush} = usePersistenceStatus(); // Get notifications from RTK Query (MUST be called before any early returns) const {data: notifications = []} = useGetNotificationsQuery(undefined, { selectFromResult: result => ({ ...result, data: result.data || [], }), }); // Populate Redux slice with RTK Query data useEffect(() => { if (notifications.length > 0) { dispatch(setNotifications(notifications)); } }, [notifications, dispatch]); // Get read IDs from Redux slice const readIds = useNewAppSelector( state => state.notifications?.readIds || [] ); // Compute unread count - same complex logic as old RootNavigator const unreadCount = useMemo(() => { const readIdSet = new Set(readIds); return notifications.filter(notification => !readIdSet.has(notification.id)) .length; }, [notifications, readIds]); const handleMarkAllRead = useCallback(async () => { try { console.log('[Navigation] Marking all notifications as read...'); // Get current notification IDs const notificationIds = notifications.map( notification => notification.id ); console.log( '[Navigation] Marking notification IDs as read:', notificationIds ); // Dispatch individual markAsRead actions for each notification notificationIds.forEach(id => dispatch(markAsRead(id))); await flush(); console.log('[Navigation] Mark all read completed with persistence'); } catch (error) { console.error('[Navigation] Mark all read failed:', error); } }, [dispatch, flush, notifications]); // TEMPORARY: For testing the "Mark All Read" functionality - make all notifications unread // TODO: Remove this once testing is complete const handleMakeAllUnread = useCallback(async () => { try { console.log('[Navigation] Making all notifications unread (TESTING)...'); dispatch(clearAllReadIds()); await flush(); console.log('[Navigation] Make all unread completed with persistence'); } catch (error) { console.error('[Navigation] Make all unread failed:', error); } }, [dispatch, flush]); console.log('[NewRootNavigator] Auth state:', { isLoggedIn, isLoading, hasUser: !!user, hasToken: !!token, }); console.log('[NewRootNavigator] Notifications state:', { notificationsCount: notifications.length, readIdsCount: readIds.length, unreadCount, readIds: readIds.slice(0, 3), // Show first 3 for debugging }); // Show loading during auth restoration (AFTER all hooks) if (isLoading) { return <LoadingOverlayContainer visible={true} message="Initializing..." />; } // Navigation handlers const handleNotificationPress = () => { if (navigationRef.current) { navigationRef.current.navigate('Notifications' as never); } }; const handleProfilePress = () => { if (navigationRef.current) { navigationRef.current.navigate('Profile' as never); } }; // Header components const HeaderRight = () => ( <View style={{flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center'}}> <NotificationBellIcon onPress={handleNotificationPress} /> <ProfileIcon onPress={handleProfilePress} /> </View> ); const NotificationHeaderRight = () => ( <View style={{flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center'}}> {/* TEMPORARY: Testing button to make all unread */} {__DEV__ && unreadCount === 0 && ( <Button mode="text" onPress={handleMakeAllUnread} disabled={isPersisting} loading={isPersisting} style={{marginRight: 4}} labelStyle={{fontSize: 10, color: theme.colors.error}} > Unread All </Button> )} {unreadCount > 0 && ( <Button mode="text" onPress={handleMarkAllRead} disabled={isPersisting} loading={isPersisting} style={{marginRight: 8}} labelStyle={{fontSize: 12, color: theme.colors.onPrimary}} > Mark All Read </Button> )} </View> ); return ( <NavigationContainer ref={navigationRef}> <Stack.Navigator screenOptions={{ headerShown: false, cardStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.background, }, }} > {isLoggedIn ? ( // Authenticated Stack <> <Stack.Screen name="Main" component={MainTabNavigator} /> <Stack.Screen name="ServiceDetail" component={ServiceDetailScreen} options={{ headerShown: true, title: 'Service Detail', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> <Stack.Screen name="LeadDetail" component={LeadDetailScreen} options={{ headerShown: true, title: 'Lead Detail', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> <Stack.Screen name="CartCheckout" component={CartCheckoutScreen} options={{ headerShown: true, title: 'Cart Checkout', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> <Stack.Screen name="Notifications" component={NotificationsScreen} options={{ headerShown: true, title: 'Notifications', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerRight: () => <NotificationHeaderRight />, }} /> <Stack.Screen name="Profile" component={ProfileScreen} options={{ headerShown: true, title: 'Profile', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> <Stack.Screen name="TicketThread" component={TicketThreadScreen} options={{ headerShown: true, title: 'Ticket Thread', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> </> ) : ( // Unauthenticated Stack <Stack.Screen name="Auth" component={AuthStack} /> )} </Stack.Navigator> </NavigationContainer> ); }

Root Navigator Component
Stack

src/components/common/NotificationBellIcon/NotificationBellIcon.tsx

NotificationBellIcon
Type : React.FC<NotificationBellIconProps>
Default value : ({ onPress, style, iconSize = 24, badgeSize = 16, }) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); // Get notifications from RTK Query const {data: notifications = []} = useGetNotificationsQuery(undefined, { selectFromResult: result => ({ ...result, data: result.data || [], }), }); // Get read IDs from Redux slice const readIds = useAppSelector(state => state.notifications?.readIds || []); // Compute unread count const unreadCount = useMemo(() => { const readIdSet = new Set(readIds); return notifications.filter(notification => !readIdSet.has(notification.id)) .length; }, [notifications, readIds]); return ( <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.container, style]} onPress={onPress} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="button" accessibilityLabel={`Notifications${ unreadCount > 0 ? `. ${unreadCount} unread` : '' }`} accessibilityHint="Tap to view notifications" > <View style={styles.iconContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="notifications" size={iconSize} color={theme.colors.onPrimary} /> {unreadCount > 0 && ( <Badge size={badgeSize} style={[ styles.badge, { backgroundColor: theme.colors.error, }, ]} visible={true} > {unreadCount > 99 ? '99+' : unreadCount.toString()} </Badge> )} </View> </TouchableOpacity> ); }
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { padding: 8, marginRight: 8, }, iconContainer: { position: 'relative', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', }, badge: { position: 'absolute', top: -8, right: -8, zIndex: 1, fontSize: 12, fontWeight: 'bold', minWidth: 16, minHeight: 16, }, })

src/api/endpoints/notifications.ts

notificationsApi
Default value : createApi({ reducerPath: 'notificationsApi', baseQuery, tagTypes: ['Notification', 'NotificationsList'], endpoints: builder => ({ /** * Get notifications for current user * Uses JWT token from auth state to identify user * * @param params - Optional query parameters for filtering/pagination */ getNotifications: builder.query< Notification[], NotificationsQueryParams | void >({ query: params => { // Handle void case explicitly if (!params) { return { url: 'notifications', params: { page: 1, limit: 20, sortBy: 'createdAt', sortOrder: 'desc', }, }; } // Set default values following API specification const { page = 1, limit = 20, sortBy = 'createdAt', sortOrder = 'desc', ...otherParams } = params; return { url: 'notifications', params: { page, limit, sortBy, sortOrder, ...otherParams, }, }; }, transformResponse: (response: NotificationsApiResponse) => { // Handle the actual API response structure if (response.success && response.data && response.data.notifications) { // API returns: { success: true, data: { notifications: [...], total, unreadCount, ... } } console.log('[NotificationsAPI] Received notifications:', { count: response.data.notifications.length, total: response.data.total, unreadCount: response.data.unreadCount, }); return response.data.notifications; } // Fallback for unexpected response format console.warn( '[NotificationsAPI] Unexpected response format:', response ); return []; }, transformErrorResponse: transformNotificationError, providesTags: result => { if (!result) { return [{type: 'NotificationsList' as const, id: 'LIST'}]; } return [ ...result.map(notification => ({ type: 'Notification' as const, id: notification.id, })), {type: 'NotificationsList' as const, id: 'LIST'}, ]; }, }), /** * Get single notification by ID * Useful for detailed view or refresh of specific notification */ getNotificationById: builder.query<Notification, string>({ query: notificationId => `notifications/${notificationId}`, transformResponse: (response: any) => { // Assuming API returns { success: true, data: { notification: {...} } } if (response.success && response.data && response.data.notification) { return response.data.notification; } throw new Error('Invalid notification response format'); }, transformErrorResponse: transformNotificationError, providesTags: (result, error, notificationId) => [ {type: 'Notification' as const, id: notificationId}, ], }), }), })

Notifications API Definition Follows the same pattern as leadsApi and quotationsApi
transformNotificationError
Default value : (error: any) => { // Check for validation errors if (isValidationError(error)) { const fieldErrors = Object.entries(error.errors) .map(([field, messages]) => `${field}: ${messages.join(', ')}`) .join('; '); return { name: 'ServiceFetchError', message: `Validation failed: ${fieldErrors}`, code: 'VALIDATION_ERROR', operation: 'NOTIFICATION_VALIDATION', httpStatus: error.status, serviceId: undefined, originalError: undefined, }; } // Check for server errors if (isServerError(error)) { return { name: 'ServiceFetchError', message: error.message, code: 'SERVER_ERROR', operation: 'NOTIFICATION_SERVER_ERROR', httpStatus: error.status, serviceId: undefined, originalError: undefined, }; } // Check for API error responses if (isApiErrorResponse(error)) { return { name: 'ServiceFetchError', message: error.error, code: 'API_ERROR', operation: 'NOTIFICATION_API_ERROR', httpStatus: 500, serviceId: undefined, originalError: undefined, }; } // Fallback to standard error transformation const baseError = transformError(error); return { name: 'ServiceFetchError', message: baseError.message, code: 'UNKNOWN_ERROR', operation: 'NOTIFICATION_UNKNOWN_ERROR', httpStatus: baseError.code, serviceId: undefined, originalError: undefined, }; }

Enhanced error transformation for notifications API Returns serializable error objects for Redux state compatibility
Default value : notificationsApi

src/screens/main/NotificationsScreen.tsx

NotificationsScreen
Type : React.FC<Props>
Default value : ({navigation}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); // Fetch notifications from API const { data: apiNotifications = [], isLoading, isError, error, isFetching, refetch, } = useGetNotificationsQuery(undefined, { selectFromResult: result => ({ ...result, data: result.data || [], }), }); // Get read IDs from Redux for computing read status const readIds = useAppSelector(state => state.notifications?.readIds || []); // Compute notifications with read status const notifications = useMemo(() => { const readIdSet = new Set(readIds); return apiNotifications.map(notification => ({ ...notification, isRead: readIdSet.has(notification.id), })); }, [apiNotifications, readIds]); /** * Handle notification item press * Marks notification as read and provides immediate visual feedback * TODO: Add deep-link navigation when metadata structure is finalized */ const handleNotificationPress = useCallback( (notification: Notification) => { console.log('[Notifications] Notification pressed:', { id: notification.id, type: notification.type, title: notification.title, }); // Mark notification as read immediately for optimistic UI dispatch(markAsRead(notification.id)); console.log( '[Notifications] Marked notification as read:', notification.id ); // TODO: Implement deep-link navigation based on notification type and metadata // Will be implemented when metadata structure for leadId, quotationId, etc. is clarified if (notification.type === 'lead' && notification.metadata?.leadId) { navigation.navigate('LeadDetail', { leadId: notification.metadata.leadId, }); } /* else if (notification.type === 'quotation' && notification.metadata?.leadId) { navigation.navigate('LeadDetail', { leadId: notification.metadata.leadId, tab: 'quotes' }); } */ }, [dispatch, navigation] ); /** * Handle pull-to-refresh * TODO: Implement proper refresh with debounce in Sub-task 4 */ const handleRefresh = useCallback(async () => { console.log('[Notifications] Pull to refresh triggered'); try { await refetch(); } catch (error) { console.error('[Notifications] Refresh error:', error); } }, [refetch]); /** * FlatList optimizations for performance */ const keyExtractor = useCallback( (item: Notification & {isRead: boolean}) => item.id, [] ); const renderNotificationItem = useCallback( ({item}: {item: Notification & {isRead: boolean}}) => ( <NotificationListItem notification={item} onPress={handleNotificationPress} testID={`notification-item-${item.id}`} /> ), [handleNotificationPress] ); const getItemLayout = useCallback( (_: any, index: number) => ({ length: 100, // Approximate height of NotificationListItem offset: 100 * index, index, }), [] ); /** * Memoized empty state component */ const EmptyState = useMemo( () => ( <View style={styles.emptyContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="notifications-none" size={64} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} /> <Text style={[styles.emptyTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> No Notifications </Text> <Text style={[ styles.emptyDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > You'll see notifications about your leads, quotations, and other updates here. </Text> </View> ), [theme] ); /** * Memoized error state component */ const ErrorState = useMemo( () => ( <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={[styles.errorTitle, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> Failed to Load Notifications </Text> <Text style={[ styles.errorDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Please pull down to refresh and try again. </Text> </View> ), [theme] ); // Loading state if (isLoading && notifications.length === 0) { return ( <SafeAreaLayout> <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.loadingText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Loading notifications... </Text> </View> </SafeAreaLayout> ); } return ( <SafeAreaLayout> <View style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} > <FlatList data={notifications} renderItem={renderNotificationItem} keyExtractor={keyExtractor} getItemLayout={getItemLayout} // Pull-to-refresh integration refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isFetching} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} /> } // Performance optimizations removeClippedSubviews={true} maxToRenderPerBatch={10} windowSize={10} initialNumToRender={10} // States ListEmptyComponent={isError ? ErrorState : EmptyState} // Styling contentContainerStyle={ notifications.length === 0 ? styles.emptyListContainer : undefined } showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} /> </View> </SafeAreaLayout> ); }

Notifications Screen Component Displays list of notifications with loading, empty, and error states
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, loadingContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, loadingText: { fontSize: 16, marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center', }, emptyListContainer: { flexGrow: 1, }, emptyContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, emptyTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, emptyDescription: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 24, }, errorContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, errorTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, errorDescription: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 24, }, })

src/utils/openConfirmDialog.ts

openConfirmDialog
Default value : ( options: ConfirmDialogOptions ): Promise<boolean> => { const { title, message, confirmText = 'Confirm', cancelText = 'Cancel', destructive = false, } = options; return new Promise<boolean>(resolve => { Alert.alert( title, message, [ { text: cancelText, style: 'cancel', onPress: () => resolve(false), }, { text: confirmText, style: destructive ? 'destructive' : 'default', onPress: () => resolve(true), }, ], { cancelable: true, onDismiss: () => resolve(false), } ); }); }

Open a confirmation dialog and return a Promise

src/types/OTPInput.ts

OTP_INPUT_CONSTANTS
Default value : { DEFAULT_LENGTH: 6, MIN_LENGTH: 4, MAX_LENGTH: 8, DEFAULT_PLACEHOLDER: '○', FILLED_PLACEHOLDER: '●', } as const

OTP Input Constants
OTP_KEY_CODES
Default value : { BACKSPACE: 'Backspace', DELETE: 'Delete', ARROW_LEFT: 'ArrowLeft', ARROW_RIGHT: 'ArrowRight', TAB: 'Tab', ENTER: 'Enter', } as const

Key codes for handling keyboard input

src/components/common/OTPInput/OTPInput.tsx

OTPField
Default value : React.memo<OTPInputFieldProps>( ({ value, index, isFocused, hasError, disabled, secureTextEntry, placeholder, onChangeText, onKeyPress, onFocus, onBlur, inputRef, testID, }) => { const handleChangeText = useCallback( (text: string) => { // Only allow numeric input and single character const numericText = text.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '').slice(-1); onChangeText(numericText, index); }, [index, onChangeText] ); const handleKeyPress = useCallback( (e: any) => { const key = e.nativeEvent.key; onKeyPress(key, index); }, [index, onKeyPress] ); const handleFocus = useCallback(() => { onFocus(index); }, [index, onFocus]); const handleBlur = useCallback(() => { onBlur(index); }, [index, onBlur]); // Memoize styles to prevent unnecessary re-renders const fieldStyle = useMemo( () => [ styles.otpInputField, styles.defaultField, isFocused && styles.focusedField, hasError && styles.errorField, disabled && styles.disabledField, ], [isFocused, hasError, disabled] ); return ( <TextInput ref={inputRef} value={secureTextEntry && value ? '●' : value} onChangeText={handleChangeText} onKeyPress={handleKeyPress} onFocus={handleFocus} onBlur={handleBlur} style={fieldStyle} keyboardType="numeric" maxLength={1} placeholder={placeholder} placeholderTextColor="rgba(0,0,0,0.3)" editable={!disabled} selectTextOnFocus testID={testID ? `${testID}-field-${index}` : undefined} accessibilityLabel={`OTP digit ${index + 1}`} accessibilityHint="Enter a single digit" accessibilityState={{ disabled, selected: isFocused, }} // Disable ALL auto-features that might cause clipboard access autoCorrect={false} autoComplete="off" textContentType="none" // ← Changed from "oneTimeCode" to "none" autoCapitalize="none" spellCheck={false} contextMenuHidden={true} // ← Disable context menu /> ); } )

Individual OTP input field component - Memoized for performance
OTPInput
Type : React.FC<OTPInputProps>
Default value : ({ value = '', onChangeText, onComplete, length = OTP_INPUT_CONSTANTS.DEFAULT_LENGTH, disabled = false, hasError = false, errorMessage, autoFocus = true, secureTextEntry = false, placeholder = OTP_INPUT_CONSTANTS.DEFAULT_PLACEHOLDER, testID = 'otp-input', accessibilityLabel = 'OTP Input', }) => { // State const [focusedIndex, setFocusedIndex] = useState<number>(-1); const [digits, setDigits] = useState<string[]>([]); const [userInitiatedPaste, setUserInitiatedPaste] = useState(false); const pasteTimeoutRef = useRef<any>(null); // Refs for input fields const inputRefs = useRef<Array<React.RefObject<any>>>([]); // Ref to track if completion callback has been called const completionCalledRef = useRef(false); // Ref to track auto-focus state const autoFocusRef = useRef(autoFocus); // Initialize refs array - memoized to prevent re-creation const initializeRefs = useCallback(() => { inputRefs.current = Array(length) .fill(null) .map(() => React.createRef()); }, [length]); useEffect(() => { initializeRefs(); }, [initializeRefs]); // Update digits when value prop changes - optimized useEffect(() => { const newDigits = value.split('').slice(0, length); while (newDigits.length < length) { newDigits.push(''); } // Only update if digits actually changed if (JSON.stringify(newDigits) !== JSON.stringify(digits)) { setDigits(newDigits); // Reset completion flag when value changes externally if (value.length < length) { completionCalledRef.current = false; } } }, [value, length, digits]); // Removed digits dependency to prevent loops // Auto-focus first input on mount - optimized useEffect(() => { if (autoFocusRef.current && inputRefs.current[0]?.current && !disabled) { // Use requestAnimationFrame for better timing requestAnimationFrame(() => { inputRefs.current[0].current?.focus(); }); } }, [disabled]); // Handle paste functionality - only when user initiates const handlePaste = useCallback(async () => { console.log('[OTPInput] User initiated paste'); setUserInitiatedPaste(true); console.log('[OTPInput] User initiated paste?', userInitiatedPaste); try { const clipboardContent = await Clipboard.getString(); const numericContent = clipboardContent.replace(/[^0-9]/g, ''); if (numericContent.length >= length) { const pastedDigits = numericContent.slice(0, length); onChangeText(pastedDigits); // Focus management for paste requestAnimationFrame(() => { inputRefs.current.forEach(ref => { ref.current?.blur(); }); // Call completion if we have full OTP if (pastedDigits.length === length && !completionCalledRef.current) { completionCalledRef.current = true; setTimeout(() => { onComplete?.(pastedDigits); }, 100); } }); } } catch (error) { console.error('[OTPInput] Manual paste failed:', error); } // Reset flag after a delay pasteTimeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => { setUserInitiatedPaste(false); }, 1000); }, [length, onChangeText, onComplete, userInitiatedPaste]); // Cleanup paste timeout useEffect(() => { return () => { if (pasteTimeoutRef.current) { clearTimeout(pasteTimeoutRef.current); } }; }, []); // Handle text change for individual field - optimized const handleChangeText = useCallback( (text: string, index: number) => { const newDigits = [...digits]; newDigits[index] = text; // Update state immediately setDigits(newDigits); // Update parent const newValue = newDigits.join(''); onChangeText(newValue); // Improved focus management - no setTimeout if (text && index < length - 1) { // Use requestAnimationFrame for smoother focus transition requestAnimationFrame(() => { inputRefs.current[index + 1]?.current?.focus(); }); } // Handle completion - optimized to prevent multiple calls if (newValue.length === length && !completionCalledRef.current) { completionCalledRef.current = true; // Slight delay to prevent screen shake requestAnimationFrame(() => { inputRefs.current[index]?.current?.blur(); onComplete?.(newValue); }); } }, [digits, length, onChangeText, onComplete] ); // Handle key press for navigation and deletion - optimized const handleKeyPress = useCallback( (key: string, index: number) => { if (key === OTP_KEY_CODES.BACKSPACE) { const newDigits = [...digits]; if (newDigits[index]) { // Clear current field newDigits[index] = ''; } else if (index > 0) { // Move to previous field and clear it newDigits[index - 1] = ''; requestAnimationFrame(() => { inputRefs.current[index - 1]?.current?.focus(); }); } setDigits(newDigits); onChangeText(newDigits.join('')); // Reset completion flag when backspacing completionCalledRef.current = false; } else if (key === OTP_KEY_CODES.ARROW_LEFT && index > 0) { inputRefs.current[index - 1]?.current?.focus(); } else if (key === OTP_KEY_CODES.ARROW_RIGHT && index < length - 1) { inputRefs.current[index + 1]?.current?.focus(); } }, [digits, length, onChangeText] ); // Handle focus - memoized const handleFocus = useCallback((index: number) => { setFocusedIndex(index); }, []); // Handle blur - memoized const handleBlur = useCallback(() => { setFocusedIndex(-1); }, []); // Memoize the fields to prevent unnecessary re-renders const otpFields = useMemo(() => { return digits.map((digit, index) => ( <OTPField key={index} value={digit} index={index} isFocused={focusedIndex === index} hasError={hasError} disabled={disabled} secureTextEntry={secureTextEntry} placeholder={placeholder} onChangeText={handleChangeText} onKeyPress={handleKeyPress} onFocus={handleFocus} onBlur={handleBlur} inputRef={inputRefs.current[index]} testID={testID} /> )); }, [ digits, focusedIndex, hasError, disabled, secureTextEntry, placeholder, handleChangeText, handleKeyPress, handleFocus, handleBlur, testID, ]); // // Add automatic paste detection for Android // useEffect(() => { // if (Platform.OS === 'android' && autoFocus) { // // Listen for clipboard changes (basic detection) // const checkClipboard = async () => { // try { // const clipboardContent = await Clipboard.getString(); // const numericContent = clipboardContent.replace(/[^0-9]/g, ''); // // Only auto-paste if OTP is empty and clipboard has exactly the right length // if (value.length === 0 && numericContent.length === length) { // console.log( // '[OTPInput] Auto-detected OTP in clipboard:', // numericContent // ); // // Small delay to avoid conflicts // setTimeout(() => { // handlePaste(); // }, 500); // } // } catch (error) { // // Silent fail - clipboard detection is optional // } // }; // // Check clipboard on mount // const timer = setTimeout(checkClipboard, 1000); // return () => clearTimeout(timer); // } // }, [autoFocus, value.length, length, handlePaste]); return ( <View style={styles.otpInputContainer} testID={testID} accessibilityLabel={accessibilityLabel} accessibilityHint="Enter the 6-digit OTP code" > <View style={styles.fieldsContainer}>{otpFields}</View> {/* Enhanced Paste Section - Always visible when not disabled */} {!disabled && ( <TouchableOpacity onPress={handlePaste} style={styles.pasteButton} activeOpacity={0.7} > <Text style={styles.pasteInstructionText}>📋 Paste OTP</Text> </TouchableOpacity> )} {/* Error message */} {hasError && errorMessage && ( <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <Text style={styles.errorText} testID={`${testID}-error`}> {errorMessage} </Text> </View> )} </View> ); }

Main OTP Input Component

src/screens/auth/OTPVerificationScreen.tsx

OTPVerificationScreen
Type : React.FC<Props>
Default value : ({navigation, route}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const {login, isLoading, error: authError} = useNewAuth(); // Get phone number from route params const {phone} = route.params; // Debug log console.log('[OTPVerification] Screen initialized with phone:', phone); // State const [otp, setOtp] = useState(''); const [error, setError] = useState(''); // For resend functionality (simplified) const isResending = false; const resendTimer = useResendTimer(() => { console.log('[OTP] Resend timer completed - can resend now'); }); const lockoutTimer = useLockoutTimer(() => { console.log('[OTP] Lockout timer completed - account unlocked'); }); // Timer effect for resend functionality /** * Handle go back to phone input */ const handleGoBack = useCallback(() => { Alert.alert( 'Go Back?', 'Are you sure you want to go back? You will need to enter your phone number again.', [ {text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel'}, { text: 'Go Back', style: 'destructive', onPress: () => navigation.goBack(), }, ] ); }, [navigation]); // Handle hardware back button useFocusEffect( useCallback(() => { const onBackPress = () => { handleGoBack(); return true; }; const subscription = BackHandler.addEventListener( 'hardwareBackPress', onBackPress ); return () => subscription?.remove(); }, [handleGoBack]) ); // Clear error when OTP changes useEffect(() => { if (error && otp) { setError(''); } }, [otp, error]); /** * Handle OTP verification */ const handleVerifyOTP = useCallback(async () => { if (!otp || otp.length !== 6) { setError('Please enter a valid 6-digit OTP'); return; } try { setError(''); console.log( '[OTPVerification] Verifying OTP for phone:', phone, 'OTP:', otp ); // Use the new auth system const result = await login(phone, otp); if (result.success) { console.log('[OTPVerification] Login successful', result.data); // Success - stop any running timers resendTimer.stop(); lockoutTimer.stop(); // Navigation is handled automatically by auth state change console.log('[OTPVerification] Login completed successfully'); } else { console.error('[OTPVerification] Login failed:', result.error); setError(result.error || 'Login failed'); } } catch (err: any) { console.error('[OTPVerification] Verification failed:', err); setError('An unexpected error occurred'); // Clear OTP for retry setOtp(''); } }, [otp, phone, login, resendTimer, lockoutTimer]); /** * Handle resend OTP */ const handleResendOTP = useCallback(async () => { if (resendTimer.isActive || isResending) { return; } try { console.log('[OTPVerification] Resending OTP to:', phone); // await sendOtp({phone}).unwrap(); // Start resend timer resendTimer.restart(TIMER_CONSTANTS.RESEND_DURATION); setOtp(''); setError(''); Alert.alert('OTP Sent Successfully', 'OTP sent successfully'); } catch (err: any) { console.error('[OTPVerification] Resend failed:', err); const errorMessage = err?.data?.error?.message || 'Failed to resend OTP'; Alert.alert('Error', errorMessage); } }, [resendTimer, isResending, phone]); /** * Handle OTP completion (auto-verify) */ const handleOTPComplete = useCallback( (completedOTP: string) => { console.log( '[OTPVerification] OTP completed:', completedOTP.length, 'digits' ); if (completedOTP.length === 6) { // Small delay to allow UI to update setTimeout(() => { handleVerifyOTP(); }, 300); } }, [handleVerifyOTP] ); return ( <SafeAreaContainer backgroundColor={theme.colors.background}> <View style={styles.content}> {/* Header */} <View style={styles.headerContainer}> <Text style={[styles.title, {color: theme.colors.primary}]}> Verify OTP </Text> <Text style={[styles.subtitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> We've sent a 6-digit code to{'\n'} <Text style={[styles.phoneNumber, {color: theme.colors.primary}]}> {phone} </Text> </Text> </View> {/* OTP Input */} <View style={styles.otpContainer}> <OTPInput value={otp} onChangeText={setOtp} onComplete={handleOTPComplete} hasError={!!error} errorMessage={error} disabled={isLoading} // autoFocus={true} testID="otp-verification-input" accessibilityLabel="Enter 6-digit OTP code" /> </View> {/* Verify Button */} <Button title="Verify OTP" onPress={handleVerifyOTP} disabled={otp.length !== 6} loading={isLoading} variant="primary" size="large" fullWidth testID="verify-otp-button" /> {/* Resend Section */} <View style={styles.resendContainer}> <Text style={[styles.resendText, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Didn't receive the code? </Text> {resendTimer.isActive ? ( <Text style={[styles.timerText, {color: theme.colors.primary}]} testID="resend-timer" > Resend in {resendTimer.secondsLeft}s </Text> ) : ( <TouchableOpacity onPress={handleResendOTP} disabled={isResending || lockoutTimer.isActive} testID="resend-otp-button" style={styles.resendButton} > <Text style={[ styles.resendButtonText, { color: isResending || lockoutTimer.isActive ? theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant : theme.colors.primary, }, ]} > {isResending ? 'Sending...' : 'Resend'} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> )} </View> {/* Lockout status display */} {lockoutTimer.isActive && ( <View style={styles.lockoutContainer}> <Text style={[styles.lockoutText, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> Account locked. Try again in{' '} {Math.floor(lockoutTimer.secondsLeft / 60)}m{' '} {lockoutTimer.secondsLeft % 60}s </Text> </View> )} {/* Back Button */} <View style={styles.backContainer}> <TouchableOpacity onPress={handleGoBack} testID="back-to-phone-button" style={styles.backButton} > <Text style={[ styles.backButtonText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Change phone number </Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {/* Demo Instructions */} {__DEV__ && ( <View style={[ styles.demoCard, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.secondaryContainer}, ]} > <Text style={[ styles.demoTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSecondaryContainer}, ]} > Demo Instructions </Text> <Text style={[ styles.demoText, {color: theme.colors.onSecondaryContainer}, ]} > • Use OTP: 123456{'\n'}• Other OTPs will show error{'\n'}• Try wrong OTP 5 times to test lockout </Text> </View> )} </View> {/* Loading Overlay */} {isLoading && ( <View style={styles.loadingOverlay}> <View style={[ styles.loadingContent, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}, ]} > <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.loadingText, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Verifying OTP... </Text> </View> </View> )} </SafeAreaContainer> ); }

OTP Verification Screen Component
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, content: { flex: 1, padding: 20, justifyContent: 'center', }, headerContainer: { alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 40, }, title: { fontSize: 28, fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: 8, }, subtitle: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 24, }, phoneNumber: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', }, otpContainer: { marginBottom: 30, alignItems: 'center', }, button: { padding: 16, borderRadius: 8, alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 20, }, buttonContent: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', }, buttonText: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', }, resendContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 20, }, resendText: { fontSize: 14, }, resendButton: { marginLeft: 4, padding: 4, }, resendButtonText: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', }, timerText: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '600', marginLeft: 4, }, backContainer: { alignItems: 'center', }, backButton: { padding: 8, }, backButtonText: { fontSize: 14, textDecorationLine: 'underline', }, demoCard: { marginTop: 24, padding: 16, borderRadius: 8, }, demoTitle: { fontSize: 16, marginBottom: 8, fontWeight: 'bold', }, demoText: { fontSize: 14, lineHeight: 20, }, loadingOverlay: { position: 'absolute', top: 0, left: 0, right: 0, bottom: 0, backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', }, loadingContent: { padding: 20, borderRadius: 8, alignItems: 'center', }, loadingText: { marginTop: 10, fontSize: 16, }, lockoutContainer: { alignItems: 'center', marginTop: 10, padding: 10, backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 59, 48, 0.1)', borderRadius: 6, }, lockoutText: { fontSize: 14, textAlign: 'center', fontWeight: '500', }, })

src/api/endpoints/profile.ts

profileApi
Default value : createApi({ reducerPath: 'profileApi', baseQuery, tagTypes: ['UserProfile'], endpoints: builder => ({ /** * Fetch current user's profile data * GET profile */ getProfile: builder.query<ProfileData, void>({ query: () => ({ url: 'profile', method: 'GET', }), transformResponse: (response: GetProfileResponse): ProfileData => { // Handle the API response envelope if (response?.success && response.data) { return response.data; } throw new Error('Failed to fetch profile'); }, transformErrorResponse: (error: any): ProfileApiError => { // Handle specific API error structure if (error?.data?.statusCode && error?.data?.code) { return { statusCode: error.data.statusCode, code: error.data.code, error: error.data.error || 'Error', message: error.data.message || 'Failed to fetch profile', }; } // Handle generic errors return { statusCode: error?.status || 500, code: 'UNKNOWN_ERROR', error: 'Unknown Error', message: error?.data?.message || 'An unexpected error occurred', }; }, providesTags: ['UserProfile'], }), /** * Update current user's profile data * PATCH profile */ updateProfile: builder.mutation<boolean, UpdateProfileRequest>({ query: data => ({ url: 'profile', method: 'PATCH', body: Object.keys(data).length > 0 ? data : {}, // Ensure at least empty object headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, }), transformResponse: (response: UpdateProfileResponse): boolean => { // API returns { success: true } for successful updates return response?.success || false; }, transformErrorResponse: (error: any): ProfileApiError => { // Handle specific API error structure if (error?.data?.statusCode && error?.data?.code) { return { statusCode: error.data.statusCode, code: error.data.code, error: error.data.error || 'Error', message: error.data.message || 'Failed to update profile', }; } // Handle generic errors return { statusCode: error?.status || 500, code: 'UNKNOWN_ERROR', error: 'Unknown Error', message: error?.data?.message || 'An unexpected error occurred', }; }, // Cache invalidation and Redux state update invalidatesTags: ['UserProfile'], }), }), })

Profile API slice with proper cache management
Default value : profileApi

src/components/forms/ProfileForm.tsx

ProfileForm
Type : React.FC<ProfileFormProps>
Default value : ({ initialData, onSubmit, isLoading = false, errorMessage, testID = 'profile-form', }) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); /** * Prepare default values from initial data */ const defaultValues: ProfileFormData = useMemo(() => { console.log('[ProfileForm] Setting default values:', initialData); return { name: initialData?.name || '', email: initialData?.email || '', phone: initialData?.phone || '', // Read-only field }; }, [initialData]); /** * Handle form submission with data sanitization */ const handleSubmit = useCallback( (formData: ProfileFormData) => { console.log('[ProfileForm] Form submitted with data:', formData); // Sanitize and prepare data for API const sanitizedData = sanitizeProfileData({ name: formData.name, email: formData.email, }); console.log('[ProfileForm] Sanitized data:', sanitizedData); // Only submit if there's actually data to update if (Object.keys(sanitizedData).length > 0) { console.log('[ProfileForm] Calling onSubmit with sanitized data'); onSubmit(sanitizedData); } else { console.log('[ProfileForm] No changes to submit'); } }, [onSubmit] ); /** * Handle form submission trigger from child component */ const handleFormSubmit = useCallback(() => { console.log('[ProfileForm] handleFormSubmit called'); // This will be called by the FormProviderWrapper's onSubmit method }, []); /** * Render error message if provided */ const renderErrorMessage = useCallback(() => { if (!errorMessage) { return null; } return ( <View style={[ styles.errorContainer, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.errorContainer}, ]} > <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={18} color={theme.colors.onErrorContainer} /> <Text style={[ styles.errorMessageText, {color: theme.colors.onErrorContainer}, ]} accessibilityRole="alert" > {errorMessage} </Text> </View> ); }, [errorMessage, theme]); return ( <View style={styles.container} testID={testID}> {/* Error Message */} {renderErrorMessage()} {/* Form */} <FormProviderWrapper defaultValues={defaultValues} formOptions={{ mode: 'onChange', // Real-time validation reValidateMode: 'onChange', }} onSubmit={handleSubmit} // This will be called when form is submitted testID={`${testID}-form-wrapper`} > {methods => ( <View style={styles.formContent}> {/* Header */} <View style={styles.headerContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="person" size={24} color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.headerTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} accessibilityRole="header" > Profile Information </Text> </View> <Text style={[ styles.headerSubtitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Update your personal information. All fields are optional. </Text> {/* Form Fields */} <ProfileFormFields initialData={initialData} isLoading={isLoading} onFormSubmit={methods.handleSubmit(handleSubmit)} // Pass the actual submit function /> </View> )} </FormProviderWrapper> </View> ); }

Profile Form Component
ProfileFormFields
Type : React.FC<literal type>
Default value : ({initialData, isLoading, onFormSubmit}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const { register, setValue, watch, formState: {errors, isDirty}, reset, trigger, } = useFormContext<ProfileFormData>(); // Watch form values for real-time validation const nameValue = watch('name'); const emailValue = watch('email'); // Register fields with validation rules useEffect(() => { register('name', profileValidationRules.name); register('email', profileValidationRules.email); register('phone'); // Read-only field }, [register]); // Set initial values when data is available useEffect(() => { if (initialData) { setValue('name', initialData.name || ''); setValue('email', initialData.email || ''); setValue('phone', initialData.phone || ''); } }, [initialData, setValue]); /** * Handle name field changes */ const handleNameChange = useCallback( (text: string) => { console.log('[ProfileForm] Name changed:', text); setValue('name', text, {shouldValidate: true, shouldDirty: true}); }, [setValue] ); /** * Handle email field changes */ const handleEmailChange = useCallback( (text: string) => { console.log('[ProfileForm] Email changed:', text); setValue('email', text, {shouldValidate: true, shouldDirty: true}); }, [setValue] ); /** * Reset form to initial values */ const handleReset = useCallback(() => { console.log('[ProfileForm] Resetting form'); if (initialData) { reset({ name: initialData.name || '', email: initialData.email || '', phone: initialData.phone || '', }); } }, [reset, initialData]); /** * Handle form submission */ const handleUpdatePress = useCallback(async () => { console.log('[ProfileForm] Update button pressed'); console.log('[ProfileForm] Current form state:', { isDirty, errors: Object.keys(errors), nameValue, emailValue, }); // Trigger validation const isValid = await trigger(); console.log('[ProfileForm] Form validation result:', isValid); if (isValid && isDirty) { console.log('[ProfileForm] Form is valid and dirty, submitting...'); onFormSubmit(); // Call the parent's submit function } else { console.log('[ProfileForm] Form not submitted:', { isValid, isDirty, errors, }); } }, [onFormSubmit, isDirty, errors, trigger, nameValue, emailValue]); /** * Check if form has valid changes */ const hasValidChanges = useMemo(() => { const isValid = Object.keys(errors).length === 0; console.log('[ProfileForm] Form state check:', { isDirty, isValid, hasValidChanges: isDirty && isValid, }); return isDirty && isValid; }, [isDirty, errors]); return ( <View style={styles.fieldsContainer}> {/* Phone Number - Read Only Display */} <View style={styles.readOnlyFieldContainer}> <Text style={[styles.readOnlyLabel, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Phone Number </Text> <View style={[ styles.readOnlyValueContainer, { backgroundColor: theme.colors.surfaceVariant, borderColor: theme.colors.outline, }, ]} > <MaterialIcons name="phone" size={18} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} style={styles.readOnlyIcon} /> <Text style={[ styles.readOnlyValue, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} accessibilityLabel={`Phone number: ${ initialData?.phone || 'Not available' }`} accessibilityRole="text" > {initialData?.phone || 'Not available'} </Text> </View> <Text style={[ styles.readOnlyHelper, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Phone number cannot be changed </Text> </View> {/* Name Field */} <TextInput label="Full Name" placeholder="Enter your full name" value={nameValue || ''} onChangeText={handleNameChange} error={!!errors.name} disabled={isLoading} maxLength={100} autoCapitalize="words" autoCorrect={false} style={styles.textInput} testID="name-input" accessibilityLabel="Full name input field" accessibilityHint="Enter your full name, optional field" /> {errors.name && ( <Text style={[styles.errorText, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> {errors.name.message} </Text> )} <Text style={[styles.charCountText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > {(nameValue || '').length}/100 characters </Text> {/* Email Field */} <TextInput label="Email Address" placeholder="Enter your email address" value={emailValue || ''} onChangeText={handleEmailChange} error={!!errors.email} keyboardType="email-address" autoCapitalize="none" autoCorrect={false} disabled={isLoading} style={styles.textInput} testID="email-input" accessibilityLabel="Email address input field" accessibilityHint="Enter your email address, optional field" /> {errors.email && ( <Text style={[styles.errorText, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> {errors.email.message} </Text> )} {/* Action Buttons */} <View style={styles.actionsContainer}> {/* Reset Button */} <Button mode="outlined" onPress={handleReset} disabled={isLoading || !isDirty} style={[ styles.resetButton, { borderColor: theme.colors.outline, opacity: !isDirty ? 0.5 : 1, }, ]} labelStyle={{color: theme.colors.onSurface}} icon={({size, color}) => ( <MaterialIcons name="refresh" size={size} color={color} /> )} testID="reset-button" accessibilityLabel="Reset form to original values" accessibilityHint={ isDirty ? 'Reset all changes and restore original values' : 'No changes to reset' } > Reset </Button> {/* Update Button - FIXED */} <Button mode="contained" onPress={handleUpdatePress} // Now calls the proper submit function disabled={isLoading || !hasValidChanges} loading={isLoading} style={[ styles.updateButton, { backgroundColor: hasValidChanges && !isLoading ? theme.colors.primary : theme.colors.surfaceVariant, opacity: !hasValidChanges ? 0.5 : 1, }, ]} labelStyle={{ color: hasValidChanges && !isLoading ? theme.colors.onPrimary : theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant, }} icon={({size, color}) => ( <MaterialIcons name="save" size={size} color={color} /> )} testID="update-button" accessibilityLabel={ isLoading ? 'Updating profile' : hasValidChanges ? 'Save profile changes' : 'No changes to save' } accessibilityHint={ isLoading ? 'Please wait, saving your profile changes' : !isDirty ? 'Make changes to enable this button' : !hasValidChanges ? 'Please fix form errors first' : 'Save your profile changes' } > {isLoading ? 'Updating...' : 'Update Profile'} </Button> </View> </View> ); }

Profile Form Fields Component (uses useFormContext)
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, formContent: { flex: 1, }, headerContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 8, }, headerTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginLeft: 12, }, headerSubtitle: { fontSize: 14, marginBottom: 24, lineHeight: 20, }, fieldsContainer: { flex: 1, marginBottom: 24, }, readOnlyFieldContainer: { marginBottom: 16, }, readOnlyLabel: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '500', marginBottom: 8, }, readOnlyValueContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', padding: 12, borderRadius: 8, borderWidth: 1, minHeight: 48, }, readOnlyIcon: { marginRight: 12, }, readOnlyValue: { fontSize: 16, flex: 1, }, readOnlyHelper: { fontSize: 12, marginTop: 4, fontStyle: 'italic', }, textInput: { backgroundColor: 'transparent', marginBottom: 4, }, errorText: { fontSize: 12, marginLeft: 16, marginTop: 4, marginBottom: 4, }, charCountText: { fontSize: 12, textAlign: 'right', marginRight: 16, marginBottom: 16, }, actionsContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', paddingTop: 16, borderTopWidth: 1, borderTopColor: '#E0E0E0', }, resetButton: { flex: 1, marginRight: 8, }, updateButton: { flex: 1, marginLeft: 8, }, errorContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', padding: 12, borderRadius: 8, marginBottom: 16, }, errorMessageText: { fontSize: 14, marginLeft: 8, flex: 1, }, })

Styles (same as before)

src/components/common/ProfileIcon.tsx
