src/screens/main/ProfileScreen.tsx

ProfileScreen
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const {user, isLoggedIn, logout} = useNewAuth(); // Local state for UI feedback const [snackbarVisible, setSnackbarVisible] = useState(false); const [snackbarMessage, setSnackbarMessage] = useState(''); const [snackbarType, setSnackbarType] = useState<'success' | 'error'>( 'success' ); const [isLoggingOut, setIsLoggingOut] = useState(false); const [appVersion, setAppVersion] = useState<string>(''); const [isOpeningLink, setIsOpeningLink] = useState(false); // API hooks const { data: profileData, error: profileError, isLoading: isLoadingProfile, refetch: refetchProfile, } = useGetProfileQuery(undefined, { skip: !isLoggedIn, // Skip if user is not logged in }); const [updateProfile, {isLoading: isUpdatingProfile}] = useUpdateProfileMutation(); // Refresh control for pull-to-refresh const {refreshAll, isRefreshing} = useRefreshControl(); /** * Get app version on component mount */ useEffect(() => { const getAppVersion = () => { try { // Get version directly from package.json const version = packageJson.version; setAppVersion(version); console.log('[ProfileScreen] App version loaded:', version); } catch (error) { console.error('[ProfileScreen] Failed to get app version:', error); setAppVersion('1.0.0'); // Fallback version } }; getAppVersion(); }, []); /** * Show snackbar message */ const showSnackbar = useCallback( (message: string, type: 'success' | 'error' = 'success') => { setSnackbarMessage(message); setSnackbarType(type); setSnackbarVisible(true); }, [] ); /** * Hide snackbar */ const hideSnackbar = useCallback(() => { setSnackbarVisible(false); setSnackbarMessage(''); }, []); useFocusEffect( useCallback(() => { // Only clear very old snackbar messages (not recent ones) // This gives users time to read the message const clearOldMessages = setTimeout(() => { if (snackbarVisible) { console.log('[ProfileScreen] Clearing old snackbar message on focus'); hideSnackbar(); } }, 5000); // 5 second delay return () => clearTimeout(clearOldMessages); }, []) // Empty dependencies - only run on mount/focus ); /** * Handle pull-to-refresh */ const handleRefresh = useCallback(async () => { console.log('[ProfileScreen] Starting pull-to-refresh...'); try { // Use refresh control to refresh profile data await refetchProfile(); console.log('[ProfileScreen] Profile data refreshed successfully'); } catch (error) { console.error('[ProfileScreen] Refresh failed:', error); showSnackbar('Failed to refresh profile data', 'error'); } }, [refetchProfile, showSnackbar]); /** * Handle profile form submission */ const handleProfileSubmit = useCallback( async (formData: UpdateProfileRequest) => { console.log('[ProfileScreen] Submitting profile update:', formData); try { // Call the update mutation await updateProfile(formData).unwrap(); console.log('[ProfileScreen] Profile updated successfully'); showSnackbar('Profile updated successfully!', 'success'); // Refresh profile data to get latest changes await refetchProfile(); } catch (error: any) { console.error('[ProfileScreen] Profile update failed:', error); let errorMessage = 'Failed to update profile. Please try again.'; // Handle specific error types if (error?.data?.message) { errorMessage = error.data.message; } else if (error?.message) { errorMessage = error.message; } showSnackbar(errorMessage, 'error'); } }, [updateProfile, refetchProfile, showSnackbar] ); /** * Handle logout with confirmation */ const handleLogout = useCallback(async () => { Alert.alert( 'Logout', 'Are you sure you want to logout? Any unsaved changes will be lost.', [ { text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel', onPress: () => { announceForAccessibility('Logout cancelled'); }, }, { text: 'Logout', style: 'destructive', onPress: async () => { try { setIsLoggingOut(true); screenReaderUtils.announceLoading(true, 'logout'); console.log('[ProfileScreen] Starting logout process...'); // Use new auth system logout const result = await logout(); if (result.success) { screenReaderUtils.announceSuccess('Logged out successfully'); console.log('[ProfileScreen] Logout successful'); } else { console.error('[ProfileScreen] Logout error:', result.error); announceForAccessibility('Logout failed, please try again'); showSnackbar('Logout failed, please try again', 'error'); } } catch (error) { console.error('[ProfileScreen] Logout error:', error); announceForAccessibility('Logout failed, please try again'); showSnackbar('Logout failed, please try again', 'error'); } finally { setIsLoggingOut(false); } }, }, ] ); }, [logout, showSnackbar]); /** * Handle privacy policy link opening */ const openPrivacyPolicy = useCallback(async () => { const url = EXTERNAL_LINKS.PRIVACY_POLICY; const linkName = getLinkDisplayName(url); try { setIsOpeningLink(true); console.log('[ProfileScreen] Opening privacy policy link:', url); // Attempt to open the URL directly await Linking.openURL(url); console.log('[ProfileScreen] Linking.openURL success', url); // Announce success for accessibility announceForAccessibility(`${linkName} opened in browser`); console.log('[ProfileScreen] Privacy policy link opened successfully'); } catch (error: any) { console.error( '[ProfileScreen] Failed to open privacy policy link:', error ); // Determine error message let errorMessage = LINK_ERROR_MESSAGES.GENERAL_ERROR; if (error?.message === LINK_ERROR_MESSAGES.UNSUPPORTED) { errorMessage = LINK_ERROR_MESSAGES.UNSUPPORTED; } else if ( error?.message?.includes('network') || error?.message?.includes('internet') ) { errorMessage = LINK_ERROR_MESSAGES.NETWORK_ERROR; } // Show error to user showSnackbar(errorMessage, 'error'); // Announce error for accessibility announceForAccessibility(`Failed to open ${linkName}`); } finally { setIsOpeningLink(false); } }, [showSnackbar]); /** * Render loading state */ const renderLoadingState = () => ( <SafeAreaContainer testID="profile-loading"> <LoadingOverlayContainer visible={true} message="Loading profile..." /> </SafeAreaContainer> ); /** * Render error state */ const renderErrorState = () => ( <SafeAreaContainer testID="profile-error"> <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={[styles.errorTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Failed to Load Profile </Text> <Text style={[styles.errorMessage, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > {profileError?.message || 'Unable to fetch your profile information.'} </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); /** * Render logout section */ const renderLogoutSection = () => ( <View style={styles.logoutContainer}> <View style={styles.logoutHeader}> <MaterialIcons name="exit-to-app" size={24} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={[styles.logoutHeaderTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} {...createTextA11yProps('Account Actions', 'header')} > Account Actions </Text> </View> <Text style={[ styles.logoutDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} {...createTextA11yProps('Logout description')} > Sign out of your account. You'll need to log in again to access your profile. </Text> <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.logoutButton, { backgroundColor: theme.colors.error, opacity: isLoggingOut || isUpdatingProfile ? 0.6 : 1, }, ]} onPress={handleLogout} disabled={isLoggingOut || isUpdatingProfile} {...createButtonA11yProps( isLoggingOut ? 'Logging out' : 'Logout', 'Tap to sign out of your account', isLoggingOut || isUpdatingProfile, 'logout-button' )} > <MaterialIcons name="exit-to-app" size={20} color={theme.colors.onError} style={styles.logoutButtonIcon} /> <Text style={[styles.logoutButtonText, {color: theme.colors.onError}]}> {isLoggingOut ? 'Logging out...' : 'Logout'} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> ); /** * Render app footer with privacy policy and version */ const renderFooter = useCallback( () => ( <View style={styles.footerContainer}> {/* Separator */} <View style={[ styles.footerSeparator, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.outline}, ]} /> {/* Footer Content */} <View style={styles.footerContent}> {/* Privacy Policy Link */} <TouchableOpacity style={styles.privacyLinkContainer} onPress={openPrivacyPolicy} disabled={isOpeningLink || isLoggingOut || isUpdatingProfile} {...createButtonA11yProps( isOpeningLink ? 'Opening privacy policy' : 'Privacy Policy', 'Tap to open privacy policy in your browser', isOpeningLink || isLoggingOut || isUpdatingProfile, 'privacy-policy-link' )} > <MaterialIcons name="open-in-new" size={16} color={ isOpeningLink ? theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant : theme.colors.primary } style={styles.privacyLinkIcon} /> <Text style={[ styles.privacyLinkText, { color: isOpeningLink ? theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant : theme.colors.primary, opacity: isOpeningLink || isLoggingOut || isUpdatingProfile ? 0.5 : 1, }, ]} > {isOpeningLink ? 'Opening...' : 'Privacy Policy'} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> {/* App Version */} <View style={styles.versionContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="info-outline" size={14} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} style={styles.versionIcon} /> <Text style={[ styles.versionText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} {...createTextA11yProps(`App version ${appVersion}`)} > Version {appVersion} </Text> </View> </View> {/* Copyright */} <Text style={[styles.copyrightText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} {...createTextA11yProps('Copyright 2025 Solarium Energy')} > © 2025 Solarium Energy </Text> </View> ), [ theme, openPrivacyPolicy, isOpeningLink, isLoggingOut, isUpdatingProfile, appVersion, ] ); /** * Render main content */ const renderContent = () => ( <SafeAreaContainer testID="profile-screen"> {/* Loading overlay for updates and logout */} {(isUpdatingProfile || isLoggingOut || isOpeningLink) && ( <LoadingOverlayContainer visible={true} message={ isLoggingOut ? 'Logging out...' : isOpeningLink ? 'Opening link...' : 'Updating profile...' } /> )} <ScrollView style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} contentContainerStyle={styles.scrollContent} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} scrollEnabled={!isUpdatingProfile && !isLoggingOut} refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isRefreshing} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} progressBackgroundColor={theme.colors.surface} enabled={!isLoggingOut && !isUpdatingProfile} /> } > {/* Header Section */} <View style={styles.headerContainer}> <View style={styles.headerContent}> <MaterialIcons name="account-circle" size={64} color={theme.colors.primary} /> <View style={styles.headerTextContainer}> <Text style={[styles.headerTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} accessibilityRole="header" > My Profile </Text> <Text style={[ styles.headerSubtitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Manage your account information </Text> </View> </View> </View> {/* Profile Form */} <View style={styles.formContainer}> <ProfileForm initialData={profileData} onSubmit={handleProfileSubmit} isLoading={isUpdatingProfile} testID="profile-form" /> </View> {/* Logout Section */} {renderLogoutSection()} {/* Footer Section */} {renderFooter()} </ScrollView> {/* Success/Error Snackbar */} <Snackbar visible={snackbarVisible} onDismiss={hideSnackbar} duration={4000} // 4 seconds auto-dismiss action={{ label: 'Dismiss', onPress: hideSnackbar, labelStyle: { color: snackbarType === 'success' ? theme.colors.onPrimaryContainer : theme.colors.onErrorContainer, }, }} style={[ styles.snackbar, { backgroundColor: snackbarType === 'success' ? theme.colors.primaryContainer : theme.colors.errorContainer, }, ]} theme={{ colors: { onSurface: snackbarType === 'success' ? theme.colors.onPrimaryContainer : theme.colors.onErrorContainer, }, }} elevation={6} // Add elevation for better visibility > {snackbarMessage} </Snackbar> </SafeAreaContainer> ); // Early returns for loading and error states if (isLoadingProfile) { return renderLoadingState(); } if (profileError && !profileData) { return renderErrorState(); } return renderContent(); }

'center', }, headerTextContainer: { marginLeft: 16, flex: 1, }, headerTitle: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: 4, }, headerSubtitle: { fontSize: 16, lineHeight: 22, }, formContainer: { flex: 1, marginBottom: 32, }, logoutContainer: { padding: 16, borderRadius: 12, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#FFE6E6', // Light red border backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.02)', // Very light red background marginBottom: 16, }, logoutHeader: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 12, }, logoutHeaderTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', marginLeft: 12, }, logoutDescription: { fontSize: 14, lineHeight: 20, marginBottom: 20, }, logoutButton: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', paddingVertical: 16, paddingHorizontal: 24, borderRadius: 8, elevation: 2, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: { width: 0, height: 1, }, shadowOpacity: 0.2, shadowRadius: 2, }, logoutButtonIcon: { marginRight: 8, }, logoutButtonText: { marginBottom: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, errorMessage: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 22, }, snackbar: { marginBottom: 16, }, // Footer styles footerContainer: { marginTop: 32, paddingBottom: 16, }, footerSeparator: { height: 1, marginBottom: 24, opacity: 0.3, }, footerContent: { alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: 16, gap: 12, }, privacyLinkContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', paddingVertical: 8, paddingHorizontal: 12, borderRadius: 8, }, privacyLinkIcon: { marginRight: 6, }, privacyLinkText: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '500', textDecorationLine: 'underline', }, versionContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', }, versionIcon: { marginRight: 4, }, versionText: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '400', }, copyrightText: { fontSize: 12, textAlign: 'center', fontWeight: '300', fontStyle: 'italic', }, })

Styles

src/hooks/useActionDebounce.ts

quotationActionTimestamps
Default value : new Map<string, number>()

Global map to store last action timestamps per quotation ID This ensures debounce state persists across component re-renders and is independent per quotation
useActionDebounce
Default value : ( quotationId: string, options: UseActionDebounceOptions = {} ): UseActionDebounceResult => { const {debounceSeconds = DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.QUOTE_ACTION} = options; // State to track if action is currently blocked const [isBlocked, setIsBlocked] = useState<boolean>(false); const [remainingSeconds, setRemainingSeconds] = useState<number>(0); // Timer ref for cleanup const timerRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null); const intervalRef = useRef<NodeJS.Timeout | null>(null); /** * Update the blocked state based on current timestamp */ const updateBlockedState = useCallback(() => { const lastActionTime = quotationActionTimestamps.get(quotationId) || null; const isActionAllowed = isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastActionTime, debounceSeconds ); const blocked = !isActionAllowed; setIsBlocked(blocked); if (blocked && lastActionTime) { const now = Date.now(); const debounceMs = debounceSeconds * 1000; const timeSinceLastAction = now - lastActionTime; const remainingMs = debounceMs - timeSinceLastAction; const remainingSecs = Math.max(0, Math.ceil(remainingMs / 1000)); setRemainingSeconds(remainingSecs); } else { setRemainingSeconds(0); } }, [quotationId, debounceSeconds]); /** * Trigger the action and start debounce timer */ const triggerAction = useCallback(() => { const now = Date.now(); // Check if action is currently allowed const lastActionTime = quotationActionTimestamps.get(quotationId) || null; if (!isOutsideDebounceWindow(lastActionTime, debounceSeconds)) { // Action is still blocked, don't trigger return; } // Record the action timestamp quotationActionTimestamps.set(quotationId, now); // Update state immediately setIsBlocked(true); setRemainingSeconds(debounceSeconds); // Clear existing timers if (timerRef.current) { clearTimeout(timerRef.current); } if (intervalRef.current) { clearInterval(intervalRef.current); } // Start countdown interval intervalRef.current = setInterval(() => { updateBlockedState(); }, 1000); // Set timer to unblock after debounce period timerRef.current = setTimeout(() => { setIsBlocked(false); setRemainingSeconds(0); if (intervalRef.current) { clearInterval(intervalRef.current); intervalRef.current = null; } }, debounceSeconds * 1000); }, [quotationId, debounceSeconds, updateBlockedState]); // Initialize state on mount and when quotationId changes useEffect(() => { updateBlockedState(); }, [updateBlockedState]); // Cleanup timers on unmount useEffect(() => { return () => { if (timerRef.current) { clearTimeout(timerRef.current); } if (intervalRef.current) { clearInterval(intervalRef.current); } }; }, []); return { isBlocked, triggerAction, remainingSeconds, }; }

Action Debounce Hook

Provides debounced action handling with automatic state management for quotation actions. Each quotation has independent debounce state, preventing rapid successive actions while allowing actions on different quotations simultaneously.

The hook uses existing debounceWindow utilities for time calculations and maintains a global Map for timestamp storage to ensure consistency across component lifecycle.

src/api/endpoints/quotations.ts

quotationsApi
Default value : createApi({ reducerPath: 'quotationsApi', baseQuery, tagTypes: [ 'Quotation', 'QuotationsList', 'QuotationPdf', 'Lead', 'LeadsList', ], endpoints: builder => ({ /** * Get quotations with filters */ getQuotations: builder.query<QuotationsListResponse, GetQuotationsRequest>({ query: (params = {}) => { const {offset = 0, limit = 25, ...filters} = params; return { url: 'quotations', params: {offset, limit, ...filters}, }; }, transformResponse: transformResponse<QuotationsListResponse>, transformErrorResponse: transformQuotationError, providesTags: result => [ ...(result?.items.map(item => ({ type: 'Quotation' as const, id: item.quotationId, })) || []), {type: 'QuotationsList', id: 'LIST'}, ], }), /** * Get quotations by lead ID */ getQuotationsByLeadId: builder.query<QuotationListItem[], string>({ query: leadId => ({ url: 'quotations', params: {leadId, limit: 100}, // Get all quotations for the lead }), transformResponse: (response: any): QuotationListItem[] => { const data = transformResponse<QuotationsListResponse>(response); return data.items; }, transformErrorResponse: transformQuotationError, providesTags: (result, error, leadId) => [ ...(result?.map(item => ({ type: 'Quotation' as const, id: item.quotationId, })) || []), {type: 'QuotationsList', id: leadId}, ], }), /** * Get quotation by ID */ getQuotationById: builder.query<QuotationDetail, string>({ query: quotationId => `quotations/${quotationId}`, transformResponse: transformResponse<QuotationDetail>, transformErrorResponse: transformQuotationError, providesTags: (result, error, quotationId) => [ {type: 'Quotation', id: quotationId}, ], }), /** * Get quotation PDF URL */ getQuotationPdf: builder.mutation<QuotationPdfResponse, string>({ query: quotationId => ({ url: `quotations/${quotationId}/pdf`, method: 'GET', }), transformResponse: transformResponse<QuotationPdfResponse>, transformErrorResponse: transformQuotationError, invalidatesTags: (result, error, quotationId) => [ {type: 'QuotationPdf', id: quotationId}, ], }), /** * Accept a quotation * * @remarks * This mutation handles the quotation acceptance workflow: * - Sends PATCH request to accept endpoint * - Invalidates relevant caches (quotation and lead data) * - Triggers automatic refresh of dependent data * * Backend side effects: * - Updates quotation status to 'Accepted' * - Updates lead status to 'Customer Accepted' * - Triggers any configured business logic workflows * * @param quotationId - Unique identifier for the quotation to accept * @returns Promise resolving to success/error response */ acceptQuotation: builder.mutation<QuotationActionResponse, string>({ query: quotationId => ({ url: `quotations/${quotationId}/accept`, method: 'PATCH', body: {}, }), transformErrorResponse: transformQuotationError, invalidatesTags: (result, error, quotationId) => [ {type: 'Quotation', id: quotationId}, {type: 'QuotationsList', id: 'LIST'}, // Also invalidate lead data as quotation acceptance affects lead status {type: 'Lead', id: 'LIST'}, {type: 'LeadsList', id: 'LIST'}, ], }), /** * Reject a quotation * * @remarks * This mutation handles the quotation rejection workflow: * - Sends PATCH request to reject endpoint * - Invalidates relevant caches (quotation and lead data) * - Triggers automatic refresh of dependent data * * Backend side effects: * - Updates quotation status to 'Rejected' * - May update lead status based on business rules * - Triggers any configured business logic workflows * * @param quotationId - Unique identifier for the quotation to reject * @returns Promise resolving to success/error response */ rejectQuotation: builder.mutation<QuotationActionResponse, string>({ query: quotationId => ({ url: `quotations/${quotationId}/reject`, method: 'PATCH', body: {}, }), transformErrorResponse: transformQuotationError, invalidatesTags: (result, error, quotationId) => [ {type: 'Quotation', id: quotationId}, {type: 'QuotationsList', id: 'LIST'}, // Also invalidate lead data as quotation rejection may affect lead {type: 'Lead', id: 'LIST'}, {type: 'LeadsList', id: 'LIST'}, ], }), }), })

Quotations API Definition
transformQuotationError
Default value : (error: any) => { const baseError = transformError(error); // Add quotation-specific error handling if (error.status === 404) { return { ...baseError, message: 'Quotation not found or access denied', }; } if (error.status === 403) { return { ...baseError, message: 'You do not have permission to access this quotation', }; } if (error.status === 409) { return { ...baseError, message: 'Quotation already processed', code: 409, }; } return baseError; }

Transform quotation errors to provide better error messages
Default value : quotationsApi

src/components/debug/RefreshDebugger.tsx

RefreshDebugger
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const [testResults, setTestResults] = useState<string>(''); const [remainingTime, setRemainingTime] = useState<number>(0); const [lastRefreshTime, setLastRefreshTime] = useState<number | null>(null); const {refreshLeads, canRefreshLeads, isRefreshing} = useRefreshControl(); // Update countdown every second useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { if (lastRefreshTime) { const remaining = getRemainingDebounceTime(lastRefreshTime, 60); setRemainingTime(remaining); } }, 1000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [lastRefreshTime]); const testLeadsRefresh = async () => { const timestamp = new Date().toLocaleTimeString(); const canRefresh = canRefreshLeads(); const statusMessage = getDebounceStatusMessage(lastRefreshTime, 60); setTestResults( prev => `${prev}🕐 [${timestamp}] Testing leads refresh...\n` + `📊 Can refresh: ${canRefresh ? '✅ YES' : '❌ NO'}\n` + `⏰ Status: ${statusMessage}\n` ); try { console.log( '[RefreshDebugger] Testing leads refresh - canRefresh:', canRefresh ); const result = await refreshLeads(); const apiCalled = result.refreshedApis.length > 0; const resultIcon = apiCalled ? '✅' : '🚫'; const resultText = apiCalled ? 'API CALLED' : 'BLOCKED BY DEBOUNCE'; setTestResults( prev => `${prev}🎯 Result: ${resultIcon} ${resultText}\n` + `📋 Refreshed APIs: [${ result.refreshedApis.join(', ') || 'none' }]\n` + `${ result.errors.length > 0 ? `❌ Errors: ${result.errors.map(e => e.error).join(', ')}\n` : '' }` + `${'─'.repeat(50)}\n\n` ); // Update last refresh time if API was actually called if (apiCalled) { setLastRefreshTime(Date.now()); } } catch (error: any) { console.error('[RefreshDebugger] Error testing refresh:', error); setTestResults( prev => `${prev}❌ Error: ${error.message || 'Unknown error'}\n` + `${'─'.repeat(50)}\n\n` ); } }; const clearResults = () => { setTestResults(''); setLastRefreshTime(null); setRemainingTime(0); }; const getStatusColor = () => { if (isRefreshing) { return theme.colors.secondary; } if (canRefreshLeads()) { return theme.colors.primary; } return theme.colors.outline; }; return ( <View style={{ padding: 20, backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface, margin: 10, borderRadius: 8, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: theme.colors.outline, }} > <Text style={{ fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: 15, color: theme.colors.onSurface, }} > 🔄 Refresh Debounce Tester </Text> {/* Status Info */} <View style={{ backgroundColor: theme.colors.surfaceVariant, padding: 12, borderRadius: 6, marginBottom: 15, }} > <Text style={{fontSize: 14, color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}}> 📍 Status: {canRefreshLeads() ? '🟢 Ready' : '🔴 Blocked'} </Text> <Text style={{fontSize: 14, color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}}> ⏳ Remaining: {remainingTime > 0 ? `${remainingTime}s` : 'None'} </Text> <Text style={{fontSize: 14, color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}}> 🔄 Refreshing: {isRefreshing ? '✅ Yes' : '❌ No'} </Text> </View> {/* Action Buttons */} <View style={{flexDirection: 'row', gap: 10, marginBottom: 15}}> <TouchableOpacity onPress={testLeadsRefresh} style={{ backgroundColor: getStatusColor(), padding: 15, borderRadius: 8, flex: 1, }} disabled={isRefreshing} > <Text style={{color: 'white', textAlign: 'center', fontWeight: 'bold'}} > {isRefreshing ? '⏳ Testing...' : '🧪 Test Refresh'} </Text> </TouchableOpacity> <TouchableOpacity onPress={clearResults} style={{ backgroundColor: '#666', padding: 15, borderRadius: 8, flex: 0.4, }} > <Text style={{color: 'white', textAlign: 'center'}}>🗑️ Clear</Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> {/* Test Instructions */} <View style={{ backgroundColor: '#e3f2fd', padding: 10, borderRadius: 6, marginBottom: 15, }} > <Text style={{fontSize: 12, color: '#1565c0', fontWeight: 'bold'}}> 📋 Test Instructions: </Text> <Text style={{fontSize: 11, color: '#1565c0'}}> 1. Click "Test Refresh" → Should call API{'\n'} 2. Click again immediately → Should be blocked{'\n'} 3. Wait 60+ seconds → Should call API again </Text> </View> {/* Results Display */} <ScrollView style={{ maxHeight: 300, backgroundColor: '#f8f9fa', padding: 10, borderRadius: 5, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#dee2e6', }} > <Text style={{ fontFamily: 'monospace', fontSize: 11, color: '#333', lineHeight: 16, }} > {testResults || '💡 Click "Test Refresh" to start testing the 60-second debounce...\n\n🎯 Expected: First call works, second call blocked, third call after 60s works.'} </Text> </ScrollView> </View> ); }

src/utils/refreshTimestamps.ts

refreshTimestamps
Default value : new RefreshTimestamps()

src/navigation/roleBasedGuard.tsx

RoleBasedGuard
Type : React.FC<RoleBasedGuardProps>
Default value : ({ children, requireAuth = true, fallback = null, }) => { const isLoggedIn = useAppSelector(selectIsLoggedIn); const isLoading = useAppSelector(selectAuthLoading); // Show loading overlay during authentication check if (isLoading) { return ( <LoadingOverlay visible={true} message="Checking authentication..." /> ); } // If authentication is required but user is not logged in if (requireAuth && !isLoggedIn) { return fallback ? <>{fallback}</> : null; } // If user is logged in but trying to access auth screens if (!requireAuth && isLoggedIn) { return fallback ? <>{fallback}</> : null; } return <>{children}</>; }

Role-Based Guard Component Redirects unauthenticated users or shows loading state

src/navigation/RootNavigator.tsx

RootNavigator
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const isLoggedIn = useAppSelector(selectIsLoggedIn); const navigationRef = useNavigationContainerRef(); const [isReady, setIsReady] = useState(false); const [initialState, setInitialState] = useState(); const handleNotificationPress = () => { if (navigationRef.current) { navigationRef.current.navigate('Notifications' as never); } }; const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); const {isPersisting, flush} = usePersistenceStatus(); // Get notifications from RTK Query const {data: notifications = []} = useGetNotificationsQuery(undefined, { selectFromResult: result => ({ ...result, data: result.data || [], }), }); // Populate Redux slice with RTK Query data useEffect(() => { if (notifications.length > 0) { dispatch(setNotifications(notifications)); } }, [notifications, dispatch]); // Get read IDs from Redux slice const readIds = useAppSelector(state => state.notifications?.readIds || []); // Compute unread count const unreadCount = useMemo(() => { const readIdSet = new Set(readIds); return notifications.filter(notification => !readIdSet.has(notification.id)) .length; }, [notifications, readIds]); const handleMarkAllRead = useCallback(async () => { try { console.log('[Navigation] Marking all notifications as read...'); // Get current notification IDs const notificationIds = notifications.map( notification => notification.id ); console.log( '[Navigation] Marking notification IDs as read:', notificationIds ); // Dispatch individual markAsRead actions for each notification notificationIds.forEach(id => dispatch(markAsRead(id))); await flush(); console.log('[Navigation] Mark all read completed with persistence'); } catch (error) { console.error('[Navigation] Mark all read failed:', error); } }, [dispatch, flush, notifications]); const NotificationHeaderRight = () => ( <View style={{flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center'}}> {unreadCount > 0 && ( <Button mode="text" onPress={handleMarkAllRead} disabled={isPersisting} loading={isPersisting} style={{marginRight: 8}} labelStyle={{fontSize: 12, color: theme.colors.onPrimary}} > Mark All Read </Button> )} </View> ); const HeaderRight = () => ( <NotificationBellIcon onPress={handleNotificationPress} /> ); /** * Load persisted navigation state */ useEffect(() => { const restoreState = async () => { try { const state = await getStorageItem(NAVIGATION_PERSISTENCE_KEY); if (state !== null) { setInitialState(state); } } catch (e) { console.warn('[Navigation] Failed to restore navigation state:', e); } finally { setIsReady(true); } }; if (!isReady) { restoreState(); } }, [isReady]); /** * Persist navigation state changes */ const onStateChange = (state: any) => { if (isReady && state) { setStorageItem(NAVIGATION_PERSISTENCE_KEY, state).catch((e: any) => { console.warn('[Navigation] Failed to persist navigation state:', e); }); } }; /** * Handle deep link */ const onReady = () => { console.log('[Navigation] Navigation container ready'); }; if (!isReady) { // You could show a splash screen here return null; } return ( <NavigationContainer ref={navigationRef} linking={linkingConfig} initialState={initialState} onStateChange={onStateChange} onReady={onReady} theme={{ ...DefaultTheme, dark: false, colors: { ...DefaultTheme.colors, primary: theme.colors.primary, background: theme.colors.background, card: theme.colors.surface, text: theme.colors.onSurface, border: theme.colors.outline, notification: theme.colors.error, }, }} > <Stack.Navigator screenOptions={{ headerShown: false, cardStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.background, }, }} > {isLoggedIn ? ( // Authenticated Stack <> <Stack.Screen name="Main" component={MainTabNavigator} /> <Stack.Screen name="ServiceDetail" component={ServiceDetailScreen} options={{ headerShown: true, title: 'Service Detail', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> <Stack.Screen name="LeadDetail" component={LeadDetailScreen} options={{ headerShown: true, title: 'Lead Detail', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> <Stack.Screen name="CartCheckout" component={CartCheckoutScreen} options={{ headerShown: true, title: 'Cart Checkout', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> <Stack.Screen name="Notifications" component={NotificationsScreen} options={{ headerShown: true, title: 'Notifications', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerRight: () => <NotificationHeaderRight />, }} /> <Stack.Screen name="TicketThread" component={TicketThreadScreen} options={{ headerShown: true, title: 'Ticket Thread', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerRight: () => <HeaderRight />, }} /> </> ) : ( // Unauthenticated Stack <Stack.Screen name="Auth" component={AuthStack} /> )} </Stack.Navigator> </NavigationContainer> ); }

Root Navigator Component
Stack
Default value : createStackNavigator<RootStackParamList>()

src/components/common/SafeAreaContainer/SafeAreaContainer.tsx

SafeAreaContainer
Type : React.FC<SafeAreaContainerProps>
Default value : ({ children, backgroundColor = '#FFFFFF', keyboardAvoiding = false, scrollable = false, padding, paddingHorizontal, paddingVertical, style, testID, accessibilityLabel, }) => { // Container styles const containerStyles = useMemo( () => [ styles.container, {backgroundColor}, padding && {padding}, paddingHorizontal && {paddingHorizontal}, paddingVertical && {paddingVertical}, style, ], [backgroundColor, padding, paddingHorizontal, paddingVertical, style] ); // Render content with optional keyboard avoidance const renderContent = () => { if (keyboardAvoiding) { return ( <KeyboardAvoidingView style={styles.keyboardAvoidingView} behavior={Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'padding' : 'height'} keyboardVerticalOffset={Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 0 : 20} > {scrollable ? ( <ScrollView style={styles.scrollView} contentContainerStyle={styles.scrollViewContent} keyboardShouldPersistTaps="handled" showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} > {children} </ScrollView> ) : ( <View style={styles.content}>{children}</View> )} </KeyboardAvoidingView> ); } if (scrollable) { return ( <ScrollView style={styles.scrollView} contentContainerStyle={styles.scrollViewContent} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} > {children} </ScrollView> ); } return <View style={styles.content}>{children}</View>; }; return ( <SafeAreaView style={containerStyles as StyleProp<ViewStyle>} testID={testID} accessibilityLabel={accessibilityLabel} > {renderContent()} </SafeAreaView> ); }

src/components/layout/SafeAreaLayout.tsx

SafeAreaLayout
Type : React.FC<SafeAreaLayoutProps>
Default value : ({ children, scrollable = false, keyboardAvoiding = true, backgroundColor, statusBarStyle = 'dark-content', edges = ['top', 'bottom', 'left', 'right'], style, }) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const bgColor = backgroundColor || theme.colors.background; // Render content based on configuration const renderContent = () => { if (keyboardAvoiding) { return ( <KeyboardAvoidingView style={styles.keyboardAvoidingView} behavior={Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'padding' : 'height'} keyboardVerticalOffset={Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 0 : 20} > {scrollable ? ( <ScrollView style={[styles.scrollView, {backgroundColor: bgColor}]} contentContainerStyle={[styles.scrollContent, style]} keyboardShouldPersistTaps="handled" showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} > {children} </ScrollView> ) : ( <View style={[styles.content, {backgroundColor: bgColor}, style]}> {children} </View> )} </KeyboardAvoidingView> ); } if (scrollable) { return ( <ScrollView style={[styles.scrollView, {backgroundColor: bgColor}]} contentContainerStyle={[styles.scrollContent, style]} keyboardShouldPersistTaps="handled" showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} > {children} </ScrollView> ); } return ( <View style={[styles.content, {backgroundColor: bgColor}, style]}> {children} </View> ); }; return ( <> <StatusBar barStyle={statusBarStyle} backgroundColor={bgColor} translucent={false} /> <SafeAreaView style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: bgColor}]} edges={edges} > {renderContent()} </SafeAreaView> </> ); }

Safe Area Layout Component Provides consistent safe area handling across all screens
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, content: { flex: 1, }, scrollView: { flex: 1, }, scrollContent: { flexGrow: 1, }, keyboardAvoidingView: { flex: 1, }, })

src/lib/kycUploader.ts

sasTokenMutex
Default value : new SasTokenMutex()

src/refresh/refreshSelectors.ts

selectCanRefresh
Default value : createSelector( [selectIsRefreshing], isRefreshing => !isRefreshing )
selectFormattedLastRefresh
Default value : createSelector( [selectLastRefreshAt], lastRefreshAt => { if (!lastRefreshAt) { return 'Never refreshed'; } const refreshDate = new Date(lastRefreshAt); const now = new Date(); const diffInMs = now.getTime() - refreshDate.getTime(); const diffInMinutes = Math.floor(diffInMs / (1000 * 60)); const diffInHours = Math.floor(diffInMinutes / 60); const diffInDays = Math.floor(diffInHours / 24); if (diffInMinutes < 1) { return 'Just now'; } else if (diffInMinutes < 60) { return `${diffInMinutes} minute${diffInMinutes === 1 ? '' : 's'} ago`; } else if (diffInHours < 24) { return `${diffInHours} hour${diffInHours === 1 ? '' : 's'} ago`; } else if (diffInDays < 7) { return `${diffInDays} day${diffInDays === 1 ? '' : 's'} ago`; } else { return refreshDate.toLocaleDateString(); } } )
selectIsRefreshing
Default value : createSelector( [selectRefreshState], refresh => refresh.isRefreshing )
selectLastRefreshAt
Default value : createSelector( [selectRefreshState], refresh => refresh.lastRefreshAt )
selectRefreshCount
Default value : createSelector( [selectRefreshState], refresh => refresh.refreshCount )
selectRefreshError
Default value : createSelector( [selectRefreshState], refresh => refresh.refreshError )
selectRefreshInfo
Default value : createSelector( [ selectIsRefreshing, selectLastRefreshAt, selectRefreshError, selectRefreshCount, selectRefreshProgress, selectCanRefresh, selectFormattedLastRefresh, ], ( isRefreshing, lastRefreshAt, refreshError, refreshCount, refreshProgress, canRefresh, formattedLastRefresh ) => ({ isRefreshing, lastRefreshAt, refreshError, refreshCount, refreshProgress, canRefresh, formattedLastRefresh, }) )
selectRefreshProgress
Default value : createSelector( [selectRefreshState], refresh => refresh.refreshProgress )
selectRefreshProgressPercentage
Default value : createSelector( [selectRefreshProgress], progress => { if (progress.total === 0) { return 0; } return Math.round((progress.current / progress.total) * 100); } )
selectRefreshState
Default value : (state: RootState): RefreshState => state.refresh

src/screens/main/ServiceDetailScreen.tsx

ServiceDetailScreen
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const route = useRoute<ServiceDetailRouteProp>(); const {serviceId} = route.params; // Fetch service details const { data: service, isLoading, isError, error, refetch, } = useGetServiceByIdQuery(serviceId); /** * Handle contact action */ const handleContact = () => { Alert.alert( 'Contact for Service', 'Would you like to get in touch about this service?', [ {text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel'}, { text: 'Contact', onPress: () => { // TODO: Implement contact functionality Alert.alert( 'Coming Soon', 'Contact feature will be available soon!' ); }, }, ] ); }; /** * Handle retry */ const handleRetry = () => { refetch(); }; if (isLoading) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.loadingText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Loading service details... </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } if (isError || !service) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={[styles.errorTitle, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> Failed to Load Service </Text> <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.retryButton, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary}, ]} onPress={handleRetry} > <Text style={[styles.retryButtonText, {color: theme.colors.onPrimary}]} > Retry </Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <ScrollView style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} contentContainerStyle={styles.contentContainer} > {/* Service Header */} <View style={[styles.headerCard, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]} > <View style={styles.headerContent}> <MaterialIcons name="solar-power" size={48} color={theme.colors.primary} style={styles.headerIcon} /> <View style={styles.headerText}> <Text style={[styles.serviceName, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} > {service.name} </Text> <Text style={[ styles.serviceType, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > {service.type} </Text> </View> </View> </View> {/* Service Description */} <View style={[styles.card, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]}> <Text style={[styles.cardTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Description </Text> <Text style={[styles.description, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > {service.description} </Text> </View> {/* Price Information */} {service.priceRange && ( <View style={[styles.card, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]}> <Text style={[styles.cardTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Pricing </Text> <View style={styles.priceContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="currency-rupee" size={20} color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.priceText, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Contact us for detailed pricing information </Text> </View> </View> )} {/* Status */} <View style={[styles.card, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]}> <Text style={[styles.cardTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Availability </Text> <View style={styles.statusContainer}> <MaterialIcons name={'check-circle'} size={20} color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[ styles.statusText, { color: theme.colors.primary, }, ]} > {'Available'} </Text> </View> </View> {/* Contact Button */} {service.active && ( <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.contactButton, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary}, ]} onPress={handleContact} > <MaterialIcons name="phone" size={20} color={theme.colors.onPrimary} style={styles.contactIcon} /> <Text style={[ styles.contactButtonText, {color: theme.colors.onPrimary}, ]} > Contact for This Service </Text> </TouchableOpacity> )} </ScrollView> </SafeAreaContainer> ); }

Service Detail Screen Component
styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, contentContainer: { padding: 16, }, loadingContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', }, loadingText: { fontSize: 16, marginTop: 16, }, errorContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, errorTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 24, textAlign: 'center', }, retryButton: { paddingHorizontal: 24, paddingVertical: 12, borderRadius: 8, }, retryButtonText: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '600', }, headerCard: { padding: 20, borderRadius: 12, marginBottom: 16, elevation: 2, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 1}, shadowOpacity: 0.2, shadowRadius: 2, }, headerContent: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', }, headerIcon: { marginRight: 16, }, headerText: { flex: 1, }, serviceName: { fontSize: 24, fontWeight: '700', marginBottom: 4, }, serviceType: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '500', }, card: { padding: 16, borderRadius: 12, marginBottom: 16, elevation: 2, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 1}, shadowOpacity: 0.2, shadowRadius: 2, }, cardTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', marginBottom: 12, }, description: { fontSize: 16, lineHeight: 24, }, priceContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', }, priceText: { fontSize: 16, marginLeft: 8, }, statusContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', }, statusText: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '500', marginLeft: 8, }, contactButton: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', padding: 16, borderRadius: 12, marginTop: 8, }, contactIcon: { marginRight: 8, }, contactButtonText: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', }, })

Styles

src/screens/main/ServicesScreen.tsx

ServiceItem
Type : React.FC<ServiceItemProps>
Default value : ({ service, onPress, onAddToCart, isCartFull, cartItemCount, }) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const handleAddToCart = () => { onAddToCart(service); }; const handleIncrement = () => { onAddToCart(service); // Reuse the same add logic }; const handleDecrement = () => { // This will be passed from parent onAddToCart(service, -1); // Indicate decrement }; const canAddToCart = !isCartFull || cartItemCount > 0; const showQuantityControls = cartItemCount > 0; return ( <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.serviceItem, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]} onPress={() => onPress(service)} activeOpacity={0.7} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="button" accessibilityLabel={`${service.name}, ${service.type} service. ${service.description}`} accessibilityHint="Tap to view service details" > <View style={styles.serviceHeader}> <MaterialIcons name="solar-power" size={24} color={theme.colors.primary} style={styles.serviceIcon} /> <View style={styles.serviceInfo}> <Text style={[styles.serviceName, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> {service.name} </Text> <Text style={[styles.serviceType, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > {service.type} </Text> </View> <MaterialIcons name="chevron-right" size={24} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} /> </View> <Text style={[ styles.serviceDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} numberOfLines={2} > {service.description} </Text> <View style={styles.serviceFooter}> {service.priceRange && ( <View style={styles.priceContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="currency-rupee" size={16} color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.priceText, {color: theme.colors.primary}]}> Contact for pricing </Text> </View> )} <View style={styles.cartButtonContainer}> {showQuantityControls ? ( // Quantity Controls Block <View style={[ styles.quantityControlsBlock, {borderColor: theme.colors.outline}, ]} > {/* Minus Button */} <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.quantityButton, styles.quantityButtonLeft, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}, ]} onPress={handleDecrement} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="button" accessibilityLabel={`Decrease ${service.name} quantity`} accessibilityHint={ cartItemCount === 1 ? 'Will remove from cart' : `Will decrease to ${cartItemCount - 1}` } > <MaterialIcons name="remove" size={18} color={theme.colors.onSurface} /> </TouchableOpacity> {/* Quantity Display */} <View style={[ styles.quantityDisplay, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.primaryContainer}, ]} > <Text style={[ styles.quantityText, {color: theme.colors.onPrimaryContainer}, ]} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="text" > {cartItemCount} </Text> </View> {/* Plus Button */} <TouchableOpacity style={[ styles.quantityButton, styles.quantityButtonRight, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}, ]} onPress={handleIncrement} disabled={isCartFull && cartItemCount === 0} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="button" accessibilityLabel={`Increase ${service.name} quantity`} accessibilityHint={ isCartFull && cartItemCount === 0 ? 'Cannot add more, cart is full' : `Will increase to ${cartItemCount + 1}` } > <MaterialIcons name="add" size={18} color={ isCartFull && cartItemCount === 0 ? theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant : theme.colors.onSurface } /> </TouchableOpacity> </View> ) : ( // ADD Button (when quantity is 0) <Button mode="contained" onPress={handleAddToCart} disabled={!canAddToCart} compact style={[ styles.addButton, !canAddToCart && styles.addButtonDisabled, ]} contentStyle={styles.addButtonContent} labelStyle={styles.addButtonLabel} accessibilityRole="button" accessibilityLabel={ !canAddToCart ? 'Cannot add to cart, limit reached' : `Add ${service.name} to cart` } accessibilityHint={ !canAddToCart ? 'Cart is full with 20 items' : 'Adds this service to your cart' } > {isCartFull && cartItemCount === 0 ? 'Cart Full' : 'ADD'} </Button> )} </View> </View> </TouchableOpacity> ); }
ServicesScreen
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const navigation = useNavigation<ServicesScreenNavigationProp>(); const route = useRoute<ServicesScreenRouteProp>(); // Local state for success snackbar const [successSnackbarVisible, setSuccessSnackbarVisible] = useState(false); const [successMessage, setSuccessMessage] = useState(''); // Use the collective refresh control hook const { refreshAll, isRefreshing: isCollectiveRefreshing, refreshError, getFormattedLastRefresh, clearError, } = useRefreshControl(); // Fetch services - only active services const { data: services = [], isLoading, isError, error, refetch, } = useGetServicesQuery({active: true}); // Cart actions const {addToCart, removeFromCart, cartCount, isCartFull, cartItems} = useCartActions(); const navigationToNotiScreen = useNavigation<RootStackScreenProps<'Main'>['navigation']>(); const handleNotificationPress = () => { navigationToNotiScreen.navigate('Notifications'); }; const handleProfilePress = () => { navigation.navigate('Profile'); }; /** * Configure header with notification-bell-icon and cart-icon */ useLayoutEffect(() => { navigation.setOptions({ headerShown: true, title: 'Services', headerStyle: { backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary, }, headerTintColor: theme.colors.onPrimary, headerTitleStyle: { fontWeight: '600', }, headerRight: () => ( <View style={styles.headerRightContainer}> {/* Notification Bell Icon */} <NotificationBellIcon onPress={handleNotificationPress} /> {/* Cart Icon */} <TouchableOpacity style={styles.headerCartButton} onPress={() => navigation.navigate(CART_CHECKOUT_ROUTE as any)} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="button" accessibilityLabel={`Shopping cart with ${cartCount} items`} accessibilityHint="Navigate to cart checkout" > <View style={styles.cartIconContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="shopping-cart" size={24} color={theme.colors.onPrimary} /> {cartCount > 0 && ( <View style={[ styles.cartBadge, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.error}, ]} > <Text style={[ styles.cartBadgeText, {color: theme.colors.onError}, ]} > {cartCount > 99 ? '99+' : cartCount.toString()} </Text> </View> )} </View> </TouchableOpacity> {/* Profile Icon */} <ProfileIcon onPress={handleProfilePress} /> </View> ), }); }, [navigation, theme.colors, cartCount]); /** * Handle success message from navigation params */ useEffect(() => { if (route.params?.showSuccessMessage && route.params?.successMessage) { setSuccessMessage(route.params.successMessage); setSuccessSnackbarVisible(true); // Clear the params to prevent showing message again on re-focus navigation.setParams({ showSuccessMessage: undefined, successMessage: undefined, leadId: undefined, }); } }, [route.params, navigation]); /** * Handle service item press */ const handleServicePress = useCallback( (service: Service) => { navigation.navigate('ServiceDetail', { serviceId: service.serviceId, serviceName: service.name, }); }, [navigation] ); /** * Handle add to cart (supports both add and decrement) */ const handleAddToCart = useCallback( (service: Service, increment: number = 1) => { if (increment > 0) { // Adding to cart if (isCartFull) { const existingItem = cartItems[service.serviceId]; if (!existingItem) { Alert.alert( 'Cart Full', 'You have reached the maximum of 20 items in your cart. Please remove some items to add new ones.', [{text: 'OK'}] ); return; } } try { addToCart(service, increment); } catch (error) { console.error('[ServicesScreen] Add to cart failed:', error); Alert.alert( 'Error', 'Could not add item to cart. Please try again.', [{text: 'OK'}] ); } } else { // Removing from cart (decrement) try { removeFromCart(service.serviceId, Math.abs(increment)); } catch (error) { console.error('[ServicesScreen] Remove from cart failed:', error); Alert.alert( 'Error', 'Could not remove item from cart. Please try again.', [{text: 'OK'}] ); } } }, [addToCart, removeFromCart, isCartFull, cartItems] ); /** * Handle collective refresh - refreshes all app data */ const handleRefresh = useCallback(async () => { try { // Clear any previous refresh errors if (refreshError) { clearError(); } // Perform collective refresh of all APIs const result = await refreshAll({ showLoading: true, includeUserData: true, // This will refresh auth and leads data too }); if (!result.success && result.errors.length > 0) { // Show error if refresh failed const errorMessage = result.errors .map(err => `${err.api}: ${err.error}`) .join('\n'); Alert.alert( 'Refresh Warning', `Some data may not be up to date:\n${errorMessage}`, [{text: 'OK'}] ); } } catch (error) { console.error('[ServicesScreen] Refresh failed:', error); Alert.alert( 'Refresh Failed', 'Could not refresh app data. Please try again.', [{text: 'OK'}] ); } }, [refreshAll, refreshError, clearError]); /** * Handle fallback refresh (RTK Query only) when collective refresh fails */ const handleFallbackRefresh = useCallback(() => { refetch(); }, [refetch]); /** * Handle retry on error */ const handleRetry = useCallback(() => { // Try collective refresh first, fallback to RTK Query refetch handleRefresh().catch(() => { handleFallbackRefresh(); }); }, [handleRefresh, handleFallbackRefresh]); /** * Show error alert */ const showErrorAlert = useCallback(() => { const errorMessage = isError && error ? 'data' in error ? typeof error.data === 'string' ? error.data : 'Failed to load services' : 'Network error occurred' : 'Unknown error occurred'; Alert.alert('Error Loading Services', errorMessage, [ {text: 'Retry', onPress: handleRetry}, {text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel'}, ]); }, [isError, error, handleRetry]); /** * Render service item */ const renderServiceItem = useCallback( ({item}: {item: Service}) => { const cartItem = cartItems[item.serviceId]; const cartItemCount = cartItem?.qty || 0; return ( <ServiceItem service={item} onPress={handleServicePress} onAddToCart={handleAddToCart} isCartFull={isCartFull} cartItemCount={cartItemCount} /> ); }, [handleServicePress, handleAddToCart, isCartFull, cartItems] ); /** * Render empty state */ const renderEmptyState = () => ( <View style={styles.emptyContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="solar-power" size={64} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} /> <Text style={[styles.emptyTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> No Services Available </Text> <Text style={[styles.emptyMessage, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Services will appear here once they are available. </Text> {/* Show last refresh info */} <Text style={[styles.lastRefreshText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Last updated: {getFormattedLastRefresh()} </Text> </View> ); /** * Render loading state */ const renderLoadingState = () => ( <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.loadingText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Loading services... </Text> </View> ); /** * Render error state */ const renderErrorState = () => ( <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={[styles.errorTitle, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> Failed to Load Services </Text> <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.retryButton, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary}]} onPress={handleRetry} > <Text style={[styles.retryButtonText, {color: theme.colors.onPrimary}]}> Retry </Text> </TouchableOpacity> <TouchableOpacity style={styles.detailsButton} onPress={showErrorAlert}> <Text style={[styles.detailsButtonText, {color: theme.colors.primary}]}> View Details </Text> </TouchableOpacity> </View> ); /** * Render header with last refresh info and cart summary */ const renderHeader = () => ( <View style={styles.headerContainer}> <Text style={[ styles.lastRefreshHeader, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Last updated: {getFormattedLastRefresh()} </Text> {cartCount > 0 && ( <Text style={[styles.cartSummaryText, {color: theme.colors.primary}]} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="text" accessibilityLabel={`Cart contains ${cartCount} item${ cartCount === 1 ? '' : 's' }`} > Cart: {cartCount} item{cartCount === 1 ? '' : 's'} </Text> )} </View> ); /** * Main render */ if (isLoading) { return <SafeAreaContainer>{renderLoadingState()}</SafeAreaContainer>; } if (isError) { return <SafeAreaContainer>{renderErrorState()}</SafeAreaContainer>; } return ( <SafeAreaContainer> <View style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} > <FlatList data={services} keyExtractor={item => item.serviceId} renderItem={renderServiceItem} contentContainerStyle={styles.listContainer} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isCollectiveRefreshing || isLoading} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} title="Refreshing all data..." titleColor={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} /> } ListHeaderComponent={services.length > 0 ? renderHeader : undefined} ListEmptyComponent={renderEmptyState} /> </View> {/* Success Snackbar */} <Snackbar visible={successSnackbarVisible} onDismiss={() => setSuccessSnackbarVisible(false)} duration={5000} action={{ label: 'Dismiss', onPress: () => setSuccessSnackbarVisible(false), }} style={{ backgroundColor: theme.colors.primaryContainer, marginBottom: 16, }} > <Text style={{color: theme.colors.onPrimaryContainer}}> {successMessage} </Text> </Snackbar> </SafeAreaContainer> ); }

Services Screen Component

Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, listContainer: { padding: 16, flexGrow: 1, }, serviceItem: { padding: 16, paddingBottom: 20, marginBottom: 12, borderRadius: 12, elevation: 14, lineHeight: 20, marginBottom: 8, }, priceContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', }, priceText: { fontSize: 14, fontWeight: '500', marginLeft: 4, }, // Header headerContainer: { paddingBottom: 8, marginBottom: 8, }, lastRefreshHeader: { fontSize: 12, textAlign: 'center', fontStyle: 'italic', }, // Empty state emptyContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: // Small top margin for spacing }, addButtonDisabled: { opacity: 0.6, }, addButtonContent: { height: 36, // Match button height paddingHorizontal: 12, }, addButtonLabel: { fontSize: 12, fontWeight: })

Styles

src/api/endpoints/services.ts

servicesApi
Default value : createApi({ reducerPath: 'servicesApi', baseQuery, tagTypes: ['Services', 'Service'], endpoints: builder => ({ /** * Get all services with optional filters */ getServices: builder.query<Service[], GetServicesRequest | void>({ query: params => { const queryParams = params ? { ...(params.type && {type: params.type}), ...(params.priceRange && {priceRange: params.priceRange}), ...(params.active !== undefined && {active: params.active}), ...(params.category && {category: params.category}), } : {}; return { url: '/services', method: 'GET', params: queryParams, }; }, transformResponse: (response: any): Service[] => { try { // Debug: Log the actual response format in development if (__DEV__) { console.log( '[ServicesAPI] Raw response:', JSON.stringify(response, null, 2) ); } // Handle different possible response formats // Format 1: {success: true, data: {items: [...]}} - Primary API format if (response.success && response.data && response.data.items) { if (__DEV__) { console.log( '[ServicesAPI] Using format 1 - items array:', response.data.items.length ); } // Transform the API response to match our interface return response.data.items.map((item: any) => ({ serviceId: item.serviceId, name: item.name, description: item.description, type: item.type, priceRange: item.priceRange || {}, active: item.status === 'Active' || item.active === true, category: item.category, features: item.features || [], estimatedDuration: item.estimatedDuration, createdAt: item.createdAt, updatedAt: item.updatedAt, })); } // Format 2: {success: true, data: {services: [...]}} - Legacy format if (response.success && response.data && response.data.services) { if (__DEV__) { console.log( '[ServicesAPI] Using format 2 - services array:', response.data.services.length ); } return response.data.services; } // Format 3: {success: true, data: [...]} (direct array) if (response.success && Array.isArray(response.data)) { if (__DEV__) { console.log( '[ServicesAPI] Using format 3 - direct array:', response.data.length ); } return response.data; } // Format 4: Direct array response [...] if (Array.isArray(response)) { if (__DEV__) { console.log( '[ServicesAPI] Using format 4 - direct response array:', response.length ); } return response; } // Format 5: {services: [...]} (no success field) if (response.services && Array.isArray(response.services)) { if (__DEV__) { console.log( '[ServicesAPI] Using format 5 - services field:', response.services.length ); } return response.services; } console.error('[ServicesAPI] Unknown response format:', response); throw ServiceFetchError.forListFetch( new Error(response.error || 'Unknown response format') ); } catch (error) { if (error instanceof ServiceFetchError) { throw error; } throw ServiceFetchError.forListFetch( error instanceof Error ? error : new Error('Response parsing failed') ); } }, transformErrorResponse: (error: any) => { const transformedError = transformError(error); console.error( '[ServicesAPI] Services list fetch error:', transformedError ); // Extract HTTP status if available const httpStatus = error.status || error.data?.status; throw ServiceFetchError.forListFetch( new Error(transformedError.message || 'Failed to fetch services'), httpStatus ); }, // This tag is invalidated by the unified refresh system providesTags: ['Services'], }), /** * Get service details by ID */ getServiceById: builder.query<Service, string>({ query: serviceId => ({ url: `/services/${serviceId}`, method: 'GET', }), transformResponse: (response: any): Service => { try { if (__DEV__) { console.log('[ServicesAPI] Service detail response:', response); } // Handle different response formats if (response.success && response.data) { return { serviceId: response.data.serviceId, name: response.data.name, description: response.data.description, type: response.data.type, priceRange: response.data.priceRange || {}, active: response.data.status === 'Active' || response.data.active === true, category: response.data.category, features: response.data.features || [], estimatedDuration: response.data.estimatedDuration, createdAt: response.data.createdAt, updatedAt: response.data.updatedAt, }; } // Direct service object if (response.serviceId) { return response; } throw ServiceFetchError.forServiceFetch( 'unknown', new Error(response.error || 'Invalid service response format') ); } catch (error) { if (error instanceof ServiceFetchError) { throw error; } throw ServiceFetchError.forServiceFetch( 'unknown', error instanceof Error ? error : new Error('Service parsing failed') ); } }, transformErrorResponse: (error: any, meta, arg) => { const transformedError = transformError(error); console.error( `[ServicesAPI] Service fetch error for ${arg}:`, transformedError ); const httpStatus = error.status || error.data?.status; throw ServiceFetchError.forServiceFetch( arg, new Error( transformedError.message || 'Failed to fetch service details' ), httpStatus ); }, // Individual service tags - also invalidated by unified refresh providesTags: (result, error, serviceId) => [ {type: 'Service' as const, id: serviceId}, ], }), }), })

Services API slice Tags: 'Services' for list, 'Service' for individual items These tags are used by the unified refresh system in refreshThunks.ts
Default value : servicesApi

{width: 0, height: 2}, shadowOpacity: 0.1, shadowRadius: 4, }, icon: { fontSize: 48, }, title: { fontSize: typography.fontSize.xxl, fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.bold, color: colors.text.primary, lineHeight: typography.fontSize.md * typography.lineHeight.relaxed, marginBottom: spacing.xl, paddingHorizontal: spacing.sm, }, errorDetails: { backgroundColor: colors.surface, padding: spacing.md, color: colors.error, marginBottom: spacing.xs, }, errorMessage: { fontSize: typography.fontSize.xs, fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.medium, color: colors.text.primary, marginBottom: spacing.xs, backgroundColor: '#f5f5f5', padding: spacing.xs, borderRadius: 4, }, errorStack: { fontSize: typography.fontSize.xs, fontFamily: 'monospace', color: colors.text.secondary, backgroundColor: '#f8f8f8', supportText: { fontSize: typography.fontSize.sm, fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.regular, color: colors.text.secondary, textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: spacing.xs, }, supportEmail: { fontSize: typography.fontSize.sm, fontFamily: typography.fontFamily.medium, color: colors.primary, textAlign: 'center', }, })

src/components/tickets/TicketListItemComponent.tsx

styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { marginHorizontal: spacing.md, marginBottom: spacing.sm, padding: spacing.md, borderRadius: borderRadius.medium, elevation: 2, shadowColor: '#000', shadowOffset: {width: 0, height: 1}, shadowOpacity: 0.1, shadowRadius: 2, minHeight: 100, }, ticketHeader: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginBottom: spacing.sm, }, ticketId: { fontSize: 12, fontWeight: '600', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: 0.5, }, subject: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '500', lineHeight: 22, marginBottom: spacing.sm, }, footer: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginTop: spacing.xs, }, leadInfo: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', flex: 1, }, leadIcon: { marginRight: spacing.xs, }, leadId: { fontSize: 12, fontWeight: '500', flex: 1, }, timeContainer: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', }, timeIcon: { marginRight: 4, }, timeText: { fontSize: 11, fontWeight: '400', }, })

TicketListItemComponent Styles Styling for ticket list row component following app design patterns
TicketListItemComponent
Type : React.FC<TicketListItemProps>
Default value : React.memo( ({ticket, onPress, testID}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const relativeTime = getRelativeTime(ticket.createdAt); // Accessible label for screen readers const accessibleLabel = `Ticket ${ticket.ticketId}, ${ticket.subject}, Status: ${ticket.status}, Created ${relativeTime}`; const handlePress = () => { onPress(ticket.ticketId); }; return ( <TouchableOpacity style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}]} onPress={handlePress} testID={testID} accessible={true} accessibilityRole="button" accessibilityLabel={accessibleLabel} accessibilityHint="Tap to view ticket details" > {/* Ticket Header - ID and Status */} <View style={styles.ticketHeader}> <Text style={[styles.ticketId, {color: theme.colors.primary}]} accessible={false} > {ticket.ticketId} </Text> <StatusBadge status={ticket.status} variant="compact" testID={`${testID}-status`} /> </View> {/* Ticket Subject */} <Text style={[styles.subject, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]} numberOfLines={2} accessible={false} > {ticket.subject} </Text> {/* Footer - Lead ID and Created Time */} <View style={styles.footer}> <View style={styles.leadInfo}> <MaterialIcons name="assignment" size={14} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} style={styles.leadIcon} /> <Text style={[styles.leadId, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} numberOfLines={1} accessible={false} > {ticket.leadId} </Text> </View> <View style={styles.timeContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="schedule" size={12} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} style={styles.timeIcon} /> <Text style={[styles.timeText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} accessible={false} > {relativeTime} </Text> </View> </View> </TouchableOpacity> ); } )

TicketListItemComponent Memoized for performance in FlatList

src/screens/main/TicketThreadScreen.tsx

styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, loadingContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, loadingText: { fontSize: 16, marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center', }, listContent: { flexGrow: 1, }, // Header styles headerContainer: { padding: 16, borderBottomWidth: 1, borderBottomColor: '#E0E0E0', marginBottom: 8, }, headerTop: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginBottom: 8, }, titleSection: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', flex: 1, }, ticketId: { fontSize: 16, fontWeight: '700', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: 0.5, marginRight: 12, }, leadId: { fontSize: 12, fontWeight: '500', }, subject: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: '600', marginBottom: 8, lineHeight: 24, }, description: { fontSize: 14, lineHeight: 20, marginBottom: 12, }, headerBottom: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', }, createdAt: { fontSize: 12, }, closedAt: { fontSize: 12, }, // Message input section messageInputContainer: { padding: 16, borderTopWidth: 1, borderTopColor: '#E0E0E0', minHeight: 80, }, messageInputRow: { flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'flex-end', gap: 12, }, messageInput: { flex: 1, maxHeight: 100, minHeight: 40, borderWidth: 1, borderRadius: 8, padding: 12, fontSize: 16, textAlignVertical: 'top', }, sendButton: { alignSelf: 'flex-end', }, // Reopen section reopenSection: { marginTop: 16, paddingTop: 16, borderTopWidth: 1, borderTopColor: '#E0E0E0', }, reopenButton: { alignSelf: 'flex-start', }, reopenForm: { marginTop: 8, }, reopenInput: { marginBottom: 16, }, reopenButtons: { flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', gap: 12, }, cancelButton: { flex: 1, }, submitButton: { flex: 1, }, // Empty and error states emptyContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, paddingVertical: 64, }, emptyTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, emptyDescription: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 24, }, errorContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, errorTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, errorDescription: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 24, }, })
TicketThreadScreen
Type : React.FC<Props>
Default value : ({ route, navigation: _navigation, }) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const {ticketId} = route?.params ?? {}; // Add message input state const [newMessage, setNewMessage] = useState(''); const [isSendingMessage, setIsSendingMessage] = useState(false); // Handle message input changes const handleMessageChange = React.useCallback((text: string) => { setNewMessage(text); }, []); // Local state for re-open functionality const [reopenReason, setReopenReason] = useState(''); const [showReopenForm, setShowReopenForm] = useState(false); const [snackbarVisible, setSnackbarVisible] = useState(false); const [snackbarMessage, setSnackbarMessage] = useState(''); // API and Redux data const { data: ticketDetail, isLoading, isError, error: _error, isFetching, } = useGetTicketByIdQuery(ticketId); const cachedTicket = useAppSelector(selectTicketById(ticketId)); const [addMessage] = useAddMessageMutation(); const [reopenTicket, {isLoading: isReopening}] = useReopenTicketMutation(); // Refresh control const {refreshTickets, canRefreshTickets} = useRefreshControl(); // Use API data first, fallback to cached data const ticket = ticketDetail || cachedTicket; /** * Handle pull-to-refresh */ const handleRefresh = useCallback(async () => { console.log('[TicketThread] Pull to refresh triggered'); try { await refreshTickets(); } catch (error) { console.error('[TicketThread] Refresh error:', error); } }, [refreshTickets]); /** * Show snackbar message */ const showMessage = useCallback((message: string) => { setSnackbarMessage(message); setSnackbarVisible(true); }, []); /** * Handle send message */ const handleSendMessage = useCallback(async () => { if (!newMessage.trim() || isSendingMessage) { return; } setIsSendingMessage(true); try { await addMessage({ ticketId, message: {message: newMessage.trim()}, }).unwrap(); setNewMessage(''); showMessage('Message sent successfully'); } catch (error) { console.error('[TicketThread] Send message error:', error); showMessage('Failed to send message. Please try again.'); } finally { setIsSendingMessage(false); } }, [ticketId, newMessage, addMessage, showMessage, isSendingMessage]); /** * Handle reopen ticket */ const handleReopenTicket = useCallback(async () => { if (!reopenReason.trim() || reopenReason.trim().length < 10) { showMessage('Reason must be at least 10 characters long'); return; } if (reopenReason.trim().length > 500) { showMessage('Reason must be less than 500 characters'); return; } Alert.alert( 'Reopen Ticket', `Are you sure you want to reopen this ticket?\n\nReason: ${reopenReason.trim()}`, [ {text: 'Cancel', style: 'cancel'}, { text: 'Reopen', style: 'default', onPress: async () => { try { await reopenTicket({ ticketId, reason: {reason: reopenReason.trim()}, }).unwrap(); showMessage('Ticket reopened successfully'); setShowReopenForm(false); setReopenReason(''); } catch (error) { console.error('[TicketThread] Reopen error:', error); showMessage('Failed to reopen ticket. Please try again.'); } }, }, ] ); }, [ticketId, reopenReason, reopenTicket, showMessage]); /** * FlatList optimizations */ const keyExtractor = useCallback( (item: TicketMessage, index: number) => `${item.timestamp}-${index}`, [] ); const renderMessage = useCallback( ({item, index}: {item: TicketMessage; index: number}) => ( <MessageBubble message={item} testID={`message-${index}`} /> ), [] ); const getItemLayout = useCallback( (_: any, index: number) => ({ length: 100, // Approximate height offset: 100 * index, index, }), [] ); /** * Memoized header component */ const TicketHeader = useMemo(() => { if (!ticket) { return null; } return ( <View style={[ styles.headerContainer, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}, ]} > <View style={styles.headerTop}> <View style={styles.titleSection}> <Text style={[styles.ticketId, {color: theme.colors.primary}]}> {ticket.ticketId} </Text> <StatusBadge status={ticket.status} variant="default" /> </View> <Text style={[styles.leadId, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]}> Lead: {ticket.leadId} </Text> </View> <Text style={[styles.subject, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> {ticket.subject} </Text> {ticket.description && ( <Text style={[styles.description, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > {ticket.description} </Text> )} <View style={styles.headerBottom}> <Text style={[styles.createdAt, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Created {getRelativeTime(ticket.createdAt)} </Text> {ticket.status === 'Closed' && ticket.closedAt && ( <Text style={[styles.closedAt, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Closed {getRelativeTime(ticket.closedAt)} </Text> )} </View> {/* Message Input */} {/* Reopen functionality for closed tickets */} {ticket.status === 'Closed' && ( <View style={styles.reopenSection}> {!showReopenForm ? ( <Button mode="outlined" onPress={() => setShowReopenForm(true)} icon="refresh" style={styles.reopenButton} disabled={isReopening} > Reopen Ticket </Button> ) : ( <View style={styles.reopenForm}> <PaperTextInput label="Reason for reopening *" placeholder="Please provide reason for reopening this ticket (min 10 chars)" value={reopenReason} onChangeText={setReopenReason} multiline numberOfLines={3} maxLength={500} style={styles.reopenInput} /> <View style={styles.reopenButtons}> <Button mode="outlined" onPress={() => { setShowReopenForm(false); setReopenReason(''); }} style={styles.cancelButton} disabled={isReopening} > Cancel </Button> <Button mode="contained" onPress={handleReopenTicket} disabled={isReopening || reopenReason.trim().length < 10} style={styles.submitButton} > {isReopening ? 'Reopening...' : 'Reopen'} </Button> </View> </View> )} </View> )} </View> ); }, [ ticket, theme, showReopenForm, reopenReason, isReopening, handleReopenTicket, ]); /** * Memoized empty state */ const EmptyMessages = useMemo( () => ( <View style={styles.emptyContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="chat-bubble-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} /> <Text style={[styles.emptyTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> No Messages Yet </Text> <Text style={[ styles.emptyDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > This ticket doesn't have any messages yet. </Text> </View> ), [theme] ); /** * Memoized error state */ const ErrorState = useMemo( () => ( <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={[styles.errorTitle, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> Failed to Load Ticket </Text> <Text style={[ styles.errorDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Please pull down to refresh and try again. </Text> </View> ), [theme] ); // Loading state if (isLoading && !ticket) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer testID="ticket-thread-loading"> <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.loadingText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Loading ticket details... </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } // Error state if (isError && !ticket) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer testID="ticket-thread-error"> {ErrorState} </SafeAreaContainer> ); } // No ticket data if (!ticket) { return ( <SafeAreaContainer testID="ticket-thread-not-found"> <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="search-off" size={64} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} /> <Text style={[styles.errorTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> Ticket Not Found </Text> <Text style={[ styles.errorDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > The requested ticket could not be found. </Text> </View> </SafeAreaContainer> ); } return ( <SafeAreaContainer testID="ticket-thread-screen"> {/* Loading Overlay for reopen operation */} {isReopening && ( <LoadingOverlayContainer message="Reopening ticket..." visible={true} /> )} <View style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} > <FlatList data={ticket.messages || []} renderItem={renderMessage} keyExtractor={keyExtractor} getItemLayout={getItemLayout} ListHeaderComponent={TicketHeader} ListEmptyComponent={EmptyMessages} refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isFetching && canRefreshTickets()} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} /> } contentContainerStyle={[ styles.listContent, {paddingBottom: ticket.status === 'Open' ? 100 : 16}, ]} showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} removeClippedSubviews={true} maxToRenderPerBatch={10} windowSize={10} initialNumToRender={20} /> {/* Message Input Section */} {ticket.status === 'Open' && ( <KeyboardAvoidingView behavior={Platform.OS === 'ios' ? 'padding' : 'height'} keyboardVerticalOffset={0} > <View style={[ styles.messageInputContainer, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface}, ]} > <View style={styles.messageInputRow}> <RNTextInput key={`message-input-${ticketId}`} style={[ styles.messageInput, { color: theme.colors.onSurface, borderColor: theme.colors.outline, backgroundColor: theme.colors.surface, }, ]} value={newMessage} onChangeText={handleMessageChange} placeholder="Type your message..." placeholderTextColor={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} multiline maxLength={1000} editable={!isSendingMessage} textAlignVertical="top" autoCorrect={false} autoComplete="off" /> <Button mode="contained" onPress={handleSendMessage} disabled={!newMessage.trim() || isSendingMessage} loading={isSendingMessage} style={styles.sendButton} icon="send" > Send </Button> </View> </View> </KeyboardAvoidingView> )} </View> {/* Snackbar for success/error messages */} <Snackbar visible={snackbarVisible} onDismiss={() => { setSnackbarVisible(false); setSnackbarMessage(''); }} duration={4000} action={{ label: 'Dismiss', onPress: () => { setSnackbarVisible(false); setSnackbarMessage(''); }, }} > {snackbarMessage} </Snackbar> </SafeAreaContainer> ); }

TicketThreadScreen Component
