src/screens/main/LeadDetail/TicketsTab.tsx

styles
Default value : StyleSheet.create({ container: { flex: 1, }, loadingContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, loadingText: { fontSize: 16, marginTop: 16, textAlign: 'center', }, listContainer: { paddingTop: 16, paddingBottom: 100, // Space for FAB }, emptyListContainer: { flexGrow: 1, paddingBottom: 100, // Space for FAB }, emptyContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, emptyTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, emptyDescription: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 24, marginBottom: 24, }, createButton: { marginTop: 16, }, errorContainer: { flex: 1, justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', paddingHorizontal: 32, }, errorTitle: { fontSize: 20, fontWeight: '600', marginTop: 16, marginBottom: 8, textAlign: 'center', }, errorDescription: { fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', lineHeight: 24, marginBottom: 24, }, retryButton: { marginTop: 16, }, fab: { position: 'absolute', right: 16, bottom: 16, }, })
TicketsTab
Type : React.FC<TicketsTabProps>
Default value : ({leadId}) => { const theme = useAppTheme(); const navigation = useNavigation<RootStackScreenProps<'TicketThread'>['navigation']>(); // Modal state const [createTicketModalVisible, setCreateTicketModalVisible] = useState(false); const [snackbarVisible, setSnackbarVisible] = useState(false); const [snackbarMessage, setSnackbarMessage] = useState(''); // Fetch all tickets (will be filtered by leadId) const { data: apiTickets, isLoading, isError, isFetching, } = useGetTicketsQuery(undefined, { selectFromResult: result => ({ ...result, data: result.data || {items: [], total: 0, offset: 0, limit: 25}, }), }); // Get tickets filtered by leadId from Redux state const leadTickets = useAppSelector(selectTicketsByLeadId(leadId)); // Pull-to-refresh functionality const {refreshTickets, canRefreshTickets} = useRefreshControl(); // Ticket polling with focus-based lifecycle const ticketPolling = useTicketPolling({ enabled: true, startImmediately: false, // Only start via focus control }); /** * Handle tab focus - start polling */ useFocusEffect( useCallback(() => { console.log( '[TicketsTab] Tab focused, starting ticket polling for lead:', leadId ); ticketPolling.startPolling(); return () => { console.log( '[TicketsTab] Tab unfocused, stopping ticket polling for lead:', leadId ); ticketPolling.stopPolling(); }; }, [ticketPolling, leadId]) ); /** * Handle pull-to-refresh */ const handleRefresh = useCallback(async () => { console.log('[TicketsTab] Pull to refresh triggered for lead:', leadId); try { await refreshTickets(); } catch (error) { console.error('[TicketsTab] Refresh error:', error); } }, [refreshTickets, leadId]); /** * Handle ticket item press - navigate to ticket thread */ const handleTicketPress = useCallback( (ticketId: string) => { console.log('[TicketsTab] Navigating to ticket thread:', ticketId); // Navigate to TicketThread screen (escape the tab navigator) (navigation as any).navigate('TicketThread', {ticketId}); }, [navigation] ); /** * Handle create ticket button press */ const handleCreateTicket = useCallback(() => { console.log('[TicketsTab] Opening create ticket modal for lead:', leadId); setCreateTicketModalVisible(true); }, [leadId]); /** * Handle close create ticket modal */ const handleCloseCreateTicketModal = useCallback(() => { setCreateTicketModalVisible(false); }, []); /** * Show snackbar message */ const showMessage = useCallback((message: string) => { setSnackbarMessage(message); setSnackbarVisible(true); }, []); /** * Handle ticket created successfully */ const handleTicketCreated = useCallback( (ticketId: string) => { console.log('[TicketsTab] Ticket created successfully:', ticketId); showMessage(`Ticket ${ticketId} created successfully!`); // Optionally navigate to the new ticket // (navigation as any).navigate('TicketThread', {ticketId}); }, [showMessage] ); /** * FlatList optimizations */ const keyExtractor = useCallback( (item: TicketListItemType) => item.ticketId, [] ); const renderTicketItem = useCallback( ({item}: {item: TicketListItemType}) => ( <TicketListItemComponent ticket={item} onPress={handleTicketPress} testID={`ticket-item-${item.ticketId}`} /> ), [handleTicketPress] ); const getItemLayout = useCallback( (_: any, index: number) => ({ length: 100, // Approximate height of TicketListItemComponent offset: 100 * index, index, }), [] ); /** * Memoized empty state component */ const EmptyState = useMemo( () => ( <View style={styles.emptyContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="support-agent" size={64} color={theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant} /> <Text style={[styles.emptyTitle, {color: theme.colors.onSurface}]}> No Support Tickets </Text> <Text style={[ styles.emptyDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > No support tickets found for this lead. Create a new ticket to get help with your requests. </Text> <Button mode="contained" onPress={handleCreateTicket} style={styles.createButton} icon="plus" > Create Ticket </Button> </View> ), [theme, handleCreateTicket] ); /** * Memoized error state component */ const ErrorState = useMemo( () => ( <View style={styles.errorContainer}> <MaterialIcons name="error-outline" size={64} color={theme.colors.error} /> <Text style={[styles.errorTitle, {color: theme.colors.error}]}> Failed to Load Tickets </Text> <Text style={[ styles.errorDescription, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}, ]} > Please pull down to refresh and try again. </Text> <Button mode="outlined" onPress={handleRefresh} style={styles.retryButton} icon="refresh" > Retry </Button> </View> ), [theme, handleRefresh] ); // Show loading only if we're loading AND have no cached data for this lead const shouldShowLoading = isLoading && leadTickets.length === 0; // Loading state if (shouldShowLoading) { return ( <View style={styles.loadingContainer}> <ActivityIndicator size="large" color={theme.colors.primary} /> <Text style={[styles.loadingText, {color: theme.colors.onSurfaceVariant}]} > Loading tickets... </Text> </View> ); } return ( <View style={[styles.container, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.background}]} > <FlatList data={leadTickets} // Use filtered tickets for this lead renderItem={renderTicketItem} keyExtractor={keyExtractor} getItemLayout={getItemLayout} refreshControl={ <RefreshControl refreshing={isFetching && canRefreshTickets()} onRefresh={handleRefresh} colors={[theme.colors.primary]} tintColor={theme.colors.primary} /> } // Performance optimizations removeClippedSubviews={true} maxToRenderPerBatch={10} windowSize={10} initialNumToRender={10} // States ListEmptyComponent={isError ? ErrorState : EmptyState} // Styling contentContainerStyle={ leadTickets.length === 0 ? styles.emptyListContainer : styles.listContainer } showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false} /> {/* Create Ticket FAB - Always visible, prefilled with leadId */} <FAB style={[styles.fab, {backgroundColor: theme.colors.primary}]} icon="plus" onPress={handleCreateTicket} label="Create Ticket" visible={true} /> {/* Create Ticket Modal with prefilled leadId */} <CreateTicketModal visible={createTicketModalVisible} onClose={handleCloseCreateTicketModal} onSuccess={handleTicketCreated} prefilledLeadId={leadId} // This will disable the dropdown and prefill the lead testID="create-ticket-modal" /> {/* Snackbar for success messages */} <Snackbar visible={snackbarVisible} onDismiss={() => { setSnackbarVisible(false); setSnackbarMessage(''); }} duration={4000} action={{ label: 'Dismiss', onPress: () => { setSnackbarVisible(false); setSnackbarMessage(''); }, }} > {snackbarMessage} </Snackbar> </View> ); }

TicketsTab Component Shows support tickets for a specific lead

src/components/common/TextInput/TextInput.tsx

TextInput
Type : React.FC<TextInputProps>
Default value : ({ value, onChangeText, placeholder, label, helperText, errorMessage, hasError = false, disabled = false, multiline = false, numberOfLines, maxLength, keyboardType = 'default', autoCapitalize = 'sentences', autoCorrect = true, secureTextEntry = false, variant = 'default', prefix, suffix, showCharacterCount = false, onFocus, onBlur, style, testID, accessibilityLabel, accessibilityHint, }) => { const [isFocused, setIsFocused] = useState(false); // Handle focus const handleFocus = useCallback(() => { setIsFocused(true); onFocus?.(); }, [onFocus]); // Handle blur const handleBlur = useCallback(() => { setIsFocused(false); onBlur?.(); }, [onBlur]); // Container styles const containerStyles = useMemo( () => [ styles.inputContainer, styles[variant], isFocused && styles.focused, hasError && styles.error, disabled && styles.disabled, ], [variant, isFocused, hasError, disabled] ); // Text input styles const textInputStyles = useMemo( () => [styles.textInput, multiline && styles.multiline], [multiline] ); // Character count const characterCount = value?.length || 0; const isOverLimit = maxLength ? characterCount > maxLength : false; return ( <View style={[styles.container, style]}> {/* Label */} {label && <Text style={styles.label}>{label}</Text>} {/* Input Container */} <View style={containerStyles}> {/* Prefix */} {prefix && <View style={styles.prefixContainer}>{prefix}</View>} {/* Text Input */} <RNTextInput value={value} onChangeText={onChangeText} placeholder={placeholder} placeholderTextColor="#8E8E93" style={textInputStyles} multiline={multiline} numberOfLines={numberOfLines} maxLength={maxLength} keyboardType={keyboardType} autoCapitalize={autoCapitalize} autoCorrect={autoCorrect} secureTextEntry={secureTextEntry} editable={!disabled} onFocus={handleFocus} onBlur={handleBlur} testID={testID} accessibilityLabel={accessibilityLabel || label} accessibilityHint={accessibilityHint} accessibilityState={{ disabled, }} /> {/* Suffix */} {suffix && <View style={styles.suffixContainer}>{suffix}</View>} </View> {/* Helper/Error Text and Character Count */} <View style={styles.helperContainer}> <View style={{flex: 1}}> {/* Error Message */} {hasError && errorMessage && ( <Text style={styles.errorMessage}>{errorMessage}</Text> )} {/* Helper Text */} {!hasError && helperText && ( <Text style={styles.helperText}>{helperText}</Text> )} </View> {/* Character Count */} {showCharacterCount && maxLength && ( <Text style={[ styles.characterCount, isOverLimit && styles.characterCountError, ]} > {characterCount}/{maxLength} </Text> )} </View> </View> ); }

src/api/endpoints/tickets.ts

ticketsApi
Default value : createApi({ reducerPath: 'ticketsApi', baseQuery, tagTypes: ['Ticket', 'TicketsList'], endpoints: builder => ({ /** * Get paginated tickets list for current user * Uses JWT token from auth state to identify user * * @param params - Optional query parameters for filtering/pagination */ getTickets: builder.query< GetTicketsResponse, TicketsQueryParams | undefined >({ query: (params = {}) => { const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(); // Add pagination parameters with defaults searchParams.append('offset', (params.offset || 0).toString()); searchParams.append('limit', (params.limit || 25).toString()); // Add optional filter parameters if (params.status) { searchParams.append('status', params.status); } if (params.cpId) { searchParams.append('cpId', params.cpId); } if (params.customerId) { searchParams.append('customerId', params.customerId); } if (params.dateRange) { searchParams.append('dateRange', params.dateRange); } return `tickets?${searchParams.toString()}`; }, transformResponse: transformResponse<GetTicketsResponse>, transformErrorResponse: transformTicketError, providesTags: result => { if (!result || !result.items) { return [{type: 'TicketsList' as const, id: 'LIST'}]; } return [ ...result.items.map(ticket => ({ type: 'Ticket' as const, id: ticket.ticketId, })), {type: 'TicketsList' as const, id: 'LIST'}, ]; }, }), /** * Get single ticket with full message thread * Used for detailed ticket view with all messages */ getTicketById: builder.query<GetTicketByIdResponse, string>({ query: ticketId => `tickets/${ticketId}`, transformResponse: transformResponse<GetTicketByIdResponse>, transformErrorResponse: transformTicketError, providesTags: (result, error, ticketId) => [ {type: 'Ticket' as const, id: ticketId}, // Refresh Ticket ], }), /** * Create a new support ticket * Only works for leads with status "Executed" */ createTicket: builder.mutation<CreateTicketResponse, CreateTicketRequest>({ query: ticketData => ({ url: 'tickets', method: 'POST', body: ticketData, }), transformResponse: transformResponse<CreateTicketResponse>, transformErrorResponse: transformTicketError, invalidatesTags: [{type: 'TicketsList' as const, id: 'LIST'}], // Refresh list }), /** * Add a message to an existing ticket thread */ addMessage: builder.mutation< void, {ticketId: string; message: AddMessageRequest} >({ query: ({ticketId, message}) => ({ url: `tickets/${ticketId}/messages`, method: 'POST', body: message, }), transformResponse: transformResponse<void>, transformErrorResponse: transformTicketError, invalidatesTags: (result, error, {ticketId}) => [ {type: 'Ticket' as const, id: ticketId}, // Refresh Ticket {type: 'TicketsList' as const, id: 'LIST'}, // Refresh list (for message count, etc.) ], }), /** * Reopen a closed ticket * Only works for closed tickets */ reopenTicket: builder.mutation< void, {ticketId: string; reason: ReopenTicketRequest} >({ query: ({ticketId, reason}) => ({ url: `tickets/${ticketId}/reopen`, method: 'PATCH', body: reason, }), transformResponse: transformResponse<void>, transformErrorResponse: transformTicketError, invalidatesTags: (result, error, {ticketId}) => [ {type: 'Ticket' as const, id: ticketId}, {type: 'TicketsList' as const, id: 'LIST'}, ], }), }), })

Tickets API definition using RTK Query Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on support tickets
transformTicketError
Default value : (error: any) => { // Handle HTTP errors with status code and backend message if (error.status && error.data) { const statusCode = error.status; const errorMessage = error.data.error || 'Request failed'; return { name: 'ServiceFetchError', message: errorMessage, code: 'API_ERROR', operation: 'API_ERROR', httpStatus: statusCode, serviceId: undefined, originalError: undefined, }; } // Handle network errors (no HTTP status) if (error.status === 'FETCH_ERROR') { return { name: 'ServiceFetchError', message: 'Network error - please check your connection', code: 'NETWORK_ERROR', operation: 'NETWORK_ERROR', httpStatus: 0, serviceId: undefined, originalError: undefined, }; } // Handle timeout errors if (error.status === 'TIMEOUT_ERROR') { return { name: 'ServiceFetchError', message: 'Request timeout - please try again', code: 'TIMEOUT_ERROR', operation: 'TIMEOUT_ERROR', httpStatus: 408, serviceId: undefined, originalError: undefined, }; } // Fallback for unexpected error formats return { name: 'ServiceFetchError', message: 'Unexpected error occurred', code: 'UNKNOWN_ERROR', operation: 'UNKNOWN_ERROR', httpStatus: 500, serviceId: undefined, originalError: undefined, }; }

Transform ticket API errors to consistent ServiceFetchError format Follows the same pattern as notifications error transformation
Default value : ticketsApi

src/components/debug/TicketsDebugger.tsx

TicketsDebugger
Type : React.FC
Default value : () => { const [testTicketId, setTestTicketId] = useState('TKT004'); const [testLeadId, setTestLeadId] = useState('LEAD-1014'); const [testSubject, setTestSubject] = useState('Test ticket subject'); const [testDescription, setTestDescription] = useState('Test description'); const [testMessage, setTestMessage] = useState('Test message'); const [debugLogs, setDebugLogs] = useState<string[]>([]); // Hooks const {refreshTickets, canRefreshTickets} = useRefreshControl(); const [createTicket] = useCreateTicketMutation(); const [addMessage] = useAddMessageMutation(); // Redux selectors const tickets = useAppSelector(selectTickets); const ticketById = useAppSelector(selectTicketById(testTicketId)); const ticketsByLead = useAppSelector(selectTicketsByLeadId(testLeadId)); const openCount = useAppSelector(selectOpenTicketsCount); const isCacheValid = useAppSelector(selectIsTicketsCacheValid); const cacheTimestamp = useAppSelector(selectTicketsCacheTimestamp); // RTK Query hooks const { data: apiTickets, isLoading: isLoadingList, error: listError, refetch: refetchList, } = useGetTicketsQuery(undefined, { skip: false, // Always enabled for debugging }); const { data: apiTicketDetail, isLoading: isLoadingDetail, error: detailError, refetch: refetchDetail, } = useGetTicketByIdQuery(testTicketId, { skip: !testTicketId, }); // Helper functions const addLog = (message: string) => { setDebugLogs(prev => [ `${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}: ${message}`, ...prev.slice(0, 19), // Keep last 20 logs ]); }; const clearLogs = () => { setDebugLogs([]); }; // Test functions const testGetTickets = async () => { addLog('Testing GET /tickets...'); try { const result = await refetchList(); addLog(`✅ GET /tickets: ${result.data?.items.length || 0} tickets`); } catch (error) { addLog(`❌ GET /tickets error: ${error}`); } }; const testGetTicketById = async () => { if (!testTicketId) { addLog('❌ Please enter a ticket ID'); return; } addLog(`Testing GET /tickets/${testTicketId}...`); try { const result = await refetchDetail(); addLog( `✅ GET /tickets/${testTicketId}: ${result.data?.subject || 'No data'}` ); } catch (error) { addLog(`❌ GET /tickets/${testTicketId} error: ${error}`); } }; const testCreateTicket = async () => { if (!testLeadId || !testSubject || !testDescription) { addLog('❌ Please fill all fields for ticket creation'); return; } addLog('Testing POST /tickets...'); try { const result = await createTicket({ leadId: testLeadId, subject: testSubject, description: testDescription, }); if ('data' in result) { addLog(`✅ POST /tickets: Created ${result.data?.ticketId}`); setTestTicketId(result.data?.ticketId ?? 'TKT004'); } else { addLog(`❌ POST /tickets error: ${result.error}`); } } catch (error) { addLog(`❌ POST /tickets error: ${error}`); } }; const testAddMessage = async () => { if (!testTicketId || !testMessage) { addLog('❌ Please enter ticket ID and message'); return; } addLog(`Testing POST /tickets/${testTicketId}/messages...`); try { const result = await addMessage({ ticketId: testTicketId, message: {message: testMessage}, }); if ('data' in result) { addLog(`✅ POST /tickets/${testTicketId}/messages: Success`); } else { addLog( `❌ POST /tickets/${testTicketId}/messages error: ${result.error}` ); } } catch (error) { addLog(`❌ POST /tickets/${testTicketId}/messages error: ${error}`); } }; const testRefreshTickets = async () => { addLog('Testing refreshTickets...'); try { const result = await refreshTickets(); addLog(`✅ refreshTickets: ${result.success ? 'Success' : 'Failed'}`); } catch (error) { addLog(`❌ refreshTickets error: ${error}`); } }; const getRefreshTimestamp = () => { const timestamp = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh(RefreshableApi.TICKETS); return timestamp ? new Date(timestamp).toLocaleTimeString() : 'Never'; }; const formatTimestamp = (timestamp: number | null) => { return timestamp ? new Date(timestamp).toLocaleTimeString() : 'Never'; }; return ( <ScrollView style={{flex: 1, padding: 16}}> <Card style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Card.Content> <Text variant="headlineSmall">🎫 Tickets Debugger</Text> <Text variant="bodyMedium"> Test tickets API and refresh functionality </Text> </Card.Content> </Card> {/* Input Fields */} <Card style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Card.Content> <Text variant="titleMedium">Test Inputs</Text> <TextInput label="Ticket ID" value={testTicketId} onChangeText={setTestTicketId} style={{marginVertical: 8}} /> <TextInput label="Lead ID" value={testLeadId} onChangeText={setTestLeadId} style={{marginVertical: 8}} /> <TextInput label="Subject" value={testSubject} onChangeText={setTestSubject} style={{marginVertical: 8}} /> <TextInput label="Description" value={testDescription} onChangeText={setTestDescription} style={{marginVertical: 8}} /> <TextInput label="Message" value={testMessage} onChangeText={setTestMessage} style={{marginVertical: 8}} /> </Card.Content> </Card> {/* API Tests */} <Card style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Card.Content> <Text variant="titleMedium">API Tests</Text> <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 8, marginTop: 8, }} > <Button mode="contained" onPress={testGetTickets} loading={isLoadingList} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > GET /tickets </Button> <Button mode="contained" onPress={testGetTicketById} loading={isLoadingDetail} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > GET /tickets/{testTicketId} </Button> <Button mode="contained" onPress={testCreateTicket} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > POST /tickets </Button> <Button mode="contained" onPress={testAddMessage} style={{marginBottom: 8}} > POST /messages </Button> </View> </Card.Content> </Card> {/* Refresh Tests */} <Card style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Card.Content> <Text variant="titleMedium">Refresh Control</Text> <View style={{flexDirection: 'row', gap: 8, marginTop: 8}}> <Button mode="contained" onPress={testRefreshTickets} disabled={!canRefreshTickets()} > Refresh Tickets </Button> <Chip icon="clock"> Can refresh: {canRefreshTickets() ? 'Yes' : 'No'} </Chip> </View> <Text variant="bodySmall" style={{marginTop: 8}}> Last refresh: {getRefreshTimestamp()} </Text> </Card.Content> </Card> {/* Redux State */} <Card style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Card.Content> <Text variant="titleMedium">Redux State</Text> <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 8, marginTop: 8, }} > <Chip icon="ticket">Total: {tickets.length}</Chip> <Chip icon="alert">Open: {openCount}</Chip> <Chip icon={isCacheValid ? 'check' : 'close'}> Cache: {isCacheValid ? 'Valid' : 'Invalid'} </Chip> </View> <Text variant="bodySmall" style={{marginTop: 8}}> Cache timestamp: {formatTimestamp(cacheTimestamp)} </Text> <Text variant="bodySmall"> Tickets by lead {testLeadId}: {ticketsByLead.length} </Text> </Card.Content> </Card> {/* RTK Query State */} <Card style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Card.Content> <Text variant="titleMedium">RTK Query State</Text> <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 8, marginTop: 8, }} > <Chip icon={isLoadingList ? 'loading' : 'check'}> List: {isLoadingList ? 'Loading' : 'Ready'} </Chip> <Chip icon={isLoadingDetail ? 'loading' : 'check'}> Detail: {isLoadingDetail ? 'Loading' : 'Ready'} </Chip> </View> {listError && ( <Text variant="bodySmall" style={{color: 'red', marginTop: 4}}> List error: {JSON.stringify(listError)} </Text> )} {detailError && ( <Text variant="bodySmall" style={{color: 'red', marginTop: 4}}> Detail error: {JSON.stringify(detailError)} </Text> )} </Card.Content> </Card> {/* Current Data */} <Card style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Card.Content> <Text variant="titleMedium">Current Data</Text> <Text variant="bodySmall" style={{marginTop: 8}}> API Tickets: {apiTickets?.items.length || 0} </Text> <Text variant="bodySmall">Redux Tickets: {tickets.length}</Text> <Text variant="bodySmall"> Selected Ticket: {ticketById?.subject || 'None'} </Text> </Card.Content> </Card> {/* Debug Logs */} <Card style={{marginBottom: 16}}> <Card.Content> <View style={{ flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', }} > <Text variant="titleMedium">Debug Logs</Text> <Button mode="outlined" onPress={clearLogs}> Clear </Button> </View> <Divider style={{marginVertical: 8}} /> <Surface style={{padding: 8, maxHeight: 200}}> <ScrollView> {debugLogs.length === 0 ? ( <Text variant="bodySmall">No logs yet...</Text> ) : ( debugLogs.map((log, index) => ( <Text key={index} variant="bodySmall" style={{marginBottom: 4}} > {log} </Text> )) )} </ScrollView> </Surface> </Card.Content> </Card> </ScrollView> ); }

src/types/Timer.ts

TIMER_CONSTANTS
Default value : { RESEND_DURATION: 60, // 60 seconds for resend timer LOCKOUT_DURATION: 900, // 15 minutes (900 seconds) for lockout timer TICK_INTERVAL: 1000, // 1 second intervals } as const

Timer Constants

src/hooks/useTypedRedux.ts

useAPILoadingStates
Default value : () => { const authQueries = useAppSelector(state => state.authApi?.queries || {}); const servicesQueries = useAppSelector( state => state.servicesApi?.queries || {} ); const leadsQueries = useAppSelector(state => state.leadsApi?.queries || {}); const isAnyLoading = Object.values(authQueries).some( (query: any) => query?.status === 'pending' ) || Object.values(servicesQueries).some( (query: any) => query?.status === 'pending' ) || Object.values(leadsQueries).some( (query: any) => query?.status === 'pending' ); return { isAnyLoading, authLoading: Object.values(authQueries).some( (query: any) => query?.status === 'pending' ), servicesLoading: Object.values(servicesQueries).some( (query: any) => query?.status === 'pending' ), leadsLoading: Object.values(leadsQueries).some( (query: any) => query?.status === 'pending' ), }; }

Hook for API loading states
useAppAction
Default value : () => { const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); return useCallback( <T extends Parameters<AppDispatch>[0]>(action: T) => { return dispatch(action); }, [dispatch] ); }

Hook for dispatching actions with automatic type inference
useAppDispatch
Default value : () => useDispatch<AppDispatch>()

Typed useDispatch hook
useAppSelector
Type : TypedUseSelectorHook<RootState>
Default value : useSelector

Typed useSelector hook
useAuthAPI
Default value : () => { const [sendOtp] = authApi.useSendOtpMutation(); const [verifyOtp] = authApi.useVerifyOtpMutation(); const [logout] = authApi.useLogoutUserMutation(); const [updateProfile] = authApi.useUpdateProfileMutation(); return { sendOtp, verifyOtp, logout, updateProfile, }; }

Hook for auth API operations
useAuthState
Default value : () => { return useAppSelector(state => state.auth); }

Hook for selecting auth state
useCacheState
Default value : () => { return useAppSelector(state => state.cache); }

Hook for selecting cache state
useLeadsAPI
Default value : () => { const { data: leads, isLoading: leadsLoading, error: leadsError, refetch: refetchLeads, } = leadsApi.useGetLeadsQuery({}); const [createLead] = leadsApi.useCreateLeadMutation(); const [updateLead] = leadsApi.useUpdateLeadMutation(); const [deleteLead] = leadsApi.useDeleteLeadMutation(); // Customer-specific leads query const { data: customerLeads, isLoading: customerLeadsLoading, error: customerLeadsError, refetch: refetchCustomerLeads, } = leadsApi.useGetCustomerLeadsQuery(); return { leads, leadsLoading, leadsError, refetchLeads, createLead, updateLead, deleteLead, customerLeads, customerLeadsLoading, customerLeadsError, refetchCustomerLeads, }; }

Hook for leads API operations
useRehydrated
Default value : () => { const [isRehydrated, setIsRehydrated] = useState( persistor.getState().bootstrapped ); useEffect(() => { if (isRehydrated) { return; } const unsubscribe = persistor.subscribe(() => { if (persistor.getState().bootstrapped) { setIsRehydrated(true); } }); return unsubscribe; }, [isRehydrated]); return isRehydrated; }

Hook to check if Redux store is rehydrated
useServicesAPI
Default value : () => { const { data: services, isLoading: servicesLoading, error: servicesError, refetch: refetchServices, } = servicesApi.useGetServicesQuery({}); const { data: categories, isLoading: categoriesLoading, error: categoriesError, } = servicesApi.useGetServiceCategoriesQuery(); return { services, servicesLoading, servicesError, refetchServices, categories, categoriesLoading, categoriesError, }; }

Hook for services API operations
useUIState
Default value : () => { return useAppSelector(state => state.ui); }

Hook for selecting UI state

src/hooks/useAuthRestore.ts

useAuthRestore
Default value : (config: UseAuthRestoreConfig = {}) => { const {enabled = true, delay = 500, onComplete, onError} = config; const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); const hasRunRef = useRef(false); const isRunningRef = useRef(false); /** * Perform auth restoration */ const performRestore = async (): Promise<void> => { if (isRunningRef.current || hasRunRef.current) { console.log('[useAuthRestore] Restoration already run or in progress'); return; } isRunningRef.current = true; try { console.log('[useAuthRestore] Starting auth restoration...'); const result = await dispatch(restoreAuth()).unwrap(); console.log('[useAuthRestore] Restoration completed:', result); hasRunRef.current = true; onComplete?.(result); } catch (error) { console.error('[useAuthRestore] Restoration failed:', error); onError?.(error); } finally { isRunningRef.current = false; } }; /** * Effect to run restoration on mount */ useEffect(() => { if (!enabled) { console.log('[useAuthRestore] Auth restoration disabled'); return; } const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => { performRestore(); }, delay); return () => { clearTimeout(timeoutId); }; }, [enabled, delay, performRestore]); /** * Manual trigger function for testing or special cases */ const triggerRestore = async (): Promise<void> => { hasRunRef.current = false; // Allow re-run await performRestore(); }; return { isRunning: isRunningRef.current, hasRun: hasRunRef.current, triggerRestore, }; }

useAuthRestore Hook

src/hooks/useCartActions.ts

useCartActions
Default value : (): UseCartActionsReturn => { const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); // Selectors const cartCount = useAppSelector(selectCartCount); const uniqueItemsCount = useAppSelector(selectUniqueItemsCount); const isCartEmpty = useAppSelector(selectCartIsEmpty); const isCartFull = useAppSelector(selectIsCartFull); const cartItems = useAppSelector(selectCartItems); // Actions const handleAddToCart = useCallback( (service: Service, qty: number = 1) => { if (qty <= 0) { console.warn('[useCartActions] Cannot add zero or negative quantity'); return; } dispatch(addToCart({service, qty})); }, [dispatch] ); const handleRemoveFromCart = useCallback( (serviceId: string, qty: number = 1) => { if (qty <= 0) { console.warn( '[useCartActions] Cannot remove zero or negative quantity' ); return; } dispatch(removeFromCart({serviceId, qty})); }, [dispatch] ); const handleUpdateQuantity = useCallback( (serviceId: string, qty: number) => { if (qty < 0) { console.warn('[useCartActions] Cannot set negative quantity'); return; } dispatch(updateQuantity({serviceId, qty})); }, [dispatch] ); const handleRemoveService = useCallback( (serviceId: string) => { dispatch(removeService({serviceId})); }, [dispatch] ); const handleClearCart = useCallback(() => { dispatch(clearCart()); }, [dispatch]); return { // Actions addToCart: handleAddToCart, removeFromCart: handleRemoveFromCart, updateQuantity: handleUpdateQuantity, removeService: handleRemoveService, clearCart: handleClearCart, // State cartCount, uniqueItemsCount, isCartEmpty, isCartFull, cartItems, // Now we return all cart items }; }

Hook for cart actions and state management

Provides all necessary cart operations with built-in validation and error handling. State updates are automatic via Redux.

src/hooks/useCountdownTimer.ts

useCountdownTimer
Default value : ( duration: number = TIMER_CONSTANTS.RESEND_DURATION, options: TimerOptions = {} ): CountdownTimerState => { const { defaultDuration = duration, autoStart = false, onComplete, onTick, } = options; // Timer state const [secondsLeft, setSecondsLeft] = useState(duration); const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(autoStart); const [isPaused, setIsPaused] = useState(false); // Refs for cleanup and callbacks - FIXED TYPE const intervalRef = useRef<ReturnType<typeof setInterval> | null>(null); const onCompleteRef = useRef(onComplete); const onTickRef = useRef(onTick); // Update callback refs when they change useEffect(() => { onCompleteRef.current = onComplete; }, [onComplete]); useEffect(() => { onTickRef.current = onTick; }, [onTick]); /** * Clear existing interval */ const clearTimer = useCallback(() => { if (intervalRef.current) { clearInterval(intervalRef.current); intervalRef.current = null; } }, []); /** * Start the timer */ const startTimer = useCallback(() => { clearTimer(); // Clear any existing timer intervalRef.current = setInterval(() => { setSecondsLeft(prevSeconds => { const newSeconds = prevSeconds - 1; // Call onTick callback if (onTickRef.current) { onTickRef.current(newSeconds); } // Check if timer completed if (newSeconds <= 0) { setIsActive(false); clearTimer(); // Call onComplete callback if (onCompleteRef.current) { onCompleteRef.current(); } return 0; } return newSeconds; }); }, TIMER_CONSTANTS.TICK_INTERVAL); }, [clearTimer]); /** * Restart timer with optional new duration */ const restart = useCallback( (newDuration?: number) => { const targetDuration = newDuration || defaultDuration; console.log(`[Timer] Restarting with duration: ${targetDuration}s`); clearTimer(); setSecondsLeft(targetDuration); setIsActive(true); setIsPaused(false); // Start the timer on next tick to ensure state is updated setTimeout(() => { if (targetDuration > 0) { startTimer(); } }, 0); }, [defaultDuration, clearTimer, startTimer] ); /** * Stop timer completely */ const stop = useCallback(() => { console.log('[Timer] Stopping timer'); clearTimer(); setIsActive(false); setIsPaused(false); setSecondsLeft(0); }, [clearTimer]); /** * Pause timer */ const pause = useCallback(() => { if (isActive && !isPaused) { console.log('[Timer] Pausing timer'); clearTimer(); setIsPaused(true); } }, [isActive, isPaused, clearTimer]); /** * Resume paused timer */ const resume = useCallback(() => { if (isActive && isPaused && secondsLeft > 0) { console.log('[Timer] Resuming timer'); setIsPaused(false); startTimer(); } }, [isActive, isPaused, secondsLeft, startTimer]); // Start timer when isActive becomes true and not paused useEffect(() => { if (isActive && !isPaused && secondsLeft > 0) { startTimer(); } else { clearTimer(); } return clearTimer; }, [isActive, isPaused, secondsLeft, startTimer, clearTimer]); // Cleanup on unmount useEffect(() => { return () => { console.log('[Timer] Cleaning up timer on unmount'); clearTimer(); }; }, [clearTimer]); // Auto-start if specified useEffect(() => { if (autoStart && !isActive && secondsLeft > 0) { setIsActive(true); } }, [autoStart, isActive, secondsLeft]); return { secondsLeft, isActive: isActive && !isPaused, restart, stop, pause, resume, }; }

Countdown Timer Hook
useLockoutTimer
Default value : ( onComplete?: () => void ): CountdownTimerState => { return useCountdownTimer(TIMER_CONSTANTS.LOCKOUT_DURATION, { autoStart: false, onComplete, }); }

Hook specifically for lockout functionality
useResendTimer
Default value : ( onComplete?: () => void ): CountdownTimerState => { return useCountdownTimer(TIMER_CONSTANTS.RESEND_DURATION, { autoStart: false, onComplete, }); }

Hook specifically for resend OTP functionality

src/hooks/useNewTypedRedux.ts

useNewAppDispatch
Default value : () => useDispatch<NewAppDispatch>()
useNewAppSelector
Type : TypedUseSelectorHook<NewRootState>
Default value : useSelector

src/hooks/useNewAuth.ts

useNewAuth
Default value : () => { const dispatch = useNewAppDispatch(); const authState = useNewAppSelector(selectNewAuth); const [loginMutation] = useLoginMutation(); const [logoutMutation] = useLogoutMutation(); /** * Login function */ const login = async (phone: string, otp: string) => { try { dispatch(setLoading(true)); dispatch(setError(null)); // Call API const result = await loginMutation({phone, otp}).unwrap(); // Handle success await dispatch(loginSuccess(result)).unwrap(); return {success: true, data: result}; } catch (error: any) { const errorMessage = error?.data?.error || error?.message || 'Login failed'; dispatch(setError(errorMessage)); return {success: false, error: errorMessage}; } finally { dispatch(setLoading(false)); } }; /** * Logout function */ const logout = async () => { try { dispatch(setLoading(true)); // Try to call logout API (optional - don't fail if it doesn't work) try { await logoutMutation().unwrap(); } catch (apiError) { console.warn( '[NewAuth] Logout API failed, continuing with local logout:', apiError ); } // Always clear local state await dispatch(logoutUser()).unwrap(); return {success: true}; } catch (error: any) { console.error('[NewAuth] Logout failed:', error); return {success: false, error: error.message}; } finally { dispatch(setLoading(false)); } }; return { // State isLoggedIn: authState.isLoggedIn, user: authState.user, token: authState.token, isLoading: authState.isLoading, error: authState.error, // Actions login, logout, }; }

src/hooks/usePersistenceStatus.ts

usePersistenceStatus
Default value : (): PersistenceStatus => { const [isPersisting, setIsPersisting] = useState(false); const [error, setError] = useState<Error | null>(null); /** * Manual flush function */ const flush = useCallback(async (): Promise<void> => { try { setIsPersisting(true); setError(null); console.log('[usePersistenceStatus] Starting manual flush...'); // Trigger persistence flush await persistor.flush(); console.log('[usePersistenceStatus] Manual flush completed'); } catch (err) { const error = err instanceof Error ? err : new Error('Persistence failed'); console.error('[usePersistenceStatus] Flush error:', error); setError(error); } finally { setIsPersisting(false); } }, []); /** * Monitor persistor state changes */ useEffect(() => { const handlePersistorStateChange = () => { const state = persistor.getState(); // Check if persistence is in progress const isCurrentlyPersisting = state.registry.length > 0; if (isCurrentlyPersisting !== isPersisting) { console.log('[usePersistenceStatus] Persistence state changed:', { isPersisting: isCurrentlyPersisting, registry: state.registry, }); setIsPersisting(isCurrentlyPersisting); } }; // Initial check handlePersistorStateChange(); // Subscribe to changes const unsubscribe = persistor.subscribe(handlePersistorStateChange); return () => { unsubscribe(); }; }, [isPersisting]); return { isPersisting, error, flush, }; }

src/hooks/useRefreshControl.ts

useRefreshControl
Default value : (): RefreshHookReturn => { const dispatch = useAppDispatch(); const refreshInfo = useAppSelector(selectRefreshInfo); const progressPercentage = useAppSelector(selectRefreshProgressPercentage); /** * Refresh all application data (unchanged - this works fine) */ const refreshAll = useCallback( async (refreshOptions?: RefreshOptions): Promise<RefreshResult> => { try { const result = await dispatch(refreshAllData(refreshOptions)).unwrap(); return result; } catch (error) { const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Refresh failed'; return { success: false, refreshedApis: [], errors: [{api: RefreshableApi.SERVICES, error: errorMessage}], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } }, [dispatch] ); /** * Refresh specific APIs (unchanged - this works fine) */ const refreshSpecific = useCallback( async ( apis: RefreshableApi[], refreshOptions?: RefreshOptions ): Promise<RefreshResult> => { try { const result = await dispatch( refreshSpecificData({apis, options: refreshOptions}) ).unwrap(); return result; } catch (error) { const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Specific refresh failed'; return { success: false, refreshedApis: [], errors: [ {api: apis[0] || RefreshableApi.SERVICES, error: errorMessage}, ], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } }, [dispatch] ); /** * Background refresh (unchanged - this works fine) */ const refreshInBackground = useCallback( async (refreshOptions?: RefreshOptions): Promise<RefreshResult> => { try { const result = await dispatch( backgroundRefresh(refreshOptions) ).unwrap(); return result; } catch (error) { const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Background refresh failed'; return { success: false, refreshedApis: [], errors: [{api: RefreshableApi.SERVICES, error: errorMessage}], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } }, [dispatch] ); /** * FIXED: Simplified leads refresh using ONLY tag invalidation * No more direct API calls + tag invalidation mixing */ const refreshLeads = useCallback(async (): Promise<RefreshResult> => { const lastLeadsRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.LEADS ); const canRefresh = isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastLeadsRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.LEADS ); if (!canRefresh) { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Leads refresh blocked by ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.LEADS}s debounce` ); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } try { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Refreshing leads - outside ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.LEADS}s window` ); // Update timestamp using singleton refreshTimestamps.setLastRefresh(RefreshableApi.LEADS, Date.now()); // Use ONLY tag invalidation (consistent with thunks approach) dispatch(leadsApi.util.invalidateTags(['Lead', 'LeadsList'])); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [RefreshableApi.LEADS], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } catch (error) { const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Leads refresh failed'; console.error('[RefreshControl] Leads refresh error:', errorMessage); return { success: false, refreshedApis: [], errors: [{api: RefreshableApi.LEADS, error: errorMessage}], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } }, [dispatch]); /** * NEW: Single lead refresh with proper debouncing */ const refreshSingleLead = useCallback( async (leadId: string): Promise<RefreshResult> => { const lastSingleLeadRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.SINGLE_LEAD ); const canRefresh = isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastSingleLeadRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.SINGLE_LEAD ); if (!canRefresh) { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Single lead refresh blocked by ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.SINGLE_LEAD}s debounce` ); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } try { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Refreshing single lead ${leadId} - outside ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.SINGLE_LEAD}s window` ); // Update timestamp using singleton refreshTimestamps.setLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.SINGLE_LEAD, Date.now() ); // Invalidate ONLY the specific lead dispatch(leadsApi.util.invalidateTags([{type: 'Lead', id: leadId}])); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [RefreshableApi.SINGLE_LEAD], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } catch (error) { const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Single lead refresh failed'; console.error( '[RefreshControl] Single lead refresh error:', errorMessage ); return { success: false, refreshedApis: [], errors: [{api: RefreshableApi.SINGLE_LEAD, error: errorMessage}], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } }, [dispatch] ); /** * Quotations refresh with proper debouncing */ const refreshQuotations = useCallback(async (): Promise<RefreshResult> => { const lastQuotationsRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.QUOTATIONS ); const canRefresh = isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastQuotationsRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.QUOTATIONS ); if (!canRefresh) { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Quotations refresh blocked by ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.QUOTATIONS}s debounce` ); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } try { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Refreshing quotations - outside ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.QUOTATIONS}s window` ); // Update timestamp using singleton refreshTimestamps.setLastRefresh(RefreshableApi.QUOTATIONS, Date.now()); // Use ONLY tag invalidation (consistent with leads approach) dispatch( quotationsApi.util.invalidateTags(['Quotation', 'QuotationsList']) ); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [RefreshableApi.QUOTATIONS], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } catch (error) { const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Quotations refresh failed'; console.error('[RefreshControl] Quotations refresh error:', errorMessage); return { success: false, refreshedApis: [], errors: [{api: RefreshableApi.QUOTATIONS, error: errorMessage}], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } }, [dispatch]); /** * Single quotation refresh with proper debouncing */ const refreshSingleQuotation = useCallback( async (quotationId: string): Promise<RefreshResult> => { const lastSingleQuotationRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.SINGLE_QUOTATION ); const canRefresh = isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastSingleQuotationRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.SINGLE_QUOTATION ); if (!canRefresh) { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Single quotation refresh blocked by ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.SINGLE_QUOTATION}s debounce` ); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } try { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Refreshing single quotation ${quotationId} - outside ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.SINGLE_QUOTATION}s window` ); // Update timestamp using singleton refreshTimestamps.setLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.SINGLE_QUOTATION, Date.now() ); // Invalidate ONLY the specific quotation dispatch( quotationsApi.util.invalidateTags([ {type: 'Quotation', id: quotationId}, ]) ); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [RefreshableApi.SINGLE_QUOTATION], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } catch (error) { const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Single quotation refresh failed'; console.error( '[RefreshControl] Single quotation refresh error:', errorMessage ); return { success: false, refreshedApis: [], errors: [{api: RefreshableApi.SINGLE_QUOTATION, error: errorMessage}], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } }, [dispatch] ); /** * KYC documents refresh with proper debouncing */ const refreshKyc = useCallback(async (): Promise<RefreshResult> => { const lastKycRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh(RefreshableApi.KYC); const canRefresh = isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastKycRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.KYC ); if (!canRefresh) { console.log( `[RefreshControl] KYC refresh blocked by ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.KYC}s debounce` ); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } try { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Refreshing KYC documents - outside ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.KYC}s window` ); // Update timestamp using singleton refreshTimestamps.setLastRefresh(RefreshableApi.KYC, Date.now()); // Use ONLY tag invalidation (consistent with other APIs) dispatch(kycApi.util.invalidateTags(['KycDoc'])); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [RefreshableApi.KYC], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } catch (error) { const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'KYC refresh failed'; console.error('[RefreshControl] KYC refresh error:', errorMessage); return { success: false, refreshedApis: [], errors: [{api: RefreshableApi.KYC, error: errorMessage}], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } }, [dispatch]); /** * Notifications refresh with proper debouncing */ const refreshNotifications = useCallback(async (): Promise<RefreshResult> => { const lastNotificationsRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.NOTIFICATIONS ); const canRefresh = isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastNotificationsRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.NOTIFICATIONS ); if (!canRefresh) { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Notifications refresh blocked by ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.NOTIFICATIONS}s debounce` ); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } try { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Refreshing notifications - outside ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.NOTIFICATIONS}s window` ); // Update timestamp using singleton refreshTimestamps.setLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.NOTIFICATIONS, Date.now() ); // Use ONLY tag invalidation (consistent with other APIs) dispatch( notificationsApi.util.invalidateTags([ 'Notification', 'NotificationsList', ]) ); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [RefreshableApi.NOTIFICATIONS], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } catch (error) { const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Notifications refresh failed'; console.error( '[RefreshControl] Notifications refresh error:', errorMessage ); return { success: false, refreshedApis: [], errors: [{api: RefreshableApi.NOTIFICATIONS, error: errorMessage}], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } }, [dispatch]); /** * Tickets refresh with proper debouncing */ const refreshTickets = useCallback(async (): Promise<RefreshResult> => { const lastTicketsRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.TICKETS ); const canRefresh = isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastTicketsRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.TICKETS ); if (!canRefresh) { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Tickets refresh blocked by ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.TICKETS}s debounce` ); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } try { console.log( `[RefreshControl] Refreshing tickets - outside ${DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.TICKETS}s window` ); // Update timestamp using singleton refreshTimestamps.setLastRefresh(RefreshableApi.TICKETS, Date.now()); // Use ONLY tag invalidation (consistent with other APIs) dispatch(ticketsApi.util.invalidateTags(['Ticket', 'TicketsList'])); return { success: true, refreshedApis: [RefreshableApi.TICKETS], errors: [], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } catch (error) { const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Tickets refresh failed'; console.error('[RefreshControl] Tickets refresh error:', errorMessage); return { success: false, refreshedApis: [], errors: [{api: RefreshableApi.TICKETS, error: errorMessage}], timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), }; } }, [dispatch]); // Clear any refresh errors const clearError = useCallback(() => { dispatch(clearRefreshError()); }, [dispatch]); // Get formatted last refresh time const getFormattedLastRefresh = useCallback(() => { return refreshInfo.formattedLastRefresh; }, [refreshInfo.formattedLastRefresh]); // Quick refresh functions const refreshServicesOnly = useCallback( () => refreshSpecific([RefreshableApi.SERVICES]), [refreshSpecific] ); const refreshUserDataOnly = useCallback( () => refreshSpecific([RefreshableApi.AUTH, RefreshableApi.LEADS]), [refreshSpecific] ); // Check functions const canRefreshLeads = useCallback((): boolean => { const lastLeadsRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.LEADS ); return isOutsideDebounceWindow(lastLeadsRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.LEADS); }, []); const canRefreshSingleLead = useCallback((): boolean => { const lastSingleLeadRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.SINGLE_LEAD ); return isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastSingleLeadRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.SINGLE_LEAD ); }, []); const canRefreshQuotations = useCallback((): boolean => { const lastQuotationsRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.QUOTATIONS ); return isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastQuotationsRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.QUOTATIONS ); }, []); const canRefreshSingleQuotation = useCallback((): boolean => { const lastSingleQuotationRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.SINGLE_QUOTATION ); return isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastSingleQuotationRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.SINGLE_QUOTATION ); }, []); const canRefreshKyc = useCallback((): boolean => { const lastKycRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh(RefreshableApi.KYC); return isOutsideDebounceWindow(lastKycRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.KYC); }, []); const canRefreshNotifications = useCallback((): boolean => { const lastNotificationsRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.NOTIFICATIONS ); return isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastNotificationsRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.NOTIFICATIONS ); }, []); const canRefreshTickets = useCallback((): boolean => { const lastTicketsRefresh = refreshTimestamps.getLastRefresh( RefreshableApi.TICKETS ); return isOutsideDebounceWindow( lastTicketsRefresh, DEBOUNCE_WINDOWS.TICKETS ); }, []); return { // Main actions refreshAll, refreshSpecific, // State isRefreshing: refreshInfo.isRefreshing, lastRefreshAt: refreshInfo.lastRefreshAt, refreshError: refreshInfo.refreshError, refreshCount: refreshInfo.refreshCount, refreshProgress: refreshInfo.refreshProgress, // Computed state canRefresh: refreshInfo.canRefresh, getFormattedLastRefresh, // Utilities clearError, refreshInBackground, refreshServicesOnly, refreshUserDataOnly, progressPercentage, // Leads refresh (backward compatible) refreshLeads, canRefreshLeads, // Single lead refresh (NEW) refreshSingleLead, canRefreshSingleLead, // Renamed from canRefreshWithCustomDebounce // Quotations refresh (NEW) refreshQuotations, canRefreshQuotations, // Single quotation refresh (NEW) refreshSingleQuotation, canRefreshSingleQuotation, // KYC refresh (NEW) refreshKyc, canRefreshKyc, // Notifications refresh (NEW) refreshNotifications, canRefreshNotifications, // Tickets refresh (NEW) refreshTickets, canRefreshTickets, }; }

Enhanced refresh control hook with configurable debouncing Uses ONLY tag invalidation approach for consistency

src/utils/azureBlobUploader.ts

UPLOAD_CONFIG
Default value : { // Timeout based on environment (in milliseconds) TIMEOUT_MS: __DEV__ ? 10000 : 8000, // 10s dev/staging, 8s prod // Progress update interval PROGRESS_INTERVAL_MS: 100, // Minimum progress ticks for 10MB file MIN_PROGRESS_TICKS: 5, // Maximum retry attempts MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS: 1, // Buffer time for token expiry checks (30 seconds) EXPIRY_BUFFER_MS: 30 * 1000, } as const

Upload configuration
uploadMutex
Default value : new UploadMutex()

    No results matching ""
